item.text: @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra nA ma d+ha ra Ni maN+Dal pra kr-i ya ya thA kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lag len go rims ji lta ba zhes bya ba/

byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho gas rang ngam 'gro ba gzhan gyi gdon dang nad rnams las grol bar 'dod pa'i rdo rje

rigs kyi sgrub pa pos phyugs lhas sam/ shing gcig dang lha khang ngam/ lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ khang stong ngam nags tshal gang yang rung / bsam gtan gyi khang par chag chag dang ba'i rnam lnga dang / spos dri
zhim pos byug ris byas la/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa thams cad rdzogs par bshams nas/ khrus dang 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byas te/ stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs gtsang zhing sar pa gon la/ phyag

na rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis mchod pa byin gyis brlabs la/ yungs kar lag tu thogs te/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nas bin+d+ha bin+d+ha badzra hUM phaT ces pa'i bar du lan gsum mam bcu brjod do/ /de nas bum pa bca' ste/

gser dang dngul lam ma rnyed na zangs sam sa las byas kyang rung ste/ lto ba che la mgrin pa ring ba zhabs zhum pa kha yel ba/ nag po ra ri med pa/ grangs lha grangs dang mthun pa drug gam/ yang na bdun nam gcig kyang

rung ste/ gu gul gyis bdugs pa dang / yungs kar gyis bgegs bzlog la/ der 'o ma dang chu nyung zad blugs pa der rin po che rnams dang / dri lnga dang / sman lnga dang 'bru lngas dgang la mgrin pa gos kyi shing las byung ba'i kha tshar phun tshar ma

nyams pa'i mthing shun gyis kha bsgyur ba'am/ dkar po gsar zhing gtsang bas mgul pa bcings la/ me tog sngon po dang bcas pas kha brgyan la mgul pa ras kyi steng du yungs kar dang rtswa dUr ba nyag ma bdun dang bcas pa dri zhim po'i me

tog phreng bas bcings la/ mdud pa la hUM bris pa'i ba'i lci bas lam lhung bas so/ /gdugs dang ba dan kyang ngo / /de nas maN+Dal gyi steng du gzhag go/ /yang khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/ las kyi rdo rje dang / gsang gdub dang / gdu

bu'i cho ga rnams byas la/ der rang gi snying gar nyi ma la sa bon bltas pa des rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas pa dmigs la/ bde bar gshegs pa dam pa'i chos/ /tshogs chen bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum po phyag na rdo rje la/ /khyad par

du yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid 'ong mchod rdzas ji snyed rnams/ /rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/ /da lta sdig pa bgyis pa dang / /bgyid du stsal dang yi rang ba/ /shin tu 'gyod pas bshags shing sdom/ /bdag dang gzhan

gyis gang bgyis pa'i/ /dge ba kun la rjes yi rang / /byang chub snying po nyer gnas te/ /gang yang byang chub mchog rtogs pa'i/ /bdag gis gsol ba rgyal ba kun/ /'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol/ /bya ba thams cad byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' ba

rnams/ bdag gis gsol ba rgyal ba kun/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' gsol/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs bsod nams gang / /ji snyed bdag gis bgyis pa rnams/ /ji ltar mgon pos mkhyen pa ltar/ /byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo'o/ /de nas rang gis rang ma rtogs pa

stong par bsgom/ a ser pos gser gyi sa gzhir bsam/ de'i steng du baM las 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho bsam/ de nas suM las ri rab/ de steng du b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs dang bcas pa/ dbus dang mtshams bzhir 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dang phyogs bzhi ni

gri gug bzhis mtshan pa'o/ /de'i dbus su raM las stong par song ba'i ngang las chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i sgra byung bar bsam/ oM badzra dz+wa lA na lA ya swA hA/ de las sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med pa/ de las rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi skur grub/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa ni sku mdog ljang

sngon yid tsam khro ba/ g.yas na rdo rje rgya gram la ngos gcig med pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ g.yon dkur brten cing 'gying ba/ mgul rgyan dang dpung brgyan la sogs pa dang ldan pa/ stod g.yogs dar la smad g.yogs dang tshi gu can bsnams pa'o/ /oM tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da ki li kI lA

ya swA hA/ oM trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra ki li kI lA ya swA hA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ oM pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra b+hany+dza nA ya swA hA zhes pa las/ dbang ldan dang me dang srin po dang rlung rnams kyi 'khor lo'i steng du go rims bzhin du rdo rje gdengs pa dang / rdo rje ka na ka dang / rdo rje be con dang /

rdo rje tho ba rnams so/ /de rnams la go rims bzhin du rdo rje gtum mo dang / rdo rje ki li kI la dang / rdo rje be con dang / rdo rje tho ba rnams kyi skur grub po/ /khro bo rdo rje gtum po smug nag bzhin khro gnyer can/ g.yas pa khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyar te thogs pa'o/ /

lha thams cad g.yon bstan nas 'gying ba'o/ /rdo rje ki li kI la ya mdog ljang nag khro gnyer can/ g.yas na rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ rdo rje be con mthing nag khro gnyer can/ smar ser po can/ g.yas na be con gyi rtse mo rdo rjes mtshan pa/ rdo rje tho ba mdog nag po shin tu khro ba mche ba

gtsigs pa/ g.yas na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'o/ /de nas mchod yon lag tu thogs te/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs khro rgyal rnams/ /bdag la mchod yon pa zhes nas kyang / /bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /oM A ha ra A ha ra

sarba bid+ya d+ha ra swA hA zhes pas mchod yon gyis spyan drangs la rang la bstims la/ phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas gdab ste/ gong ma'i sngags lnga brjod cing lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bkug la phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad byung

bar byas la/ gung mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas la/ mthe bong gnyis gshibs pa ni rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi'o/ /g.yon pa ni sdigs mdzub snying gar bzhag pa/ g.yas pa sor mo gsum bsgreng la mthe chung gi sen

mo mtheb mos mnan pa'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur nang du bcings la/ cung zad bsnol ba'i tshul du bcug ste/ mthe bong gnyis gyen du gshibs la bsgreng ngo / /lag pa thal mo phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba las/ mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste tshigs pa bkug nas srin

lag gi drung du gzugs so/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs/ mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug go/ /phyag rgya chen po rnams gong ma bzhin bsgoms pas rgyas gdab/ de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ de nas b+h+rUM las rin po che'i bum pa la nang

'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho las pad+ma 'khrungs par bsams la pad+ma'i steng du zla ba/ de'i steng du sngags lngas lha lnga bskyed la ye shes kyi lha rnams mchod yon gyis spyan drangs la bstim/ phyag rgya gsum gyis rgyas btab nas mchod bstod byas la/ bum pa'i steng du bzhag

la/ de la gzungs thag btags la/ rang dang lha'i thugs kar sngar gyi sngags lnga po gang zlos pa gsal bar dmigs la/ phreng ba snyim par bcug la gzungs thag nas bzung la/ oM badzra a ts+tshin+d+ha ye swA hA zhes brjod la phreng ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung la so so'i sngags

bzlas pas yi ge phreng ba gzungs thag la 'khril nas ye shes sems dpa' mnyes shing bum par ye shes kyi chu rgyun gyis khengs par bsam/ thun rel glal dang sbrid pa gsang sbubs la sogs pa spangs la ma yengs par 'dzab tu dbul lo/ /glal la sogs byung na khrus sogs byas la bzlas pa bskyar/

yang na kun la thun mong du yang snying thun re la brgya rtsa brgyad dam ji ltar nus pa dbul/ de nas mchod bstod byas la/ phyi rol du dpung bzangs las 'byung ba bzhin gtor ma btang la/ lus ngag gi kun spyod bya/ thun gnyis phan chod la rang khrus sogs byas la mchod bstod bzlas pa bya'o/ /

thun tha ma la mchod bstod gtor ma btang ba'i rjes la bzod par gsol la/ slar yang bdag la nges par ni/ /rjes su bzung bar mdzad nas kyang / /mgon po rig dang sngags bcas pas/ /ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsol/ /zhes thabs kyi ye shes pa gshegs su gsol/ /

khro bo bzhi bo rang la bsdu/ rang bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la nyal/ yang tho rangs khrus dang 'thor 'thung nye reg dang las kyi rdo rje cho ga nas bzung la thams cad sngar bzhin byas la/ me long gi ngos ltar mnyam pa la rnam lnga dang dri zhim pos byugs las gzung bya'o/ /de nas khrus dang

'thor 'thung nye reg byas la/ sa gzung nyi ma nas brtsams te/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug gi bar/ /slob dpon rtogs par 'jug par bya/ /dri dang bcas pa'i zas bza' zhing / /zhes gsungs pas/ smyung ba la gnas pa'am/ yang dkar gsum la dris bsgos pa nyung zad

tsam bza'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus sam nub phyogs su ku sha'i stan la 'dug ste/ lha drug gi sgo nas rang lha lngar bskyed cing ye shes bcug nas rgya gsum gyis btab pa la/ shar phyogs nas slob ma'am yon gyi bdag pos khrus la sogs pa byas nas

gos gtsang zhing gsar pa gon la me tog gi phreng ba dri zhim pos bsgos pa lag tu thogs la tsog pur 'dug ste/ mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang / /de dag thams cad zhi bar

blta/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/ /de bas rdo rje rigs mchog gis/ /rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ /zhes dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pas lan gsum gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas sngags 'chang 'greng ste/

rang gi lha'i 'khor lo nam mkha' la bteg la/ rang bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgyur la/ mig la hUM bkod la nyi zla 'bar bar bya zhing / rkang pa gnyis su hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje kha gyes par bsams la/ se gol gyi sgra brdabs shing khro bo'i lta bas phyogs mtshams thams cad lta zhing

rdo rje lan gsum du gsor la/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thugs rje can gyi thabs chen de/ /zhi yang sems can gdul don du/ /dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi 'khyil ba de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags ring brjod do/ /

de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu stong bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rnam pa la smad zur gsum par 'dug pa la/ na ma rat+na tra yA ya nas/ kro d+ha kro d+ha ki li kI lA ya swA hA zhes bya ba'i bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gam brgya rtsa brgyad dam ma nus na lan gsum btab la/ dbus dang mtshams bzhir gdab/

cod pan dang tsan+dan dmar pos thig le gsum dang gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / dri sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa lnga dang / dbu'i gtsug tor rnams rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas brtan ma lhag gnas bya ste/ g.yas pa'i srin lag gi haM gis bkug la/ dri sngon du song ba'i rnam

lngas mchod la/ spos thogs la/ skyob pa sangs rgyas la sogs kyis/ /mkhyen pa gsol ba lan gsum bya/ /de nas lha lnga'i sa dang / phyogs skyong gi gnas su dri'i thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu byas la lha lnga nam mkha' nas phab la bzhugs su gsol/ phyogs skyong

rnams yid tsam mam/ yang na/ ri rgyal gnya' shing 'dzin gyi tshul lto nas/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs so 'tshal/ /bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /log 'dren gzhom pa'i slad du 'dir gshegs shig /e h+ye hi da sha lo ka sa pa ri bA ra sa ma ya s+t+waM

zhes brjod do/ /de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bstod pa kun gyis kyang bstod la/ bum pa gtsang ma 'dir bca' zhing bum pa la mchod la/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu snga ma bzhin du bzlas so/ /yon bdag dang slob ma yang khrus la sogs pa byed du bcug

la/ gsum la skyabs 'gro sbyin/ gtor ma btang la pus mo g.yas pa btsugs la/ dril bu gsil zhing rdo rje dang spos thogs la/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms bcom ldan 'das/ /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rig rgyal khro bo'i tshogs rnams dang / /gang yang gsang

sngags lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba mthu chen rnams/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms dkyil 'khor ni/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na/ /khyod kyis

gnang ba mdzad pa dang / /las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum brjod/ nyi ma 'char ka sngags 'chang g.yog dang bcas pa thig ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs la/ ye shes kyi thig dang las kyi thig dang / kun la slob dpon kha nub tu lta ba lhag ma'o/ /seng ldeng

gi phur bus dbus su btab la/ srad bu brtod pas bskor phyogs su/ rnam 'joms kyi gnas cha chen gcig la bskor/ mu khyud cha bran lnga pa bskor/ de nas lha snam la thug pa la 'khor lo'i mu khyud cha bran gnyis bskor/ de nas phyi rol rdo rje ra ba dang me ri rta babs kyi phyi

rol du cha bran gnyis gnyis la bskor/ de nas 'grus thig btab la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i thig btab/ phyogs bzhir gri gug re bya/ de nas tshon bsgrubs la/ phyogs tshon la shar dkar/ lho ser/ nub dmar/ byang ljang / dbus mthing /

'khor lo bzhi dang gri gug sngo skya/ pad+ma rA ga dang por sngo/ /de'i phyi rol ljang / de'i phyi rol dmar/ de'i phyi rol ser/ kun gyi phyi rol dkar po/ de nas 'khor lo'i dbus dang 'dab ma rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bris la/ dbus su rdo rje rgya gram ljang sngon la

ngos gcig med pa bri/ byang shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa smug nag /shar lho'i rtsibs la rdo rje rtse gcig pa ljang nag /lho nub kyi rtsibs la be con mthing nag /nub byang gi rtsibs la tho ba nag po bri/ 'khor lo'i mu khyud dkar po la/ gru chad ljang gu la bum pa bri/ lha'i snam

bur phyogs skyong dgod/ /de yang gsang ba'i spyi rgyud las/ /brgya byin gyi ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /me lha'i phyag mtshan me thab yin/ /gshin rje yi ni be con te/ /bden bral gyi ni ral gri ste/ /chu bdag gi ni zhags par bya/ /rlung lha'i phyag mtshan rgyal mtshan yin/ /ku be+e ra

yid byug sngon no/ /dbang phyug gi ni tri shU la/ /sa yi lha mo bum pa'o/ /nyi zla'i phyag mtshan de nyid do/ /de rnams gdan byas pa'i steng du dgod par bya'o/ /de nas sgo bzhir nub kyi sgor dpal be'u dang 'khor lo/ byang gi sgor gdugs dang rgyal mtshan/ shar gyi sgor

pad+ma dang bum pa/ lho'i sgor dung dang nya bri/ de nas rta babs la sogs rdzogs par ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas rnam lnga dang dri zhim pos nye bar byugs la/ bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / lhab lhub kyis dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyan cing / me tog sil ma

gtor zhing mchod pa'i yan lag thams cad bshams la dra phur bres la/ de nas sngags 'chang bdag nyid khrus la sogs pa thams cad la/ nub sgor rtsa ku sha'i stan la 'dug la/ las kyi rdo rje'i cho ga dang gsang gdub dang gdu bu'i cho ga rnams byas la maN+Dal blang la mtshan ma

dang sta gon gyi lha bsres la/ me tog sngon po'i phreng ba thogs la rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing / oM badzra dz+wa lA na lA ya swA hA zhes brjod cing lan gsum gsum bskor ba byas la/ me tog rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi dbu la phul/ slar rang gi mgo la bcings la/ nub sgor 'greng la khro bo'i bstod

pa btang la/ bgegs la la zhig sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ dngos grub kyi bar chad rtsom pa/ rig pa'i rgyal bo drag po'i rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba 'dis mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so zhes brjod cing / a mo g+ha badzra/ oM h+ye hi badzra zhes pa nas badzra rA ga dz+wa lA ya

swA hA'i bar du lan cig brjod pas mtshams bcad/ de nas sngags 'chang nub sgor ku sha'i gdan nyid la bsdad la/ dril bu gsil zhing sbos snod thogs la/ ye shes bskal ba me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /ma rig 'dod pa'i bdud khams thams cad bsregs/ /zhe sdang gshin

rje'i 'jig rten thams cad 'joms/ /log 'dren srin po ma lus gdul ba yin/ /dpa' bo dpa' mtshan stag lpags rlon pa gsol/ /rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo bzhugs so 'chal/ /log 'dren 'joms pa'i slad du spyan 'dren gyis/ /'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su

gsol/ /badzra bi dA ra ma hA kro d+ha sa pa ri bA ra sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod/ de nas mchod yon phul la/ dam tshig la ye shes gzhug pa ni ma tis+thi ra badzra/ shru tis+thi ra badzra/ pra tis+thi ra badzra/ ma hA badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra zhes pas bzhugs su gsol/ de nas dam tshig chen po de'i phyag

rgya bstan te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong mthe'u chung mnan la lhag ma rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i tshul du bsgreng ba'o/ /oM shaM ka re ma hA sa ma ye swA hA zhes brjod pa ni dam tshig chen po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya gsum gyis gdab/ de nas bum pa sngar bzhin bzlas la gzhug

go/ /dam tshig gso ste lag pa gnyis rgyab tu thal mo sbyar ba'i tshul du byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor 'khyud la lte ba'i thad kar bzhag la/ oM badzrod b+ha ba ya swA hA zhes brjod pa rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig bskang zhing gso ba'o/ /sku khrus gsol/ mchod yon phul/

dri sngon du 'gro bas rnam lnga dbul/ 'dod yon dang rin po che sna bdun dang / 'phra mchod dbul/ de nas bstod de/ chos nyid stong pa gnyis med ngang nyid las/ /'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong ste/ /thabs la mkhas pa'i 'jigs byed skur ston pa/

khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ye shes zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /sku yi cha lugs za byed rngam stabs can/ /gsung gi nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgra/ /ma lus dbang du sdud la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lha yi ye shes rol pas rab ston cing / bsdigs pa'i

mtshon cha mang po phyag na bsnams/ /nyon mongs dug chen sna tshogs 'joms mdzad pa/ /dug sbrul rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM gtum chen 'bar ba bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'od zer 'gyur ba bzhin/ /rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong

bzhin du sgrogs/ /khro rgyal bgegs tshogs 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /dpa' bo'i stong stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis/ /bgegs dpung sreg par mdzad la phyag

'tshal bstod/ /de nas dpung bzangs nas 'byung ba bzhin/ shar phyogs rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs bcas/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / dbang bo rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ zhes pa la sogs kyis phyogs skyong la gtor ma dang bstod pa bya/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas

la sogs kyis 'byung po'i gtor ma btang / de nas gang zag de khrus dang 'thor 'thung dang nye reg byed du bcug la gos gtsang ma gon du bcug /dkyil 'khor dang sngags 'chang gnyis la phyag byed du bcug la/ lag tu me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pas/ rig sngags 'chang

chen dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal las thar phyir/ /rdo rje 'dzin de 'khor bcas la/ /bdag ni gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /de nas sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod par bya ste/ ji ltar sngon tshe bde gshegs pho brang du/ /

gdug pa 'dul phyir rdo rje can gyis ni/ /rjes mthun phrin las khyad par gang bsgo ba/ /dam bcas phrin las de ni grub par mdzod/ /de slad bgegs dang log 'dren tshar bcad ltar/ /'gro ba nyam thag 'di ni gzung ba'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal nges bsal bde mchog la sbyar ba'i/ /

khro rgyal khyed kyis deng 'dir byin brlabs gsol/ /de nas 'gro ba de rtswa ku sha'i steng du bzhag la/ gdug pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad de/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya nas hUM phaT kyi bar du brjod/ de nas las bum gyis bkru zhing / sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ /zhes pa nas/ sdig

pa kun las rnam par thar/ /zhes pa'i bar du khrus kyi phan yon brjod cing bkru'o/ /de nas khrus sa'i stegs bu khru gsum pa la khru do stong par dbang su bzhag la khru phyed lha snam la phyogs skyong rnams bkod la/ khru gang la rta babs med pa'i sgo bzhi bris te/ dbus su rtswa

ku sha bting bar 'gro ba der bzhag pa'am/ khrus sa'i stegs bu ma 'byor na/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha lnga bum par yid kyis spyan drangs la/ rma bya'i sgro la sogs pa mtshan ma lnga pos phyis la/ der rtswa ku sha'am ras dkar po bting la/ 'gro ba der bzhag la bum pa rnams thogs te/

gang la ser sna rnams chags pa'i/ /rnam 'joms dri med mdzad pa yi/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du sdud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyod la bde

legs byed par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang gis byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ kha gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des/ /

khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /brgya byin bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / /'byung po kun gyi

bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu byin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kun gyis bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi 'dod 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring 'grub gyur cig /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag

kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shog /ces brjod la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya nas na maHtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA ba ta ye/ oM badzra dz+wa lA na lA ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA zhes khro bo bzhi'i sngags dang 'bru spel la bkru/

sdig pa dang nad dang gdon la sogs pa dag par bsams la/ shar sgo nas bton la gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byin la snying gar rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi phyag mtshan bskyed cing bcug la bzhag /de nas slob ma rdo rje'i rwa la 'dzin du bcug la/ ya gcig nas slob dpon gyis bzung la/

'gro ba 'di la nga yis bsrungs zin gyis/ /da ni 'di la sus kyang gnod ma byed/ /gal te 'di la gnod pa byas gyur na/ /mgo bo tshal ba brgyar ni 'gas par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod la srung ba'i 'khor lo'am srung skud gdags/ nyi ma gza' las grol ba bzhin du che ge mo 'di

yang nad dang gdon la sogs pa las grol bar gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig /mang du brjod cing rol mo mang du yang rdung du gzhug go/ /de nas ras dkar po gtsang ma'i steng du bkra shis kyi rdzas rnams bzhag ste/ yungs kar dang / dUr ba dang / bil ba dang / gi wang dang / li khri

dang / zho dang / me long dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dang brgyad byin te/ yungs kar rdo rje'i rigs te thams cad du/ /bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms par byed pa'o/ /mthu stobs yon tan phun sum tshogs 'gyur bar/ /bkra shis des kyang thams cad zhi bar shog /dUr

bas tshe ni 'phel bar byed pa ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ni rab grub nas/ /nyon mongs skye shi rgyun chad gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang tshe ni 'phel bar shog /bil bas rgyu rkyen 'bras bur gyur pa'i chos/ /'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i spyod pa kun/ /byang chub snying po mchog tu

gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang mchog tu grub gyur cig /gi wang dug gsum 'joms pa'i nad kyi sman/ /chos kyi chos nyid rab tu rtogs nas ni/ /nyon mongs zug rngu med par gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang sdug bsngal bral gyur cig /li khri dmar po dbang gi rang

bzhin te/ /chos rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus nas kyang / /chos kyi rgyal srid rab brtan gyur pa ste/ /bkra shis des kyang khyod srid brtan gyur cig /zho ni kun gyi snying por gyur pas na/ /snying po rnam dag ye shes rnam rtogs nas/ /yon tan chos kyi dbyings su gyur pa yi/ /

bkra shis des kyang dug gsum zhi bar shog /me long ye shes chen po'i rgya mtsho yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mchog tu bdag gyur te/ /rnam dag chos la thogs med longs spyod pa'i/ /bkra shis des kyang deng khyod dga' gyur cig /dung ni chos kyi sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i tshul/ /

ye shes rgya mtsho nyid du bdag gyur te/ /chos rnams ma lus yongs su ston pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang tshig la dbang thob shog /ces blangs la slob ma la sbyin no/ /de ma 'byor na dkar gsum tsam mam 'bras chan la bkra shis brjod la sbyin/ /slob mas kyang 'byor tshad kyis

mchod sbyin bya/ /de nas slar bum pa'i lha dang dkyil 'khor dang bum pa'i lha la gang yang bdag blo gti mug la sogs kyis bshags/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /la sogs kyis ye shes pa gshegs su gsol la/ dam tshig pa rnams rang la bsdus la

rang bdud rtsi 'khyil par bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad ni gdod ma nas dag pa'o/ /rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'o zhes brjod cing rdul tshon phyags la bum pa dang / dman pa rnams chu bo'am gnas mthon por bskyal lo/ /dam pa rnams kyi gzhung bzung nas/ /sna tshogs rgyud la

rab brtan te/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ldan pa yi/ /khrus kyi cho ga brtsams pa las/ /dri med dge ba gang thob des/ /'gro kun sdug bsngal zhi nas kyang / /lam mchog rnams la zhugs gyur cig /rig sngags 'chang gi slob dpon rat+na shI

las mdzad pa'i rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga gzhan la phan par byed pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra bo d+hi dang / lo tsA ba tshul dge rin chen gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ M ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra

bi dA ra Na d+hA ra NI sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shigs kun 'joms rdo rje 'dzin/ /khros shing gtum pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /rdo rje yon tan rdzogs btud de/ /

de nyid bsgrub pa'i rim pa bshad/ /dad brtan g.yo dang nga rgyal med/ /ser sna chung zhing bla mar gus/ /'di la lhag par che dad pas/ /bsgrub pa 'di 'bad bde legs shog /dang por yid 'ong phyogs su yang / /'gro ba bsgral ba'i bsam pa yis/ /rtag tu 'di la brtson par

bya/ /maN+Dal mchod dang gtor ma dang / /las dang po yi rnal 'byor pas/ /dmigs pa'i rten kyang bri bar bya/ /rang nyid phyi nang khrus byas te/ /khyad par du ni lus kyi khrus/ /dri yi chu yis rtag tu bya/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang nyid zla ba sa bon bsam/ /de yi 'od

kyis bla ma sogs/ /nam mkha'i phyogs su dmigs nas ni/ /byin gyis brlab par gsol ba gdab/ /de nas sems can thams cad la/ /lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya/ /de bzhin snying rje dga' ba dang / /btang snyoms tshul bzhin bsgom par bya/ /de rjes rnam par mi

rtog pa'i/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsgom par bya/ /de la cung zad dmigs nas ni/ /rnam par rtog par ldang bar bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa mi dmigs kyang / /sngags kyi sgra ru bsgom par bya/ /de rjes rang gi shes pa ni/ /sngags kyi phreng bar bsgom par bya/ /gsung gi rnam

par rdzogs pa yi/ /phra zhing gsal pa'i rnam par ro/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de/ /gsal zhing cha ma 'dres par bsam/ /de yi 'od kyis 'gro ba rnams/ /rnam par 'joms pa byas nas ni/ /tshur la bsdu ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /rang snying rnam par 'joms par bsgom/ /zhabs

gnyis chu 'dzin dag la ni/ /g.yon brkyang bas ni rnam par bzhugs/ /sku ni in+d+ra nI la dang / /rdo rje snying po dang yang mtshungs/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste/ /spyan dmar dpral ba khro gnyer can/ /mgo skyes dmar ser gyen 'greng ba/ /gsus pa che zhing sbrul gyis

brgyan/ /smad ni ba ti mnabs pa ste/ /sku stod dar la yis dkris pa/ /rin po che yi dpung rgyan can/ /rang gi bdag po dbu la gnas/ /g.yas pa rgya gram phyogs gsum bsnams/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin/ /sra zhing mkhregs pa'i sku dang ldan/ /'ja'

ltar gsal ba'i bdag nyid du/ /bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab bya zhing / /gnas lnga dag tu gtug par bya/ /oM badzra dz+wa lA na lA ya swA hA/ de nas rang mdog phyag mtshan dang / /blo yis gsal bar bsgom

par bya/ /gsal ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya/ /de las skyon sngags bzlas pa/ /de ni phyi dang nang gi'o/ /de la nang gi bshad bya ste/ /rang nyid zla ba rang sa bon/ /de yi mtha' ma gsang sngags rgyal/ /mu tig 'ja' dang mar me ltar/ /rnam pa de

ldan zla bar bsgom/ /de la cung zhig dmigs nas ni/ /yang ni gsang sngags rgyal bo bzlas/ /de dag ni na mo rat+na tra yA ya zhes pa nas/ a mr-i te hUM phaT ces pa'i bar du'o/ /de ni sgra dang bcas pa'o/ /rang snying khro bo'i tshogs spros te/ /kun kyang gsang sngags rgyal po zlos/ /

sngags kyi 'brug gi sgra dang bcas/ /phyogs rnams kun du rnam par spro/ /gdug pa can rnams pa sdigs par mdzad/ /de bzhin spro zhing bsdu ba ni/ /mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag spyod la/ /zhi la 'od zer dkar po ste/ /dbang la lcags kyu dmar po'o/ /rgyas pa la ni ser po ste/ /

de ltar las dang rjes mthun par/ /'od zer dag kyang spro bar bya/ /phyi ni nam mkha'i zla dkyil du/ /yi ge'i phreng ba bsam byas te/ /rgyud las ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya/ /de ltar bsam gtan 'bum gyi bar/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'o/ /de

ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas ni/ /las rnams kun du spyad par bya/ /de dag rab tu bshad pa ni/ /rig sngags bcad dang bcing ba dang / /phur bus gdab cing mnan par bya/ /de bzhin nor sogs rgyas pa dang / /sdig sogs zhi dang dbang du bya/ /de la dbang

du bya ba ni/ /byi ru dmar 'dra'i sa gzhi la/ /mo yi pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /thab khung dag ni bca' zhing bsam/ /de nas star bu'i me bus te/ /me yi lha ni bdag po nyid/ /dmar po lcags kyu thogs bsams nas/ /mngon byas nas ni 'od zer spro/ /gsang sngags mjug

la las mthun gdags/ /star bu'i 'bru dang me tog dmar/ /phub ma dag ni brgya stong sreg /de yis gang 'dod de bzhin no/ /pad ltar dkar ba'i sa gzhi la/ /zla rgyas 'dra ba'i thab khung du/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i me sbar te/ /rang lha dkar po bdud rtsir ldan/ /de la skad cig

dmigs byas la/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i 'o ma sbags/ /de bzhin dkar po'i rdzas rnams la/ /de bzhin yang ni sngags bzlas te/ /ji tsam nus pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /sa gzhi ser zhing 'phos pa na/ /dbang chen lta bu'i dbyibs su bya/ /mkhas pas thab ni bca' bya zhing / /star

ka a ru ra yi me/ /cho ga dang bcas sbar bya ste/ /'bras bur bcas pa'i yam shing la/ /de bzhin ba ru la sogs kyis/ /dbang chen la gnas bcom ldan 'das/ /gser mdog 'dra zhing dbang chen 'phro/ /de la sbyin sreg stong byas la/ /gang dag 'dod pa rgyas par bya/ /de dag

las kyi rim pa ste/ /rang nyid bsnyen pa rdzogs pas su/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rjes dran bya/ /gang dag gdon gyis nyen pa yi/ /cho ga la sogs bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor legs par byas nas ni/ /bum pa rdzas sogs ldan par bri/ /gsang sngags brgya dang

gcig bzlas te/ /bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor steng gzhag ste/ /de la khrus ni lan gsum bya/ /srung skud mdud pa gsum pa ni/ /dpung pa'am srin lag dag la bcing / /des ni grol bar the tshom med/ /'khor lo dag gis bsrung bya ni/ /rtsibs bzhi'i mtshams su mtshon char

ldan/ /mu khyud me ri rdo rjes bskor/ /gur kum gi waM dag gis bris nas ni/ /snga dro cho ga ldan par bsrung bar bya/ /de ltar 'di ni bsrung ba'i rgyal po ste/ /'gro ba rnams la gsang sngags rgyal pos brlab/ /de rgyud de dang gzhan las gsungs pa'o/ /oM badzra dz+wa lA na lA ya swA hA/

oM tsu ru tsu ru tsaN+Da ki li kI lA ya swA hA/ oM trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra ki li kI lA ya swA hA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ oM pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra b+hany+dza nA ya swA hA/ bsrung ba yi'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ya/ mahA yak+Sha se nA ba ta ye/ tar+ya thA/ oM sarba byA d+hi/ sarba big+h+nAn/

sarba dur swa p+ni/ sarba du rmi ti/ sarba gra he/ sarba dz+wa re/ sarbA kA la mr-i t+yu/ sarba u pa dra pe b+h+yaH/ sarba sha trUM/ sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA zhes khrus kyi'o/ /oM sarba puSh+Ta ye puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa'i'o/ /oM badzra ba shaM ku ru swA hA zhes dbang du bya'o/ /'di rnams las dang mthun pa'i sngags kha las kyang

shes par bya'o/ /'di ni rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi sgrub thabs rgyud dang 'brel pa'i las dang bcas par shes par bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'dir ma bkod pa rnams bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/ /'di ni sgrub thabs kun gyi rgyal/ /rang sems mos pa'i rjes 'brel pa'i/ /rtog pa

dang bcas sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rnal 'byor rnams la phan byed yin/ /'di byas bsod nams dri med pa/ /zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel gyur pa'i/ /'gro rnams mos pa'i bye brag 'grub gyur te/ /rnam par 'joms pa'i sku 'grub shog /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs

las dang bcas pa slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga /chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la rab gnas kyang / /thugs rjes gtan du mya ngan mi 'da' zhing / /'dod pa'i don grub mtha' yas

gzugs mnga' ba/ /dpa' brtan rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por bum pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i dbang du mdzad nas/ nor bu yungs kar dUr ba dang / /rin chen rma med tsan+dan bcas/ /shel dang rdo rje'i me tog dang / /chu yi gser ram yang na ni/ /dngul gyi bum

pa dag kyang rung / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing dgang / /zhes gsungs pas/ gser ram dngul lam zangs las byas kyang rung / zhabs kyi gdub kor ni 'phang du sor gcig gi tshad du byas la gdags so/ /dbus kyi dbyibs ni lhung bzed 'dra bar bya'o/ /

mgrin pa'i 'phang du so bzhi'i tshad du bya'o/ /mgrin pa'i nang gi tshad kyang sor bzhi pa'i sbubs su bya'o/ /mgrin pa'i kha khyer phyir skyed pa ni sor gnyis kyi tshad du byas la/ kha'i cha ga'i bshal ka sor gcig gi tshad du bya'o/ /dbul po rnams kyis dngul dang gser dang zangs la

sogs pa las bya ba mi rnyed pas de'i phyir rgyu gzhan las bya bar gsungs te/ bum pa pad+ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar zhing byi ru dang li khri dang mtshal gyi mdog ltar dmar ba dang / so btang nyes pa'i nag po ra ri med par bya'o/ /ltor ni chu phul lnga yan chod nas bcu shong ba'i tshad

gar nus pa'i chad byas te/ de nas lag pa byug spos kyis byugs te/ dri zhim po shin tu bkra shis pa'i bdug pas bdugs la/ gu gul la/ oM a mr-i te hUM phaT ces bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis lan bdun du bzlas pas bum pa'i nang du bdugs la/ chu gtsang ma srog

chags med par btsags pas bkang ste/ de'i nang du tsan+dan dang ga pur dang / gur kum dang dzA ti dang / gla rtsi lnga po bsres pa'i chu yang blugs nas der rin po che lnga zhes bya ba nor bu rin po che dang / byi ru dang / gser sa le sbram dang / mu tig dang / shel dag dang / sman lnga

zhes bya ba bya kr-i dang / sreng kri dang / gi bri kar ni dang / sa hA dang / sa ha de ba dang / 'bru lnga zhes bya ba nas dang / so ba dang / til dang / mon sran dang / mon sran gre 'u rnams kyang bcug la bum pa'i khar gser ram dngul phor ram khar phor gtsang ma'i nang du yungs kar

blugs pa'i snod bzhag ste/ ras gtsang ma kha tshar ma god pas bum pa'i kha dang yungs kar gyi snod dang bcas pa dkri zhing g.yogs la bcings te/ mdud pa'i steng du ba'i lci bas rgyas gdab pa'i tshul du glan la der rtswa dUr ba'i nyag ma bdun btsugs te phyag na rdo rje la dbul

bar 'os pa'i me tog dmar po dri zhim po'am/ yang na me tog dri zhim po gang yang rung ba'i phreng bas kyang bum pa'i mgrin pa bskor ba'i don no/ /dkyil 'khor med par bum pa 'ba' zhig gis 'dod pa'i las mi 'grub pas thog mar dkyil 'khor bri nas brtag dgos pas/

spyi rgyud dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las 'dir sbyar bar bya ste/ phyugs lhas shing gcig lha yi khang pa'am/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khang stong nags tshal du/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar bstan pa yang de nyid las/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i

tshad/ /tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bri/ /phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su gzung / /sgo bzhi pa la phyogs kyi rtsa yang dgram/ /zhes gsungs te/ /de yang sa gzhi shin tu sbyangs shin tu 'thas par bcags pa la ba'i rnam lnga zhes bya ba/ 'o ma dang / mar dang /

zho dang / gcin dang / lci ba rnams dang / spos rnams bsres pa rnams kyis bskus la thig gdab par bya'o/ /khru bzhi'i tshad la gru bzhi par byas la phur bus legs par gdab bo/ /de'i dbus su gsang sngags 'chang khrus byed pa'i sa khru do gzhag go/ /de'i phyi rim khru gang gi

khyon yod pa la cha gsum du bgos te/ dang por 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi gnas su bya'o/ /gnyis pa ni sgo khyud dang mu khyud mu tig gi phreng ba dag bri'o/ /gsum pa la ni mchod pa dag bri'o/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams dgod pa yang / spyi'i rgyud gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las/

'di skad du/ brgya byin gyi ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /me lha'i phyag rgya me thab yin/ /gshin rje'i phyag rgya be con te/ /bden bral gyi ni ral grir bstan/ /chu bdag gi ni zhags par bstan/ /rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin/ /ku ber yi dbyug to yin/ /dbang phyug gi ni rtse gsum

gsungs/ /sa yi phyag rgya bum pa yin/ /nyi zla'i phyag rgya zlum por bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor ni sgo bzhir btod cing / bkra shis brgyad po dpal be'u dang / 'khor lo dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / pad+ma dang / bum pa dang / dung dang / nya dag bris pas

mdzes par bya'o/ /dbus su ni ku sha bting zhing phyi rol thog tu yang ku sha dgram mo/ /steng du yang bla res legs par dgab cing me tog gi phreng ba dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / me long gis brgyan na khrus kyi cho ga bkra shis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bum pa

yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa bzlas shing btsugs nas/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la yang gsang sngags de nyid bzlas shing bskor bas mtshams gcad par bya'o/ /bshos dang gtor ma

bkod pa yang / dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las/ bza' dang sha chang la phug la sogs bcas/ /'bras chan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin/ /zhes gsungs te/ ma phye ba yang 'os 'os su phye ste/ sha chang la phug dag ni gshin rje dang bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa la

sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bdag nyid phyi nang gi dri ma dag par byas la/ gos sar pa bgos te/ cho ga brtsams pa'i dbang du mdzad nas/ des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems dngas shing / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab

brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ /zhes gsungs te/ de'i don ni rang gi rgyud dag par byed de dkyil 'khor gyi nub sgor 'greng la/ lag pa byug spos kyis byugs nas/ rang gi lha ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du bsgoms la/ mig gnyis su yi ge

hUM 'bar ba re bsams la se gol gyi sgra phyung zhing / phyogs su bltas pas mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad nas/ slar stan bde ba la 'dug nas dkyil 'khor de yang rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i lha'i gnas bzang po dpe med par dmigs shing / bum pa de yang yid bzhin

gyi rgya mtsho'i bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar dmigs te/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las/ kha phye ste pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni pad+ma'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yin te/ de'i sngags la/ oM pad+ma kam la ye swA hA zhes brjod nas yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i dbus su pad+ma'i sdong po dang lo ma dang 'dab ma

dang ze ba dang / snying por bcas pa dpe med par bzang zhing che ba gcig bsams te/ mchod yon gyi snod blangs la sgreng zhing 'di skad du/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis/ /tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gi mchod yon bzhes su gsol/ /mchod

yon bzhes nas de nyid du/ /mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /A ha ra A ha ra/ sarba bid+ya d+har pU dzi te swA hA zhes brjod pas 'phags pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par rig pa dang / bar 'dir phyir 'breng ba'i bgegs bskrad/ a mr-i tas

bsang yang na rtsa sngags sam bskrad sngags kyis so/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mthe bong gis mnan te/ lhag ma gsum nas do tsam gyis ma reg par byas te/ /rdo rje'i tshul du byas nas bstan pa ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te/ de'i sngags la/ oM shaM

ka re ma hA sa ma ye swA hA zhes brjod nas/ gdan de la 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kyi khyad par las byung ba/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba mdog sngon po yid tsam khro ba/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rgya gram las rwa phyogs gcig med pa bsams pa/ phyag g.yon pa

dkur brten cing 'gying ba/ dbu rgyan rtse bran can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bza' stod g.yogs dar la smad g.yogs tshi gu can mnabs pa/ 'khor rigs kyi lha dpag tu med pa dang gshegs par dmigs shing / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la

srin lag gnyis nang du bkug ste/ phan tshun bsnol ba'i rtse mo mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad 'byung bar byas la/ gung mo gshibs phyi rol nas mdzub mo bkug la nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas te/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gshibs pa ni rdo rje rnam par

'joms pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las thams cad byed do/ /de'i sngags la/ oM badzra dz+wa lAn lA ye swA hA/ de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga rim bzhin du dbul ba ni/ dang por byug spos dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i byug spos 'di/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul

lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /A ha ra A ha ra sarba bid+ya d+ha ra pU dzi te swA hA/ de nas me tog dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar skyes pa yi/ /lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'di/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la

dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas bdug pa dbul te/ shing gi khu ba yid du 'ong / /dri yis rgyas pa bdug pa'i mchog /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /lha bshos dbul te/ sman rnams khu ba yi gar 'ong / /dri yis rgyas pa

lha yi zas/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /'di yan chad kyi sngags ni gong mar smos pa gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de'i 'og tu mar me dbul te/ gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis la/ /dge zhing mun pa rnam sel

ba/ /lha rdzas bzang po'i zhun mar 'di/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /A lo ka A lo ka sarba bid+ya d+ha ra pU dzi te swA hA/ de nas gdon rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam

mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal sbyar de dag la ni gsol ba 'debs/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa

rnams/ /gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig /sems can gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yul gang gnas dang / /gang dag shar nub nyi ma'i khyim gnas dang / /chu bo kun dang chu yi ngogs rnams dang / /rin chen gnas su'ang gnas

ni bcas pa dang / /rdzing dang mtsho dang lu ma ltang lteng dang / /khron pa dang ni ngam grog chu mig dang / /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer nags tshal dang / /khong stong dag dang lha yi gnas dag dang / /lha khang mchod rten 'dug gnas bsti gnas dang / /mu stegs gnas dang glang chen

khang pa dang / /gang dag rgyal po'i dkor khong gnas pa dang / /srang dang khyams dang lam kha'i bzhi mdo dang / /gang dag shing gcig po dang lam po che/ /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang / /gang dag seng ge glang chen dred kyi gnas/ /'jigs pa'i sa dang 'brog na gnas

pa dang / /gling bzang rnams su gnas ni bcas pa dang / /gang dag lhun po dur khrod gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu thugs dgyes dri dang phreng ba dang / /bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod gus 'bul/ /'di dag bzhes nas bsnams dang gsol mdzod la/ bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras

bu mchis par mdzod/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las kha phye ste bkan pa ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags la srin po rnams la krang ke re/ sha za rnams la/ mi tsi mi tsi/ 'byung po rnams la gung gung / thams cad la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/

sarba tat+khaM ung+ga te s+pha raN i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ de ltar gdon rnams la gtor ma byin nas phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las/ sor mo dbus ma gsum bskyed de/ pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o/ /de'i sngags la/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su

ru drA ya swA hA/ dbang po'i phyogs su sha krA ya swA hA/ me'i phyogs su ag+na ye swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su bep+ta ye swA hA/ bden bral phyogs su rak+Sha sa a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su me ga a sha nA ya swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bA ya be+e swA hA/ ku be+e ra'i phyogs

su yak+Sha bid+d+ha re swA hA/ steng gi phyogs su a di t+yA ya swA hA/ nyi ma'i'o/ /zla ba'i tsan+d+rA ya swA hA/ 'og gi phyogs su phr-i thi bye swA hA/ sa'i lha mo'i'o/ /de ltar phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod de/ bzlas brjod bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /yang na lan

grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas su/ /rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig /ces 'byung ba'i don ni de ltar 'phags pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'byung po thams cad la mchod pa byas nas/ bum pa'i nang du 'phags pa spyan drangs pa de nyid

kyang srog dang bcas pa lta bur dmigs te/ de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa la yi ge'i phreng ba rnams bkod de bzlas so/ /lha'i sku dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge'i phreng ba la dus gcig tu dmigs pa ni 'jig rten na za 'og la sogs

pa'i gding ba khra bo la lta ba dang 'dra'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu'i nang du yi ge'i phreng ba mang ba ji ltar bkod ce na/ sems goms pa rnams la mi rung ba med de/ chu nyung du shin tu dang ba'i nang du nyi zla dang / gza' skar la sogs pas brgyan pa'i nam mkha' thams cad snang ba

bzhin no/ /rgyal po zhes pas 'dzin du zad do/ gzhan yang khrus kyi sbyor ba bya ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi/ /mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kun/ /de dag thams cad zhi bar lta/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar

'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/ /zhes gsungs te/ de ltar bzlas brjod kyi grangs tshang nas phyogs bcu'i lha rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad pa yang bsgrag par bya ste/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon

gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha/ /ma mo'i rgyal po

gdon gyi bdag /ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa

chu yi lha/ /bden pa gsung ba gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /rlung gi phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /

gnod sbyin lag na be con thogs/ /nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa

bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gi klu ste sa yi lha/ /sa 'dzin lag pa chen po ste/ /dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang / /zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la/ /mchod

pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /de nas shu ti dang ba'i rnam lnga chu dang sbyar ba la/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags gong du smos pa btab ste/ khrus byed pa'i lus bskus te/ dril nas khrus byas te gos sar pa bgos nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi sgor 'dug ste/ de la srung ba chen po bya'o/ /

de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byin te/ dkyil 'khor bskor du bcug la/ gus pas phyag byas la/ cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rtswa ku sha bkram pa'i steng du bde bar 'dug la/ gsang sngags zlos pas bum pa blangs te/ gzungs sngags bzlas

shing khrus byed du bcug la phyi nang gi dri ma thams cad ma lus par dag par bsam mo/ /shin tu bde legs dang bkra shis dang / rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i tshig dang rol mo'i sgra skad rab tu snyan pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar dang / zho dang / dUr ba dang / li khri dang / me long dang /

dung dang / bil ba'i 'bras bu dang / gi wang rnams kyang slob ma'i nang du ras khri'u bting ba'i nang du bzhag ste/ de bkra shis 'don pa'i lag tu bzhag nas rdzas de rnams re re nas blangs shing sbyin no/ /de nas byab bya ste/ rma bya'i steng du zla ba'i steng du gzungs sngags bsams la/ des

byab cing gzungs ring brjod pa'i gsham la che ge mo'i sarba byA d+hi la sogs pa sbyar ro/ /de nas bsrung ba bya ste/ skud pa la bsrung ba byas la gdags/ gzungs ring bris la de la rab gnas byas pa gdags so/ /de nas yang bsrung ba bya ste/ rdo rje phyed de'i lag tu byin nas zhi ba dang dga'

ba'i sems kyis longs shig ces bya ba'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje phyed po de la bzung nas gdon thams cad las thar nas ldang ste/ zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bzung ba las thar ba bzhin du lus sdig pa dang bral ba'i dbang du mdzad nas/ sdig pa thams

cad byang byas nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed/ /rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste/ /dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / /tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / /

mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang / /phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las gnod pa dang / /'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang / /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / /mya ngan ngal

las byung ba yis/ /rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang / /cho ga 'di yi phan yon gyis/ /de dag las ni thar bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa'o/ /de nas 'byor na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang gzhan du na 'di ltar bya'o/ /byams pa che dang snying rje che/ /mnyam par ldan par byas kyang

rung / /de yang zhi bar shes bya ste/ /nang gi sbyin sreg dam pa yin/ /'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra Na sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms

pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ gdug pa kun gyi dgrar gyur pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal la gus btud de/ /rgyas pa bsgom par mi nus dang / /sdug bsngal nad kyis nyen pa la/ /de don sgrub thabs 'bad par bya/ /snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /mgul khug nyungs kar tshags byas

te/ kha bshal khrus dang ldan byas la/ /dben gnas bde ba'i stan la 'dug /badzra bcu yis mtshams bcad de/ /rang snying bsil zla hUM bkod de/ /de 'od bde gshegs spyan drangs te/ /mkha' la gsal bkod mdun rdzogs bya/ /chos nyid dang gnas de rjes la/ /drag

po'i hUM sgra stong zil gnon/ /stong gsum g.yo ldan mkha' 'byung bsam/ /de rjes hUM 'od mkha' la bsam/ /de las yaM baM laM suM chad/ /de dag rim gyis zhu gyur pas/ /rlung mtsho sa ri rgyal por 'gyur/ /de steng a hUM paM zhu bas/ /zla nyi pad+ma'i gdan du bsam/ /de steng hUM babs

zhu 'gyur bas/ /sna tshogs pa yi rdo rje la/ /phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam/ /de 'od bde gshegs mtha' dag bsdus/ /de gyur rdo rje snying po'o/ /sku ljang spyan gsum phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rgya gram la/ /ngos gcig yu bar 'dzin pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa

sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin/ g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ /dbu skra gyen brdzes klu rigs brgyan/ /mche gtsigs phyag rdor sprul par bsgom/ /de thugs hUM las 'od zer 'phros/ /badzra gnyis dang bcas pa yis/ /sngon lha'i ye shes spyan drangs te/ /na

mo rat+na tra yA yas/ /ye shes lha la phyag byas te/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsa gnyis med bya/ /badzra brgyad dang kI la lnga/ /badzra bdun tshogs brjod byas pas/ /sku gsung thugs sogs byin gyis brlab/ /thugs hUM las byas bde gshegs bkug/

na masma man sngags sogs kyis/ /khro bo nyid la dbang bskur bsam/ /de lhar gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /de skyo gzungs sngags rim pa gsum/ /mos ba'i bye brag bzlas par bya/ /de skyo gtor btang ye shes dbyung / /mchod la gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /lha yi nga rgyal

ldan par bya/ /bdag blo shin tu dman gyur kyang / /yi dam lhas bskul sgrub thabs 'bad/ /'bad pas dge ba ci thob pas/ /'gro rnams re 'dod skong bar shog /bdag kyang yi dam lung bstan bzhin/ /rang 'dod gnas su skye bar shog /kun gyis yi dam zhal mthong shog /bdag

gi bstan bcos rgyas gyur cig /slob dpon chen po mkhas pa rat+na kI rtis mdzad pa'i/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta ma hA pa Na'i rang 'gyur ro/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra Na snan bi d+hi

nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ las rnams bzhi po mthar phyin pa/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i sku la 'dud/ /bum mang bca' bar mi nus la/ /phrin las rnam pa bzhi po yi/ /bum gcig cho ga bstan par bya/ /rgyud nas

phrin las rnam bzhi gsungs/ /bum gcig cho ga rnam pa bzhi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /bum gcig cho ga bcu gnyis 'gyur/ /zhi ba dkar dang rgyas pa ser/ /dbang ni dmar dang drag po nag /bum pa mgul chings gzungs thag sogs/ /las dang mthun par 'gyur

byas te/ /gu gul tsan+dan dud pa dang / /las bzhi yi ni sngags dang ni/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /bum pa bdug cing bsang ba bya/ /rgyu bzang bum pa tshad ldan nang / /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ni/ /so so'i tshon gyis bris nas ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni gang byed pa'i/ /

yi ge rdzas dang bcas pa ni/ /ras su gtums te bum nang gzhug /nad dang mtshon dang mu ge yi/ /bskal pa de dag sel byed cing / /sman lnga rin chen 'bru lnga yis/ /bum pa yang ni dgang bar bya/ /tshul khrims dang ldan mchog yin phyir/ /dri dang snying pos bum pa bkang / /de

sogs bum rdzas sna tshogs btsal/ /bum pa rnams ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /bum pa la ni gdugs bu dbub/ /zhi ba yi ni maN+Dal ni/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad pa/ /rgyas pa rin chen ser po sna tshogs can/ /dbang la pad+ma dmar po lcags kyus mtshan/ /drag po la ni mthing nag

rtsibs brgyad do/ /bum gcig cho ga bsdus pa yis/ /gzhan gyi don ni byed gyur na/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bshams nas ni/ /zhi ba'i maN+Dal shar du bri/ /rgyas pa'i lho dang dbang gi nub/ /drag po byang du bri ba ste/ /bum pa yang ni de der dgod/ /mchod dang gtor ma rgyas par

bsham/ /ku sha'i stan ni gding bya ste/ /slob dpon smyung bar gnas pa'am/ /yang na dkar gsum zas la brten/ /gtsang ma'i gos sogs khrus byas te/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te/ /badzra bcu yis mtshams bcad de/ /rang snying bsil la hUM dgod de/ /de 'od bde

gshegs spyan drangs te/ /mkha' la gsal bkod bdun rdzogs bya/ /chos nyid ngang gnas de rjes la/ /drag po'i hUM sgra stong zil gnon/ /stong gsum g.yo ldan mkha' 'byung bsam/ /de rjes hUM 'od ldan pa ni/ /nam mkha' la ni bsam par bya/ /de las yaM baM laM suM chad/ /

de dag rim gyis zhu gyur pas/ /rlung mtsho sa ri rgyal por 'gyur/ /de steng AHhUM baM zhu bas/ /zla nyi pad+ma'i gdan du gyur/ /de steng hUM babs zhu gyur pas/ /sna tshogs pa yi rdo rje la/ /phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam/ /de 'od bde gshegs mtha' dag bsdus/ /de gyur

rdo rje snying po'o/ /sku ljang spyan gsum phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rgya gram pa/ /ngos gcig yu bar 'dzin pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ /dbu skra gyen brdzes klu rigs brgyan/ /mche gtsigs

phyag rdor sprul pa bsgom/ /de nas bum pa'i nang du ni/ /a zhu bas ni bdud rtsi'i mtsho/ /de steng a zhu zla ba bsam/ /de steng so so'i kha dog dang / /ldan pa'i yi ge hUM bsam mo/ /gsung sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub/ /de zhu sna tshogs rdo rje la/ /phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam/ /

kha dog las dang mthun pa'o/ /thugs sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub/ /de zhu rdo rje snying po ni/ /sngon lta bar ni bsam par bya/ /de nas ye shes spyan drangs te/ /hUM 'jigs bcas lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog nas/ /rig sngags gsang sngags kun gyi bdag po ste/ /khro rgyal

rdo rje 'dzin gyi rab sprul pa'i/ /khro rgyal rdo rje snying po gshegs su gsol/ /ha ra ha ra badzra bi dA ra NA ya swA hA/ pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra b+ha ny+dza nA ya swA hA/ sngon lha'i ye shes spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bya/ /badzra brgyad dang kI la lnga/ /badzra bdun sogs brjod byas pas/ /

sku gsung thugs sogs byin gyis brlab/ /thugs hUM las byas bde gshegs bkug /na masma man sngags sogs kyis/ /khro bo la ni dbang bskur bsam/ /na mo rat+na tra yA yas/ /bum pa'i lha la phyag kyang bya/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /de mchod sku ni gsal

bar bsgom/ /sku sgrub de la dmigs te sgrub/ /de nas gzungs sngags rim pa gsum/ /mos pa'i bye brag bzlas par bya/ /nges skyo gtor btang ye shes dbyung / /dam tshig bum lha 'od du zhu/ /rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal bya/ /de nas gzungs mchog ces bya ba

ni/ /kun khyab gzungs chog bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na 'di ltar bya ba ste/ /shis brjod mang du byas nas ni/ /byab cing bsrung ba'i cho ga bya/ /rgyud kyi sbyor tshig la sogs pa/ /khrus chog rgyas par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar bum gcig ma'i cho ga bsdus pa'am/ dgos pa'i bye brag

gis shes par bya'o/ /bdag blo shin tu dman gyur kyang / /rgyud 'di nyid dang mi 'gal ba'i/ /las bzhi'i bum gcig cho ga 'bad/ /'bad pas dge ba ci bsags pa/ /'gro rnams re 'dod bskang bar shog /kun kyang 'di la 'jug gyur cig /slob dpon chen po rat+na

kI rtis mdzad pa'i/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //bal po'i paN+Di ta ma hA pa Na'i rang 'gyur ro// //drag po'i gtso bum 'di skad do/ /cis kyang mi chod mi shigs pa/ /bden pa sra ba brtan pa ste/ /thams cad du ni thogs pa med/ /thams cad du

ni ma pham pa/ /shes rab thugs kyi rang bzhin te/ /sems can thams cad skrag par byed/ /sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed/ /rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed/ /gdon rnams thams cad brlag par byed/ /sems can thams cad rengs byed pa/ /kI li kI la'i

sngags dang ni/ /tra ta ya yi sngags sogs kyis/ /phrin las drag po'i las mthar phyin/ /khro rgyal rdo rje rnam 'joms mthus/ /drag po'i bum chu 'di yis ni/ /dri ma thams cad dag gyur cig /phrin las drag po mthar phyin shog /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/

badzra bi dA ra Na maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal la sogs dag par mdzad pa ste/ /rnam par 'joms pa khro bo rnams kyi rje btsun nyid/ /dpal ldan

yid khros log lta gcod pa'i dpal/ /rdo rje bsnams pa las 'joms 'jigs byed pa'i/ /le'u'i grangs la nges pa'i snying po ste/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rtsa bar 'di gsungs thog ma'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor cho ga las kyi rim pa nyid/ /'di nyid du ni rnam par bshad par bya'o/ /

sa yi cho ga go rims ltar/ /gzhan gyi las kyi rim par dbye/ /sa stegs 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /phyogs mtshams ma nor legs par mnyam/ /'khrul ba med pa'i blo yis bya/ /dpangs su chag gang brtsig par bya/ /srad bu mnyam ldan sum sgril la/ /byin gyis

brlabs te g.yas nas gdab/ /cha chen cha bran mkhas pas dbye/ /tshon sna lnga yi phye ma la/ byin gyis brlabs la legs par dgod/ /dang po pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /gnyis pa'i cha la 'khor lo brgyad/ /mu khyud rdo rje'i ra ba dang / /gru chad snam bu gnyis pa dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud

ldan par bri/ /de nyid kha dog nges par ni/ /pad+ma dkar po 'khor lo dmar/ /mu khyud bzhi pa dkar po la/ /rdo rje rnams ni lcags dang mtshungs/ /gru chad gnyis ni ljang gu la/ /snam bu dang po ser po ste/ /de bzhin gnyis pa dkar po che/ /sgo bzhi so so'i rigs dang sbyar/ /lha

rnams so so'i phyag mtshan ni/ /so so'i gnas su dgod par bya/ /de nas slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/ /dgos pa dag ni tshang ba la/ /dkyil 'khor grub pa'i rdzas nyid ni/ /seng ldeng phur ba sor brgyad pa/ /bzhi pa phyogs kyi bzlas pa bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni ngos bzhir gdab/ /

tshon sna lnga yi skud pas sbrel/ /gser dngul zangs lcags bum pa nyid/ /tshad dang ldan pa dag pa la/ /gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkris shing dgang / /'bras bu 'dab mar ldan pa yi/ /kha rgyan ldan pa lnga nyid la/ /so so'i mtshan ma btab la gzhag /las kyi bum pa sna tshogs

pa'i/ /rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no/ /sgrub po bdag nyid mdun du yang / /mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor bsham/ /nya dang bu ram sran chung 'bras/ /khre dang tshe la sogs pa yi/ /gtor ma gsum ni g.yas na gzhag /de nas phyi nang khrus byas te/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni rab gon la/ /

dri zhim zas ni mur bzhin du/ /sems bskyed pas ni gzhan don mchog /bdun po yongs su dag par bya'o/ /de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo nyid/ /ji ltar dmigs pa mkhas pas sgom/ /dri chab byin gyis brlabs la gzhag /hUM hUM zhes pas rngam pa dang / /oM badzra

rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM zhes pas/ g.yas brkyang ba yi gar gyis ni/ /g.yon brkyang stabs kyis g.yon nas bskor/ /bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /phyogs bcur khro bo ti ra yi/ /nga rgyal ldan pas bsrung dang bcings/ /mtshams la sogs pa mkhas pas bshad/ /de nas lha

rnams bskyed pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba'i steng / /hUM yig sngon po'i 'phro 'du las/ /mchod dang don gnyis rdzogs par byas/ /'dus pas gtso bo'i phyag mtshan ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med/ /dbus su rnam par bsam par bya/ /de rjes sngags 'di rnam par

brjod/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ b+ha ku la bi sho d+ha nA ya swA hA/ zhes pa lan gsum brjod pa yis/ /rnam 'joms nyid kyi sku ru 'gyur/ /de nyid dam tshig phyag rgya ni/ /lag gnyis rdo rje bcings pa las/ /gung mo gnyis ni gshibs nas bsgreng / /gshin rje

gshed kyi phyag rgya ste/ /gsang sngags 'di ni legs par ni/ /byang shar mtshams su gshin rje'o/ /oM ya mAn+ta kA ya swA hA/ yang snying lag gnyis sor mo dgod/ /snying gar rtse mo sprad pa yang / /oM a nan+te swA hA/ zhes pas shar du mtha' yas bskyed/ /g.yon pa khu tshur

dkur brten pa/ /g.yas pa nu ma'i thad kar bzung / /oM a mr-i te ba re hUM/ zhes pas shar lhor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskyed/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bong sbrel byas la/ /oM sum+b+ha ni ki ra ban+d+ha ri swA hA/ zhes pas lho ru gnod mdzes bskyed/ /lag

gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag mnan/ /gung mo sor mo mthe'u chung bsgreng / /oM b+hi na ste badzra kro d+ha na kro d+ha swA hA/ zhes pas lho nub sngon mthong bskyed/ /snga ma'i phyag rgya lta bu la/ oM h+ya gr-I ba swA hA/ zhes pas nub tu rta mgrin bskyed/ /g.yon

pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yas pa'i khu tshur gnyis bsgrengs la/ /oM a pa ra dzi ta sa ta swA hA/ zhes pas nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub bskyed/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung gung mo ni/ /gshibs te so sor bsgreng byas la/ /oM

badzra pA Ni bAn pa ti swA hA/ zhes byas byang du gtum po'o/ /de nas so so'i phyag rgya bskyed/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa dang / /g.yas pa bcangs te spyi bor gzhag /lag gnyis khu tshur snying gar brtsegs/ /g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung g.yon pas bcangs/ /lag gnyis

brdebs pa'i tshul du bya/ /de ltar rim pa nges pa yis/ /gru chad la ni go rims bzhin/ /sngags 'dis rgyal chen bzhi rim par gsal bar bskyed par bya'o/ /oM D+h+r-i ta rASh+TA ya swA hA/ oM bi rU D+ha kA ya swA hA/ oM bi rU pak+Sha ye swA hA/ oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ zhes pa rgyal po bzhi

ru bskyed/ /de yi phyi rim snam bu la/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad po'o/ /de yi phyi rim snam bu la/ /phyogs skyong ba ni de bzhin no/ /sgo bzhir sgo ma gzhan dang mthun/ /de dag sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ /gtso bo'i sku mdog ljang ser la/ /g.yas pa rgya gram phyogs de ni/ /thugs

kar bzung ste g.yon pa yang / /bum pa dku la brten pa'o/ /yang na phyag gnyis bum pa ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes kha bcad la/ /phyag gnyis bzung ste thugs kar 'dzin/ /mtha' yas zhal gsum sku mdog mthing / /phyag drug nges med mtshon cha la/ /g.yon gyi 'og mas rtse dgu

ni/ /thugs kar 'dzin la nges pa'o/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sku mdog dmar/ /zhal dang phyag gnyis sngar 'dra la/ /'og mas rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin/ /gnod mdzes mdog ser sngar bzhin la/ /'og mas tho ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /mi g.yo ba ni ljang gu la/ /rdo rje dbyug tho thugs

gar 'dzin/ /rta mgrin dmar po pad+ma 'dzin/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sngon po la/ /rin chen 'bar ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /gtum po smug nag rtse dgu 'dzin/ /gshin rje sngo nag zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug nges med mtshon cha la/ /'og ma gnyis pos be con 'dzin/ /de nas grub

chad rgyal po bzhi/ /dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu la/ /be con pi wang chu srin dang / /rin po che yi dong tse'o/ /lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni/ /gsal byed ma ni sngon mo la/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dpal be'u 'dzin/ /dbyangs can ma ni dkar mo la/ /rang

rtags g.yas pa 'khor lo'o/ /mdangs can ser mo pad+ma'o/ /'od ldan mthing ga rgyal mtshan no/ /skyes chen dmar mo gdu bu 'dzin/ /dri med pa ya dmar mo la/ /rang rtags g.yas pa bum pa 'dzin/ /yid bzangs ljang gu 'bud dung 'dzin/ /yid gzhungs ljang ser g.yung

drung 'dzin/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyi sku mdog ni/ /brgya byin dkar la rdo rje gdengs/ /me lha dmar po rin chen phreng / /gshin rje mthing ga dbyug to bsnams/ /bden bral ljang gu ral gri'o/ /chu lha dmar po klu zhags bsnams/ /rlung lha dud ka be con 'dzin/ /gnod sbyin ser po

rin chen 'dzin/ /dbang ldan dkar ser tri shU la/ /nyi zla dkar po u dum+WAr/ /sa yi lha mo ser mo la/ /phyag na rin chen bum pa bsnams/ /sgo ma'i phyag mtshan sku mdog ni/ /lcags kyu dkar la lcags kyu 'dzin/ /zhags pa sngo la de bzhin zhags/ /lcags sgrog dmar

mo lcags sgrog 'dzin/ /dril bu ljang ser dril bu 'dzin/ /de ltar sku mdog gsal bsgoms la/ /ye shes dbang bskur dgug gzhug bstim/ /de ltar gzhal yas gsal dmigs la/ /snying po rgyas dang bsdus pa dang / /shin tu bsdus pa gang mos la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad

du dbul bar bya/ /rdo rjes mchod pa lnga yang dbul/ /bsnyen pa'i dus su dmigs pa gsum/ /legs par brtags te mnyes par bya/ /sgrub pa bum pa nyid la'o/ /de nas bstod pa dbul ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi dbyings nas lha rnams ni/ /spyan drangs bum pa'i nang du bstim/ /bskul

tshig 'di skad brjod par bya/ /na mo sems ni rgya che mchog tu rab bskyed de/ /ma lus 'khor dang bcas te gshegs su gsol/ /chos dbyings mngon 'gyur ye shes sku brnyes te/ /sku gsung thugs su legs par 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gsung rab bcu gnyis 'phags lam rgyal ba'i

bka'/ /bcom ldan shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /rnam dag dbyings kyi dam chos gshegs su gsol/ /sa bcu'i rgyal tshab chos la mnga' brnyes shing / /snying rje chen pos brtson 'grus go gyon pa/ /shes rab thabs kyis khams gsum 'dren mdzad pa/ /rgyal sras byang

chub sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/ /mi mjed 'jig rten 'dzam gling 'dir/ /dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas khang / /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams te/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan bshams nas/ /spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol ba ni/ /bzhi bcom drug ldan 'khor ba

mya ngan 'das/ /nams kyang rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' ba'i/ /lus ngag yid gsum nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/ /'gro 'dul thugs rjes byin rlabs bsam mi khyab/ /bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa yang / /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /sems

can nyon mongs gshin rje'i dra ba la/ /ye shes thugs kyis gshed dang dra ba 'joms/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa 'byung ba yi/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed po yang / /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas thug pa

bzhin/ /'gro ba'i las dang nyon mongs mtha' yas la/ /thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprul pa mtha' yas kyis/ /ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'joms mdzad pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po yon tan mtha' yas kyang / /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /sems can dug

gsum nad kyis gdungs pa la/ /thugs rje'i byin rlabs bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ /thabs la mkhas pa mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can ma lus dbyings su sbyor mdzad pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bdud rtsi thab sbyor yang / /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /

rnam thar gsum gyi mnga' mdzad ye shes stobs/ /nyon mongs dug gsum ma lus gnon mdzad phyir/ /phyag mtshan rdo rje tho ba 'bar ba bsnams/ /mdzes pa'i sku mdog gdul thabs cir yang ston/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes stobs po che/ /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i

don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /dbyings las mi g.yo 'khor ba'i mtha' mi g.yo/ /mtha' la mi gnas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i mtha' gcod cing / /sems can rnams kyi dpal dang mgon gyur pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal bo mi g.yo mgon po

yang / /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /ye shes thugs kyi 'khor ba'i mtha' yi bar/ /thugs rje myur bas rta gdong phrin las mdzod/ /'gro don mdzad pa'i ngo mtshar mnga' ba yang / /rtag tu rta mgrin rgyal po gsung du sprul/ /khro bo'i rgyal po dbang gi rta gdong

yang / /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku/ /mtha' gnyis ma yengs dbyings la dbang sgyur zhing / /thugs rjes phrin las dbyings su 'dus ma mdzad/ /sku yi yon tan rdzogs pas dbang phyug che/ /khro bo'i rgyal

po dbang phyug gtum po yang / /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /rin chen las grub ri rab ngos bzhi nas/ /bsod nams tshogs ldan dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi/ /gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du don mdzad pa'i/ /dpal

ldan rgyal po chen po 'khor bcas kyang / /'dir gshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod pa bzhes/ /dus bzhi tshad med bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mi 'jigs bzhi ldan ye shes tshogs rdzogs te/ /mchod pa mang po'i sprin dang bcas nas ni/ /mchod pa'i lha mo mang po gshegs su gsol/ /

rdo rje dang ni rin chen pad+ma dang / /sna tshogs las grub rdo rje rgya gram 'bar/ /phyag rgya chen pos bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon/ /phyogs bzhi phyag rgya chen po gshegs su gsol/ /zhi ba dkar po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /pad+ma dkar po phyag na dpal be'u bsnams/ /'joms byed

dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol/ /lho phyogs rgyas pa ser mo'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /rgyas pa sngon mo phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /'od ldan mthing ga phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs

su gsol/ /nub phyogs pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dkar sham dmar mo phyag na gdu bu bsnams/ /mdangs can dmar mo phyag na bum pa bsnams/ /gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol/ /byang phyogs phrin las drag po'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /yid

gzhungs ljang gu phyag na bud dung bsnams/ /yid bzangs ljang ser phyag na g.yung drung bsnams/ /gnyis med don la thugs sbyor gshegs su gsol/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten dbang ldan dang / /thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dgyes pa che/ /brgya byin dbang po 'khor

dang bcas pa yang / /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /sbyin sreg bdag po dka' thub ral pa can/ /drang srong brtul zhugs spyod pa kun gyi rje/ /me yi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing

gshegs su gsol/ /bdud gcod bdud la mnga' mdzad bdud kyi rje/ /bdud gcod 'chi bdag mang po kun gyi gtso/ /gshin rje'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /thod rgal

'jigs pa chen po'i skyabs mdzad pa/ /nad gtong mdangs 'phrog srin po kun gyi rje/ /srin po'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /char sprin lo tog chu la dbang byed pa/ /lha chen

chu lha snyem pa kun gyi rje/ /chu lha'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /srog 'chang dbugs kyi bdag po dbugs kyi gzungs/ /srog 'chang rlung lha rig 'dzin kun gyi rje/ /rlung lha

rig 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba/ /gter sbyin gter 'chang mang po kun gyi rje/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bstan

pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /bgegs la mnga' mdzad dngos grub mchog ston pa/ /log 'dren tshar gcod lha rnams kun gyi rje/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bstan pa bsrung

ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /'od chen 'jig rten gling bzhir snang mdzad pa/ /gza' skar stong gi lha mang kun gyi rje/ /lha yi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing

gshegs su gsol/ /sa la mnga' mdzad sa bdag kun gyi rje/ /sa yi lha mo brtan ma yang / /bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /gnyis med don la rig pa shar mdzad cing / /thugs dam rgyud bskul lcags kyu phyogs bcur

'bar/ /zhi ba bdud bzhi 'dul mdzad dkar mo'i sku/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /yon tan rgyas pa gser 'od 'od zer 'phro/ /log 'dren bgegs 'ching zhags pa phyogs bcur 'phen/ /yon tan tshogs rgyas 'ching byed zhags pa ma/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su

gsol/ /thams cad dbang sdud dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom/ /grub pa sdud cing 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sdom/ /khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i lcags sgrog ma/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /sna tshogs las las grub pa'i ljang gu dgyes/ /bde gshegs

tshogs mnyes mchod pa'i dril bu 'bar/ /las dang nyon mongs bdud 'dul thal byed ma/ /'gro ba'i don du mchod cing gshegs su gsol/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya dr-i sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya ho/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badzra aM gu sha dzaH/ badzra pA sha hUM/ badzra s+pho Ta baM/ badzra

g+haN+De hoH/ /de nas gnyis su med bar bstim pa dang / /ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyer med bsres/ /brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ /hUM rin chen sna bzhi grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /ma chags pad+ma 'bum gyi gdan bting ste/ /rin chen khri dang nyi zla gsal ba'i rgyan/ /dngos su

'byor dang yid kyis rnam sprul te/ /bdag cag dad pa'i yid kyis mngon sprul te/ /rim bzhin bde yangs nyid du bzhugs su gsol/ /badzra tiSh+Tha lhan/ phyag btsal ba ni/ e ma ho/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs ni rab tu rgya che ste/ /'gro ba kun la khyab mdzad rdo rje rnam 'joms

nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma ho/ /phyogs bcu'i khro bo rgyal ba rnams/ /nyon mongs dug gsum sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzir ba'i 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /phrin las drag po'i dregs pas 'dul mdzad pa/ /phyogs bcu'i khro rgyal rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma ho/ /phyogs

bzhi dpal ldan rgyal chen bzhi/ /srid rtse rin chen mtha' yas nas/ /dri med bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa'i/ /phyogs bzhi'i yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma ho/ /phyogs kyi lha mo bkra shis brgyad rnams kyis/ /thugs mchog 'gro don ma lus bdud las rgyal/ /thugs

rjes dbang bskur chos sgra shes rab thabs/ /mi mthun phyogs la yon tan bkra shis pa/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma ho/ phyogs bcu 'dul ba'i dbang phyug sku sprul ba/ /phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams mang po tshar gcod cing / /mtho ris gnas nas

'khor los sgyur mdzad pa/ /phyogs skyong chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma ho/ /tshad med bzhi po mthar phyin lhun grub rtags/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi ngang du thugs rjes sprul/ /'gro drug sems can gnas nas sprul mdzad pa'i/ /sgo skyong 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de nas mchod pa lnga phul te/ slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid/ /cho ga ji ltar 'dod bzhin brtsam/ /de rjes dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la/ /bstod pa nyid ni 'di skad dbul/ /hUM bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms/ /thugs rje nyi zla'i 'od pas 'tsher/ /ngan song thams cad rnam

par sbyong / /de nyid sgrib pa sel mdzad pa/ /pad+ma 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs ma brgyad/ /nang gi snying po rdo rje gtso/ /dpa' bo thub pa bzhugs pa yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dang / /phrin las bzhi yi khyad par gyi/ /pad+ma 'khor lor bcas

pa la/ /rol mo sil snyan rnams kyis mchod/ /rin chen stegs bu 'di dag ni/ /gru bzhir ldan zhing sgo bzhi gdod/ /dbus kyi pad+ma ge sar la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje rnam par 'joms/ /sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'bar/ /rgya gram phyogs med thugs kar 'dzin/ /

de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /shar phyogs gtso bo mtha' yas ni/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te/ /rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /shar lho khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar/ /

phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te/ /rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /lho phyogs khro bo gnod mdzes ni/ /sku mdog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te/ /rdo rje tho ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /

lho nub khro bo mi g.yo mgon/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag drug rdo rje dbyug to thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /nub phyogs khro bo rta mgrin ni/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar/ /pad+ma brtsegs pa thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la bstod de mchod pa

'bul/ /byang phyogs gtum po dbang phyug ni/ /sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag drug mtshon cha sna tshogs te/ /rdo rje rtse dgu thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /byang shar gshin rje gshed po ni/ /sku mdog sngo nag 'bar ba'i 'od/ /phyag drug mtshon

cha sna tshogs te/ /be con 'bar ba thugs kar 'dzin/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /shar phyogs rgyal po yul 'khor srung / /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na ne le bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /lho phyogs rgyal po 'phags skyes po/ /sku

mdog ser la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na pi wang bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /nub phyogs rgyal po spyan mi bzang / /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na chu srin bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /byang phyogs rgyal po rnam

thos sras/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od 'bar ba/ /phyag mtshan phyag na dong tse brtsegs/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /shar phyogs lha mo dkar sham ma/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od 'bar ba/ /phyag na bkra shis gdugs 'dzin cing / /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /shar smad lha mo

dbyangs mkhan ma/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na bkra shis 'khor lo bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /lho stong lha mo mdangs can ma/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /lho smad

lha mo 'od ldan ma/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na bkra shis rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /nub stod lha mo skyes chen ma/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na bkra shis bum pa bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /nub

smad lha mo dri ma med/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na yid bzhin nor bu bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /byang stod lha mo yid bzangs ma/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na bkra shis bud dung bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /byang

smad lha mo yid gzhungs ma/ /sku mdog ljang la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gser gyi nya mo bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /shar phyogs lha dbang brgya byin ni/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /

shar lho drang srong me lha ni/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na rin chen phreng ba bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /lho phyogs gshin rje'i rgyal po ni/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gshin rje'i dbyug to bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa

'bul/ /lho nub srin po bden bral ni/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na ral gri rnon po bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /nub phyogs chu lha'i bdag po ni/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na klu yi zhags pa bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa

'bul/ /nub byang rlung lha dbang ldan ni/ /sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na rin chen be con bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /byang phyogs gnod sbyin ku be ra/ /sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gnod sbyin dbyug pa 'dzin/ /de

la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /byang shar dbang ldan bgegs kyi bdag /sku mdog dkar ser 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na tri shU la rtse gsum bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /steng phyogs nyi zla tshangs pa ni/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na ut+pa la 'bar ba rnams/ /de la bstod de

mchod pa 'bul/ /'og phyogs sa yi lha mo ni/ /sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /shar sgo'i rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na lcags kyu bsnams/ /de la

bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /lho sgo rdo rje zhags pa ma/ /sku mdog sngon mo 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /nub phyogs rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na lcags

sgrog bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /byang phyogs rdo rje dril bu ma/ /sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan phyag na dril bu bsnams/ /de la bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /de la dbang bskur cho ga las/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i dbang rnams sbyin/ /bzod gsol

smon lam gdab pa nyid/ /de nas lha rnams so so yi/ /thugs ka'i sa bon la bsdus te/ /gshegs gsol dmigs med rgyas btab la/ /de nas dga' ston dbugs phyung ste/ /rig pa'i las dang gzengs yang bstod/ /de nas gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /mgon po'i gtor

ma btang ba ni/ /sngags kyis spyan drangs ye shes gzhug /paM las gyur pa so so yi/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan so sor dmigs/ /de nas 'dzab dang bsnyen pa 'bul/ /de yi sngags ni 'di dag bzlas/ /rdo rje lce las yang dag phyung / /oM e h+ye hi ha na ha na b+hin+da badzra hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi badzrA

na la b+hin+da na maN+Da la bud+d+ha sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi badzrA kA la daN+Da ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi badzra ki ri Ti staM rak+Sha sa de ba ta ye swA hA/ oM e h+ya hi nA ga badzra A na ya sarba d+ha na d+ha n+ya/ sarba nam ni muk+tA laM ka ra d+ha ra sarba nA ga nar ni tsa badzra d+ha ra ya/ sa ma yA ma nu smA ra a kaD+D+h+ya a ka D+D+h+ya ban+d+ha

ban+d+ha ha ra ha ra pra Na na ma hA ts+tshe da hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi badzra a ni la ma hA bai ga/ /A na ya sarba du Sh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi ku be+e ra yak+ShA d+hi ba ta ye swA hA/ oM e h+ye hi d+hi d+hu b+hi na badzra shU la swA hA/ oM e h+ye hi na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM phri nyi b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM e h+ye hi na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha na maH/ he shor+ya pra to dz+yo ti ra mA ya

swA hA/ lha rnams so so'i phyag rgya yis/ /mchod yon la sogs gtor ma la/ /sngags ni bdun tsam cig dag gis/ /nges par 'bul dang bstabs par bya'o/ /de nas mgon po mnyes pa yi/ /tshig 'di rnams kyang brjod par bya'o/ /hUM lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /

nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po/ /dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang / /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa yang / /bdag gi pus mo sa la btsugs nas su/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol ba 'debs/ /

gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig /dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me ste bsreg bya za ba'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar lho gdon

gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje be con 'chang ba'i lha/ /ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /lho phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon

gyi bdag /lho nub gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha/ /klu yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod par bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /
