gos gsar pa byin la khrus nas bton la sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur la de'i rjes la rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la srung skud gdags so/ /de ltar byas na dpal nges par bskyed do/ /dpal skyed pa bkra shis skyed pa/

nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba dpal kun gyis ni brgyan pa'i mtha'/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po nyams pa gso bar byed pa'i las kyi bye brag ni/ dang po mig gi nad las grol bar

'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ khrus kyi cho ga nas ji ltar 'byung ba'i khrus byas te/ gos gsar pa gyon pa dang smyung bar gnas pa la sogs pa byas nas khrus lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la/ bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon

las gzungs kyi lha dpag tu med pa spros te/ 'phags pa mchod la sems can gyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus par byas nas bdag gi mig la thim pas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan dri ma med pa thob cing yongs su dag par mkhyen pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par

dmigs shing / ut+pal sngon po dang skyer khaN+Da la snying po rgyas bsdus kyi sngags ci rigs par bzlas shing byug go/ /tshag pa la ni spangs ma la bzlas shing byug go/ /rab rib can rnams la ni a ru ra'i khu ba la bsngags te byug go/ /ling thog can rnams la mtshal dang cong zhi'i khu

ba la bsngags la byug go/ /sha mdzer dang zug che ba rnams la ka ra dang mi'i 'o ma la bzlas la byug go/ /de ltar byas pas gdon dang nad gang yin pa yang zhi bar nges so/ /mig gi dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga gsal ba'i snang ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes

mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rna ba'i dbang po nyams shing rna ba gso bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ zhag gsum smyung bar gnas shing gos gsar pa gyon la khrus kyi cho

ga brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ de'i rjes la bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang gur dmigs la bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod sems can gyi don byas pas/ phrin las bzhi'i 'dod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas pas/ de

nas yang 'od 'phros pas sngar dang 'dra/ de nas 'od 'phros pas sgra'i lha mo grangs med pa 'phros te/ de dag re re las kyang sprul ba'i lha mo dpag tu med pa 'phros te/ snang ba thams cad sgra'i lha mo zhal nas sgra snyan pa sna tshogs pa brjod pas/ phyag na sgra snyan pa'i byung khungs bi wang dang /

gling bu dang / rdza rnga la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsnams shing de nyid kyi sgras sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du mchod pa'i bye brag sprin rnam par byed pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod nas/ slar ye shes kyi 'od phung chen po gcig tu gyur nas/ bdag nyid la

bskor ba lan gsum byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim nas/ de nyid thim pas lus ngag khro bo rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du dmigs la/ tshogs rdzogs par bya/ de nas yang 'od 'phros pas lha mo de dag gis gong ltar sems can gyi don byas nas/ yang ye shes kyi 'od

phung po chen po gcig tu gyur nas/ bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la bstim pa snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /de nas lan gcig 'phros nas don gnyis rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi rna ba la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan rnam par dag pa dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba ye shes kyi mkhyen pa rdzogs

par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas so/ /rna ba na ba rnams la khug chos chen po'i phye ma dang / rtsi mar la bzlas te blugs/ 'on zhing sgra mi thos pa rnams la 'bru mar dang ru rta la bzlas te byug go/ /zug che zhing gzer ba rnams la mar sna tshogs dang sbrang rtsi la bzlas

la rtsa rnams la byugs te nyi ma la sreg go/ /rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa dang de'i nad gso ba'i cho ga /sgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sna'i nad gso

bar byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas khrus kyi cho ga lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ de nas rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du gnas pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od snga ma ltar 'phros pa las don gnyis byas pa'i tha ma dri'i lha mo rnams bdag nyid kyi sna la thim pas

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shangs dri ma med pa yongs su dag pa ye shes tshogs pa'i phung po las grub pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes go ma 'gags pa sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa dang ldan par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas so/ /de ltar sna tshub pa rnams la 'bru mar la bzlas

la blugs so/ /khrag 'bab cing dbugs stong pa bkab na tsan+dan dkar po la bzlas so/ /zug che ba rnams la gi wang 'o ma la sbyar ba la bzlas shing sna phug tu blugs so/ /sna'i dbang po nyams pa dang na ba gso ba dri ma dang bral ba'i sbyong byed ces bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes

mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lce'i dbang po nyams shing na ba gso bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gos gsar pa gon te smyung bar gnas par byas la khrus kyi cho ga lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/

de nas rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ snying ga'i sa bon las 'od snga ma ltar lan gsum du 'phags pa mchod pa dang / sems can gyi don byas pa'i gzhug la ro'i lha mo 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ro sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams bdag nyid kyi lce la thim pas sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi ljags ring zhing yangs pa ye shes 'dus pa las byung ba/ mkhyen pa ma 'gags par gsal bar dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas pa bya'o/ /de ltar yang skrangs pa rnams la rgya tshal bzlas pa bya ste byug go/ /brda mi shes pa rnams la shing kun la bzlas so/ /

tsha zhing zug dang ldan pa rnams la 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang ga pur gyi chu la bzlas so/ /grang zhing ser ka dang ldan pa rnams la tsha ba gsum dang tsan+dan gyi chu la bzlas so/ /lce'i dbang po nyams pa gso ba'i cho ga pad+ma rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye

shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus kyi dbang po nyams shing na ba gso ba'i cho ga byed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gos gsar pa dri ma med pa bgos te zhag gsum smyung bar

gnas te/ lus kyi dbang po gang na yang khrus lan grangs bdun nam bcu gcig gam/ nyer gcig gam/ sum cu rtsa gnyis sam/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ stong phrag gcig gam/ khri phrag gcig la sogs pa na ba'i rigs dang sbyar la bya'o/ /de nas de'i 'og tu rdo rje rnam par

'joms pa'i nga rgyal du byas te/ rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od phrin las bzhi gang mos pa'i kha dog tu 'phros pas reg bya'i lha mo kha dog 'od zer dang mthun pa phyag na reg bya'i lha mo bye brag dpag tu med pa 'phros pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dpag tu med par mchod pa'i sprin

gyis gtibs nas mnyes par bya ste/ ye shes kyi 'od phung po chen po gcig tu gyur nas slar bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs bsdus/ de nas yang 'phros nas lha mor gyur pas sems can gyi don byas nas yang snying gar 'od du gyur

nas thim mo/ /de lha mo spros nas lha mo de dag kyang bdag gi lus la thim pas/ yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes kyi lus su song ste/ sangs rgyas sku'i mkhyen pa rdzogs par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus la ci rigs par bzlas so/ /

de yang lus kyi stod na na chu la bzlas so/ /smad na na dri chu la bzlas so/ /tsha na gi wi la bzlas so/ /grang na bu ram gyi khu ba la bzlas so/ /mgon na rdo rgyus la bzlas so/ /ske dang mjing pa na na nya'i mkhris pa la bzlas so/ /lag pa na na stag tsher ba la bzlas so/ /pho mchin na

bde na bca' sga la bzlas so/ /glo snying ma bde na cu gang rgya mtsho gser gyi bye ma la bzlas so/ /yi ga 'chus na se 'bru dang gur gum la bzlas so/ /sbos na rgyam tsha la bya'o/ /bshang gci che chung 'dom na sdig srin la bya'o/ /rgyu ma na na skyer ba'i khaN+Da la bya'o/ /mkhal ma na na

gser gyi bu dbu la bya'o/ /pus mo na na tsan+dan lde gu la bya'o/ /rkang pa na na li shi la bya'o/ /'khru na sbrang rtsi dang ut+pal la bya'o/ /skyug na na le sham gyis bya'o/ /gzer ba la chu dkyil gyi rdo ba grang mo la bya'o/ /rtsib logs na ba la lag mthil g.yon pa la bsngags shing

glan no/ /gre ba na na rkun 'brum la bzlas so/ /chu so na na dong ga dang lan tshal bzlas shing dugs bya'o/ /rims la chu dang tsan+dan dkar po la bzlas nas bya'o/ /'brum bu la ga bur dang seng ldeng gi khu ba la bzlas so/ /klad gzer la a ka la'i khu ba la bzlas so/ /mdzes zin pa la ni

gu gul dang b+ha sa li dang 'bras kyi thal ba la bzlas so/ /gdon drag pos zin pa rnams la smyag shad kyi lcug ma dang / bal po se'u'i lcug ma dang / klu shing gi lcug ma la bya'o/ /'bras la sa 'dag tshil chen gyi khu ba bsres la bya'o/ /mtshon gyis btab pa rnams la pa la sha'i

lo mas bya'o/ /skrangs pa la tsha sna dang lum bu'i phye mas bya'o/ /shu ba la dur byid dang shu dag la bya'o/ /zha grum dang skur po la seng phrom dang tsha ba'i yungs mo la bya'o/ /lhog pa dang phol la rab gnas byas pa'i tsha tsha rnying pa'i sa dang / dug sna tshogs la bzlas so/ /chu rgyus kyi

nad la mar sna tshogs pa la bzlas te bsku mnye bya'o/ /snying rlung dang 'dar ba rnams la ta ma la'i 'bras bu la bzlas so/ /lba ba la seng ldeng gi phur pa la bzlas la bya'o/ /sbid cing rengs pa'i nad la tsha ba gsum la bzlas la bya'o/ /yan lag gi tshigs na ba rnams la khrag sna tshogs la

bzlas la bya'o/ /dbugs mi bde ba rnams la A li kA li'i 'bras bu la bzlas la bya'o/ /khrag nad la glang po'i shas bya'o/ /so nad la bram dkar po'i rtsa ba la bzlas so/ /mchu nad la ni a ru ra'i pags pa la bzlas so/ /sgal pa na ba la 'bru mar la bzlas so/ /lus kyi

dbang po nyams pa dang lus na ba gso ba'i cho ga rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can tshe zad pa bsring ba'i cho ga sgrub pa po

dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la/ bum pa gcig la dpa' bo chen po'i phyag mtshan btab la der rdo rje mig gis bltas te bgegs bskrad la rang lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can a dkar por bsdus la de nyid

las 'od 'phros pas lha mo dkar mo lag na tshe'i bum pa thogs pa grangs med pa spros la/ de la mchod pas mchod la 'chi ba'i ltas byung ba'i 'gro ba de la bstims pas mdangs nges par 'jug go/ /de lta bu byas na ni lo gcig tu tshe bsring bar nges so/ /tshe zad pa bsring

ba'i cho ga rgyun gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can tshe 'das pa'i sdig pa kun las thar bar 'dod pas/ sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sa'i cho ga

la sogs pa rdzogs par byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la/ bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lha'i grangs dang mnyam pa kha dog tshon gyis bsgyur la/ lha so so'i phyag mtshan btab la lha rnams kyi nang du gzhag go/ /lha

bshas dang mchod pa lnga lha'i grangs dang mnyam par bsham/ gtor ma yang de dang 'dra'o/ /phyogs skyong rnams dang bgegs rnams kyi gtor ma yang bsham mo/ /de nas ro de khrus nas bton la rgyan cha lngas brgyan la khro bo 'chol pa'i gar bya'o/ /de nas yam shing dbus su bcug

ste/ g.yas brkyang pa dang / g.yon brkyang mnyam pa'i gar gsum hUM sgra dang bcas pas bskor ro/ /sbyin sreg nas byung ba ltar me lha spyan drang ba dang / dgug gzhug byas la cho ga'i las rim pa ltar spyan drang ba dang / bstod pa la sogs pa sngags dang phyag rgya dang / tshigs bcad

rnams kyis rgyas par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar zer te lho phyogs su ngan song rnam par dag par byed pa'i maN+Dal le'u tshe drug pa legs par bkod la/ rigs drug nas drang ba'i cho ga ni dri ma le tshe nag por bzhag ste/ hUM mnar med las kyis mnar ba'i sems can

khyod/ /sngon nas sbyangs pa bral bas mnar med 'khor/ /sdug bsngal chen po bzod par dka' bas na/ /sdug bsngal bzod med tsha grang bor gyis la/ /bzod chen ye shes chu rgyun 'di long la/ /yid ldan sgo lnga longs spyod gnas 'dir spyon/ /bum chus dbang bskur ro/ /oM na ra

ka sa man+ta hUM/ de nas yang / hUM 'dod pa rang rgyud gcad pa'i sems can khyod/ /rku 'phrog las kyis bsags pa'i 'bras bu las/ /yid 'dod ngoms med 'bras bu sdug bsngal las/ /yid 'gyur 'dod chen spyod pa'i las bor la/ /yid bzhin gter dang ldan pa 'di long la/ /

rmugs spyod dran rig 'chol ba'i gnas 'dir spyon/ /oM pre ta pre tsa pa ti hUM/ de nas dud 'gro'i gnas su drang ba ni/ hUM shes rab ma rig pas mnar sems can khyod/ /thos bsam bral bas sems la log par mthong / /rmugs pa ma mthong bag chags ma yal bas/ /mun pa

rang rig bral ba'i gnas bor la/ /shes rab dag pa'i dri med 'di long la/ /bde sdug bsags pa 'khor ba'i gnas 'dir spyon/ /oM tiR+Ya ka ma hA bi le hUM/ de nas mi'i gnas su drang ba ni/ hUM bde sdug 'chol bar sbyangs pa dor ba khyod/ /rang sems ma rtogs 'khor ba 'khor

bar 'khyams/ /dus gsum lam rten thar pa'i skas dang bral/ /sems rgyud zhen pa gcod pa'i gnas bor la/ /dri ma med pa'i 'dod bral khrims long la/ /rtsub 'gyur 'jigs su rung ba'i gnas 'dir spyon/ /oM pa laM d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ de nas lha min gnas su drang ba ni/ hUM

rtsub 'gyur las kyis bskal pa'i sems can khyod/ /'jigs spyod go mtshon zhe sdang lam la gnas/ /'dod pa'i rgyun lon rags pa'i dug bor nas/ /bsam gtan mi mchog chu bo 'di long la/ /longs spyod dga' bde ldan pa'i gnas 'dir spyon/ /oM pra b+he sa ma ya li

na maHsa man+ta hUM/ de nas lha'i gnas nas spyan drang ba ni/ hUM dga' bde las kyis bcings pa'i sems can khyod/ /bde 'dod sems kyi le los g.yengs pa ste/ /rang rgyud chags pas bcings pa'i gnas bor la/ /mi 'jigs dpung dang ldan pa'i

brtson 'grus chu long la/ /'dzin med skye shi med pa'i shar sgor spyon/ /oM de bA pa tsa sarba At+ma ya hUM/ de nas skabs 'dir zas gtad pa'i cho ga bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gnas dang / mtshan nas bton la der song shig ces lam bstan no/ /de nas mgal me'i

'khor lo bskor te/ phung po'i gnas lngar raM las ye shes kyi me 'bar bar dmigs la/ me sbar te dgang gzar dang blugs gzar thogs la/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o/ /hUM ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i ho ma khung nas/ /rnam dag ye shes lnga rdzogs yam shing las/ /

bcom ldan rdo rje can gyi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das bdag tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dz+wa la raM/ /srid pa rgyun gcod 'khor lo'i hom khung nas/ /rnam dag phung lnga sbyang ba'i yam shing las/ /khro brgyad phyogs na gnas pa'i me byung bas/ /tshe 'das rnam shes brgyad la dz+wa la raM/ /bar

khyams rin chen mnyam pa'i hom khung nas/ /mi mthun rkyen rnams dag pa'i yam shing las/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das rnam shes brgyad la dz+wa la raM/ /gru chad rang bzhin dag pa'i hom khung nas/ /gnyis med ye shes bzhi yi yam shing las/ /rgyal

chen stobs ldan bzhi yi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das 'byung ba bzhi po dz+wa la raM/ /sna tshogs 'od ldan 'dod pa'i hom khung nas/ /khams gsum 'dod pas grol ba'i yam shing las/ /phyogs skyong shugs ldan bcu yi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das phyin ci log bzhi dz+wa la raM/ /sgo bzhi

rang gdangs dgyes pa'i hom khung nas/ /log lta 'joms byed tshogs rdzogs yam shing las/ /sgo skyong sgo ma bzhi yi me byung bas/ /tshe 'das phyin ci log bzhi dz+wa la raM/ /zhes nyon mongs pa dang bag chags kyi sa bon rnams bsregs te/ sa bon gyi cha tsam yang ma lus par

byas so/ /tshig de dag brjod la lha so so'i sngags nas brjod cing dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyis bkang zhing dbul lo/ /rdzas ni zhi rgyas gang la mos pa la sbyin sreg gi cho ga ltar bya'o/ /shi ba'i sems can sdig pa las thar bar byed pa'i ro sreg pa'i cho ga dug sbyangs

gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar sdig pa sbyangs par byas nas/ lhag ma'i rus pa la tsha tsha 'debs par 'dod pas/ sgrub pa po

dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dang po stong pa nyid kyi ngang nas raM zhes yongs su gyur pa las/ sa'i nyes pa'i skyon rnams ye shes kyi mes sbyangs/ de nas baM yongs su gyur pa las ye shes kyi chu rgyun dbab/ de nas yaM zhes gyur pa las/ ye shes kyi rlung gis bskyod/ saM zhes

pa gyur pa las/ ye shes bzhi 'dus pa'i sar dmigs la skabs der bdun rnam par dag pa'i las bya'o/ /tshogs rdzogs par byas la 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags ni/ oM ma hA ba le be+e ga ra Na hUM zhes brjod cing / ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang gi rgyur byin gyis brlab po/ /de

nas tsha tsha gdab pa ni snying po rgyas bsdus gang la mos pa bzlas shing gdab bo/ /de ni sa la 'debs pa'i lugs so/ /de me la 'debs na raM gyi sa bon las bskyed la/ chu la baM/ rlung la yaM/ nam mkha' la a las mchod rten du bskyed do/ /mchod rten de dag kyang sa la kha dog

ser po/ chu dkar po/ me dmar po/ rlung ljang gu/ nam mkha' mthing gar dmigs so/ /de ltar btab la ye shes kyi mchod rten spyan drangs la gnyis su med par bstim mo/ /de nas bskal pa ji srid gnas pa'i yun la rigs lnga'i mchod rten du dmigs la/ rab tu gnas

pa byas la mchod pa lnga phul la bzhugs su gsol ba'am/ yang na chu bo chen po la bskur ro/ /mchod rten gdab pa shi ba'i sdig pa byang bar byed pa/ rang byung 'jigs bral zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal

rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshe dang dpal bskyed par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa kha dog ser po lte ba sngon po mu khyud ljang gu sgo bzhi rigs dang

'dra ba bris la/ de la lha'i mtshan mas btab la/ bum pa tshad dang ldan pa la lha lnga'i mtshan mas btab la/ 'bru gtsang ma'i phye la tshe bshos zla gam la mar la sogs pa'i ro mchog rnams kyis brgyan la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas gzungs thag btags/ snying po rgyas bsdus

gang la mos pa'i gzhug la/ oM badzra hUM b+h+rUM/ oM bud+d+ha oM b+h+rUM/ oM rat+na swA b+h+rUM/ oM pad+ma AHb+h+rUM/ oM karma hA b+h+rUM zhes bzlas la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog dkar po tshe'i rgyun 'bebs pa/ khams gsum gyi tshe nyams pa gso bar byed pa/ ye shes tshe la longs spyod par bskyed la/ de'i

thugs ka'i zla ba la dmigs la sngags bzlas so/ /khams gsum tshe'i bcud bum par bsdus par dmigs la/ lha lnga'i mtshan nas brjod cing che ge mo'i tshe khug ces brjod cing bstims la dbang bskur ro/ /sems can tshe zad pa sring pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa pad+ma dbyig sgrub

ces bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byor pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ ril ba spyi blugs kyi nang du chu dang 'o mas bkang

la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i lugs ma'i spyi bo nas sbreng zhing gong ltar shin tu snying po bsdus pa la brgya phrag bzlas shing skya rengs dang po shar ba'i dus na byas pas rang gi 'dod pa dang 'byor pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog dkar

por dmigs la/ yi dam du byas te/ gzhan gyis ma mthong bar rang res byas na nyin re la gser gyi dong tse bdun brgya bdun brgya sbyin par byed do/ /gtso bo'i mdun du rnam thos sras mdog dang cha lugs legs par dmigs la bya'o/ /dal 'byor chen mo'i sgrub pa bcud kyis

lan pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon gyi lan chags kyi dbang gis tshe 'di la phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba rnams ni/ gtor ma'i las byed par 'dod pas rin po

che'i snod rgya che la gting zab pa dag cing dri ma med pa chag pa dang gas pa dang / zhom pa la sogs pa med pa/ 'bras chan nam/ 'bru'i phye ma rab tu gtsang bas gtams la/ sha dang mar dang 'o ma dang khur ba la sogs pas bran la chu rab tu gtsang zhing dri ma med pas bran la/

sngon du stong pa nyid bsgom/ de nas tshad med bzhi bsgom/ de'i ngang las bdag nyid kyis paM zhes brjod pas bdag gi mdun du sdong po shin tu rgya che ba dpangs mtho ba sum brtsegs gcig la/ de yang steng gi pad+ma la kha dog dkar po 'dab ma dpag tu med pa dbus dmar po 'dab ma

dpag tu med pa 'od sngon po dpag tu med pa dmigs so/ /de'i rjes la paM ka ma la hUM dzaHzhes brjed pas/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad spyan drangs/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can thams cad steng gi pad+ma'i steng du 'dus shing 'khod par bsam/

dbus su gzugs khams 'og tu 'dod pa khams kyi sems can 'dus shing 'khod par dmigs la/ de nas de'i 'og tu gtor ma'i snod de ci yin kyang rin po che'i snod rgya khyon dpag tu med par dmigs so/ /de'i 'og tu hUM las rdo rje phyed phyung gi sgyed po/ de'i 'og tu yaM las rlung

gi dkyil 'khor zla gam gcig bskyed/ de'i steng du raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa/ de'i steng du sgyed [(]po'i [,]pu'i [)]steng du b+h+rUM las rin po che'i snod khor khor yug tu bcas pa dmigs shing de'i nang du khaM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho/ de nas bdag nyid kyis yaM yaM yaM zhes brjod pas

rlung gi dkyil 'khor las rlung g.yos/ raM raM raM zhes brjod pas/ rlung g.yos pas me'i dkyil 'khor las me sbar/ b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM zhes brjod pas 'og tu me 'bar bas snod rin po che'i snod du zhu/ khaM khaM khaM zhes brjod pas me 'bar bas snod dros pas rdzas rnams zhu bas/ bdud rtsi'i

rgya mtshor 'khyil/ de nas oM zhes brjod pas snod kyi nang dam tshig gi bdud rtsi de sku'i bdud rtsir gyur/ AHzhes brjod pas gsung gi bdud rtsir gyur/ hUM zhes brjod pas thugs kyi bdud rtsir gyur/ de nas yang raM zhes brjod pas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i

nyes pa rnams bsregs/ yaM gis gtor/ khaM gis bkrus nas de nas sku gsung thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i bdud rtsir gyur ba'o/ /de nas srung ba chen po'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad/ de nas badzra zhes brjod pas zla phyed rdo rje las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi babs te/ rnam par dag

pa'i bdud rtsi chen po'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur te/ de nas oM ba liM b+hu dza b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha i daM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmANAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na/ twAd oM AHhUM phaT swA hA zhes pas gzugs med pa rnams la yid bzhin nor bus dbul/ gzugs khams rnams la dpag bsam

gyi shing 'dod pa rnams la rang rang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du thob par mos par bya'o/ /de nas tshigs bcad kyang 'di skad ces brjod do/ /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i gtor ma 'dis/ /dkon mchog mchod gnas bla ma'i zhing gyur dang / /gzugs med gzugs dang 'dod pas

bsdus pa yi/ /mgon btsun grogs byed chos skyong srung ma dang / /rang bzhin yon tan ldan pa'i rigs rnams dang / /lan chags 'dod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / /gnod byed 'phral gyi rkyen du byed la bsngo/ /lan chags dang bral bar byed pa gtor ma'i las dpag bsam gyi

sdong po zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa phun sum tshogs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ bdag nyid kyi mdun du zangs la sogs

pa'i snod bre bco brgyad shong ba cig bzhag la/ de'i nang du rin po che sna gang yang rung ba las byas pa'i dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa mtshon gang ba'am/ mtho gang ngam khru gang ba la sogs pa ji ltar 'grub pa'i lugs ma byas la bzhugs su gsol/ zangs la sogs pa'i snod

khyor ba gang shong ba cig tu chu gtsang ma srog chags med pas bkang ste/ 'bru'am zan mtheb kyu re bcug la/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya hu lu hu lu tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ha na ha na a mr-i te hUM phaT/ ces lan bdun bdun brjod la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog gser btso ma lta bu la

dmigs la dbul lo/ /mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya se gol gyi sgra dang ldan pas snod chen po khangs par dbul/ 'bul dus su kha dang yan lag bshal la dbul lo/ /de ltar phul bas nyi ma re la kAR+ShA pa Na lnga stong lnga stong thob par nges so/ /de ltar ma chags par nyi ma ri rtse la

shar ba phan chad dang / lto ba'i gong du rdzogs par bya'o/ /de ltar nyi ma re la yi dam du byas pas 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs par nges so/ /longs spyod dang ldan par nges pa'i dpal tshogs kyi gtor ma rin po che legs phreng zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa

rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ mchod pa'i rgya mtsho chen po rnam par rol par bya'o/ /dbus su 'bru sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag

go/ /shar phyogs su kham sa'i glud sor bzhi pa brgya la gdugs brgya/ lhor ba dan brgya/ nub tu rgyal mtshan brgya/ byang du dar dpyangs brgya/ de dag lan bdun bdun byas na 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par nges so/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i las nye bar sgrub par byed pa las tshogs

stong rgyas zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gyi lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa la lha chen po brgyad kyi cho gas lha mnyes par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan

pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la gtor ma la sogs pa snga ma ltar bshams la/ lha chen po brgyad kyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ de re re la ngar glud sor bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bskor la/ tshon gyis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bsgyur la dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' mar gzhag go/ /

de nas lha chen po rnams spyan drang ba ni/ hUM ri rab chen po'i yang steng nas/ /'jig rten stobs ldan lha chen rnams/ /dral shul ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /dbang phyug grags pa rnams skyed pa/ /legs pa'i lam yang ston pa ste/ /lha chen drag po 'khor dang

bcas/ /'dir spyon legs pa'i lam ston cig /sa ma ya dzaH/ de nas bstod cing gtor ma dbul ba ni/ hUM shar phyogs lha chen dbang phyug ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /sku mdog sngo skya 'jigs byed pa/ /skra brdzes spyan yang 'bru tshugs lta/ /dur khrod 'bar ba'i rgyan

gyis brgyan/ /g.yas na tri shUl rtse gsum bsnams/ /g.yon na thod pa khrag 'dren pa/ /de la bstod de gtor ma dbul/ /lho phyogs lha chen rgyal chen ni/ /sku mdog ser la zhal gcig pa/ /'jigs byed chen po'i phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje gsum pa bsnams/ /g.yon

pa rus pa'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /nub phyogs lha dbang tshangs pa ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar/ /skra brdzes mche ba gtsigs pa la/ /'jigs pa'i nga ro 'brug ltar sgrogs/ /g.yas pa dung chen g.yas 'khyil bsnams/ /

g.yon pa pad+ma mdzes pa 'dzin/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /byang phyogs lha chen khyab 'jug ni/ /zhal dgu phyag gnyis sku mdog dud/ /mgo lus spyan gyis khengs pa ste/ /ro smad sbrul nag 'khyil pa la/ g.yas pa'i phyag na dbyug to 'phyar/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na

'khor lo bsnams/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /shar lho 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog smug /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ha ha hi hi cher sgrogs pa/ /g.yas pa mda' ste g.yon pa gzhu/ /de la bstod de gtor ma

'bul/ /lho nub tshogs kyi bdag po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag /sbrul kyis lus brgyan 'jigs rung ba/ /rab 'jigs dbang chen kun gyi gtso/ /glang sngon sna la mche ba gtsigs/ /g.yas pa glang chen mche ba bsnams/ /g.yon pa glang ko rlon pa 'dzin/ /

de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /nub byang nag po chen po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag /skra g.yengs so gnan khrag gis brlan/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /byang

shar smin drug dbang phyug bu/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang / /'jigs byed chen po'i zhal gdangs nas/ /rab tu rngam pa'i nga ro can/ /phyag gnyis mdung thung gsor byed cing / /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /lha chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas/ /mchod

dang gtor ma phul ba yis/ /'jig rten lha rnams mnyes byas te/ bdag gi 'dod pa'i don rnams ni/ /nges par 'grub par mdzad du gsol/ /zhes gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la/ ri'i rtse mo la sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang ldan par byas la bskyal lo/ dkyil 'khor

basbu zhing bkra shis gsol/ /'jig rten gyi lha mnyes par byed pa/ don grub pa zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsgrub bya la mdza' bo dang gces pa dang / so so'i skye bo

rnams kyi lce 'bab par 'dod na/ sa sna bdun nam bcu gcig la bsgrub bya'i gzugs khru gang ba byas te/ snying gar gro ga la ra khrag gis ming rus bris te gzhug go/ /de'i spyi bor e gru gsum brus la/ /tsher ma sna tshogs pa nyag ma re gzugs so/ /mgo la ltas ngan sna tshogs

sgros brgyan/ lus la gze ma mang po btsugs la dur khab kyis btur/ de bdag gi mdun du bzhag la gtso bo la mchod bstod ci rigs par byas la sran ma rnams dang sgog skya dang / bra ma'i 'brum bu dang / skyi ba dang / bse shing gi 'bras bu la sarba sha trUM hUM phaT ces 'bum phrag

gcig bzlas te/ thun gyi skabs su brabs te/ mi chen po rnams kyi lce nyams pa 'di la phob cig ces brjod cing / ri gsum 'dus pa'i rtse la sran ma'i sbyin sreg lan nyer gcig byas la thal ba de rlung la bskur te/ bsgrub bya'i khang pa la khrag gis gtor na nges par mdza' sdug rnams

kyi lce 'bab par nges so/ /skye bo sdang ba'i las myur byed chen mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyi lce babs pa dang / sdang ba bzlog par

'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ cho ga rdzogs par byas la bdag nyid sdig pa ma lus pa yongs su dag par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /gtor ma brgya rtsa

brgyad bya ste/ gtor ma re re'i nang du sdang ba rnams ya hi gats+tsha zhes gro ga la bris la gzhug /snying po shin tu bsdus pa'i sngags brgya phrag sum cu so lnga/ spru ma dang mkhan pa dang glang ma dang shug pa'i lo ma la bzlas la/ gzhan gyi du bsam slebs par yul kun du du bo chen po

btang / tshon rtsi lnga'i phye ma la sngags bzlas la rlung chen po byung dus su yul kun khyab par gtor ro/ /des ni gzhan gyi lce babs pa rgyun 'chad do/ /gzhan gyi lce 'bab pa bzlog pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje

rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdza' bo bdag la sdang na ma rungs par byed pa'i las ni dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa byis la/ lte bar che ge mo mA ra dzaH zhes pa bri/ mu khyud la kA li/ rtsibs la khro bo lnga'i sngags bris la cho ga rdzogs par byas nas dur

khrod du mnan na mdza' bo sdang ba mi rungs bar 'gyur ro/ /sdu gu bdag la sdang ba dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na/ snying po bsdus pa la stong phrag lnga bzlas la dpral bar tsan+dan gyis lcags kyu bri/ lag mthil du gi wang gis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa re bris la/ che ge mo'i nor dang bcas

pa dbang du gyur cig swA hA zhes brjod pas dbang du 'gyur ro/ /skye bo gang sdang ba dur khrod du gsang ba'i sbyor ba lan bdun byas na 'chi bar nges so/ /sdang ba gsum gyi las thor bu slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnams par 'joms pa

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bran dang bza' mi bsrung bar 'dod pas sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dur khrod kyi shing leb kyi steng du dkyil 'khor bzhengs la khri'i steng du bzhag la/ 'og tu chu'i snod chen po gzhag go/ /de'i shar du gang bsrung ba de rnams khrus nas bton la bzhag

la/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la mdud pa bor la mgul du gdags so/ /rgya shog la 'khor lo rtsibs lnga pa la shin tu bsdus pa'i 'khor lo gi wang gis bris la/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdags so/ /shar du kha bltas la phyag btsal ba dang / de ltar

lho dang nub dang byang rnams su phyag 'tshal du bcug la dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi chus brab ba dang / brdeg pa dang / 'thor 'thung byas la dkyil 'khor gyi 'og nas shar nas nub tu bton cing ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de 'od kyi phung po chen po zhi bar 'dod na dkar po/ rgyas par

'dod na ser po/ dbang du 'dod na dmar po/ tshar gcad par 'dod na ljang gur bzhu/ lha rnams gshegs su gsol/ 'od zer de gang bsrung ba'i spyi gtsug tu bstims la/ de nyid kyang 'od kyi kha dog ci 'dra bar bzhu bar dmigs la/ phyogs skyong dang sgo ma rnams de nyid

la mchod par dmigs so/ /de ltar byas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyi gzhir 'gyur ro/ /bran dang bza' mi gdon gyis gtses pa bsrung ba'i cho ga chen mo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal

rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi mthun pa'i 'thab pa dang rtsod pa rnams zhi bar 'dod pas nags stug po'i khrod du song ste/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa zhi ba'i kha dog tu bzhengs la lha rnams spyan drang ba dang / bzhugs su gsol ba la sogs pa bya ste/

bkra shis bum pa la lha rnams dbang bskur ba la sogs pa bya ste/ bum pa de nyid la mchod cing bstod pa byas la snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la zhag bdun nam bcu gcig tu bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas skra brdzes la stod g.yogs gzar la/ sdigs

mdzub bsgreng la g.yul 'gyed pa'i khrod de'i bar du phyin na g.yul 'gyes so/ /mi mthun pa'i sems can rnams la yungs kar la bzlas nas gtor na mthun par 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang mthun pa'i sems can la gnod par sems pa las ka ra bI ra'i me tog la

bzlas nas/ de'i gdong du gtor na gnod pa bya ba dang / bsam pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dUr ba la dur khrod kyi thal ba la bzlas nas gtor na 'phrog ma'i sems zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mdza' bshes dang mdza' bo mi mthun pa la ni go la'am shing gang yang rung ba la bzlas nas byin na mdza'

zhing gcugs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'am yon tan can dang mi mthun pa la ni bya nag mo'i sgo nga dang / mu zi la bzlas la me byas la rlung phyogs su phyar ba tsam gyis mthun sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mi mthun pa zhi bar byed pa'i rtsi sbyor dbyig gi nor bu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon

ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor 'grib par 'gyur ba slar 'gugs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ shin tu ma phongs pa'i khyim nas blangs la zhing bzang po'i sa dang bsres la

stegs bu bya ste/ thig btab la de nas tshon dgye ba ni/ dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po khyams gnyis dang sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya'o/ /lte bar rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i mtshan ma gdab bo/ /shar du rigs ldan bum pa/ lhor stobs bzangs kyi be con dang / nub

tu mtshon chen gyi bse kha sbyor/ byang du rnam thos sras kyi dong tse bris la/ gtor ma bzhi/ bshos gtsang bzhi/ mar me bzhi/ bdug pa bzhi/ me tog bzhi/ dri'i dung chos bzhi bsham/ seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi sgo bzhir btsugs la me tog gi phreng bas sbrel lo/ /mtha' mar

rin po che sna tshogs pa dang / 'bru sna tshogs pa'i tshom bu dgod/ de'i phyi rim du shing me tog dang lo ma dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa sna tshogs pa btsugs te/ dkyil 'khor mi mthong bar bya'o/ /de'i phyi rim rnams su dri sna tshogs pa'i chag chag gdab ste/ rtswa ku shas 'khor bar

dgram mo/ /steng du dar sna tshogs pa'i yol ba dang / 'phyang ma 'phyang gis khebs par byas so/ /logs rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ris su bris pa dang / 'bur du btod pa dang lugs su blugs pa la sogs pa 'khor bar dgram mo/ /de nas bza' ba dang / btung

ba dang / myong ba dang / bldag pa la sogs pa kha zas kyi bye brag ji ltar 'byor pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' mar bzhag la/ mchod g.yog pa gnyis sam gsum gyis mchod pa rgyun ma chad par bya'o/ /slob dpon bdag stod g.yogs la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / dbu rgyan la

sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la ku sha'i steng du khrus bya/ rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan la 'khor dang bcas te gzhag go/ /de'i phyi logs la g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs kyis g.yas skor du hUM zhes bgegs bskrad/ de nas log ste/ byang shar nas

g.yon brkyang ba'i stabs kyis g.yon skor du oM badzra yak+Sha hUM hUM zhes brjod pas bdag dang yon bdag gi nor 'grib par byed pa'i bgegs de dpag tshad brjod kyis mi lang bar byer zhing dengs par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma'i cho ga zhag gsum du rgyun ma chad par bya/

bdag nyid kyi snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la ci nus su bzlas/ yon bdag gis sems bskyed pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / 'dod pa'i don la sogs pa la gsol ba ci nus su byed du gzhug go/ /de nas nub gsum gyi tha ma kha zas longs spyod pa

dang / yon bdag bza' bran 'khor dang bcas pa la dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams gsal la dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur ro/ /rnam thos sras la gtor ma chen po gcig byin la nor gyi bdag por mnga' gsol/ yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pas kyang / byang phyogs

kyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pas do nub nas bzung ba phan chod nor gyi bdag po mdzod la bdag cag gi nor dang zas mi 'grib par 'phel bar mdzad du gsol zhes dus la brjod do/ /de nas gtor ma btang / sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang ldan pas

gtong ngo / /de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu/ bkra shis gsol/ bsod nams kyi tshogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsag cing bla ma la yon dbul lo/ /nor 'grib pa dgang ba'i cho ga dpag bsam shing rgyas pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs

so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i las 'dod pa'i don thams cad rab tu sbyin pa longs spyod bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par maN+Dal zlum po shin tu mnyam pa

me long gi ngos lta bur byas te/ kha dog sngon po khru do'i tshad tsam byas la de'i steng du par bu sngon po gtso bo'i yi ges 'khor ba nang du phyogs kyi bdag po'i snying po gser las bris pa dang / ras sngon po la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la rab tu gnas pa byas la dar sna tshogs

pas dril la de'i nang du gzhug go/ /spre'u'i snying gi nang du gser sa byung ma dang / rin po che rnyed tshad dang / sha sna rnyed tshad de maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhag la/ glang po che'i spu dang / spre'u'i spu bsgril ba'i gzungs thag gdags/ de'i steng du tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku mdog dang / phyag

mtshan gsal bar bsgom/ bdag nyid rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du byas la gzungs thag bzung la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ga swA hA zhes stong stong gzhan gyis bar ma chod par bzlas shing tshogs bdag gis bdag nyid la longs spyod ji ltar 'dod pa'i sbyin pa byin par bsam mo/ /

yar ngo'i brgyad pa'am/ yang na mar ngo'i brgyad pa la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma shin tu bzang po sha sna tshogs dang / mar dang khur ba dang / ro mchog sna tshogs dang ldan pas mchod cing 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ gzhan kyis mthong du mi rung ngo / /tshogs bdag gi sgrub pa

dbul ba'i gter sbyin zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa nor dang zas 'dod pa rnams kyi dam pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/

snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la stong phrag lnga bzlas nas bye ma la bzlas nas rgyal po'i gdong du gtor na/ rgyal po'i chad pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /me'i 'jigs pa zhi bar 'dod na shing gcig gi drung du song ste/ maN+Dal dang mchod pa rdzogs par byas la snying po rgyas bsdus la

snga ma ltar bzlas nas/ ske tshe la bzlas nas me la gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa la se byi'i sha phye mar btags pa la bzlas te phog par gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams la stag gi spu la bzlas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mkha'

'gro mas 'jigs na ce spyang gi khrag dang spu bsres nas bdag gi lus mgo mjug tu byugs na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gdug pas 'jigs na/ mu zi dang gla rtsi la bzlas nas mgul du btags na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dug gis 'jigs na rma bya'i mkhris pa dang bu khye'u'i

ro tshon dang / sbal pa bse ru'i sha la bzlas nas lto stong la zos na de'i 'og tu rang gi dri chu 'thungs pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa brgyad las thar ba'i sgrub pa sbas pa'i ga'u zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal

rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zag gza' ngan pa'i dus las zlog par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ kha dog sngon po gtso bo'i mtshan nyid

dang ldan pa bzhag la/ de la gtso bo'i bsnyen pa brgya phul la gzhag go/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams su phur pa brgyad la dar dmar po'i cod pan btags la khro bo brgyad du bskyed la gzhag go/ /mar me la sogs pas gtso bo dang gza' brgyad mchod do/ /gza'i

gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad phyogs gtor dang bgegs gtor yang bsham mo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas rnams su bag zan las gza'i gzugs byas la tshon gyis bsgyur la gzhag /de dag re re'i mdun du sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma la sogs pa spyan gzigs kyis kyang 'khor bar

gzhag go/ /khyams rnams su rgyu skar gyi gzugs byas la gzhag go/ /de nas gtso bo la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la/ gza' rnams kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs te/ tshigs bcad kyis kyang spyan drang ba 'di skad do/ /hUM hUM hUM/ rnam dag ri rab legs pa'i

dkyil 'khor nas/ /gza' brgyad rgyu skar 'khor bcas spyan 'dren na/ /sngon gyi dam tshig dbang gis gshegs su gsol/ /e h+ye hi dzaH/ rang bzhin mi mnyam rnam dag gzhal yas la/ /mnyes par bris shing spras pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /gza' chen 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs su

gsol/ /sa ma yA hUM zhes so/ /so so'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams gsal bar bsgoms la/ mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ hUM phyogs bcu kun nas rnam dag rdzas kyi mchog /mdzes par gtams pa'i yon chab 'di/ /gza' rnams 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dam tshig

dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /phyogs bcu kun nas rnam dag rdzas kyi mchog /mdzes par gtams pa'i me tog 'di/ /gza' rnams 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dam tshig dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /phyogs bcu kun nas rnam dag rdzas kyi mchog /mdzes par gtams pa'i snang gsal 'di/ /gza' rnams

'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dam tshig dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /phyogs bcu kun nas rnam dag rdzas kyi mchog /mdzes par gtams ba'i bdug spos 'di/ /gza' rnams 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dam tshig dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /phyogs bcu kun nas rnam dag rdzas kyi

mchog /mdzes par gtams pa'i dri chab 'di/ /gza' rnams 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dam tshig dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /phyogs bcu kun nas rnam dag rdzas kyi mchog /mdzes par gtams pa'i bshos gtsang 'di/ /gza' rnams 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dam tshig

dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /phyogs bcu kun nas rnam dag rdzas kyi mchog /mdzes par gtams pa'i sil snyan 'di/ /gza' rnams 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dam tshig dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /de nas gza' rnams la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul ba ni/ hU~M shar phyogs

gza' chen pa ba sangs/ /sku mdog dmar po mdzes pa la/ na bza' dar dkar stod g.yogs can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag mtshan phyag na spu gri bsnams/ /de la mchod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /hU~M lho phyogs gza' chen phur bu ni/ /sku mdog

dkar po mdzes pa la/ /glog gi phreng ba'i 'khor yug can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ser po dar gyi stod g.yogs can/ /phyag mtshan phyag na glegs bam bsnams/ /zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /nub phyogs

gza' chen zla ba ni/ /sku mdog dkar po mdzes pa la/ /na bza' dar dmar stod g.yogs can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag mtshan phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /ngang pa dag la zhon pa la/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /byang phyogs gza' chen lag

pa ni/ /sku mdog ser po mdzes pa la/ /na bza' zangs kyi thor cog gsol/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag mtshan phyag na chan gri bsnams/ /sbrul gyi steng na bzhugs pa la/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /lha chen gza' chen sgra gcan 'dzin/ /sku

mdog dud ka mdzes pa la/ /na bza' sbrul gyi rked chings can/ /mgo lus thams cad mig gis khengs/ /phyag mtshan phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs/ /ro smad sbrul du 'khyel pa la/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /nub byang gza' chen nyi ma ni/ /sku mdog dmar po

mdzes pa la/ /na bza' thog lcags gu zu can/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag mtshan phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /rta yi steng na zhon pa la/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /byang shar gza' chen spen pa ni/ /sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa la/ /na bza'

dar dmar thul pa gsol/ /rin chen mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /phyag mtshan phyag na ral gri bsnams/ /'brug gi steng na bzhugs pa la/ /de la bstod de gtor ma 'bul/ /gza' chen 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te/ /so so'i rgyu skar 'khor bcas la/ /me tog

gtor ma gus pas 'bul/ /'di dag so sor bsnams nas ni/ /las 'di'i 'bras bu grub par mdzod/ /ces gtor ma 'bul/ phyogs skyong dang bgegs rnams la yang bstod cing gtor ma 'bul lo/ /gza' ngan pa bzlog pa'i cho ga rgya

mtsho sprin zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang dag gza' rnams kyis zin pa las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor

snga ma ltar bris la/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su chu dang khrag dang 'o ma bsres pas snod zangs la sogs pa bkang la/ gza' gang gis zin pa'i gzugs bag zan la zhi dkar sa'i phye mas bsres pa la khru gang pa tshon sna tshogs pas ri mo dang / thig ler byas la gzhag

go/ /de'i lus rnams ltas ngan sna tshogs pa'i spu dang / stag gzig gi ras dang / smyug ma gtsang ma la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan kyang phyar ro/ /de nas gzugs de chu'i steng du khri byas la dar dmar po'i yol ba byes la gzhag go/ /dkyil 'khor gyi

phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor ma gtsang ma brgyad/ spos dang mar me dang bshos dang ldan pa bsham mo/ /stag pa'am shug pa khru gang ba cig la khram nyi shu rtsa gcig btod la/ rma bya'i sgro dang bal tshon dang / dar tshon lnga yis byas pas gzas zin pa'i lus mgo mjug bya ba

ste/ chu dang gzugs la bstim mo/ /sngags pa gtsang sbra ldan pas dmar po'i gos gyon/ mgo la dmar po'i thod bcings la/ me long lnga btsugs la gza' gang gis zin pa'i snying po la 'bum phrag gcig khram shing la btab la khram phyis byad bkrol shod gtor zhes brjod

cing nad pa'i lus la gza'i sgo'i ngos su bya ste/ gzugs la bstim/ gtor ma tshar gyin gza' la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ lhag ma bdun po'i snying po la stong phrag re chu la bzlas shing / gzas zin pa'i lus la byab bo/ /dpung shig /tshogs khye/ dar rtul/ dmag

sod/ ces brjod cing brab po/ /de nas 'bru mar dang rtsi mar la sogs pa rnyed tshad la snying po rgyas bsdus gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nad pa'i lus mgo mjug tu bsku mnye bya'o/ /de ltar lan gcig las ma grol na gnyis dang gsum dang bdun byas na/ gzas zin pa

las mi grol mi srid do/ /de nas chu rungs su bcas pa de rgya mtsho chen po'i gling ngam/ ri brgyad 'dus pa'i rtse mo la pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra sna tshogs dang ldan pas bskyal lo/ /gtor ma brgyad po yang phyogs mtshams ma nor bar gtang / de ltar cho ga rdzogs par byas nas/

gzas zin pa la yang gong gi gza' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur na/ dus thams cad du gza' rnams kyi dmag dpon du 'gyur ro/ /gal te gza' gang gis zin pa'i dus ma phyed na gza' brgyad char gyi gzugs byas la/ bsnyen pa 'bum phrag re bskyar la snga ma

ltar bya'o/ /gza'i gdon las grol bar byed pa'i cho ga rin po che grol byed ces bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gza' rnams kyi las grub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam

tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bris la seng ldeng gi phur bu brgyad la gza' brgyad kyi snying po so sor bris la/ rtse mo la dug khrag gis byugs la so so'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gtor ma brgyad sha sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bsham mo/ /dbus

su gtso bo'i bum pa la yab yum kyi mtshan ma btab la snying po bsdus pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal bar bskyed pa'i thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags kyu'i gzugs 'dra ba byung ste/ gza' so so'i snying ga nas bzung ste rnal 'byor pa'i las kyi mtha' grub

par gyis shig par mnga' gsol/ de nas gza' las chu 'grol ba la sogs pa gang byed pa la bsnyen pa brgya bzlas/ mchod bstod bya/ de nas sngags pa bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi nas rgyud rdzogs pa sum brgya klag ste/ brgya tshigs kyis mchod bstod bya zhing / gtso bo

yab yum la bdag nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ de nas gza' brgyad kyi las ji ltar byed pa'i don khas blangs la gtor ma gtang zhing rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzhung gi las la sbyar na 'grub par gdon mi za'o/ /gza' brgyad

kyi las ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'i cho ga /'dod pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang bos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu skar ngan pa bzlog par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang

ldan pas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par dkyil 'khor snga ma ltar bzhengs la/ rgyu skar rnams thang la dbab pa'i cho ga ni/ gtor ma btang / mchod pa'i bye brag lha'i grangs dang mnyam par bsham par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kyi gru bzhir dar dmar po'i gdugs dbub/

de'i nang du gza' brgyad kyi gzugs gnyis gnyis gzhag /bag zan las rgyu skar rnams kyi gzugs byas te/ so so'i sku mdog dang mthun pa'i tshon gyis bsgyur/ rgyu skar re re la ngar glud mtheb gang ba bcu gsum bcu gsum gyis bskor/ de dag kyang tshon sna tshogs pas

bsgyur ro/ /gtor ma re'i nang du lha bshos re bya'o/ /de ltar byas la dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sngags dang phyag rgyas gong ltar spyan drangs la ye shes sems dpa' dang gnyis su med par bstims la/ gtso bo la mchod bstod ci rigs par byas la de nas gza' rnams la

bstod/ /mchod pa lnga dbul/ de nas rgyu skar rnams ri rab kyi ngos la spyan drangs te/ hUM ri rab chen po'i ngos dag nas/ /dus tshod kun la dbang bsgyur ba'i/ /rgyu skar tshogs dang dmag dpung bcas/ /btsun mo g.yog 'khor bcas pa rnams/ /spyan 'dren mchod kyis 'dir

gshegs shig /a pra ti ha ta hUM/ de nas rgyu skar re re la mchod pa lnga lnga phul la/ brtan par bzhugs par bya'o/ /de nas rgyu skar gyi tshogs la bstod de/ gtor ma dbul lo/ /'dir sngags ci rigs par bzlas so/ /de nas bstod pa ni/ hUM shar phyogs skar ma smin

drug ni/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan yang drug /phyag stong 'od zer mtha' yas pa/ /sku mdog dkar la rin chen brgyan/ /phyag stong phyag na mdung dmar bsnams/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su khyi dkar mdzes pa bcibs/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma

'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /snar ma las kyi lha skar ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na mda' mo che/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su

nya la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /chu bdag rgyu skar mgo bo ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dkar smug 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na 'khor lo bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis

brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su sre mo bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /lag pa kun du rgyu ba ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ljang skya 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na gtun

shing bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa /chibs su sre mo bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /bra nye skar ma nab so ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku

mdog dkar la 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na phub bsnams pa/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su sram la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /nyes pa spangs pa'i

bkra shis rgyal/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dkar ser 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na ral gri bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan kyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su khyung la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma

'bul/ /skar ngan byol bo bzlog par mdzod/ /shar smad rgyu skar skag ces pa/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na rnga yab bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun

'bab pa/ /chibs su rta la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /lho stod ngos kyi skar ma mchu/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na me dpung bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs

rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su bya dkar bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /gre ni ma rungs las ston pa/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog sngo skya 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong

phyag na chu rgyun 'bebs/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su glang po che la bcibs/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /dbo ni mi sdug cho 'phrul can/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog

dmar skya 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na sa dkyil bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su stag la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /tsha ba las spyod me bzhi

ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na rlung 'dzin pa/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /rin chen khri steng bzhugs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po

bzlog par mdzod/ /'jigs chen po yi nag pa ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog gnag la 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su g.yag rog bcibs

pa la /de la bstod byung gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /dregs chen 'joms pa'i sa ri ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na sbud pa bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud

rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /gser gyi gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /kun du nyul ba'i sa ga ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /rin chen sna

tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su sbrul la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /nub stod lha mtshams gzi brjid 'bar/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer

'khrug /phyag stong phyag na rin chen bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su glog la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /sa 'og dbang ba khron skyes ni/ /zhal

gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dmar skya 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na bse'i ga'u bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su dred la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog

par mdzod/ /pho nya'i las tshogs bsrungs chen ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dmar ser 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na dngul phran bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su rlung la bcibs pa la/ /

de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /skyob pa chen mo'i chu stod ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog sngon po 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i

rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su 'brug la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /chu smad khyab pa chen mo ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ljang sngon 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na ba dan

bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su ce spyang bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /gro bzhin sa yi khams pa ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog smug

po 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na lcags kyu bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su seng ge bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /srod la rku mkhas byi bzhin ni/ /

zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dmar ljang 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na yol ba 'dzin/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su wa la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog

par mdzod/ /byang stod dbang ba mon gru ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na seng ge bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su dom la bcibs pa la/ /

de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /stong 'joms pa ste mon gre ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na wa seng bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i

rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su sprin la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /'jigs pa'i las mkhan khrums stod ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ljang ser 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na byi la bsnams/ /rin chen sna

tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su ngang pa dag la bcibs/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /brtan pa'i las byed khrums smad ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ljang sngon 'od zer

'khrug /phyag stong phyag na glang sngon bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su ra la bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /bar snang dbang ba'i nam gru ni/ /zhal

gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog mthing skya 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na bya rgod bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su bum pa bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par

mdzod/ /dpung ldan rags pa tha skar ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog ljang dmar 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na ri skegs bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /chibs su rnga mo bcibs pa la/ /de la bstod

cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /nyes pa ston pa'i bra nye ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag stong pa/ /sku mdog dud ser 'od zer 'khrug /phyag stong phyag na rma bya bsnams/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab pa/ /

chibs su sbal pa khra bo bcibs/ /de la bstod cing gtor ma 'bul/ /skar ngan byol po bzlog par mdzod/ /phyogs dang mtshams su 'gro ba la/ /'od dang kha dog yang dag ldan/ /'gro ba'i 'phel 'grib byed pa ste/ /rgyu skar rin po dpal ldan 'jigs/ /so so'i g.yog

'khor bcas pa la/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes/ /las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /ces gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la/ gzugs dang bcas pa ri rtse la bskyal lo/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsags/ dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing yon bdag bkra

shis par bya ba'i phyir/ lha mo brgyad kyi bkra shis dang gye/ rigs lnga'i 'am/ lha mo bzhi'i bkra shis sam/ gsum gyi bkra shis gang mos pas bkra shis gsol/ bgegs dang phyogs skyong gi gtor ma btang la/ bgegs dang dbral ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /

las dang las kyi bye brag gang 'dod pa'i dbye bar bya'o/ /de nas yi ge brgya pas bshags so/ /rnal 'byor pa'i tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba'i cho ga /bdud rtsi'i sprin zhes bya ba rgyas bsdus gang mos la bya'o/ /de nas yon bdag rnams khrus nas gdon no/ /rgyu skar ngan pa zlog par

byed pa'i cho ga /dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skar ma rgyu ba rnams kyi las sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms

pa'i rnal 'byor sngon du song bas/ zhi ba'i las byed par 'dod pas/ me bzhi la bya'o/ /rgyas pa'i las la rgyal/ dbang gi las la khrums smad la/ dral shul sna tshogs kyi las byed par 'dod pas nag pa la bya'o/ /bskrad par 'dod pas lag la/ dbye bar 'dod pas sa ri la/

bkar bar 'dod pas gro bzhin la/ rmugs par 'dod pas mon gre la/ rengs par 'dod pas nab so la/ skrag par 'dod pas smin drug la/ 'gugs par 'dod pas byi bzhin la/ 'jil bar 'dod pas snar ma la/ 'khrug par 'dod pas bra nye la/ rgyal bar 'dod pas lha mtshams

la /dpung dang ldan par 'dod pas mgo la/ sa'i las byed par 'dod pas khrums stod la/ chu'i las byed par 'dod pas chu stod la/ me'i las byed par 'dod pas nam gru la/ rlung gi las byed par 'dod pas mchu la/ sa'i sde pham par 'dod na khrums smad la/ chu'i sde pham par

'dod na chu smad la/ me'i sde pham par 'dod na dbo la/ /rlung gi sde pham par 'dod na sa ga la/ ma grub pa grub par 'dod na mon gru la/ grub pa chud mi za bar byed pa tha skar la/ 'dod pa'i don rab tu sbyin par 'dod pas bre la bya'o/ /bsgrub bya phung bar byed par 'dod pas skag la/ nor

bsgrub par 'dod pas snron la bya'o/ /gzhan 'jig rten pa'i legs pa sna tshogs sgrub par 'dod pas rgyal la bya'o/ /pha rol la nyams pa sna tshogs gtong bar 'dod pas bra nye la bya'o/ /de ltar dmag drang bar 'dod pa dang / nor rnyed par 'dod pa dang / tshong rgyal bar 'dod pas

snrubs la bya'o/ /rtsa ra dang rkun ma'i las grub par 'dod pas tha skar la bya'o/ /'jigs pa brgyad las thar bar 'dod na mon gru la bya'o/ /bgegs bzlog pa dang mi mthong ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung bzlog par 'dod pas lha mtshams la bya'o/ /skra bkru ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / dpal

dbang phyug dang / rgyal sar 'don pa dang / tshong bzang bar 'dod pas rgyal la/ bag ma gtong ba dang / skra bkru ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / gos dang sa bon 'debs par 'dod pas lag la/ ston mo dang 'du ba sbud pa dang / 'dun ma dang / gros legs par 'dod pas nab

so la bya'o/ /gzhan gnyen spyor dang / mkhar len dang nyo ba dang / 'khor ba'i las gang yang grub par 'dod pas me bzhi la bya'o/ /de ltar na nye ba ston pa'i las sna tshogs la yang mkhas par spyad par bya'o/ /de ltar rgyu skar rnams dus nges pa las ma 'khrul bar byas na/

gdon mi za bar 'grub pa la the tshom med do/ /de'i phyir na rgyu skar rnams ni bzang po yin zhes bya'o/ /de nas so so'i phyogs kyi gza' rnams dang btub par nges par 'grub pa yin no/ /de ltar rgyu skar 'di dag gis ni legs pa dang nyes pa dang / 'jig rten kyi 'khrul 'khor sna

tshogs ston pas gtso che'o/ /rgyu skar rnams kyi las sna tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa/ dus 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang bos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol gyi byad stems las

grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dur khrod kyi ras la khyi nag po'i khrag gis 'khor lo rtsibs sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris te/ lte bar che ge staM b+ha ya bri/ rtsibs rnams la khro bo bcu'i sngags mgo nang du bstan pa bri/ mu khyud nang ma la A li mgo nang du bstan pa

bri/ phyi ma la kA li mgo nang du bstan pa bris la bdag nyid kha lho phyogs su bltas la 'khor lo la rab tu gnas pa byas la/ khro bo bcu'i sngags la stong phrag lnga bzlas la/ de nas g.yul gyes pa'i sa dang / dur khrod kyi sa dang / grog mkhar gyi sa dang /

phung shul gyi sa las mchod rten khru gang ba rim pa lnga byas la/ de'i nang du yang gro ga la ling+ga bris la lce phyir phyung la lce la dug gi phur pa rgya mdud nub par btab la/ che ge mo'i byad kha rnams bzlog /byol staM b+ha ya hUM hUM hUM zhes pas mtha' ma bskor/ mchod rten gyi bre'i nang du

gzhug go/ /bdag nyid kyi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum pa brus la nang dur khrod kyi sol bas byugs la/ 'khor lo de phur bu bcu gsum gyis brgyangs la de'i steng du nas nag mo dang sran ma dang / yungs nag rnams bkram la/ de'i steng du mchod rten mgo mjug bzlog la gzhag

go/ /de nas nang rnams su dug shing gi tsher mas dgang ngo / /kha dur khrod kyi g.yam pa la ri rab gling bzhi dang bcas pas mnan no/ /de nas lham 'bob dang / yugs sa mo'i zhabs ma bting las bdag gi zhal dbyung ngo / /bdag nyid nyal ba'i tshe oM ha ra ha ra badzra che ge mo'i byad

stems sha trUM hUM hUM zhes khro bo bcu'i sngags la btags la/ ji ltar 'grub pa'am ma chag par bzlas so/ /dus bzhir gtor ma chung ba bcu phyogs bcur 'phang zhing khro bo bcu la dmod btsugs shing ma nyes pa'i rabs brjod 'jig rten gyi lha 'dre rnams la dam pa dar zhing dpang gzugs

pa/ phyogs rnams su seng ldeng gi phur bu re la khro bo bcu'i sngags bris la dpal che ge byad stems mA ra ya bzlog sod byol zhes bris la bdag nyid kyi gnas khang gi phyogs mtshams dang / steng 'og tu gdab po/ /phur bu de dag kyang khro bo bcur mnga' gsol la gtor ma re btang / nya stong

la phur bu de gzi brjid bskyed do/ /gtor ma gtang ba'i dus su yungs kar dang dug sna la sngags bzlas la phyogs mtshams su gtor ro/ /dur khrod du yang skabs su mnan pa bya'o/ /skabs su gtor ma dang bsgrub bya'i ling+ga chu la bskur ro/ /skabs su me la bsreg go/ /de ltar byas

pas gdon thams cad kha 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /byad stems thams cad spod gtong byed pa de nyid rang la nges par bzlog par nges so/ /byad stems thams cad gcod pa dang / phur kha thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir bzlog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa

rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa'i sems can la phan thogs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ klu chen po brgyad mchod par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bzhengs la

ral gri dang / mda' rnams kyis mtha' ma bskor la/ dbus su gtso bo'i bum pa btsugs la/ gzungs thag gis gdags/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi steng du klu so so'i gzugs brnyan bkod pa dang / so so'i gtor ma dkar gsum mngar gsum dang / rtsi sman sna tshogs pa

dang ldan par yang bsham mo/ /dkon mchog dang klu rnams mchod pa'i lha bshos dang / mar me la sogs pa mchod pa'i bye brag ci 'byor pa rnams bsham mo/ /phyogs skyong dang bgegs rnams la gtor ma bsham zhing gtang ngo / /de nas klu chen po rnams so so'i gnas su spyan

drang ba ni/ hUM rgya mtsho yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /mtha' yas 'jog po karko Ta/ /u li ka dang nor rgyas dang / /pad+ma dang ni ba su na/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas/ /btsun mo rnams kyis mgul nas 'khyud/ /yab yum sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /'dir gshegs

spyan 'dren mchod par 'bul/ oM phuHswA hA/ sa ma yA/ de nas bstod cing gtor ma dbul ba ni/ hUM shar phyogs klu rgyal mtha' yas ni/ /sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang / /sbrul mgo bdun gyi

gdengs ka can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi hUM/ /lho phyogs klu rgyal 'jog po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul/ /sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin

nor bu dang / /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /nub phyogs klu dbang karko Ta/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul/ /sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma

zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang / /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan kyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /byang phyogs klu rgyal u li ka /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul/ /sku mdog dmar skya 'od zer 'bar/ /

phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang / /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /shar lhor klu rgyal nor rgyas ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul/ /sku mdog ser

skya 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang / /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /lho nub klu rgyal dung skyong ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul/ /

sku mdog ser la 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang / /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /nub byang klu rgyal pad+ma ni/ /zhal gcig phyag

gnyis ro smad sprul/ /sku mdog sngo skya 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang / /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /byang shar klu rgyal ba ra Na/ /

zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro smad sbrul/ /sku mdog dmar sngo 'od zer 'bar/ /phyag mtshan pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /spyi gtsug yid bzhin nor bu dang / /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /sbrul dang rin chen rgyan kyis brgyan/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /

so so'i yum kyi sku mdog ni/ /rang rang yab dang mthun pa la/ /rin chen phreng ba'i do shal can/ /g.yas g.yon yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud/ /kha rlangs dug tu 'khyil bar byed/ /de la mchod cing bstod par bgyi/ /de dag so so'i sras rnams ni/ /sku mdog 'di 'dra ma nges te/ /

mdzes shing sdu gu 'od 'bar ba/ /la la chu srin kha nas 'byung / /de bzhin sbrul dang sbal pa dang / /chu glang chu rta kha nas 'byung / /sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod par bgyid/ /gzhan yang klu bran 'bum gyi tshogs/ /byol song gzugs

brnyan sna tshogs ston/ /'dab chags tshogs dang ltos 'gro dang / /rkang mangs dang ni rkang med dang / /sdig srin gzugs brnyan ston pa la/ /mchod cing bstod nas gtor ma 'bul/ /bdag gi las kyi 'bras bu rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod pa ji bzhin du/ /khyed kyis 'dod don

grub par mdzod/ /ces klu brgyad kyi snying po brgya rtsa bzlas la gtor ma gtong zhing snying po rgyas bsdus kyi bum pa'i chus khrus bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing bkra shis gsol lo/ /klu chen po brgyad mchod pas mi bzad pa'i nad yams drag po las thar bar byed pa/ dpal mar

me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu chen po rnams bsgrubs te mi bzad pa tsi tsi dz+wa la'i nad las thar bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la mchod

pa ji ltar 'byor pa bzhin bshams la/ /gtso bo'i bsnyen pa ci rigs par bzlas la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ de nas klu chen po rang bzhin gyi gnas nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du spyan drangs la/ de la mchod pa dbul lo/ /de nas klu brgyad kyi gtor ma la baM las ye shes

kyi chu rgyun babs te snga ma ltar phul la/ de nas klu brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor de bdag nyid rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas lag mthil gnyis su bsgoms pas/ de nas kha sbyar te phud ces pa lan 'bum bzlas te/ klu rnams la 'o ma rtsi sman sna tshogs pas mchod cing / dug

thams cad phyungs shig ces sman kyis mchod pa rgyas par dbul lo/ /de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas/ sgrub pa dngos ni klu chen po brgyad la sogs pa bag zan las klu'i gzugs sna tshogs pa byas te/ btsag rams la sogs pas bsgyur la/ kham phor kha

spyor du bcug ste/ rtsi sman dang / 'o ma dang ldan pas klu brgyad kyi snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas/ bstod pa ci rigs par byas la/ gang 'dod pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa sa'i gting du sba'o/ /de ltar byas pas klu rnams kyis legs pa ster bar 'gyur ro/ /klu

sgrub rin po che dbyig sgrub ces bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu rnams kyi gdon las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin

du bris la/ gtso bo'i bum pa la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsangs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag /de nas bag zan la klu chen po brgyad kyi gzugs sor bzhi pa thal mo sbyar ba tshon gyis bsgyur te/ so so'i gnas su bum pa la kha bstan la gzhag go/ /de nas

dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su sbrul nag po brgyad/ rtsangs pa dmar po brgyad/ sbal pa ser po brgyad/ sdig pa sngon po brgyad/ nya ljang gu brgyad/ lcong mo dmar mo brgyad/ sdom nag po brgyad/ bya dkar mo brgyad/ glang dmar po brgyad/ chu srin sngon po brgyad/

ra dkar mo brgyad/ sram sngon po brgyad/ rta smug po brgyad/ sgo bzhir shar du stag skya bo/ lhor seng ge'i mgo can/ nub tu ba lang gi mgo can/ byang du byi la'i mgo can phyogs kyi kha dog dang mthun pa'o/ /mu khyud kyi steng du klu brgyad kyi chung ma ral pa can mdog khra bo brgyad

gzhag go/ /mu ran rnams su byol song gi gzugs sna tshogs la tshon sna tshogs pas bsgyur la gzhag go/ /srog chags de dag ni gtso bo la bka' nyan pa'i tshul gyis blta'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su kham phor gtsang ma'am/ rin po che'i snod du

ba dmar mo'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang / ka ra dang / bu ram la sogs te/ mngar sna rnams dang / nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i klu sman sna tshogs blugs te/ dar ljang gus phub la gzhag go/ /klu'i gtor ma nyi shu rtsa gcig phyogs gtor dang / bgegs gtor kyang gzhan

dang mthun par bsag go/ /rin po che dang bal tshon sna tshogs pa yang sobs su 'bul lo/ /de nas dzaHhUM baM hoHsa klu rnams gzugs brnyan la bcug ste de dag mchod par bya'o/ /me long gi nang du gzugs brnyan gsal bar byas la/ nad pa'i lus la rma byas byabs

te/ me long gi gzugs brnyan dang dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas la/ 'o ma sbreng zhing skabs su dug 'don pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /snga ma bzhin bstod cing / snying po shin tu bsdus pa'i gsham la/ klu brgyad kyi snying po bzlas so/ /de ltar brgya song zhing klu rnams la sman dbul

ba ni/ kwa ye klu chen po brgyad po tshur nyon dang / /nga ni rdo rje rnam 'joms te/ /rig sngags grub pas yas dor te/ /klu rnams nga yi bka' la nyon/ /nga yi bka' la mi nyan na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'dis/ /klu yi snying la me sbar nas/ /mgo lus bye mas sreg par byed/ /de bas nga

yi bka' nyon cig /hUM gdug pa'i nad rnams gdon pa'i phyir/ /klu rgyal rnams la mchod par 'bul/ /nA ga ge sar bdud rtsi 'bul/ /nA ga pus pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /rgya mtsho lbu ba'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /gla gor zho sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /mkhal ma zho sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /

snying zho sha yi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /pu shel tse yi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /kaN+Da ka ri'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /mkhal sran bre yi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /cu gang dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /gur kum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /'om bu dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /dbang po lag pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /chu

srin sder mo'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /rdo rgyus dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /thal ka rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'bul/ /dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /mngar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul/ /zhes brjod cing klu rnams kyi snying po brgya tshar re bzlas/ de nas klu gso ba'i cho ga ni/ hUM nA ga

ge sar sman phul bas/ /klu yi glo nad sos gyur cig /nA ga bus pa'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi mchin nad sos gyur cig /rgya mtsho lbu ba'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi dbugs nad sos gyur cig /gla gor zho sha'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi klad nad sos gyur cig /

mkhal ma zho sha'i bdud rtsi yis/ /klu yi mkhal nad sos gyur cig /snying zho sha yi sman phul bas/ /klu yi snying nad sos gyur cig /pu shel tse yi sman phul bas/ /klu yi skra nad sos gyur cig /kaN+Da ka ri'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi rkang nad sos gyur cig /mkhal sran khra

bo'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi kha nad sos gyur cig /cu gang dkar po'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi so nad sos gyur cig /gur gum dag gi sman phul bas/ /klu yi rgyu nad sos gyur cig /'om bu dag gi sman phul bas/ /klu yi khong nad sos gyur cig /dbang po lag pa'i sman

phul bas/ /klu yi yan lag sos gyur cig /chu srin sder mo'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi sems nad sos gyur cig /rdo rgyus dkar po'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi chu rgyus nyams pa sos gyur cig /thal ka rdo rje'i sman phul bas/ /klu yi gsang nad sos gyur cig /dkar

gsum bdud rtsi phul ba yis /klu yi gzi mdangs nyams pa sos gyur cig /mngar gsum bdud rtsi phul ba yis/ /klu rnams lus shed rdzogs gyur cig /ces sman gyis lus nad rnams bsal nas/ klu'i dug dbyung zhing gdon las dgrol ba'i cho ga ni/ me long gi dkyil

'khor la rtsi mchod 'bul ba ni/ rma byas dug byab cing 'di skad do/ /nA ga ge sar sman gyi mchog /nA ga ge sar 'di phul bas/ /klu yi nad rnams sos gyur cig /klu yi nad rnams sos pa bzhin/ /mi yi nad rnams sos gyur cig /klu yi nad rnams sos nas kyang / /klu rnams

mdangs dang ldan gyur cig /klu rnams mdangs dang ldan nas kyang / /mi rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig /klu rnams mdangs dang ldan nas kyang / /klu yi dug rnams phyir phyung shig /dug 'di sa yi nang du song / /reg pa'i dug rnams phyir phyung shig /kha rlangs dug rnams phyir

phyung shig /dug rnams sa yi nang du song / /de bzhin chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba bzhi la dug song cig /ces brjod cing phud phud ces dug gi rlangs pa sngon dmar du 'byung zhing / rma byas byabs la me long la bstim mo/ /sman kun la tshig de kun sbyar/ de ltar snying po stong tshar

zhing de ltar gdon dgrol kyi cho ga tshig tu brjod cing / dug gdon no/ /nad pa'i lus mgo mjug tu smyug shad kyi lcug ma'am/ bal po se'u'i lcug mas brdeg go/ /rma dang shu ba yod pa rnams la khrus bya'o/ /de nas klu rnams la gtor ma rgya chen po gtang ngo / /bgegs

dang phyogs skyong rnams la yang gtor ma gtang ngo / /de nas dkyil 'khor gzugs dang bcas pa de chu klung chen po'am/ yang na sa'i gter du sba'o/ /de nas tshe dbang bskur zhing bkra shis gsol/ khrus bya zhing snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la brgya rtsa brgyad zlos su gzhug go/ /

mi shigs pa lus thams cad rdo rjer byin kyis brlabs la gzhag go/ /klu'i gdon las grol bar byed pa sbrul 'dzin bsang ba zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdon

bsrung bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i nga rgyal dang dus thams cad du mi 'bral bar byas te/ rgyal po'i rigs kyi gdon gyis zin pa la rgyud rdzogs pa la 'bad par bya zhing rtag tu khrus bya'o/ /rje'u'i rigs la snying po bsdus pa

la 'bad par bya zhing / rtag tu dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa la snying po bsdus pa la 'bad par bya zhing rtag tu sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dmangs rigs kyi gdon gyis zin pa la/ rgyud 'khrug pa bzlas shing 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing dbang bskur

ba'o/ /gdol pa'i nad kyis zin pa rnams la ni rgyud dum bur bzlas shing gdon dgol kyi cho ga rtag tu bya'o/ /sha ro dang rma dang shu ba gtso che ba rnams la ni gu gul dang / sbrang rtsi dang tshil chen rnams la sngags btab la byug go/ /bems dang sbrid dang rab tu tsha ba rnams la ni/ tsan+dan

dkar po dang / ga bur dang / ka ra rnams la sngags btab la btung ngo / /sha'i nad rnams la ba bla dang / snying zho sha dang / tsi ta dang / ldong ros rnams la sngags btab la byug go/ /rus pa'i nad rnams la ni 'brug rus dang dngul chu la bsngags la byug go/ /

smin ma byi ba la sogs pa ba sru'i nad rnams la ni/ /'bras bu gsum bsregs pa'i thal ba la bsngags byug go/ /mdor na tsha ba'i nad rnams kyis zin pa la ni/ bsil ba'i sman rnams la bsngags la byug go/ /grang ba'i gdon gyis zin pa la ni tsha ba'i sman rnams la bsngags

rul chang dang sbyar la ltor gtong / sngags zlos pa'i tshe rang gi snying gi dkyil du yig 'bru rnams las 'od zer zhi rgyas kyi kha dog ltar dmigs la/ spros pas klu'i dug rnams phyir 'thon te/ de'i rjes la lus mgo mjug rdo rje rtse gsum pas gtams par dmigs la bzlas so/ /

rdo rje de dag las kyang bskal pa'i me sna tshogs la dmigs te/ me de dag la sngags kyi rang sgra thogs pa med par grag la dmigs te bzlas so/ /sngags bzlas pa'i mchil ma rnams kyang khro chu khol mar dmigs so/ /skabs su gdug pa can rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ ye

shes 'dus pa'i khro chung yungs 'bru tsam rdo rje'i kha nas 'thon te/ grangs med par 'phros te kha dog sngon po g.yas rdo rje g.yon bum pa bzung bas me stag 'phros pas gdug rtsub rnams tshar bcad/ bskal pa'i me sna tshogs 'phros pas/ rang gnas sgra'i bsam gtan phyogs

thams cad nas rgyun ma chad par sgrogs pas klu'i grong khyer dpag tu med pa rlag par byed pa de dag me ri dang me dpung gi dkyil na/ klu gdug pa can gyi rang srog dang / bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang g.yog rnams sreg par byed pa/ de lta bu'i khro chung gi gzi brjid kyis/ klu'i rgyal po

rnams rab tu skrag ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bka' nyan cing klu'i dug rnams rang gi lus la rngub par dmigs so/ /de ltar las ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas nas slar rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la bstims la gzhag go/ /de'i phyi nang lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas zhes

smos nas/ khro bo de dag gi rdo rje zhes smos pa'o/ /de ltar byed pa ni klu'i gdon thams cad srung bar byed pa dang / brlag par byed pa'i las kyi spyor ba'o/ /de dag klu'i gdon las bsrung na sngags kyi mgo la oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM zhes bzlas so/ /zhi bar byed na zhabs la nA ga

swA hA zhes bzlas so/ /rgyas par byed na zhabs la nA ga sarba lo ki phaT ces pa'o/ /dbang du byed na nA ga a la ya hUM zhes pa'o/ /gsod na nA ga mA ra ya hUM phaT ces pa'o/ /gnon na nA ga staM b+ha ya naM/ sreg na nA ga dz+wa la raM hU~M/ skrod na nA ga u tsa ta ya phaT/ 'gugs na nA ga pa yi dza/

klu'i 'khrun thag gcod na nA ga ya hi sa ra na phaT ces pa rnams sngags kyi mtha' rten du shes par bya'o/ /de ltar byas pas gdug pa klu'i dug pa ma lus par brlag par 'gyur bar nges so/ /klu'i gdon las thar bar byed pa'i las klu'i srog me dbal gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ klu'i

rnam par 'joms pa'i snying gzer du bkod pa/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams kyi nad mi bzad pa drag po zhi bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas/ seng
