'gyur ro/ /nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /tha na grib mas phog pa yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na bya ba mang du byed pa lta ci smos te/ de'i phan yon dpag tu med do zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa

phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa ji skad gsungs pa thams cad che ge mo la sogs pas 'phral du thob cing mngon du 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / gzungs 'di nyid phyag mtshan du bzhes pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs

pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' ldan pa'i lha'i sras thams cad dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la sogs pas 'di skad du gzungs sngags

mthu chen po 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur mthong ba dang / thos par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig phyogs nas slad ma'i dus na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/ /'di rgyas par bgyi'o/ /sems can thams cad la

bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /'di 'dzin pa'i sems can chen po de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o/ /bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang grogs po dag legs so/ /khyed kyis

kyang de ltar gyis shig /rig sngags kyi rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di ngas khyed la gtad do zhes rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa rnams dang / gzhan yang 'phags pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad kyis kyang / bdag cag dus ngan pa'i gang zag bsam pa dang spyod pa dman zhing

cho ga tshul bzhin rngo mi thogs pa'i dbang du mi bgyi bar/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung tshad mar bsgrub pa dang / so so'i thugs dam rlabs po che yongs su bskang ba gtsor dgongs shing / dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / gzungs rnams kyi mthu stobs

bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbang du mdzad de gdan 'dzom pas mdo sde dang / gzungs kyi cho ga thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bsrung zhing / phan yon ji ltar bka' stsal pa thams cad che ge mo la sogs pas thams cad 'phral du thob par byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / ci nas kyang dkon

mchog gsum sku mi ngas pa dang / bstan pa 'dzin pa bdag cag skye ba'i dge 'dun rnams kyang ngag mi sun/ 'jig rten gyis smad par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul du mthu dang phan yon sngon du bstan par ci gnang / de'i 'og tu ji ltar gsol ba bzhin du 'phags pa rnams kyis phrin las mdzad

cing 'gro ba'i don du 'gyur ba bden pa bdar zhing yid kyis bsngo ba ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang / 'phags

pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa ma dag pa mi mnga' ba rnams kyi thugs dam nges pa'i bden pas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i tshul bzhin du/ chos kyi sku'i mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab ste/ bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mchod pa'i

sprin rgya mtshos brgyan pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor bshams pa 'dir/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang / chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ mchod pa bzhes shing / kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang

ba'i gzungs dang / chos kyi sku'i mchod rten rnams tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab par mdzad de/ mdo sde gzungs zab cing rgya che ba rnams so so'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don dpag tu med pa mdzad par gyur cig /chos kyi sku'i

mchod rten la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rig pa'i rgyal mo'i yig 'bru gser gyi mdog can phreng bar gnas pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros pas/ 'jig rten thams cad du khyab cing / 'phags pa rnams kyi sku la bab pas ni

sgrib pa gnyis las grol zhing thar pa gong nas gong du 'phar te/ 'gro ba'i don spyad pa'i mthu dpag tu med pa thob cing / sems can gyi don la bskul bar gyur cig /'gro ba lnga'i sems can thams cad kyi lus la phog pas de dag thams cad so so'i sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa thams

cad 'phral du zhi zhing bde ba dang ldan par gyur la 'od zer gyi phung po'i nang na 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa mthong nas/ bka'i drin gzo dad pa skyes nas skyabs su mchi zhing / byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ngan song gi gnas nas thar te/ 'phags pa'i lam la 'jug par gyur cig /

bdag cag dge 'dun rnams la khyab nas bdag cag kyang 'gro ba'i don dpag tu med par bsgrub nus pa'i mthu thogs pa med pa thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag dang sku dang gsung dang thugs mtshungs par gyur cig /yang 'od zer de dag gcig tu 'dus pas/

bum pa'i gzungs chab la khyab ste reg pa tsam gyis gnod pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / mi bde ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ dpal dang bde legs skyed par byed pa'i bdud rtsi'i dag byed du gyur cig /che ge mo'i lus dang 'khor dang yo byad thams cad du khyab ste/ nad dang bkra mi shis pa

dang / gnod pa thams cad bsal zhing zhi nas lus dang sems dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral te/ rdo rje lta bur mkhregs shing brtan pa dang / chos kyi snod du rung bar gyur cig /gzhan yang chos kyi de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa la sogs pa thabs mkhas pa'i sgo sna tshogs nas/

'phags pa thams cad 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don rdzogs par mdzad par gyur cig /bdag cag dge 'dun gyis sems kyi dmigs pa 'ga' bskyed pa dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'bru 'ga' brjod pa yang 'phags pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sna tshogs dang / tshig 'bru mtha' yas pas

rdzogs shing rnam par dag par byin gyis brlab par gyur cig ces/ de skad lan gsum bzlas/ yang dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang byin gyi rlabs dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i

stobs dang / 'phags pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun du spyod pa ma dag pa mi mnga' ba rnams kyi thugs dam nges pa'i bden pas de bzhin du gyur cig /ces lan gsum bzlas/ 'phags pa rnams kyi dgongs pa bskul zhing gleng gzhir gyur pa'i gzungs kyi mdo sde tshar phyin gcig

kyang bzla la bklag /de'i 'og tu 'phags pa rnams kyis gnang zhing phrin las mdzad par nges par yid ches pa bskyed de/ ji ltar bden pas bsngos pa bzhin mngon sum du dmigs shing bsam/ de nas 'od zer 'phros pas nad pa dang / gzungs chab la khyad par mngon du dmigs bzhin

du gzungs kyi mdo sde tshar phyin gcig kyang bzla la bklag /gzungs rnam gnyis brgya rtsa brgyad kun gyis bzlas shing / zlos mkhan rnams nad pa 'phags pa'i tshogs mngon du phyogs par bzhag la rma bya'i sgro lngas byab po/ /de nas nad pas phyogs bzhi nas mchod nas byang chub tu

sems bskyed cing smon lam 'debs su stsal te/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dkon mchog bla na med pa

thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu na mchod rten sku gdung dang / ring bsrel dang bcas pa thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang /

ku bi ra dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' ldan gnas kyi lha'i sras thams cad dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i sras rnams dang / lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la sogs pa/ 'phags pa kun nas

sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med pa snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs dang / de la brten pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung zhing bskyang bar lhag par phyag mtshan du bzhes pa rnams dang / gzhan yang sngon gdan

'dzom pa chen pos bkas gtad cing so so nas kyang / lha'i ngag rtag pas zhal gyis bzhes te/ dam pa'i chos dang 'khor rnam bzhi bsrung zhing bskyang bar thugs dam mnga' ba/ 'phags pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs

pa thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad la mchod yon dang dri chab/ bdug spos dang me tog /zhal zas dang mar me/ rol mo dang sil snyan/ gdugs dang ba dan la sogs pa dngos su ci 'byor pa 'di dag dang / phyogs bcu na bdag

pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i lha rdzas dang / mi'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ci mchis pa thams cad dang / gzungs dang rig pa'i mthu dang / mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyis nam

mkha'i mthas klas pa'i chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste dbul zhing mchod do/ /de ltar lan gsum bzlas/ 'phags pa thams cad dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang

yid kyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang pha ma dang / sems can gzhan dag la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba ci mchis pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdom zhing bsdus te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa'i so sor bshags pas 'chags so/ /mi 'chab bo/ /slan chad kyang 'di lta bu mi bgyid do/ /de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pa thugs su chud pa de bzhin du

bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal ba dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo / /de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas sangs rgyas kyi gdung

mi gcad par bgyi ba'i slad du dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang

bral ba/ skyes bu chen po khyu mchog /sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bla na med pa'i sku chos kyi sku mnga' ba la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/ bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mnga' ba zhi ba chos kyi sku so so rang gis rig pa la

skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun dul ba tshogs kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/ phyogs bzhi pa'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dus 'di nas bzung ste/

byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ dus ji lta ba dang stobs ci mchis pa bzhin du bdag 'bul zhing mchis na/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag bdag bzhes su gsol/ de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /phyogs bcu'i

ston pa bla na med pa sangs rgyas thams cad la 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul lo/ /de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /'jig rten gyi sgron ma mya ngan las 'da' pa'i tshul ston par bzhed pa rnams la 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad cing 'jig rten na

gtan du bzhugs par gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol

ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i slad du/ ji ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi

bas kyang dus 'di nas bzung ste nam snying po byang chub la gnas kyi bar du/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sems can thams

cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang / gzung

pa dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems gzod ma nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi

bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa mtha' dag pham par mdzad nas/ de nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba

yang bdud dpung dang bcas pa mtha' dag pham par bgyis te/ bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo

rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs

rgyas nas tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer/ /byang chub

spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang / gzhan yang bdag gis bsod nams cung zad ci bgyis pa dang / bgyid pa dang bgyid par 'gyur ba

de dag thams cad pha ma la sogs pa sems can thams cad dang / bdag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /bdag gi bsod nams 'dis pha ma la sogs pa sems can ma bsgral ba rnams ni bsgral lo/ /ma grol ba rnams ni dgrol lo/ /

dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung ngo / /yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/ /skyabs ma mchis pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa dang /

dpung gnyen ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten la skyabs dang / gnas dang / dpung gnyen du gyur cig /bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/ /thob nas nyes ba'i dgra rnams pham byas te/ /rga nad 'chi ba'i rlabs chen 'khrugs pa yi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba

'don par bgyi/ /des na bdag sbyin pa stsol ba dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog pa dang / shes rab rnam par dpyod pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la slob pa ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad

sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par

zhugs pa/ sa chen po la gnas pa rnams kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go/ /'phags pa dag bdag byang chub sems dpa' lags par bzung du gsol/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /rtsi dang nags kyi shing lta bur/ /rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyis/ /'dod dgur rtag tu spyod

par shog /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa dang ni dran pas kyang / /bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi/ /nad rnams gso bar bgyid gyur cig /sems can thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig /ngan 'gro dag ni rtag tu stong par shog /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sar

bzhugs pa/ de dag kun gyis smon lam 'grub gyur cig /de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /de ltar bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / mchod pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams dang / dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa nas bsgrags shing / chos kyi sku'i

mchod rten tshul bzhin bgyis te mchod pa la sogs pa dge ba rlabs po che dag gi stobs kyis/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa/ mthar phyin par mdzad pa'i dgongs pa lhun gyis

grub par gyur cig /pho brang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du bzang po spyod pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rgyas pas klubs par gyur cig /dam pa'i chos rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas 'jig rten thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur te/ yi ge bris pa dang / mchod pa dang / bklag pa dang /

'don pa dang / sbyin pa dang / 'chad pa dang / nyan pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa mngon du byed pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi rgyud la gnas par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad so so'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go

'phang myur du thob par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa rnams su thogs pa med par 'jug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing / bka' lung yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / sems can gyi don dpag tu med pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la yo byad kyis kyang mi

bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang / mthu phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du 'byor par gyur cig /'phags pa rang rgyal dang nyan thos thams cad so so'i rnam par thar pa mthar phyin nas theg pa bla na med pa'i sgor gzhol zhing bsgrubs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang myur du thob

par gyur cig /'phags pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad rang gi 'khor yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i mthu dpal dang / thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing thugs dam rlabs po che thams cad yongs su bskang ba dang lhun gyis grub

pa'i dbang thob pa dang / so so'i rnam par thar pa myur du rdzogs shing chos kyi mnga' bdag chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang yang myur du thob par gyur cig /che ge mo pha spun 'khor dang bcas pa la g.yo med par lhag par 'go zhing phan 'dogs pa'i lha mgon thams cad lus

dang sems kyi rgyud kyi sdig pa dang / nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang bral te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang / legs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig /dkon mchog bla na med pa gsum po la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan zhing

byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed pa yongs su rdzogs par bsgrubs nas/ rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang mchog dam pa myur du thob par gyur cig /rang gi 'khor bskyang ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcad pa la mthu dang / thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /mu med

mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang sgrib pa thams cad ni byang / sdug bsngal dang gnod pa thams cad ni zhi/ byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa dge ba'i chos thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs te/ 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad spangs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su

rdzogs pa g.yung drung gi sku myur du thob par gyur cig /de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che thams cad ma lus pa 'phags pa thams cad la phul ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la bstabs shing bsngos pa la sogs pas/ che ge mos thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba

ci mchis pa'i stobs dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po dang / 'dus pa chen po rin po che'i tog dang /

gtsug na rin po che dang / kun nas sgor 'jug ba'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang / gzungs zab cing rgya che ba mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa

dang ldan pa rnams mchod de bklags nas/ chos kyi sku'i mchod rten tshul bzhin bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis mdo sde dang gzungs las phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad che ge mos 'phral du thob cing yongs su rdzogs nas mngon

du gyur cig /che ge mos thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas 'gro ba brgyud pa rnams su sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dbang gis byung ba 'di lta ste/ las kyi sgrib pa'am/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'am/ lta ba'i sgrib

pa'am/ mi shes pa'i sgrib pa'am/ rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa'am chos kyis phongs par gyur pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa las gang gis/ che ge mo ngan song gsum du mchi bar 'gyur ba'am/ mi khom par skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ dkon mchog gsum mngon par mi rig cing ma

gus mi 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mi 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/ byang chub kyi sems dang dge ba'i phyogs las nyams shing bdud kyis choms par 'gyur ba'am/ 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyis kun du 'joms par 'gyur ba'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi chos thams cad bsgrub pa la mi phyogs shing mi bsgrub par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las sna tshogs che ge mo nyid kyis bgyis pa'am/ bgyid du stsal ba'am/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa ci mchis pa thams cad ma lus par bsal te/

gtan nas zhi zhing byang bar gyur cig /sngon gyi las de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa yang rung / 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur kyang rung ste/ da ltar gyi lus 'di la nad kyi rnam pa mang pos gdungs pa dang / mi dang mi ma lags pas dan du bgyis shing gtses pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sdug bsngal mang

po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor dang yo byad mi mthun pa sbyin pa dang / bsam pa mi 'grub cing bar du gcod pa mang ba la sogs pas gnod pa dang / mi dge ba dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / ngan pa dang / sdig tor bgrang ba thams cad zhi zhing gtan du mi 'byung bar gyur cig /gdon

bgegs dang / gnod pa bgyid pa thams cad dang bral zhing / grol nas gdon bgegs de dag byams shing zhi ba'i sems kyis sngar gnod pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa byas pa thams cad bshig nas/ rang rang gi gnas su dong zhing phyin chad nam du yang gnod pa ci yang mi byed par gyur cig /

'phral du yang tshe ring zhing nad ma mchis pa dang / 'khor dang yo byad mthun zhing 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub pa la sogs pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig /tshe rabs thams cad du yang

byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i lus dang / longs spyod dang / 'khor dang / grogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /theg pa chen po'i chos dang rtag tu phrad cing / thos pa dang bsam pa dang / bsgom pa'i sgo nas don

mngon sum du bgyid par gyur cig /dam pa'i chos ma nor bar ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams dang rgyun du 'grogs shing mnyes par bgyid par gyur cig /mdor na sems can thams cad kyi don bgyi zhing / 'phags pa'i lam bsgrub pa la yo byad ci nas kyang mi

bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi mthu thogs pa med pa dang ldan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che thams cad bde blag tu nyams 'og tu chud par gyur cig /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa g.yung drung gi sku sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyi go 'phang chen po myur du thob nas sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol zhing / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la 'god par gyur cig /de'i rjes la gzungs chab stsal/ de'i rjes la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bskor te/ mchod rten bskor ba'i

tshigs su bcad pa dang / gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa dag bklab/ /bzang po spyod pa la sogs pa zhal ton du bgyi ste/ /mchod de nas bzod pa gsol te/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa chen po dgongs su gsol/ deng 'dir phyogs bcu'i 'phags pa thams cad gdan

'dzom par spyan drangs nas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs kyi sgo nas che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma 'tshal ba dang / bag ma mchis pa'i dbang gis lus ngag yid

kyi sbyor ba nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa dang / mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan pa gtsang sbras ma phyed pa dang / mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa la sogs pa 'khrul cing nongs pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la bzod pa dang /

tshangs par gsol te/ mthol bshags shing mchis na/ thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod par bzhes shing / 'phral dang yun du bdag cag gi sgrib par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / de nas slar gshegs par gsol te/ 'phags pa rnams kyis bdag cag la

sogs pa 'gro ba nyam thag pa rnams kyi don mdzad cing dka' drin stsal lags te/ da dung yang bdag cag la thugs brtse ba yang dang yang du gdan 'dzom par mdzad pas/ dgongs shing so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro ba mang po'i don la gshegs pa stsal du ci gnang / de nas

bsngo ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gdon/ de nas rjes su zhi ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'don te gyes so/ /mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa'i cho ga slob dpon bo d+hi satwas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par

snang ba'i gzungs bklag cing mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las bsdus pa/ gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs bzlas shing mchod rten gdab pa'i thabs la der gtogs pa thams cad phyi'i khrus kyang bya/ mgo

mjug kun du gnod sems dang / brnab sems dang / ma dad pa dang / le lo dang / gnyid la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i skyon dang / sems ma 'dres par bsdams shing gnod pa dang 'tshe ba'i las ma shor bar bya/ dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan gyi mthu'i khyad par dang / mdo

sde'i phan yon la yid ches pa dang / dad cing gus pa cher bskyed/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje cher bskyed do/ /khyim pa zhig na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims bzung la/ de nas mchod rten gdab pa'i yo byad rnams bshams la/ 'jim pa brko ba nas btab cing dkyil 'khor

du bzhugs pa'i bar du mchod rten gyi cho ga bzhin du nang par snga dro thebs par bya/ mchod pa'i cho ga dang yo byad bshams pa yan chad legs par bgyi/ mchod rten 'debs pa'i zla ba la chos kyi sbyin pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskul bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / gser 'od dam pa dang / rin po che'i tog dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi mdo sde tshar phyin rgyun mi 'chad par bklag /yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs rnam gnyis kyi 'dzab grwa gcig kyang bzlas/ mdo sde dag kyang mchod cing chos kyi sbyin pa

bsngo ba dang / spyan drang ba la sogs pa sna la bgyis nas bklag go/ /mdo sde de snyed ma lhogs na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang gzungs tshar gang byung zhig bton pa'i 'og tu snying po bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mchod rten thebs/ mchod pa bshams / gsung rab rdzogs nas bar

skabs der cung zhig bsangs te/ de nas snga dro dge 'dun spyir tshogs nas mchod pa la sogs pa rim bzhin bgyi'o/ /mchod pa bshams pa'i thabs 'byor pa'i stobs ci nus pa dang sbyar te/ spos kyi maN+Dal chen po'i dbus su tshon phye'am/ me tog rin po che sna lnga'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs

kyis brgyan pa bris pa'i dbus su pad+ma chen po'i steng du mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad shong ba'i gdan seng ge'i khri la pad+ma bzhag la/ re'u mig chen po brgya dang / ngos bzhi'i dbus su re'u gnyis gnyis su bgyi ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad bshams pa'am/ mchod rten lnga pa zhig na 'tsham par sbyar te de

la bzhugs su gsol/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gcig kyang dbus su bzhugs/ bar gyi snam bu gcig gam gnyis la pad+ma mang po dgram shing 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i gdan du bsham zhing / gzungs chab kyi bum pa kha rgyan can bzhi yan chad du 'byor pa ngos bzhir

bzhag /de'i phyi rol gar 'os par bshos dang / mchod yon la sogs pa mchod pa rgyas par dgram/ steng du bla re dang 'phan dang ba dan mang po brgya rtsa brgyad man chad rgyas par dgram/ grwa bzhir pog phor a ka ru dang / tu ruSh+ka dang / gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug go/ /sgo bzhir

mchod rten bzhi bsham/ gzhan yang mchod pa ci nus su rgyas par bgyi'o/ /bum pa'i khar yungs kar dang bye ma yang bzhag cing bzlas la dur khrod dam/ phyogs kun du yang gtor ro/ /dang por mchod pa bshams la dge 'dun tshogs nas phyogs bcu'i

'phags pa thams cad la phyag bgyi/ de nas chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ci nus kyis bsgom/ ting nge 'dzin las langs nas chos thams cad don dam par de lta bu yin la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de kho na nyid thugs su chud pas/ sku dang

gsung dang thugs nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gyur te/ sgrib pa mi mnga' zhing mthu dang byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go 'phang brnyes pa yang rung na/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni chos kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs te rmongs pas nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal mang pos gzir

cing nyam thag pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyang thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas 'gro ba brgyud pa rnams su bdag gi gnyen bshes dam pa drin gyi zhing du ma gyur pa gang yang med cing / bdag gis kyang dang por byang chub kyi sems dam pa bskyed de 'gro ba

mang po'i don dpag tu med pa bsgrub par dam bcas pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad bdag gis blangs zin pas/ 'di lta bu la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yal ba dor ba ni/ mi rigs na 'di dag ji ltar sdug bsngal las ni gdon/ bde ba la ni ji ltar dgod par bya snyam

du snying rje dang / byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i brtson pa'i sems drag tu bskyed par bya'o/ /yang 'di snyam du bsam ste / bdag ni dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dang mthu dman pa yin pas/ bdag nyid gcig pus 'phral du don rlabs po che 'di lta bu mi lcogs kyis/ ston pa

bde bar gshegs pas sngon lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la rjes su thugs brtse nas kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang snying po la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs la brten te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin

gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang / dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom par spyan drangs la mthu bstan pa dang dpung gnyen du gsol te/ de ltar ni 'phags pa'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba rnams la phan pa bsgrub par byas la/ phyis ni bdag nyid gcig

pus gzhan la ltos pa med par yang thabs mkhas pa'i sgo sna tshogs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bla na med pa yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o snyam du bsam mo/ /de ltar snying rje dang byams pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'og tu sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir 'phags

pa gdan 'dzom pa'i pho brang dang / mchod pa'i tshogs bshams pa bden pa bdar zhing yid kyis bsngo ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang /

chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis/ deng kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dam tshig la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs kyi mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i chos kyi sku'i mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa'i gnas 'dir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' de dag gis sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis bsgrub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i zhing gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/

tha gru che ba yangs pa reg na 'jam zhing bde ba/ dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba/ tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bsung dang ldan pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa/ mtha' rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs shing / gser dang mu tig gram bu gdal la ba/ ut+pa la dang / ku mu da

dang / pad+ma 'gying zhing ldem pas khebs par gyur cing / chu bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa/ dga' zhing 'phyo la lding bas brgyan pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka dag gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa

dang / lha'i nor bu dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang / rin po che dpyangs pa dang / me tog gi mgo lcogs dang / 'bras bu mdzes par chags pa g.yur za zhing ldem la gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha 'khrol ba las dam pa'i chos kyi sgra 'byung ba dang ldan pa tshar du bsgrengs pas legs

par brgyan pa'i sa gzhi la/ gzhal yas khang chen po rgyu rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar ba bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rgyas par khengs pa'i 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba mtha' yas par rnam par gnas pa/ rgya

yongs su ma chad pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul/ 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang sgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'

dpag tu med pa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mtha' yas pa rnam par rgyu ba/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang / bde ba chen pos brten pa/

sems can thams cad kyi don yang dag par sgrub par byed pa nye bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa/ thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa'i gnas dran pa dang / blo gros

dang rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chen po'i bzhon pa yin pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i rgyal po'i yon tan mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten pa'i gzhal

med khang chen por gyur pa'i dbus su pad+ma'i gdan chen po seng ge'i khri'i steng na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i mchod rten rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa/ rgya dang tshad dpag tu med pa/ mchod rten gyi rnam pa'i bye brag dang / legs pa'i khyad par thams cad dang /

ldan pa/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi bdag nyid 'jig rten thams cad kyi dpal zhing du gyur pa grangs med pa zhig rom me dkrigs par bzhugs par gyur pa'i mtha' 'khor bar gzhal med khang chen po'i nang du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin

gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom pa'i gdan khri/ 'phags pa so so'i smon lam khyad par can gyi mnga' thang dang 'tsham par grub pa mdzes pa sha stag 'byung bar gyur cig /phyi nang kun du cho rigs dang 'tsham par lha dang mi'i yo byad dam

pa zhal zas dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / rol mo la sogs pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs pa/ phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang / bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las 'byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /'phags pa

thams cad gdan 'dzom nas/ de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig /ces lan gsum bzlas/ yang dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su

rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /ces lan gsum du bzlas/ spyan drang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags

pa nyan thos chen po'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang / sku gdung gi mchod rten dang / chos kyi sku'i mchod rten gzugs kyi tshul du rnam par bzhag pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /

byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / bsrung ba med pa gsum dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / stobs bcu dang / sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thugs rje chen po dang / ye shes la sogs pa yon tan bsags pa'i mchod rten dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten

'di lta ste/ lum+bi'i tshal du bltams pa dang / rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang / bA rA Na sIr chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rgyal po'i khab tu glang po che nor skyong btul ba dang / lha las babs par lha yul

nas gshegs pa dang / yangs pa can du spre'us sbrang rtsi phul ba dang / gyad yul du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa dang / brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung gi gzugs dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po mdzad pas zhing khams 'di nyid mchod rten du

gyur pa dang / dpal ldan skyid pa'i gnas la sogs pa'i dpal phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa dang / dbang po'i brag phug la sogs par mdo yang dag par bsdus pa dang ka ni ka'i mchod rten du sku gdung 'dus pa la sogs pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling dang / gling bzhi

dang / stong khams na mchod rten khyad par can ji snyed bzhugs pa thams cad dang / gzhan yang sa bla dang / bar snang dang / lha yul dag na mchod rten ji snyed bzhugs pa dang / phyogs bcu thams cad na mchod rten khyad par can 'khor dang bcas pa ji snyed bzhugs pa thams cad chos

kyi dbyings dang / rigs thams cad na bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par bgyi ba dang / bdag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams su deng dkon mchog dang / mchod rten khyad par can dang bcas pa spyan drang ba'i gnas 'og min la sogs pa bar snang

dang / sa bla'i gzhal med khang dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen po ji lta ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pa 'dir/ mchod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yongs su dag pa rgya chen po rnam pa thams cad dang / longs spyod pa las byung ba'i bsod nams spel bar

mi mdzad kyang / btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yongs su spel ba'i slad du na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gnas mal dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / smyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dang / mchod rten la 'os pa'i bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis

bstabs shing spyan 'dren gyis mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad de/ chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis gshegs shing bzhes par gsol/ dkon mchog dang mchod rten khyad par can dang bcas pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa thams

cad spyan drang ba/ lha'i 'jig rten mtho ris na 'phags pa gang yang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs shing gzigs pa dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa bsal ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par

'jug pa dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la dbang du gyur pa thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pas/ lha'i dbang po'i cha lugs kyis lha mang po dag la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing bzhugs pa dang / lha mang po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa ste 'phags

pa'i lam la gnas shing / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis bsal ba / dran pa gsal zhing ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos thams cad kyi mchog bla na med pa'i chos

dkon mchog dang / tshogs thams cad kyi mchog bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la sngon bsnyen bkur mdzad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa/ 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyis chos dkar po'i phyogs rtag tu rgya cher spel zhing bsrung ba/ sems can rnams kyi 'thab mo dang /

'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phyi dgra dang / nang 'khrug dang / gnod pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nad dang / rims nad dang / mi ngas dang / phyugs nad dang / mu ge dang / lo nyes dang / ltas ngan dang / mtshan

ma ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sngon sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po'i tshe/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa dang / gzungs sngags dang / rig sngags dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa zab cing rgya chen po bshad pa'i tshe na/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe nga'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnam bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rigs bzhi chos dang ldan zhing

chos spyod pa thams cad dang / lha yul dang / yul 'khor dang / grong dang / grong khyer la sogs pa 'byung po'i tshogs dge ba rnams bsrungs shig ces zhal gyis bka' stsal zhing / de dag gis kyang dam tshig mnos te lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ phyag bya ba'i gnas/ bkur sti/

bya ba'i gnas/ bla mar bya ba'i gnas/ btsun par bya ba'i gnas/ 'di lta ste/ 'og min na lha'i dbang phyug chen po gnas gtsang ma gzhan gyi ris kyi lha dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / gsum pa dang / gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i ris kyi lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /

'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / 'thab bral dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bdag nyid

chen po khyad par can gyi tshogs thams cad dang / dam tshig can dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam pa'i chos spel bar dam bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong bcu

dang / gza' chen po brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / phyogs kyi glang po dang / sde dpon dang / lha mo dang / phyogs kyi lha dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha dang / btsun mo dang / sras dang / 'khor dang / pho nya dang / mngag pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / tshogs bdag dang /

dga' byed dbang phyug dang / smin drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang / stobs can dang / stobs po che dang / gnod 'dzin dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / dung dang / dung chen dang / gang po dang / shin tu gang ba dang / mgrin pa dang / mgrin bzangs dang / bsod nams lhun po dang / gang ba bzang po

dang / nor bu bzang po dang / bum rna dang / dril rna dang / rna gsum dang / rna bo che dang / yang dag shes dang / yang dag rgyal ba dang / rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gang gnas dang / bde ri dang / lnga rtsen dang / lnga len dang / tshigs lnga ser dang / mgrin bcu dang /

'jigs rung dang / 'brug sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyangs dang / stong gsum dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / ma dros dang / gzi can dang / nor rgyas dang / gdon la 'jebs dang / drang srong dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / char lha dang / sprin lha dang / lo tog

lha dang / lam lha dang / sa'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / nam mkha'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / shing gi lha dang / rdzing gi lha dang / dus tshigs kyi lha dang / nyin mtshan gyi lha dang / dus mtshams kyi lha dang / tshes grangs kyi lha dang / skad cig dang / thang

cig dang / yud tsam gyi lha dang / ha nu ma tha la sogs pa mthu bo che dang / tshig la dbang ba dang / dga' dbyangs dang / mdangs bu dang / dpal gyi lha mo dang / 'od zer can dang / dkar sham dang / brjod skyob dang / gang+gA dang / ya mu na dang / bu mangs dang / dung can dang / ri

mkhar dang / nag mo dang / ma bdun dang / sring mo bdun dang / sring mo bzhi dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ral pa gcig ma la sogs pa dang / lha mo chen mo dang / gnod sbyin chen mo dang / srin mo dang / sha za chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / rdzu 'phrul can dang / dbang bdag dang /

slag chen dang / brjid pa dang / g.yul rgyal dang / dge bsnyen chen mo dang / lha sras gzhon nu dang / klu sras gzhon nu dang / rig sngags 'chang gzhon nu dang / drang srong gzhon nu dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin gzhon nu dang / ti ra ka la

sogs pa dang / gzi brjid chen po'i gzhon sde thams cad dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / lha'i bzo bo las thams cad pa dang / bgegs kyi rgyal po log 'dren dang / gtsug lag khang gi srung mar zhal gyis bzhes pa gnyug mar gnas pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas mthong

ba/ chos thos pa/ dge 'dun la brten pa/ bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam tshig mnos pa/ lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ phyag bya ba'i gnas/ bkur sti bya ba'i gnas/ bla mar bya ba'i gnas/ btsun par bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa thams cad dang / gzhan yang mchod pa'i

gnas dang / drin bsab pa'i gnas dang / snying rje'i gnas su gyur pa'i sbyin gnas ji snyed pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang / rigs thams cad na bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad mnyes par bgyi ba dang / bsod nams bstab pa'i gnas dpal lha btsan po'i sku yon dang /

dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / pha ma dang / gzhan yang mchod pa'i gnas sam/ drin bsab pa'i gnas sam/ snying rje'i gnas gang yang rung ba dang / bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi don du deng dkon mchog gsum dang / mchod rten khyad par can 'khor dang

bcas pa spyan drang ba'i gnas 'og min la sogs par gnas pa/ bar snang dang sa bla'i gzhal med khang dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen po ji lta de lta bur gshegs par gsol/ bstod pa dang phyag btsal ba/ ye shes tshogs kyis bskyed pa'i sku/ /

ming dang gzugs las rnam par grol/ /rtog dang spros las rab 'das kyang / /bsnyel ba mi mnga'i rang bzhin can/ /dngos dang dngos med mtha' las dben/ /bsam brjod yul las shin tu 'das/ /ye shes rnams kyi gnas gyur pa/ /rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed pa'i sku/ /dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog na/ /chos la mnga' mdzad longs spyod pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' yongs kyi mgon/ /gtsang ma'i gnas nas ma g.yos pa/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas par/

sbrul mang 'gyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam la/ /dga' ldan mchog nas babs pa dang / /'jig rten sgyu rtsal phul phyung zhing / /bdud bcom byang chub 'tshang rgya ste/ /'khor lo bskor nas 'das pa'i bar/ /cho 'phrul cig car so sor ston/ /cho 'phrul ngo

mtshar rmad byung ba/ /lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ston pa mchog bzhugs gzhal med khang / /dbyibs legs rnam par phye bas mdzes/ /kha dog sna tshogs spel legs su/ /rin chen 'bar ba mang pos brgyan/ /yid 'ong nyams dga' lha yi gnas/ /rgyan bkod

dkyil na mdzes pa la/ /'phags pa mchod pa'i rten bgyis te/ /ston pa 'khor dang bcas la bstod/ /mchod rten bsu ba'i ar+g+ha gsol ba / chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / /de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/ /de

skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /skar ma rab rib mar me dang / /sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang / /rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bur/ /'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya/ /mkhas pa gang dag rab tu sems dang zhing / /sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la gom 'dor na/ /'dzam bu

chu bo gser gyi srang tshad ni/ /stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/ /mchod rten mchod nas dpal ldan pa/ /sku gdung chos sku chos dbyings dang / /rig sngags gsang sngags snying po dang / /phyag rgya byin brlabs gshegs su gsol/ /gshegs byon skye 'bri med pa'i sku/ /

ji ltar smon bzhin yod pa dag /dkar po 'char ba'i tshul bzhin du/ /'jig rten skyabs su gshegs su gsol/ /dkon mchog dang mchod rten khyad par can dang bcas pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa de dag la bsu ba'i mchod yon ar+g+ha gsol ba/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun

dang / mchod rten khyad par 'khor gtogs pa/ /'og min gnas dang lha tshogs dang / /bsam gtan bzhi dang 'dod khams drug /sde brgyad tshogs dang 'byung po kun/ /dam tshig can dang thugs dam can/ /tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen bzhi/ /phyogs skyong gza'

dang rgyu skar dang / /dkon mchog mthong thos skyabs brten pa/ /phyag bgyi thal mo sbyar 'os shing / /mgos gtugs mchod dang kun sbyin dang / /rab tu sbyin 'os kun gshegs shig /mchod pa dri med yang dag pa/ /rnam mang rgya che thams cad dang / /so so'i mnga' thang rgya chen

du/ /'os pa'i bde ba sbyar ba dbul/ /mchod rten gdan la bzhugs par gsol/ /sku gdung chos sku byang chub phyogs/ /ma 'dres bsrung med bsnyel mi mnga'/ /mi 'jigs stobs dang sangs rgyas chos/ /rdo rje ye shes tshogs bsags pa/ /chos dbyings rig sngags

gsang sngags dang / /snying po phyag rgya byin brlabs kyis/ /mchod rten khyad par ji snyed pa/ /dpal ldan bsod nams zhing mchog kun/ /chos don dag pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /rin chen stegs dang khri 'phang dang / /gtsang gdang lha rdzas pad+ma la/ /mi gnas tshul gyis gdan la

bzhugs/ /dkon mchog dang mchod rten khyad par dang bcas pa'i 'khor du gtogs pa de dag so sor gdan la bzhugs par gsol ba/ chos don kun gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /dpal ldan dag pa'i gdan bshams par/ /ting 'dzin mi g.yo mnyam gzhag cing / /dge ba'i dgongs

pas gdan la bzhugs/ /gtsang gdang gdan khri yangs pa la/ /thogs med dogs pa med pa'i sku/ /mnyam nyid tshul gyis bder bzhugs shing / /bde bar sbyar ba bzhes su gsol/ /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skye

dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis/ /shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog /deng kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /mchod rten la sku

khrus gsol / rnam dag skyon bral byang chub sems kyi dbyings/ /rnam rtog skyon bral yon tan tshogs kyi gter/ /kun gyis phyag byas bstod cing mchod pa'i gnas/ /bdud bzhi dpung rnams ma lus tshar gcad phyir/ /chos dbyings dag pa'i sku la khrus chab gsol/ /nyon mongs

'khrul pa'i rtog pa dag gyur cig /ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan snang gyur yang / /chos dbyings dag pa'i sku la bskyod pa med/ /rin chen lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang / /sa'am chu'am 'on te bar snang la/ /sems can don du rin chen skur bstan pa/ /mchod rten dmigs par

bcas te sku khrus gsol/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i bag chags dag gyur cig /gzhi rmong dge bcu'i rnam dag pad+ma 'jam/ /dran pa nyer gzhag rmang gi khri 'phang bstod/ /theg pa rnams kyi bang rim brtsegs pa ste/ /chos dbyings spros med bum pa zlum po la/ /smon lam chen

po'i srog shing dge ba btsugs/ /dge ba'i longs spyod nam mkha'i gdugs kyis bkab/ /byang chub sems kyi zla tshes rnam par dag /dge sde bcu gsum 'khor lo'i phreng bas brgyan/ /snang dbyings chos kyi dbyings la sku khrus gsol/ /shar phyogs byams pa brtsegs pa'i

chos sku la/ /byams pa'i sems kyis sku khrus 'di gsol bas/ /zhe sdang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun bsal nas/ /rtag tu byams pa'i ting 'dzin thob gyur cig /lho phyogs rin chen brtsegs pa'i chos sku la/ /nga rgyal gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bsal ba'i phyir/ /byang

chub sems kyi chu bos sku khrus gsol/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i nga rgyal skyon bral nas/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan thob gyur cig /nub phyogs rnam dag pad+ma chos kyi dbyings/ /'dod chags skyon bral pad+ma'i khri 'phang brtsegs/ /khams gsum sems can bag chags

sbyang ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi sku la ye shes sku khrus gsol/ /sems can 'khor ba'i 'dod chags dag gyur cig /byang phyogs rnam dag las kyi zhing rab ni/ /'dod sred spangs pa'i yon tan rdzogs pas ston/ /rin chen in+d+ra lta bu'i mchod rten la/ /las kyi sgrib pa sbyang phyir sku

khrus gsol/ /sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa 'grub gyur cig /chos sku rnam par dag pa'i skyon bral nas/ /legs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs par shog /chu bo rnam lngas sku khrus gsol ba/ sku mchog rnam dag blta bas mi ngoms la/ /ngo mtshar skyon

bral mkha' dkyil nyi gsal 'dra/ /chos kyi sku la dri ma mi mnga' yang / /sri zhu bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du/ /chu gtsang sman spos 'o ma 'dag chal chus/ /'gro ba'i lus sems sdug bsngal nad bsal te/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral 'gro ba'i yid 'ong ba/ /dam pa'i sku mchog bdag

gis thob par shog /oM badzra tsan+d+ha la se pa swA hA/ oM badzra sa ma ya ma the swA hA/ oM a mr-i te hUM/ oM sar+b+ba A be sha hU~M/ de nas ras dkar po kha tshar ma nyams pa yug gcig gis sku phyis te/ bsam pa ni tshigs bcad las smos pa ltar bsam/ bder gshegs sku gsum dpe

dang mtshan mnga' yang / /'gro ba'i don du gzugs sku cir yang gda'/ /rin chen dbyig ltar nyes pa'i skyon bral yang / /'jig rten sri zhu gus pa'i tshul tsam du/ /sdig med rgyal ba rnams kyis rab bsngags pa'i/ /ras mchog 'di yis rgyal ba'i sku phyis pas/ /nyon mongs

dug gsum sgrib pa kun byang nas/ /sku gsum ngang du bdag cag myur grub shog /oM sar+b+bar tso a dir Na swA hA/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul ba/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi longs spyod kyis/ /kun bzang mchod pas rol mdzad kyang / /'gro ba'i dbul ba bsal slad du/ /bkur sti

rim gro'i tshul tsam gyis/ /bla med mchod pa rnam lnga 'di/ /'gro ba'i don du 'bul lags na/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis khyab gyur nas/ /bsod nams gter chen thob par shog /rgyan dang na bza' dbul ba/ bde gshegs sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad dang / /rin chen 'od chags

'bar bas sku brgyan zhing / /byang chub phyogs kyi rgyan gyis mdzes lags kyang / /'jig rten bkur sti rim gro'i tshul tsam du/ /rin chen phreng ba se mo do shal dang / /rgyan gyi dam pa khyad par mchog phul bas/ /byang chub phyogs kyi rgyan dang ldan gyur nas/ /bla med thar pa mchog

la gnas par shog /bla re dang / 'phan gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang rol mo la sogs pa dbul ba/ theg mchog bla re mgon skyabs gdugs dang ldan/ /bdud bcom rgyal mtshan ba dan ting 'dzin 'phan/ /lha dang mi yi mchod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor

mdzes pas rab brgyan pas/ /bla re 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan rol mo brjid/ /bdug spos dri zhim sil snyan sprin tshogs mdzes/ /bdag dang 'gro ba'i don du 'di phul bas/ /dbang mchog dam pa dus 'dir thob gyur te/ /gnod pa'i dgra bcom bla med go 'phang la/ /theg pa

mchog gis nges par bgrod par shog /bshos dang zhal zas gsol ba/ rgyal bas bdud bcom byang chub sangs rgyas te/ /rgyal ba'i sku la bkres skyems mi mnga' yang / /bdag cag bsod nams zhing du 'gyur slad du/ /bshos dang zhal zas sbyar ba 'di phul bas/ /dus

kun dge ba'i lo tog 'phel rgyas nas/ /bde ba can du pad+ma las skyes te/ /ting 'dzin chos dang zas la longs spyod shog /'bru dang sman dang spos dang snying po dang / rin po che lnga dbul ba/ bde gshegs mgon po dpag bsam 'khor dang bcas/ /bsod nams ye shes sku lnga

mthar phyin pa/ /chos kyi longs spyod bkur sti tshul tsam du/ /'bru lnga spos lnga sman lnga rin chen lnga/ /snying po lngar bcas rgyal bar rab bsngags pa/ /bdag gzhan don gyi snying por 'di phul bas/ /'gro la phan phyir tshul khrims mchog ldan te/ /rin chen gter las kun la phan

'dogs shog /bde gshegs kun bzang mngon par sangs rgyas te/ /rdo rje gdan la mngon par bzhugs pa na/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gyis gus bcas pas/ /sngags grub rgyal pos yungs kar phul ba ltar/ /deng 'dir ston pas bdud bzhi tshar bcad nas/ /skye rga na 'chi

'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro ba kun bsgral nas/ /rdo rje gdan la mngon par sangs rgyas shog /bkra shis shing zhal dro zhing byin phebs shing 'jig rten du yun ring por bzhugs su gsol ba/ bde gshegs kun bzang mthong bas bkra shis ltar/ /

rgyal sras 'khor bcas deng 'dir bkra shis shog /ngan sdig log pa'i tshogs rnams bcom gyur nas/ /rgyal sras rig 'dzin tshogs rnams 'phel dar zhing / /zhal mthong tsam gyis bde ba'i mchog brnyes nas/ /nyi ltar zhal dro zla ltar 'od gsal zhing / /

bdag dang 'gro la zhal dro byin che nas/ /bskal pa mthar thug bar du bzhugs su gsol/ /spyan dbye ba'i smon lam du gsol ba/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i

gzugs brnyan bzhengs su gsol te/ chu gtsang dang / sug chab dang / 'o ma dang / spos chu dang / sman chab kyis sku khrus gsol bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi dri ma dang / dug gsum gyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma

dag nas rnam par dag pa'i sku dang ldan par gyur cig /ar+g+ha gsol bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag pa thob par gyur cig /dri chab kyis sku la gtor te byugs pas bdag dang mtha'

yas pa'i sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi chu'i g.yeng ba'i dri ma thams cad rnam par bsal te bde zhing tshim par gyur cig /spos gsol bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims rnam par dag ste/ yang dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur

cig /me tog phul bas bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me phul bas sems can thams cad ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan par gyur cig /bshos

dang zhal zas gsol bas sems can thams cad bkres pa'i sdug bsngal bsal nas yid bzhin gyi zas skom dang ldan par gyur cig /'bru rnam pa lnga phul bas sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi lo tog 'phel zhing dge ba'i lo tog dus kun du rgyas par gyur cig /spos

lnga gsol bas sems can thams cad tshul khrims rnam par dag ste/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig /sman lnga gsol bas sems can thams cad nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i sdug bsngal dang bral nas thugs rje'i sman gyis dug gsum gyi nad las thar bar gyur

cig /rin po che sna lnga gsol bas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches sems can thams cad kyi dgos dgu yid bzhin du bskangs nas 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /snying po lnga gsol bas bdag dang sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi

snying po dang ldan par gyur cig /rgyan dang na bza' gsol bas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i ngo tsha mkhyen pa'i na bza' dang ldan pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig /bla re dang rgyal mtshan dang 'phan dang gdugs la sogs pa phul

bas bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang ldan nas theg pa bla na med pa la gnas par gyur cig /yungs kar gsol bas 'jig rten ji srid gnas pa'i bar du 'jig rten na bzhugs shing sems can gyi don mdzad nas mchod pa'i don du gyur cig /bkra shis phul bas

mi dge zhing bkra mi shis pa thams cad bsal nas bu gcig pa'i ma ltar byams pa chen po rgyas nas bkra shis byin che bar gyur cig /'phags pa'i sku gdung rin chen ring bsrel snod/ /rnying bcos byi dor bgyis shing mchod pa dang / /gsar brtsigs mchod cing khrus chab gsol ba dang / /

bstod dang bskor dang gus pa bgyis pa dang / /smon lam zab mo sems yid dang btab pa'i/ byin rlabs yon tan khyad par chen po'i mthus/ /bdag cag yon bdag 'khor bcas thams cad dang / /dad mos grogs byed rjes su yi rang rnams/ /smon lam mthu stobs khyad par chen

po yis/ /dang ba'i yid kyis mchod pa 'di brtsigs pas/ /des na bdag cag sdig sgrib byang gyur te/ /bla med byang chub bdag cag myur thob shog /shes rab mchog gis bdag med thugs chud de/ /ye shes chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i chos sku

spros med pa/ /so so rang rig de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba'i don du dka' ba rnams mdzad de/ /bsod nams chen po'i tshogs las byung ba yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs skur gang snang ba/ /yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

bskal pa grangs med 'das pa'i sngon rol nas/ /sems can don du byang chub thugs bskyed de/ /spyod pas gzhan gyi don la rab brtson pa/ /bla med 'bras bu brnyes la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs kyis spyod pa mdzad pa mthar phyin cing / /chos kyi 'khor lo rgya chen yongs bskor

nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i tshul ni rab bstan pa/ /sku gdung gzhag pa dag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sku gdung phra mor gsil ba'i ring bsrel snod/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa chos kyi tshul/ /sems can rnams kyis mchod pa bya ba'i rten/ /gzugs brnyan nyid kyi sku la phyag

'tshal bstod/ /sngon gyi smon lam chen po'i rgyun mnga' bas/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun te/ /bang rim bum pa srog shing tshul bstan pa/ /rgyu yi chos su bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ma 'dres chos/ /thugs rje chen po

tshad med rab mnga' bas/ /'khor lo char khebs lta bu'i tshul bstan pa/ /'bras bu'i chos su bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mi 'jigs bsrung ba med dang bdud las rgyal/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan mngon par mkhyen mnga' bas/ /rdo ring them skas rgyal mtshan dril bu tog /

chos sku'i rten du bzhag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos kyi grags pa ye shes bzhi la sogs/ /yon tan ngo mtshar nang gi tshogs rdzogs shing / /gang gi chos kyi rgyal por mtshan gsol ba/ /bdag nyid chen po dag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rang bzhin rnam dag chos dbyings de

bzhin nyid/ /spros pa'i dri mas ma gos dkar ba la/ /rin chen spras pas mtshan mchog rdzogs pa'i sku/ /'gro don legs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de bzhin sku gdung dbyibs bcas chos sku dag /gang gis mthong thos dran nam reg kyang rung / /mtho ris dpal

dang thar mchog bde thob pa/ /yon tan rmang tshogs mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod pa dbul ba/ ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku gsum lhun gyis grub/ /bzhi bcom drug ldan mi gnas mya ngan 'das/ /thugs rje sprul pa'i 'khor ba'i 'dam bskams pa/ /phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /dri med bdud rtsi 'khor ba'i nad rnams 'joms/ /don dam dmigs med bde gshegs 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /ye shes nyi mas ma rig mun 'joms pa/ /'phags pa'i lam gyur chos la mchod pa 'bul/ /byams dang snying rje dga'

dang btang snyoms tshul/ /bde gshegs rin chen pad+mo las kyi rtags/ /rin chen bzhi las mngon du gyur pa'i sku/ /rigs bzhi'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /lho phyogs 'dzam gling rin chen dkyil 'khor na/ /ye shes dpag yas thugs rjes 'brel pa'i sku/ /

rang byung sprul pa'i mchod rten chen po dang / /yid bzhin lhun gyis grub la mchod pa 'bul/ /nub phyogs bde ldan pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor na/ /thabs kyi bye brag ring bsrel skur bstan pa/ /dpe med bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang / /rmad grags chos kyi dbyings la

mchod pa 'bul/ /byang phyogs bsam yas yid bzhin dkyil 'khor na/ /thabs dang shes rab gsal zhing mchod pa'i gdung / /yon tan rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang / /khams gsum bde rgyas sgron la mchod pa 'bul/ /shar phyogs lus 'phags ye shes dkyil 'khor

na/ /byams pa 'khor ba 'dren mdzad ring bsrel sku/ /byams ldan bsod nams gter gyi mchod rten dang / /mthar legs g.yung drung rdzogs la mchod pa 'bul/ /khri 'phang dang po dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi/ /lus sems tshor dang chos rnams rjes su dran/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan

nyid mngon rtogs pa/ /rig pa'i shes rab bskyed la mchod pa 'bul/ /khri 'phang gnyis pa yang dag spong ba bzhi/ /sdig pa mi bskyed mi dge'i chos spong zhing / /dge ba'i chos bskyed tshogs gnyis rdzogs mdzad pa/ rtog pa'i bag chags bral la mchod pa 'bul / /khri 'phang

gsum pa rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi/ /'dun dang sems dang dpyod dang brtson 'grus rnams/ /spong ba'i 'du byed ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /thogs med 'gro don mdzad la mchod pa 'bul/ /khri 'phang bzhi pa snang ba'i dbang po lnga/ /dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin

dbang po dang / /shes rab dbang po chos la dbang bsgyur ba/ /'dod dgu dge rtsa spyod la mchod pa 'bul/ /'gyur med bum rten 'debs pa'i stobs lnga ste/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin stobs/ /shes rab stobs kyis nyon mongs zil gyis non / /mthu dbang

mngon du gyur la mchod pa 'bul/ /bum pa mngon 'phags byang chub yan lag bdun/ /bran dang chos 'byed brtson 'grus dga' ba dang / /shin tu sbyangs dang ting 'dzin btang snyoms kyis/ /'grub 'gyur thogs pa med la mchod pa 'bul/ /kha khyer 'phags pa'i lam gyi

yan lag brgyad/ /lta dang rtog dang ngag dang las kyi mtha'/ /'tsho dang rtsol dang dran dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /'phags pa'i lam nas 'jug la mchod pa 'bul/ /srog shing mkhyen pa bcu yi bdag nyid de/ /thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rtsal mchog gis/ /dam chos

bdud rtsi 'dzin pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /shes rab don kun rig la mchod pa 'bul/ /'khor lo bcu gsum stobs bcu nyer gzhag gsum/ /shes rab spyan ldan thabs chen mngon gzigs te/ /shes bya'i bag chags sbyangs pas thogs pa med/ /ye shes phun sum tshogs

la mchod pa 'bul/ /char khebs skyabs chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid de/ /gdul bya'i dus dang sems kyi rgyud mkhyen nas/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs rab brtson pa/ /phyi mthar yun ring bzhugs la mchod pa 'bul/ /dad brtson shugs kyis lus ngag sems

btud de/ /brtson 'grus drag po'i rin chen sna lnga dang / /'byung ba lnga las grub pa'i mchod rten dang / /sku gdung ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i rgyal ba'i sras/ /rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis phyi mthar gzhan don mdzad/ /skye 'gag

med pa'i don gyis blo sbyangs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /rnam grol thar lam mgon du rab brtson pa/ /zung bzhi yang brgyad rig pa'i skyes bu'i tshogs/ /rten 'brel don kun rig pas rang sangs rgyas/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshogs la

mchod pa 'bul/ /dge ba bcus bskyed skal ldan sangs rgyas zhing / /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis ngan song mtha' spangs shing / /rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ /'jig rten srung ma'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul/ /rdo rings them skas chu srin rgyal mtshan dang / /

gdugs dang ba dan dar gyi cod pan dang / /pad+ma nyi zla sil snyan lha rdzas kyis/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar dmigs pa dag par mchod/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus bsgyur ba/ /yon chab bdug spos mar me dri chab dang / /me tog dam pa bshos gtsang mnyes pa'i

mchog /mchod yon rnam lnga'i tshogs kyis mnyes par bgyi/ /dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pa yi/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten grub pa'i rdzas/ /kun bzang rnam dag mchod pa'i sprin phung gis/ /nam mkha' gang bar dmigs te mchod par bgyi/ /srid gsum

'khor ba'i 'dam las grol ba dang / /'gro don mdzad pa'i thugs dam bskang slad du/ /ye shes nyi mas mtshan pa'i skyon spangs te/ /byams pa'i thugs rjes mchod pa bzhes su gsol/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod 'os bla ma rnams/ /spyan drangs phyag bgyis bstod

dang bskur ba'i mthus/ /sngon bsags las kyi sgrib pa kun byang nas/ /'gro drug tshogs rdzogs mngon par sangs rgyas shog /'phags pa'i mchod rten la mchod rten ar+g+ha gsol ba / mchod rten sku yi cha lugs ni/ /'og gi rmang bting ye shes bzhi/ /gyen du khri 'phang

rnam thar gsum/ /chags med pad+ma'i gdan stengs su / /bum pa zlum po chos kyi rje/ /gser gyi bre phul 'od zer 'phro/ /srog shing drang srong bla na med/ /'khor lo bcu gsum ye shes brgyad/ /'bar ba rdo rje ye shes lnga/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /

bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ar+g+ga'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /sku yi mchod rten thams cad la/ /bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol/ /mchod rten gsung gi cha lugs

ni/ /man ngag sngags kyi snying po brjod/ /bzlas brjod gsung rab bcu gnyis brjod/ /don dam sgra skad yul las 'das/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad

de/ /gsung gi mchod rten thams cad la/ /bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /mchod rten thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /dpe med bsam yas nam mkha' che/ /ting 'dzin yin pas cir yang gsal/ /ye shes yin pas sna tshogs

rtogs/ /shes rab yin bas mkhyen par rtogs/ /thams cad mkhyen pas lhun gyis grub/ /don dam sems rtog yul las 'das/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ar+g+ha'i

rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /thugs kyi mchod rten thams cad la/ /bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /bla med mchod rten cha lugs ni/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i srid rtse nas/ /tsin+tA ma Ni ye shes bzhi/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs

gzhal yas 'dir/ /bla med mchod pa'i rgyan bshams nas/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /yid kyi mchod rten cha lugs ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya

mtsho'i mjing / /byang chub sems kyi mchod rten spyi/ /snang zhing stong la stong zhing gsal/ /yid kyi mchod rten thams cad la/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /bkra shis mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /

rang bzhin mchod rten ye shes sku/ /thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po che/ /mtshan ma'i sdug bsngal yongs bsal bas/ /sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan/ /bkra shis dpal tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /

rang bzhin mchod rten thams cad la/ /bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /sprul pa'i mchod rten ting 'dzin sku/ /byams shing snyoms pa kun gyi mgon/ /thugs rje chen po skyo dub med/ /nub byang rgyal po mig nad sel/ /

dpal tshogs bkra shis gzhal yas 'dir/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /sprul pa'i mchod rten thams cad la/ /bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /gzugs brnyan mchod rten shes rab

sku/ /bdud kyi sde dang gshin rje'i 'khor/ /srin po'i tshogs dang lha ma yin/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs thams cad kyi/ /gzi byin mdangs stobs 'joms mdzad cing / /gnod sbyin mang po'i rgyu srong gcod/ /gzugs brnyan mchod rten bzhugs dgu la/ /bkra shis dpal

tshogs gzhal yas 'dir/ /chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin du/ /ar+g+ha'i rgyun yang mi 'chad de/ /bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul na/ /thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /'phags pa'i mchod rten la bstod pa/ /rang 'byung 'dren pa dpa' bo lha yi lha/ /bcom ldan

shAka thub sku gdung ring bsrel snod/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mchod gnas mchog bzhugs pa/ /bang rim ri rab lta bu'i khri 'phang la/ /bum rten pad+ma bum bzangs snying po ni/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yid bzhin sku/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pas brgya byin

lus dag cing / /mthar gyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku thob pa/ /yon tan tshogs kyi sku gdung mthu chen bzhugs/ /bum pa dbyibs legs srog shing drang brtan la/ /'khor lo gdugs phreng rim pas 'gegs pa'i steng / /'od stong nyi dbyibs char khebs gdugs bris

te/ /zla ba dril bu cod phan 'jig rten skyong / /phreng ba them skas rgyal mtshan ba dan brgyan/ /rgyan la rgyan bkod 'jig rten kun gyi rgyan/ /chos bzangs rnam snang rnam pa thams cad zhal/ /gzugs kyi khyad par blta bas mi ngoms khyod / /ye shes tshogs rdzogs

chos kyi sku lags te/ /rnam rtog bral bas yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /dran pa nyer gzhag rmang gi khri 'phang brtan/ /brtson 'grus yang dag khri 'phang gnyis pa legs/ /rdzu 'phrul nang bzhi khri 'phang gsum pa dge /dbang po lnga yi khri 'phang bzhi pa bzang / /bum pa byang chub yan lag

bum rten stobs/ /bre legs 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /srog shing shes bcu stobs bcu gdugs phreng bcu/ /gdugs phreng ma 'dres dran pa nyer gzhag gsum/ /thugs rje 'phags pa'i chos kyi char khebs lding / /bla med go 'phang gdugs kyi gnam 'phang mtho/ /

'jig rten mun sel ye shes zla ba gsal / /tshangs pa'i gsung gi dril bu'i sgra snyan 'khrol/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub dar gyi cod pan 'phur/ /bden bzhi phan 'dogs 'jig rten skyong bzhi btsun/ /tshul khrims phung po me tog phreng ba bzang / /skyon bral bsrung ba'i ngos kyi them skas

mdzes/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ba dan spa/ /bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i chu srin rgyal mtshan grags/ /mi 'jigs bzhi yi rdo rings seng ge brjid/ /'di 'dra'i dam chos ngo mtshar rmad kyi rnams/ /thabs mkhas thugs rjes mchod rten tshul du sprul/ /nam mkha'i khams la

tshon bkye ji bzhin du/ /yon tan khyad par kha dog dbyibs su bsgyur/ /dpal gnas rin chen 'byung gnas chen po pa/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i mchod rten sku gdung tshul/ /dpal 'byung ka ni ka dang rab 'byung tshul/ /bsod nams phung pos yul khams byin chags shing / /sangs

rgyas sprul pa phrin las rdzogs par mdzad/ /sa bcu'i rgyal tshab byams pa'i gtsug gi rgyan/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid chen po la/ /ri lung nags tshal chu klung mkha' gnas pa'i/ /lha tshogs dad pas gnam sa kun nas dkrigs/ /sdom brtson rgyal sras 'khor bzhi

khyim bdag dang / /dbus mtha'i rgyal khams mi tshogs kun 'dus nas/ /me tog phreng bas spel legs mdzes pa dang / /tsan+dan dri bshos mar me rol mor bcas/ /bkra shis glu dbyangs bstod pa'i rnam pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan lhab lhub brgyan / /lus ngag

yid gsum dang bas mchod par bgyi/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi la mchod cing bstod pa/ shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni ku be+e ra/ /rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags

ldan pa/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/ /sde bo che la stobs po che/ /pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms/ /gzhan gyis mi thub thul bar dka'/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang / /lha yi g.yul

yang myong bar byed/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag nyid chen po dam tshig can sangs rgyas mthong ba/ chos thos pa/ dge 'dun la brten pa bstan pa bsrung ba/ lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ bu dang bcas/

tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ mdag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu dkon mchog gsum gyi zham 'bring mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam pa'i chos spel ba/ dge

slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rigs bzhi dang / yul dang / yul phyogs dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten dang / skye dgu'i tshogs

thams cad srung bar mdzad du gsol/ /sba ba dang yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa

dang / sa bcing bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya dag tu 'tsho bar shog /ston brgya dag ni mthong bar shog /phyogs skyong ba bcu la bstod cing mchod pa/ dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /

mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me ste bsreg bya bzhes pa'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /brnab sems gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje be con thogs pa'i lha/ /ma mo'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /lho

phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa bgyid cing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha/ /bden pa

bsrung ba gdon gyi bdag /nub phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /tshig bsrung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /rlung mtshams phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gnod

sbyin lag na be con thogs/ /nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /byang phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /dbang ldan gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod pa 'bul

zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gi klu dang sa yi lha/ /sa 'dzin dang ni lag chen dang / /dam tshig shes pa'i lha rnams la/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang / /zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar bcas pa la/ /mchod pa 'bul

zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /phyogs skyong bcu po bdag nyid chen po dam tshig can sangs rgyas mthong ba/ chos thos pa/ dge 'dun la brten pa/ bstan pa bsrung ba/ lha dang mi'i mgon mdzad pa/ bu dang bcas pa/ tsha bo dang bcas pa/ spun dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas pa/ sde dpon

dang bcas pa/ mngag pa dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang bcas pa/ g.yog dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa/ rtag tu dkon mchog gsum gyi zham 'bring mchod cing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/ dam pa'i chos spel ba/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen

dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhi dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rigs bzhi dang / yul dang yul phyogs dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten dang / skye dgu'i tshogs thams cad srung bar mdzad du gsol/ sba ba dang yongs

su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya dag tu 'tsho

bar shog /ston brgya dag tu mthong bar shog /lha klu sde brgyad dang 'byung po'i tshogs dam tshig can thams cad la mchod yon ar+g+ha gsol ba/ 'khor du gtogs pa'i sde brgyad po/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min nam mkha' lding / /mi'am ci dang lto 'phye che/ /

rigs nas rigs kyi gtso mdzad pa/ /mchod 'os gyur pa thams cad la/ /rim gro gus bas mchog bskyed nas/ /mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs/ /sa chu bar snang gnas bcas pa'i/ /byams sems ldan pa thams cad la/ /

mchod pa 'bul zhing phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod par shog /'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis/ /shin tu bden

pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa/ /bden pa de yis 'di ni bden par shog /de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /sdig pa bshags pa/ khams gsum 'gro lnga skye gnas bzhi/ /'khor ba'i rgyud du gtogs kun dang / /rigs mthun skyes pa bdag cag gis/ /dug

gsum dbang gis sgo gsum nas/ /las dang nyon mongs skye ba'i rgyu/ /mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga/ /mi dge bcu dang log pa bzhi/ /sgrib pa rnams dang kun sbyor dang / /de yi rgyud dang 'bras bu dang / /yun ring 'khor zhing mi khom brgyad/ /mtho ris

thar pa'i lam 'gog cing / /bdag dang gzhan la yongs gdung ba'i/ /kha na ma tho ci bgyis pa/ /chos dbyings phyogs bcu dus gsum dang / /rigs rnams kun la rab zhugs pa'i/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams la/ /ma lus bshags shing bsdam par bgyi/ /rjes su yi

rang ba/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras bcas dang / /rang rgyal nyan thos thams cad dang / /'gro kun bsod nams ye shes kyi/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad dang / /skyon rnams spong zhing yon tan thob/ /chags bral mnyam gzhag sa dang ni/ /de yi 'bras bu'i khyad par dang /

dge ba'i bshes dang dam chos 'dzin/ /byang chub sems mchog skyed byed cing / /bdag gzhan smin par byed pa dang / /lam dang 'bras bu thob pa dang / /bla med go 'phang mchog thob pa/ /de dag kun la yi rang zhing / /bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa yis/ /'gro ba kun la bde slad du/ /

'khor gsum dag pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/ /bde gshegs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /rigs 'khrung lung bstan dbang bskur ba/ /byang chub rim par

sangs rgyas pa/ /dam chos btsun par mdzad pa dang / /gdul ba'i don la bzhes pa dang / /rgya che zab pa rtogs dka' bas/ /bskul ba'i don la bzhes rnams las/ /chos kyi snang ba rgyas pa la / /'gro ba kun la bde ba dang / /rgya che zab pa bstan pa dang / /sngon gyi thugs

dam bskang ba'i phyir/ /tshangs pa 'dra bar tshul bsgyur te/ /rim gro gus pa mchog bskyed cing / /thal mo sbyar bar rab btud de/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byam na/ /bde

gshegs bdud bzhi nges bcom zhing / /rdzogs sangs rgyas nas 'khor lo bskor/ /'gro don sangs rgyas mdzad pa mdzad/ /'gro ba gzhan rnams 'dul ba dang / /'du byed mi rtag bstan pa dang / /gdul bya brtson pa bskyed slad du/ /mya ngan 'da' ston bzhed rnams la/ /

thal mo sbyar ba rab btud de/ /'gro ba kun la phan pa dang / /bde ba bskyed par bya ba dang / /chos tshul yun ring spel ba'i phyir/ /chos dbyings bstan pa'i lugs bzhin du/ /mya ngan mi 'da' g.yung drung sku/ /stug po bkod pa'i bdag nyid rnams/ /bskal pa'i mthar

yang bzhugs par gsol/ /bla med byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /dbang gyur spyan gyur tshad mar 'gyur / /'gro don mdzad par dbang gyur ba/ /byang chub blo mnga' dgongs su gsol/ /ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba dang / /rgyal sras dpa'

bo de dag gis/ /'gro la phan dang bde slad du/ /byang chub snying por bzhugs bzhugs su / /dngos po kun dang bral ba dang / /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa/ /bdag med chos kyi bdag nyid kyis / /rang sems gdod nas ma skyes

pa/ /stong nyid rang bzhin thugs bskyed ltar/ /bdag dang ris mthun gzhan gyis kyang / /bla med byang chub sems bskyed bgyi/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi byin brlabs kyis/ /sems can thams cad shis par brjod / /dkon mchog gsum gyi byin brlabs dang / /'phags

pa kun gyi thugs rje dang / /chos nyid dag pa'i mthu dang ni/ /bsam dang sbyor ba dag pa yis/ /khams gsum rgyud lnga gnas bzhin/ /gzugs dang gzugs can ma yin dang / /'du shes med dang yod min dang / /sems can ris rnams ji snyed pas/ /so so'i skye bor

gtogs pa'i sa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad myur spangs te/ /'phags lam bde ba mya ngan 'das/ /nges par legs par rtogs gyur cig /'phags lam brnyes pa thams cad kyis/ /gong ma'i yon tan mchog thob cing / /bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ /bde ba dag la

gzhol gyur cig /sems can dang 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la bsod nams bstab pa/ 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs dang / /da ltar dus dang phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten khams na gang bzhugs pa'i/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/ /bsod
