nams dang ni ye shes tshogs/ /de yi rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / /sbyor ba dang ni dngos dang mjug /sems can kun la bstabs mkhyen ltar/ /bdag dang sems can kun gyis kyang / /rang gi bsod nams ma lus pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas bde ma thob pa'i/ /sems can rnams la

bstab par bgyi/ /sbyor ba dang ni mthong ba dang / /bsgom dang mi slob lam brnyes pa'i/ /'phags pa'i tshogs rnams kun la yang / /de dag rab tu bstab par bgyi/ /de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba/ bla ma'i bla ma dkon mchog dang / /mchod rten khyad par 'khor

bcas la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang / /yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba dang / /skyabs gsol lus phul sems bskyed dang / /shis pa brjod cing bstabs pa dang / /gzhan yang dge ba ci bsags pa/ /thams cad bla med byang chub bsngo/ /des ni sems can

thams cad dang / /'phags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis/ /ye shes sa yi lam gyi mchog /'jug dang gnas dang 'phar ba dang / /spyod pa nyid kyi yul rnams ni/ /go rims bzhin du rab rtogs te/ /sku gsum mkhyen bzhi'i tshogs rdzogs shing / /bla med sangs rgyas grub

par smon/ /'di bris bsod nams ci mchis pa/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad dang / /rmongs pa bdag gis sdig bgyis pa/ /thams cad ma lus so sor bshags/ /'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba'i gzungs bklag cing

mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa/ slob dpon chen po bo d+hi satwas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs dang / rgyud dag

las tsai t+ya dang / tsha tsha gdab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga /A tsAR+Ya d+harma kIrti dang / badzra kI rti dang / badzra bo d+hi la sogs pa las thos nas/ slob dpon de dag gis lung bstan te/ gtan la phab par byas pa'o/ /de la dang po tsi t+ya gdab pa'i sa gzhi ni/ khang pa'am/ yol bas bskor

ba'am/ ra ba la sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i nang bde bar dkyil 'khor du bya ba'i sa brtag pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi zabs su khru gang brkos las rnag byung na bzang / rus pa dang gyo mo la sogs pa byung na yang / de dag ma lus par bsal te sa brkos pa de'i dbus su/ gser dang

dngul dang zangs dang kham pa gang 'byor pa snod sbyar ma'i nang du rin po che dang / 'bru nang sman sna lnga dang spos dag blugs nas/ kha bcad de bzhag las bzang pos bkang ste/ de'i steng du dkyil 'khor 'dom do gru bzhi 'phang du khru gang pa legs pa cig byas la/ dkyil 'khor de'i ngos

gcig kyang khru gang gru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor chung ngu gnyis gnyis mgo snyoms te/ dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'brel par byas te/ dkyil 'khor de'i steng du za 'og dang / ras la sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i bla re 'dom phyed dang gsum/ khru bzhi pa yan chad 'dom gang yang yan

chad bre/ 'phan brgyad yan chad du 'byor pa gdags/ phyogs bzhir rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs/ bla re de'i dbus su dar ram/ ras sam shog bu srid du mda' gang / zheng du khru gang lhag tsam grwa sbyar/ phyogs bzhir mchod rten dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / 'phang lo

bdun dang ldan pa re res bres te/ de'i bum pa'i dbus nas thad kar bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs sngags 'di gur kum gyis bri/ de'i sngags la/ oM na ma s+t+re ya d+h+wi kA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+he/ dz+wa la dz+wa la d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ che ge mo/ /saM b+ha ra A yuHsaM sho d+ha ya/ sarba pA paM/

sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa man+toSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he/ hUM hUM hUM hUM aM baM saM dzaHswA hA/ de nas mchod rten de'i 'phang lo'i steng du bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs 'dis gdugs lta bur 'khyil par gur kum gyis bri/ de'i sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la na sA ga ra/ gam+b+hI

re A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ A yun+d+ha ra/ A yun+d+ha ra/ san+d+ha ra/ san+d+ha ra/ k+Sha Na k+Sha Na/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ k+Shu Nu k+Shu Nu/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ye/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA b+hu ba na sA ga re/ saM sho d+ha ya mAM/ sarba satwAM sh+tsa/ b+ha ga ba tI/ sarba pA paM/ bi ma le/ dza ya

dza ya/ dza ya lab+d+he/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ bi ga te/ A ba ra Ne/ b+ha ya ha ra Ne/ hUM hUM hUM/ mr-i t+yu daN+Da d+ha re/ a b+ha ya pra de/ uSh+NI Sha bya ba lo ki te/ sa man+ta mu khe/ sa man+ta bya ba lo ki te/ ma hA mA ye/ ma hA pA sha d+ha re/ a mo g+ha bi ma le/ A kaR+Sha

ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya ya A kaD+D+h+ya ya/ b+hA ra b+hA ra/ saM b+hA ra saM b+hA ra/ in+d+ri ya/ bi sho d+ha ni/ b+hU Shi ta b+hU dzi/ ma hA mu drA bi lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya/ sid+d+he sid+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni saM sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni

ha ra ha ra/ ma ma sarba pA pa/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ku la b+hu dze/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ pra sa ran+tu/ ma ma puN+yaM/ bi na sh+yaM tu pA paM/ sarba kilbi Shaha re ma Ni bi shud+d+he/ sho d+ha ya/ bi ma le/ bi ka si ta pad+me/ ka ba tsi ta b+hu dze/ ShaT+pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi ma le bi lo ki te

swa hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te swA hA/ oM A yurd de swA hA/ pu N+yad de swA hA/ puN+ya bi lo ki ti swa hA/ puN+ya a ba lo ki te swA hA/ mr-i t+yu daN+De swA hA/ ya ma daN+De swA hA/ ya ma dU ti swA hA/ saM ha ra Ni swA hA/ saM b+ha ra Ni swA hA/ san+d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ pra ti sa ra Ni swA hA/ o dzo

ba ti swA hA/ te dzo ba ti swA hA/ dza ya ba ti swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga te mu dra a d+hiSh+ThA Na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ mchod rten de dang / gdugs de las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa bre/ de'i gzhi'i dbus su dar ram shog shog gang 'byor pa las/ srid du

mda' gang tsam zheng du khru gang lhag tsam la/ gzungs gnyis ka rdzogs par bri zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan par byas te/ dbus kyi mchod rten ring bsrel can de la mi reg tu gdags/ de nas dkyil 'khor de'i steng lci ba gtsang ma dang / tsan+dan dang / gur kum la sogs pas

bskus la/ de'i steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ngos gcig la re'u bcu bcu/ re'u gcig la yang chag gang dang / tshon do'i thad du brtsis te/ cha mnyam par byas la/ srad bu ring thung cha mnyam pa cig tshon sna gcig gis thig btab ste/ re'u brgya dang ngos gcig kyang re'u gnyis

gnyis yod pa dang / spyir brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar/ re'u re re'i steng du yang tsai t+ya gzhag pa'i bzhi tsan+dan dang spos chu gang 'byor pas dkyil 'khor zlum po re re bya/ de nas las kyi bye brag las shar phyogs la sogs par gong thabs gsum gdeng / 'phan gdugs ci rigs par bres

la/ steng dbus ma'i steng du tsai t+ya su 'degs pa 'dug /de'i g.yas kyi stan la bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i gzungs sngags klog cing 'dug la/ de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor cig byas pa'i steng du mchod pa sna lnga dgram/ dbus su bum pa'am/ bya gang 'byor pa gcig spos chus bkang la/

de'i nang du sman dang 'bru dang rin po che sna lnga lnga bcug la kha bcings te/ de'i mgul nas srad bu gtsang ma gcig btags la sngags gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsam pa'i rgyud mnyam par bklag go/ /de la sman lnga ni siM ha dang / bya g+h+r-i dang / ki ri karni ka dang / sa ha dang sa ha de

ba'o/ /'bru lnga ni til dang / bal sran dang / 'bras so ba dang / nas dang gro'o/ /rin po che sna lnga ni byu ru dang / gser sa le sbram dang dung dang / mu tig dang shel te/ ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las dngos su ma 'byor na/ gang 'byor pa de rnams las sna lngar sbyar ro/ /g.yon gyi

stan la shes rab tshul brgya lnga bcu pa klog pa cig 'dug la/ yo byad gzhan ni gong ma bzhin sbyar la d+harma lan cig yan chad tsai t+ya 'debs kyi bar du rdzogs par bklag /dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tsai t+ya la sogs pa 'god pa'i gos dang / 'bob gtsang mar gsol la/ khrus legs

par byas pas 'god/ tsai t+ya 'debs pas bdag nyid rang gi lha'i tshul du ting nge 'dzin mnyam par byas te bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i snying po'am/ 'og nas tsai t+ya gdab pa'i sngags rim gyis 'byung ba gang yang rung ba des/ bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan par byas te mchod cing tsai t+ya gdab bo/ tsai t+ya

btab pa des thal byung du dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ dang por mchod rten lugs ma sha ri ram yod pa cig dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi thig rgya gram yod pa'i steng gzhag /gzhan gyi las kyi khyad par gyis 'god de/ zhi ba ni byang shar mtshams nas shar lho

mtshams su phreng gcig rdzogs par bkod la shar nas nub tu bsgre'o/ /tsai t+ya gcig btab ste/ ri'u dbus su bzhag pa dang / dar dang shog shog gang 'byor pa'i rgyal mtshan chung ngu chu srin gyi mgo'am/ tog zlum po gang 'byor pa dang bcas pa dang / 'phan phran chung ngu re re gzugs

mchod pa sna lnga yang rim bzhin du dbul zhing dgram/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni bshos dang mar me dang / spos chu dang / bdug spos dang me tog go/ /de bzhin du tsai t+ya re re btab cing mchod pa tshang bar dbul/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i steng mchod rten btab zin nas/ mtha'i tsai t+ya brgyad dang

shar lhor bskor zhing byang gi bar du rim bzhin dgod/ de nas tsai t+ya 'debs pa de bstan/ dbus ma'i steng du 'dug ste/ bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams spyan drangs la/ dung phor la sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i nang du

rin po che sna bdun dang / sman dang 'bru sna lnga dang / tsan+dan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum dang 'di rnams las ci 'byor pa bcug ste/ ar+g+ha'i chu lan gsum du sbreng zhing bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan pas dbul/ de la rin po che sna bdun ni byu ru dang / gser dang dngul dang zangs dang

lcags so/ /de nas kun du bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung rnam par 'khrigs pa kun nas gang bar byin gyis brlab cing mchod do/ /de'i 'og tu tsai t+ya de dag thams cad shel sgong yongs su dag pa'i tshul du rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal te/ de dag gi dbus su sngags mang

nyung gnyis ka'am/ yang na rigs so so'i snying po gang gcig po yang rung ste/ kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du dngas shing 'tsher ba de las 'od zer sna tshogs byung bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams nas nam mkha'i mthas klas pa kun du khyab par sems can gyi don mdzad cing / re ba

skong bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ slar 'dus pas bdag gi spyi bor zhugs par dmigs nas/ bdag gi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ste/ shel sgong yongs su dag pa'i tshul du bsam/ de bzhin du yon bdag gson gshin gang yang rung ba'i

gzugs brnyan du dmigs nas/ de'i spyi gtsug tu ye shes kyi 'od zer shin tu 'phro ba dag /tshul gong ma bzhin du zhugs shing de'i las dang / nyon mongs pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad rnam par dag ste/ shel sgong ltar rab tu gsal bar dmigs/ yon bdag ji lta ba

bzhin du 'khor thams cad la yang dmigs shing byin gyis brlab/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nas nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can thams cad la tshul gong ma ltar byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i sngags kyi snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig yan chad

'dzab ci ran cig bya/ de'i 'og tu yon bdag dngos sam gzugs brnyan gang yang rung ba de tshul bzhin du lus bsrungs la/ bi ma la uSh+NI Sha dang tshul brgya lnga bcu pa bklags pa'i sngags chab cho ga bzhin du btab cing dbang bskur ba/ spyi bo nas blugs par bya'o/ /de dang dus gcig

tu sngags mkhan cho ga shes pa cig yod na/ phyogs bcu'i mgon po yang tshul bzhin du dgug cing ar+g+ha gsol te/ mchod pa sna lnga la sogs pa dang gtor ma bzang du sbyar la rim bzhin du phul te/ 'phags pa thugs dam can khyed kyis mchod pa 'di dag bsnams la/ sbyin bdag

ming 'di zhes bya ba dgal khyed kyis bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang / don bsgrub cing byin gyis rlobs shig ces bsgo'o/ /de ltar sngags mkhan cho ga shes pa med na/ mchod rten bskor zin pa'i mjug la phyogs bcu'i gtor ma sbyin zhing bsngo'o/ /de nas rol mo sna tshogs kyis drangs la

'khor thams cad kyis mchod rten de dag la 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro bar bsam zhing / lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bsam pa'i rgyud ma nyams par byas te bskor/ de lta zin nas yang tsai t+ya 'debs pa'i cho ga shes pa des/ mchod rten de dag las 'od zer byung ba de bdag gi spyi bor

zhugs pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi spyi bor zhugs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la/ bla na med pa'i mchod pa dang / yon ci 'byor pa yang skabs 'dir dbul lo/ /de nas ar+g+ha tshul bzhin du gsol te/ bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas

par byas la 'phags pa rnams dang / mgon po dag slar gshegs par gsol lo/ /tsai t+ya'i yo byad la sogs pa kha dog dbye ba ni/ las gang byed pa'i khyad par las kha dog dkar po la sogs pa bzhin du byas te/ de la zhi ba'i cho ga ni kha dog thams cad dkar por bsgyur ro/ /

rgyas pa'i cho ga ni yo byad thams cad kha dog ser por bsgyur ro/ /dbang gi cho ga ni yo byad thams cad kha dog dmar por bsgyur ro/ /mngon spyod kyi cho ga ni yo byad thams cad nag por bsgyur zhes so/ /tsai t+ya 'debs pa dang / yon bdag dang / tsai t+ya 'debs pa'i las mi thams

cad skra bkru zhing khrus bya ba dang / gos sar pa la sogs pa ci 'byor gyis zung du bsgo bar bya'o/ /tsai t+ya 'debs pa dang / bskor ba'i mi rnams la thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du gzhan gyis ma rig par gyis shig /mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad bya ba rdzogs so// //

@##/ /mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni khru gang bzhi pa yan chad la/ 'phang yang khru gang byas la/ de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa gcig bri ste/ de'i dbus su gzhag /tsai t+ya de'i nang du sha ri ram dang rin po che

ci 'byor pa yang gzhug go/ /mchod rten gcig gdab pa'i cho ga'o//[ ]@##/ /mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu ni chur khru do zheng du khru gang / 'phang du yang khru gang ba zhig byas la/ khru gang gru bzhi pa'i re'u sa

bcad de/ de'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa re re bris la de'i dbus su mchod rten gzhag /mchod rten de gcig gi dbus su bi ma la uSh+NI Sha'i sngags mang nyung gnyis ka gur gum gyis bris te gzhug /mchod rten gcig gi nang du gzungs de gnyis ka yang gzhug pa'i steng du/

de'i bum pa'i nang du sha ri ram gcig bcug la dbyung du rung bar byas te mchod pa zin nas phyir yang dbyung bar bya'o/ /mchod rten gnyis gdab pa'i cho ga'o//[ ]@#/ /mchod rten gsum gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong dang 'dra/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni chur khru gsum/ zheng

du khru gang / 'phang du khru gang byas la/ khru gang gi re'u gsum thig gis bsnyams te/ de gsum gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa re re bris la/ de'i steng du mchod rten gzhag /de la bzhag pa'i go rims ni/ dang por dbus su gzhag go/ /mchod rten gsum gdab pa'i

cho ga'o//[ ]@##/ /mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi pa 'phang du yang khru gang ba zhig byas la/ de'i grwa bzhir yang de dang 'dra ba re re byas la/ dbus kyi stegs bu gru bzhi dang mtha'

ma'i stegs bu bzhi'i grwa bzhi dang sbyar bar bya/ de nas stegs bu dbu ma'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'am/ /bcu gnyis pa cig bris te grwa bzhi'i stegs bu'i dbus kyi pad+ma 'dab ma grangs bcu drug pa zhig na ni/ pad+ma 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa bri/ dbus kyi bcu gnyis pa zhig na

ni/ mthar brgyad pa bris te/ de'i dbus su mchod rten gzhag /mchod rten bzhag pa'i go rims ni/ dang po dbus su bzhag nas/ mtha' ma bzhi ni shar nas lhor bskor thabs su gzhag go/ /yang rnam pa gzhan du na dkyil 'khor grwa ma sbyar bar phyogs bzhi ngos ngos sbyar te

bya'o/ /grwa bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lhung bzed re re spos chus bkang ste/ mchod do/ /mchod rten lnga gdab pa'i cho ga'o//[ ]@##/ /mchod rten dgu gdab pa'i cho ga la/ las gzhan ni gong ma dang 'dra/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni ngos gcig la khru gsum grwa

bzhi 'phang du khru gang ba zhig byas te/ khru gang gru bzhi pa re'u thig gis bcad la/ dang por dbus su de nas shar nas lhor bskor thabs su mtha' gzhag par bya'o/ mchod rten dgu gdab pa'i cho ga'o/ /[ ]@##/ /mchod rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga la/ sngags bye ba bris

pa'am/ phyag rgyar btab la mchod rten bye ba btab pa'i nang du bcug na mchod rten thams cad 'bar ro/ /de nas mchod rten gcig nas bye ba'i bar du snga phyir btab pa de dag mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste/ 'phan shing la 'phan rings bsgrang ba ni/ dus

gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten 'phul ba zhes bya'o/ /mchod rten bye ba gdab pa'i cho ga ste/ mchod rten gdab pa'i cho ga'o//[ {Da}]@##/ /mchod rten dang tsha tsha gdab pa yan chad nas bye ba gdab pa la sogs kun kyang / bsam pa'i rgyud dang

sngags ni 'dra ste/ dang por rdo rje gnod sbyin kyi cha byad/ phyag rgya dang sngags su ldan pas bdun yan chad nyi shu rtsa gcig man chad du chu la bsngags te/ 'jim pa dang yo byad yan chad la gdab po/ /de la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje bcings pa bsdoms te mthe bong gnyis

gshibs pa bsgreng / mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gzhibs te cung zad kyis mi sbyar bar byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba las mche ba'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni rdo rje gnod sbyin kyi las thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags la/ badzra yak+Sha hUM/ 'dis btab pas thams cad gtsang

mar bsams pa dang / bgegs la sogs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /oM shud+he na du sho d+ha ya/ zhes 'dis btab pas/ thams cad gtsang mar bsangs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ba'i sngags la/ na mas+t+ri ya d+hI kA mAM/ dzi nA mAM/ bad+he re dra

yA na/ shu b+ha na akhyo b+h+ya mr-i ta pany+tsa ban+de a haM/ a ba lo ki taM/ na mas+t+ri ya d+hI/ nug+hA mAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA mAM/ tat+ya thA/ oM suk+T+ma suk+T+ma nuste/ shad+he dAd+he/ shi shi bi ni/ ra ku le/ ya sho ya sho ba ti/ te dza pote dzo ba ti sarba bud+d+hASh+T+r-i te swA hA/ mu dra gdab pa'i 'jim pa'am sngags bri ba'i

tshe sngags lan bdun gdab pa'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bung+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA mAM/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ 'bi 'bi bya ba'i sngags la/ oM badzrod b+ha ba swA hA/ tsi t+ya phor bu dang / sAts+tsha'i skol phor gyi nang du bye mas gdab pa'am/ snum gyis bsku ba'i sngags la oM badzra d+hA tu gar+b+he

sru hA/ tho bas brdeg cing gdab pa'i sngags la/ oM badzra mung+gA ra A ko Ta ya hUM/ tsi t+ya phor bu nas dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harma rasne swA hA/ 'khor lo dang dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM pra mArda na ye swA hA/ tsi t+ya dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa'i sngags la/ oM su phra tiSh+Tha badzre

swA hA/ cho ga de ltar byas na tsai t+ya gcig btab pas bye ba snyed btab par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gang na bskus na nad mje'i rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs pa nad thams cad ma lus pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /

sangs rgyas kyi sku dang mchod rten gyi cha dbye ba bshad pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad kyi sku ni rnam pa gnyis te/ tshe blangs pa'i sku dang / chos kyi sku'o/ /de la tshe blangs pa'i sku ni yab yum las skyes pa'i mig dang yid tshim par byed pa/ dag par

byed pa skrun par byed pa ste/ sku tshigs re re zhing sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang ldan la/ tshigs re re yang bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa mthong na ba lta bas chog mi shes

shing mi mthun pa med pa dang / blta bar bya ba bla na med pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshe blangs pa'i sku'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud par zad kyi/ rang

sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu dag dang / gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams nam chad ni/ su yang rgya chen yang dag par rab tu ston par ji ltar byas kyang nus pa med de/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga

dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po'i chos 'di dag dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang /

tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / lam bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / btang snyoms dang / bsrung ba med pa gsum dang / dkon mchog gsum dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum

dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang / mi slob pa'i chos bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las bdag gis bya ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen

pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /

zag pa zad par mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug dang / ma 'dres par bsgom pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

rnams dang / smon nas shes pa dang / shes rab kyi mthar phyin pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba dran pa dang / dro bar gyur pa dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang / mthong

ba'i lam dang / bsgom pa'i lam dang / mi slob pa'i lam dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang / phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / dbang po nyi shu gnyis rnams yin no/ /zab cing mchog tu zab pa'i chos 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa ste/ gang rang rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs nas nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs su chud de/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / mu

stegs can sna tshogs dge sbyong dang / bram ze gcig pa dang / rgyu ba dang / kun du rgyu ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ sangs rgyas

kyis 'dul ba rnams btul nas 'khor grangs med pa khrag khrig brgya stong dang / mya ngan las 'das pa 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer du zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku bshad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /de nas mchod rten gyi don bshad de/ bsags par bya ba yin

pas bsags pa'o/ /yang na bsags su rung ba'i phyir yang bsags pa zhes bya'o/ /yang na don gyi skabs su 'dir dran par bya ba yin pas na dran pa zhes bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / dbang bo

dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi yan lag dang / ye shes dang / stobs dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i yon tan de dag yun ring po nas thabs kyi bye brag gis bsags pa dang / sngon yang dag par ma

bsgoms kyang / don gyi skabs dag tu 'dul ba rnams kyis dran par bya ba'i phyir na [(]btsigs [,]btsugs [)]pa zhes bya ba'am/ dran pa zhes bya ste/ de dag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod rten zhes bya'o/ /chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o/ /de'i bang rim bzhi dang / bum rten dang / bum pa dang /

pu shu dang / srog shing dang / 'khor lo brtsegs ma bcu gsum dang / char khebs rnams ni mchod rten gyi dbyibs yin no/ /de la bang rim dang po na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste/ 'di ltar lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /

bang rim gnyis pa ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ 'di ltar sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir brtson pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson

pa dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa'o/ /bang rim gsum pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ 'di ltar 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du

byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /bang rim bzhi pa dbang po lnga ste/ 'di ltar dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /bum rten ni stobs lnga ste/ 'di ltar dad pa'i stobs dang /

brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so/ /bum pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ 'di ltar dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa dang / ting

nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ /pu shu ni lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba

dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /srog shing ni shes pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar kun rdzob shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs par shes pa dang / sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung shes pa dang /

'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /'khor lo dang po ni gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo gnyis pa ni las bdag gir mkhyen pa'i stobs gsum pa ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par

thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo bzhi pa ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo lnga pa ni mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo drug pa ni khams sna tshogs

mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo bdun pa ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo brgyad pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo dgu pa ni 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo bcu pa ni zag pa zad pa

mkhyen pa'i stobs so/ /'khor lo bcu gcig pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na/ slob ma thams cad mthun par gus par nyan pa la dga' ba'i sems mi 'byung ba'o/ /'khor lo

bcu gnyis pa ni/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na/ slob ma thams cad mthun par gus par mi nyan pa la khong khro ba mi 'byung ba'o/ /'khor lo bcu gsum pa ni ma 'dres pa'i

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa ste/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor rnams la chos ston pa la slob ma la gus par mnyan la/ la la gus par mi nyan pa rnams la dga' ba dang / khong khro ba gnyis mi 'byung ba'o/ /char khebs ni snying rje chen po ste/ gang gis de bzhin

gshegs pa'i 'dul ba'i rgyud smin pa dang / ma smin pa dang / da ltar smin pa rnams kyi don dpyod cing / 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku ma lus pa dus kyi khyad par dag tu yang dag 'dzin 'di ni mchod rten gyi rang bzhin no/ /de las gzhan pa'i

rdo rings dang / them skas dang / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dril bu dang / gdugs dang / zla ba dang / dar gyi cod pan dang / ba dan la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i rkyen du 'bab pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad dag

kyang yod de/ de la rdo rings rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi bstan te/ 'di ltar zag pa zad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams phyin ci log par bstan pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam phyin ci ma log par bstan

pa'o/ /them skas kyis ni bsrung ba med pa bzhi bstan te/ 'di ltar sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa dang / gsung gi phrin las yongs su dag pa dang / thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag pa dang / 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa'o/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan rnams kyis ni/ bdud kyi

rgyal mtshan bsnyal bar bstan te/ 'di ltar lha'i bdud bsnyal ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud bsnyal ba dang / phung po'i bdud bsnyal ba'o/ /'chi bdag gi bdud bsnyal ba'o/ /me tog gi phreng bas ni bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po bstan to/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams

kyis ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bshad pas/ 'jig rten bzhi la phan 'dogs par bstan to/ /'di ltar so so'i skye bo la phan 'dogs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa la phan 'dogs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba la phan 'dogs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /dril

bu rnams ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas tshegs chung ngus stong gsum gyi stong chen por tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos bstan pa'i sgra skad kyis kun du 'gengs pa'o/ /gdugs kyis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyi bor gyur par bstan te/ de bzhin

gshegs pa sems can rkang pa med pa dang / rkang pa gnyis pa dang / rkang mangs dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs med pa rnams kyi mchog ces bya bar gyur pa'o/ /zla bas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa'i 'jig rten du bla

na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig skyed par mdzad pa'o/ /dar gyi cod pan gyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi cod pan thogs pa bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kun du 'jug pa'o/ /ba dan rnams kyis ni bla na med

pa'i chos kyi grags pa'i ba dan bstan te/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i grags pas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor non par gyur pa'o/ /mchod rten gyi cha dbye ba 'dul ba las byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//[ #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA

ga ta sa ma ya rak+Sha sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsrung ba'i sgrub thabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dri ma med pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa'i/ /bla ma'i

zhabs kyi rdul la ni/ /dngos po kun gyis phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rgyal sras thu bo rnams la yang / /dngos kun phyag byas 'od zer gyi/ /dri med snying po sgrub thabs bshad/ /bkra shis yid 'ong bde gnas su/ /khrus byas bde ba'i stan la

'dug /gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang / /sdom bzung tshad med bzhi la gnas/ /rang snying a las 'od byung bas/ /bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /nam mkha'i ngos la bsam par bya/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa la sogs bya/ /de nas

stong pa'i ngo bor bsam/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ de nas las rjes dran par bya/ /a las zla ba rdo rjer bskyed/ /de yis ji ltar 'dod rgyal pos/ /bgegs rnams bskrad par byas nas ni/ /de dbus nam mkha' gru gsum zlum/ /gru bzhi ri rab rnam par

bsam/ /gru bzhi sgo dang rab ldan pa/ /'od dang ldan pa'i khang par bsgom/ /lte bar pad+ma zla ba la/ /a dang maM mu hriHhUM las/ /a las nor bu 'bar bar gyur/ /sku mdog sna tshogs ma nges la/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang ldan/ /g.yas pa skyabs sbyin g.yon nor

bu/ /mtshan dang dpe byad tshogs pa dbus/ /g.yas su 'jam dpal rnon po la/ /rgyab tu shAkya thub pa nyid/ /g.yon du seng ge sgra bsam bya/ /mdun du phyag na rdo rje bsgom/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar ye shes bsam/ /byin brlabs dbang bskur bsam par bya/ /mchod bstod

legs par rdzogs pa dang / /rtse gcig yid kyis bsgom par bya/ /de las skyo na snying po bzlas/ /gtsug tu bzlas dang smin phrag bzlas/ /snying ga nyid du bzlas pa'o/ /nye ba'i snying po/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu dra a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ de nas gtor mas mchod nas

gshegs/ /bdag nyid smon lam nyid bya zhing / /snang ba sgyu ma bzhin du sbyang / /'di byas ngal ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /'di byas ngal ba sdig pa dag /dri med 'khor lo'i skur gyur shog /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rgya gar gyi

mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /sAts+tsha lnga gdab pa'i cho ga bzhugs/ @#/ /de nas khrus byas gos gtsang bgos/ /spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya/ /mchod rten lnga gdab

gro ga la/ /'khor lo bya ru rdzogs par bya/ /ba dan gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sogs/ /me tog phreng bas brgyan pa ni/ /dbus dang grwa la bzhugs su gsol/ /bum pa gang ba bzhi la ni/ /byin gyis brlabs la phyogs bzhir gzhag /rma bya'i sgro lnga'i mu men dang / /spos kyi sdong po

snod bzhi yang / /gra la legs par gzhag par bya/ /mchod yon spos dang me tog tshogs/ /mar me dri dang lha bshos dang / /rol mo sna tshogs reg byas mchod/ /a las byung ba'i ngo mtshar mchog /thugs ni nam mkha' sangs rgyas nyid/ /gtsug tor dri med snying po'i mchog

yid bzhin nor bu khyod phyag 'tshal/ /shes rab mchog gyur 'jam pa'i mgon/ /a la la ho ngo bo'i chos/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i mchog 'byung ba/ /'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub/ /thugs rje'i mchog tu gyur pa ni/ /yid bzhin

nor bu lta bur mtshungs/ /shAkya thub par phyag 'tshal bstod/ /snying rje chen po'i mchog gyur pa/ /dri med dag pa'i snying po'i sku/ /'od zer 'bar bas gsung dag ba/ /spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud rnams 'joms pa'i rdo rje can/ /thugs kyi rdo rje yid bzhin

tshul/ /nad rnams sel ba sman pa'i mchog /phyag na rdo rjer phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang / /'khor lo bskor dang myang mi 'da'/ /bsngo dang gsol gdab 'dod don zhu/ /gang 'dod pa yi las la 'jug /rgyun dang nar mar tshogs bsag bya/

dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dang por sems bskyed la gang la dmigs pa'i bsam rgyud dang bcas par bya'o/ /dang por bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gtsug tor dri ma med pa la sogs pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsams

la/ mchod pa rgya chen po dngos su dbul lo/ /de rnams kyis kyang bdag dang bum pa nad pa'am gang la sgrub par byed pa de la byin gyis rlob par gsol ba gdab pas byin gyis rlob par bsam mo/ /bum pa kha rgyan dang bcas pa de la rang yang khrus bya/ gso sbyong la sogs pa gtsang mar

byas la gzungs tshar brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /de nas gang la dmigs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par bsams la khrus bya'o/ /bsam rgyud dang bcas pas so// //[ ]@##/ /gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs chog bzhugs/ @#/ /bla ma rnams

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos/ spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o/ /snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o/ /mchod rten lnga gdab par bya/ /rig sngags 'di yang mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya/ mchod

rten ni grwa bzhir gzhag par bya/ gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/ shing bu btsugs te ba dan dmar po dpyang bar bya'o/ /me tog gis gtor bar bya/ bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag /grwa bzhir pog phor bzhi dang / tu ru ska dang / a ka ru dang / gu gul gyi dud pas

bdug par bya'o/ /spos kyi mchod yon gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ dkyil 'khor la bskor bar bya'o/ /nad kyis btab pa/ gnod pa/ nad tshabs che ba/ tshe zad pa/ dus ma yin par

'chi bas 'jigs pa/ rgyal po dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa/ bu 'dod pa rnams dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par gzhag go/ /rma bya'i sgro lngas byab par bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di lan gcig

byas na bskal pa 'bum du byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro/ /kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / dam tshig la rnam par blta ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug go/ /

mchod rten gsar pa'am/ rnying pa bcos pa yang rung / de'i nang du gzhug /spos dang byug pa yang dbul lo/ /gzungs kyi sngags zlos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bskor bar bya/ nyin zhag re la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o/ /de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su

spos kyi dkyil 'khor bya/ nyi ma la logs su me tog gis gtor ro/ /a ka ru dang / tu ruska'i du bas bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab la rig sngags kyi snying po bris te mchod

rten gyi nang du bcug /dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag na gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /snying po 'di bris la gzhug go/ /gtsug tor dri ma med

pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@/ /gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs chog bzhugs// @##/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga /dang por ba'i lcib sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ de

la tsan+dan dang gur kum la sogs pas gtor la/ me tog sil ma'ang gtor ro/ /de'i steng du gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i yang snying gur kum mam/ gi waM gis me tog dkar po 'byung ba'i myu gus gro ga la bris / de la dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i sAts+tsha lnga'am/ bdun nam dgu

tsam byas la/ maN+Dal gyi me tog phung po'i steng du gzhag /de nas mchod rten re re la lha bshos la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga re re bshams la/ maN+Dal gyi steng du bskor ba ltar gzhag /yang maN+Dal gyi steng du gser dngul la sogs pa rin po che'i bum pa bzhi tsam dang / skyogs

la sogs pa'i snod bzhi tsam a ka ru dang tu ruska la sogs pa dri bzang pos bkang la/ phyogs mtshams rnams su gzhag go/ /de nas mchod pa bshams pa rnams sku gzugs dang sAts+tsha la sogs pa dkon mchog la 'bul zhing / bsod nams kyi yan lag rnams tshang bar bya/ de nas

mchod g.yog gcig bdag gis bzlas brjod ma zin gyi bar du a ka ru la sogs pa'i spos dri zhim po bsreg du gzhug /bzlas pa'i dus su gtam gzhan dang ma 'dres par bya/ bzlas pa zin pa dang yang snying po 'ba' zhig bzlas shing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya/ de ltar zin pa

dang / rin po che'i snod rnams kyi chu kun las cung zad bsdus la/ nad pa la cung zad blud cing khrus bya/ de ltar byas na glo bur ba la sogs pa'i nad tshabs che ba las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe zad pa las ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa chen po rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ de

dag la sogs pa phan yon dpag tu med pa ni de nyid kyi cho ga rgya chen po las shes par bya'o/ /cho ga gang byed kyang 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gsum mam bzhi gtung bar bya'o/ /slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i gzungs

kyi cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya si tA ta pa tre a pa rA dzi tA nA ma no pi kA /bod skad du/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

lha mo gdugs dkar can bsgrub par 'dod pas/ gnas dben par khrus byas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang skad cig gis lha mor bskyed pa'i oM gyi 'od kyis 'phags ma ri khrod ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs la phyag bya ste/ mchod pa la sogs pa'i bdun rnam dag

gis tshogs bsags nas/ tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsag par bya'o/ /de'i ngang las snying ga'i oM las 'od 'phros don gnyis byas/ tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar mo oM gyis mtshan par gyur/ de las 'od zer sku phra mor

'phros 'dus pa las bdag nyid lha mo gdugs dkar can sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gnyis las byams pa dang snying rje'i 'od zer 'phro ba/ g.yas skyabs sbyin/ g.yon gdugs dkar mo bzung ba/ pad zla'i gdan la zhabs skyil krung gis

bzhugs shing sgeg pa'o/ /de dbu rgyan dang rna rgyan la sogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan du mas spras par lta'o/ /spro na ri khrod ma dang legs ldan gyis bskor bar bsam mo/ /de la oM gyi 'od kyis ye shes pa dgug gzhug cing dbang du bya'o/ /de nyid la dbang bskur la/ bai ro tsa

nas dbu rgyan no/ /de'i thugs kar 'phags ma mtshon gang ba oM dang bcas par blta'o/ /de nyid las skyo bar gyur na ye shes kyi lha mdun du bkug la phyag dang mchod bstod byas nas thugs ka gnyis su oM la sngags kyis bskor bar dmigs nas/ zhal dang lte bar 'gal

me ltar 'khor bas rang gzhan thams cad kyi nad gdon la sogs pa bsregs par bsams nas/ tar+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ bi sha de bi sha de/ bai re bai re/ badzra d+ha ri/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT/ hUM hUM phaT phaT hUM druM ban+d+ha phaT swA hA/ 'bum la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o/ /

de nas thun mtshams su mdun gyi ye shes pa la dmigs pa'i mdo dang / lha mo legs ldan la gtor ma btang nas/ spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor bya'o/ /'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba 'phags pa

shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya si tA ta pa tre a pa rA dzi ta ba bo ta bi bye nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags ma thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/ /'byung po kun la mnga' mdzad ma'i/ /khro mo'i sku la phyag 'tshal nas/ /stong bzlog gtor ma bshad par bya/ /ba liM gzhal yas khang bsam bri/ /pho brang zlum por bya ba mchog /sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram la/ /

pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyis bskor/ /de bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir ldan/ /kha dog 'jig rten pa dang mthun/ /sgo rgyan la sogs de bzhin no/ /de nas lha rnams dgod par bya/ /dbus kyi pho brang zlum po dang / /yum chen gdugs dkar

'khor lo dang / /tshangs pa lha yi gtso bo dang / /gsol kha'i pho nya las byed pa/ /sring mo ming por bcas pa'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra bzhi la/ /rgyal chen bzhi po rim bzhin dgod/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad po la/ /brgya byin gshin rje klu chen brgyad/ /gnod sbyin rnams ni

rim pa bzhin/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu dgod par bya/ /me lha srin po rlung lha dang / /lha chen brgyad rnams mtshams bzhir dgod/ /de bzhin 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la/ /'byung po dang ni gza' gdon dang / /sa bdag dang ni lha ma yin/ /rim pa bzhin du phyogs bzhir dgod/ /

mi 'am ci dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /ma mo'i tshogs dang nam mkha' lding / /rim pa bzhin du mtshams bzhir dgod/ /lto 'phye dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /klu yi gdon dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir dgod par bya'o/ /de nas g.yos kyi rnam pa ni/ /rak+ka dang ni bo

de tse/ /lung thang dang ni lha yi mig /phreng ba za ba rnams la sbyin/ /'bras chang rgun chang la sogs pa/ /zas su sems 'phrog rnams la sbyin/ /'o ma zho dang kha ra ni/ /srog rnams 'phrog la sbyin par bya/ /shing thog rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /'bras bu za ba rnams la sbyin/ /

bong rtsi zas sgyugs za la'o/ /bdug pa za ba spos sna tshogs/ /mngar gsum sbyar ba mngal za la'o/ /btsos dang rjen pa sha sna tshogs/ /sha za ba la sbyin par bya'o/ /sbrang rtsi mchil ma 'thung ba la'o/ /khur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o/ /gtor ma za ba rnams la sbyin/ /lag pa

sbyin sreg za ba la'o/ /rkang dang rkang mar bcas pa ni/ /rkang za ba la rab tu sbyin/ /'bru ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /lo thog za ba rnams la sbyin/ /thang skyes chu skyes me tog rnams/ /me tog za ba rnams la sbyin/ /la phug sgog btsang la sogs pa/ /mi

gtsang za ba rnams la sbyin/ /tshil ni rul dang ma rul ba/ /tshil za ba la sbyin par bya/ /bya mo'i sgo nga 'byor thang pa/ /zas su snabs za ba la sbyin/ /sha rul yibs sums song ba rnams/ /rnag za ba la sbyin par bya/ /bya pho las byung sgo nga 'di/ /ngar snabs za ba rnams la sbyin/

khrag rnag mang po ji snyed pa/ /zas su khrag 'thung rnams la sbyin/ /sha rnams btsos pa'i zhag rnams ni/ /zas su zhag za rnams la sbyin/ /bu ram shing kun sbyar ba ni/ /btsas pa za ba rnams la sbyin/ /ga pur gur kum la sogs pas/ /zas su dri za ba la sbyin/ /kun gyis lhag

ma bsdus pas ni/ /lhag ma za ba rnams la sbyin/ /chu sna mang po bsdus pa ni/ /stor khung 'thung ba rnams la sbyin/ /sha dang khrag dang sgog btsang rnams/ /bgegs rigs 'khor du gyur la sbyin/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu yi/ /rgyud kyi gdams pas gtor ma sbyin/ /

'di yis nye bar mtshon pa ni/ /kun la mkhas pas shes par bya/ /de la lag pa'i thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+hA/ sarba d+harmaHswa b+hA ba bi shung+d+ho\u0f85haM/ zhes pas phreng ba'i dri ma sbyang ngo / /lag pa'i thal mo khong stong du sbyar la sor mo rnams rtse sprad de/ tshigs zur

can rin bo che'i sgrom bu ltar byas la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga to b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta da khaM ung+ga te sga ra na nyi saM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ phreng ba rgya chen por sprul la rnam pa mi 'gyur ba'i bdud rtsi'i zas phun sum tshogs par bsam mo/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar ba phyir bkyed de/ mthe bo

gnyis bsnol te kha phye la/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT kyis gang mos su bsgyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs nas mdzub mo bsgreng ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ saM b+hA ra saM b+hA ra hUM gis 'dod yon la sogs pa thams cad longs spyod nus par bsam

mo/ /lag g.yas rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bstan la/ g.yon mchod sbyin gyis snod 'debs pa'i tshul du byas nas/ oM dz+nyA na a ba lo ki te/ na maHsa man+ta spa ra Na rasmi b+ha ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma ni du ru du ru/ hr-i da ya dza la ni hUM zhes brjod pas mgron rnams kyis so sor thob cing /

tshim par bsam mo/ /lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ sor mo rnams nang bsnol te/ mthe bong gshibs nas brkyang la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA T+wAM/ gra he shwa ri dza la ni sa ma ya swA hA/ zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /de nyid dbang du bsdu'o/ /bstod cing phrin las la sbyar

ro/ /gtor ma thams cad de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de nas rang las kyi lha mo'i thugs ka'i oM gyi 'od kyis gtso 'khor rnams spyan drang bar bya ste/ hUM bcom ldan gdugs dkar 'khor bcas rnams/ /tshur gshegs 'dir ni bzhugs su gsol/ /mchod yon zhal bsil

bzhes nas kyang / /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+ha mAM/ ga ga na pra ba ra sang+ka ra~M` pad+ma le sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu/ /'byung po gza' gdon sa bdag dang / /lha min mi'am mkha' 'gro ma/ /ma tshogs mkha' lding 'dir

gshegs shig /lto 'phye che dang rnal 'byor ma/ /klu yi gdon dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /spyan 'dren mchod 'bul snyan gsan 'bebs/ /thugs dam rgyud bskul gshegs su gsol/ /oM e bye hi lo ka pA la sa pa ri wA ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes pas dkyil 'khor gye dam

tshig la bstim par bya'o/ /de nas gtso mo ri khrod ma legs ldan 'jig rten pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa la rnam pa lnga dang / 'dod yon lnga lha mo brgyad la sogs pas khyad par mchod la/ rgyud kyi bstod pa bya'o/ /de'i rjes la gtor ma thams cad kyi phud kyis gtso mo la mchod de/

de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams la tshig 'di rnams kyis sbyin par bya'o/ /hUM 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa dang / /de yi btsun mo tshangs ma dang / /tshangs pa'i rgyal mo gtsug phud dang / /dkar mo'i 'od dang mchog 'od dang / /rin chen 'od dang snang ba'i 'od/ /

sprin gyi 'od dang kun du 'joms/ /tshangs pa srid pa 'dzin la sogs/ /tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bstod de mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su phreng ba za ba la/ /rak+ka bo de tse las ni/ /gzhi blangs

pa yi gtor ma ni/ /'jig rten dkon pa'i sman rnams la/ /snying po la sogs sbyar ba 'di/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos shing tshim pas dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /tshe srog 'phrog rnams

bzlog tu gsol/ /nyes pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / /tshe srog bar chad bzlog tu gsol/ /sring mo bzhi dang ming po gsum/ /rnam par rgyal ba mi pham ma/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dril bu ma/ /rgyal bar byed dang sbrang rtsir byed/ /don kun grub dang rgyal byed ma/ /ming sring 'khor

dang bcas pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su gcin 'thung zhes bya la/ /'bras chang rgun chang la sogs pa/ /'bru dang bcud du sbyar ba 'di/ /sring mo ming po 'khor bcas kun/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes

gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyis/ /bza' nyes pa dang bri nyes pa/ /sgom nyes pa la sogs pa yi/ /nyes pa ma lus zhi ba dang / /tshe srog srung zhing rgyas par mdzod/ /rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung 'khor dang bcas pa la

bsngo ba ni/ shar phyogs rgyal po yul 'khor srung / /btsun mo rdo rje yangs byed ma/ /dri za pho mo shugs chen dang / /ut+pal dang ni tsan+dan sogs/ /zur phud lnga la sogs pa yi/ /dri za'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma

mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su srog 'phrog ces bya la/ /'o ma zho dang kha ra dang / /sman dang bcud sbyar gtor ma 'di/ /dri za 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /

dri za'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /tshe srog bar chod bzlog tu gsol/ /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ lho phyogs rgyal po 'phags skyes po/ /btsun mo rdo rje 'dul mkhas ma/ /'khor ni grul bum mgul mdzes dang / /mgul nges

dang ni ma nges dang / /kun du lha dang mngon shes ldan/ /bum lho can dang 'dod pa mchog /grul bum rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su 'bras bu za ba la/ /shing thog sna tshogs gzhi

blangs pa'i/ /'bru dang sman du sbyar ba 'di/ /grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /grul bum gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /tshe srog bar chod bzlog tu gsol/ /

rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ nub phyogs rgyal po mig mi bzang / /btsun mo rdo rje myos byed ma/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams lung dang / /pad+ma chen po rgya mtsho dang / /ma gros 'od zer rgyal ba dang / /glog chen 'byin dang rin chen 'od/ /sog ma

med la sogs pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su sgyugs pa za ba la/ /sbrang rtsi la ni sbyar ba yi/ /rtsi dang bcud du sbyar ba 'di/ /mig mi bzang ni 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /

khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /klu yi gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / /tshe srog bar chod bzlog tu gsol/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ byang phyogs rgyal po rnam thos sras/ /btsun mo rig ma phreng ldan dang / /gnod

sbyin 'dzin dga'i ring po dang / /mig mi bzang dang nyi seng ge/ /seng ge dal rdob ser skya dang / /gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su bdug pa za ba la /spos sogs dri dang spos sbyar

'di/ /byang phyogs gnod sbyin 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /gnod sbyin gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / /nad dang sdug bsngal bzlog tu gsol/ /brgya byin

'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ shar phyogs dbang ldan brgya byin dang / /dri za'i rgyal po tam+bu ra/ /yid 'ong yid dag 'od sbyangs dang / /'jam snyan dbyangs dang nyi zer dang / /yid 'phrog gtso bo la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis

pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su mngal za zhes bya la/ /mngar gsum rtsi sman sbyar ba 'di/ /phyogs skyong dri za 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /dri za'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /

tshe yi bar chod bzlog tu gsol/ /gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gshin rje long ba'i rgyal po dang / /ded dpon rje mo sring mo dang / /ma mo dang ni lha ma srin/ /dus mtshan dang ni sha za mo/ /gshin rje'i rigs kyi gdon rnams la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /

tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma ni/ /zas su sha za zhes bya la/ /btsos dang sha chen gtor ma 'di/ /gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /gshin rje'i gdon tshogs

bzlog pa dang / /pha rol rig sngags bzlog tu gsol/ /klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ klu rgyal dga' bo nye dga' bo/ /mtha' yas 'jog po stobs kyi rgyu/ /rigs ldan dung skyong pad+ma dang / /chu lha nor rgyas la sogs la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /

tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su mchil ma 'thung ba la/ /bong rtsi bcud du sbyar ba 'di/ /klu yi rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /klu gdon thams cad zhi ba dang / /

klu dug rig sngags bzlog tu gsol/ /gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gnod sbyin rgyal po ku be ra/ /'brog gnas mched lnga gang ba bzang / /nor bu bzang dang lag brgya pa/ /lnga rtsen lnga brtsegs phyis la ser/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa/ /phyag

'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su gtor ma za ba la/ /khur ba sna tshogs bcud dang sbyar/ /spyan gzigs sna tshogs bcas pa 'di/ /gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la

phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /gnod sbyin gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /rkyen ngan bar chod bzlog tu gsol/ /me lha 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ drang srong me lha byin za dang / /gnas mchog gnas brtan a ko ta/ /gau ta ma thogs pa'i

dpal/ /gar ldan dang ni phreng ba can/ /drang srong dpal sbyin la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /bsreg bya za ba zhes bya ba/ /'bras kyi lag pan la sogs dang / /'bru dang bcud kyis sbyar ba 'di/ /me lha 'khor

dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /drang srong gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / /dgra bgegs thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ /bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ bden bral

srin po bum rna dang / /gdong pa bcu la khros pa bzhin/ /mche ba zangs mdog drag po la/ /rab gtams dang ni 'jigs pa ltar/ /srin po drag byed la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su rkang za zhes bya

la/ /rkang dang rus pa sna tshogs dang / /khur ba la sogs sbyar ba 'di/ /srin po 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /srin po'i tshogs rnams bzlog pa dang / /tshe srog bar

chad bzlog tu gsol/ /rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ rlung lha bai dur ram pa dang / /phreng ba can dang 'jig rten sprin/ /rlung gi lha dang 'jigs byed dang / /tshangs chen dang ni kun du mgyogs/ /rlung lha rnam par 'thor byed dang / /rlung phyogs

gdon la sogs pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su lo tog za ba la/ /'bras dang nas dang snye ma dang / /gang du 'bru gtsang byas pa 'di/ /rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur

cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /rlung lha'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /lo nyes la sogs gdon rnams bzlog /dbang phyug chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ dbang phyug ma hA de ba dang / /btsun mo u ma de ba gnyis/ /

dga' byed dbang phyug b+h+r-ij+gi ri/ /tshogs bdag gzhon nu smin drug dang / /pa tra ba la nAb+ti kar/ /ma hA kA la sha ri sogs/ /de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su me tog za ba la/ /chu dang thang las skyes pa yi/ /me tog

rtsi bcud sbyar ba 'di/ /lha chen brgyad po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /lha yi gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / /rims nad thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ /'byung bo'i bdag po 'khor

dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dang / /log 'dren sna 'dren mdung thung dang / /gshol mda' can dang gtun shing dang / /'khrug byed snya drag yang dag 'gugs/ /'byung po 'khor bcas la sogs pas/ /de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /

tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su mi gtsang za ba la/ /'byung po'i kha zas sgog tsong dang / /la phug 'bras la sogs pa la/ /rgyu dang rkyen du sbyar ba 'di/ /'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag

cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /'byung po'i gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /bgegs kyi bsam ngan bzlog tu gsol/ /gza'i rgyal bo 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gza' chen byi tri pa tra dang / /zla ba nyi ma gza' lag can/ /pa ba sangs dang phur bu dang / /spen pa dang

ni mig dmar dang / /sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa la/ /de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su tshil za zhes bya la/ /phyi tshil nang tshil la sogs pa/ /bcud dang len du sbyar ba 'di/ /gza' gdon 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos

pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /gza' yi gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /ltas ngan mtshan ngan bzlog tu gsol/ /sa bdag rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ sa bdag rgyal po phag mgo can/ /

sa bdag hong phan the se dang / /be sna lag chen tsang ku dang / /rtsang kun 'khor dang pa rta li/ /sa bdag brtan ma la sogs la/ /phyag 'tshal bsten bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su snabs za zhes bya la/ /bya yi sgo nga la sogs pa'i/ /

srid pa'i rgyu dang sbyar ba 'di/ /sa bdag 'khor bcas thams cad la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /sa bdag gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /tshe dang dbang thang spel du gsol/ /lha ma yin

gyi rgyal bo 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ lha min rgyal bo thags bzangs ris/ /rab gsal dang ni zhi ba'i mchog /thag pa sri dang khra chen po/ /dus kyi 'khor dang dri med po/ /lha min rgyal bo thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma

mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su rnag za zhes bya la/ /sha sums rul pa la sogs pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen du bsags pa 'di/ /lha min 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad

kyi/ /lha min gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / /lo skeg zla skeg bdud skeg dang / /khram skeg la sogs bzlog tu gsol/ /mi'am ci'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ mi ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dang / /chos ldan chos skyong chos bzangs dang / /lha min

phung byed la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su ngar snabs za ba la/ /de pho'i ngar sgong sbyar ba dang / /mi ci'i rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /

bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /gzhan gyi sbyor ba ngan pa dang / /bsam ngan thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ /mkha' 'gro ma 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ mkha' 'gro ma tshogs de bi ra/ /ha pad+ma dang su ka ri/ /bi hi bi dang bi ma ka /be bo ka dang karti ka /ba kar

ta dang mu ha ka /mkha' 'gro chen mo thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su khrag 'thung zhes bya la/ /khrag sna brgya yi gtor ma 'di/ /mkha' 'go chen mo 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes

gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /mkha' 'go'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / /mdangs 'phrog thams cad bzlog tu gsol/ /ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la bsngo ba ni/ ma mo 'dzin mo dzi ma ka /rdo rje gzhon nu lu gu rgyud/ /

pad+ma'i mig dang rigs gser phreng / /rdo rje shugs ldan brgya ldan ma/ /rdo rje pad+mo'i 'od phreng ma/ /ma mo'i gdon tshogs thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su zhag za zhes bya la/ /zhag dang bcud du sbyar

ba 'di/ /ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /ma mo'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / /srog 'phrog sdug bsngal bzlog tu gsol/ /nam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa

la bsngo ba ni/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po la/ /gser mig can dang yan lag 'du/ /rna bdud dang ni 'jigs par 'gro/ /'dab brgyad dang ni gtsug phud can/ /shugs ldan bzang dang yan lag ldan/ /nam mkha' lding gi 'khor bcas la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur

mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su btsas pa za ba la/ /bu ram shing kun la sogs pa'i/ /bcud dang bdud rtsi sbyar ba 'di/ /mkha' lding rgyal po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag

cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /mkha' lding gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /tshe yi bar chad skyab tu gsol/ /lto 'phye'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ lto 'phye'i rgyal po chen po ni/ /mgyogs chen dang ni du ba can/ /la ba can dang hu ta ka /shu bar ka

sna sna bzang dang / /dpung bzangs dang ni 'jigs chen dang / /lto 'phye'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su dri za zhes bya la/ /ga pur gur kum sug smel dang / /li shi dzA ti la sogs pa'i/ /

dri dang sman du sbyar ba 'di/ /lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /lho 'phye'i gdon tshogs zhi ba dang / /gdon gyi bar chad bzlog tu gsol/ /srin po 'khor dang

bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ rnal 'byor srin mo nag mo dang / /sbal mig mo dang rta nag mo/ /srin mo nag mo gnod sbyin mo/ /be con nag mo la sogs la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su lhag ma za ba la/ /kun gyi

lhag ma'i tshogs sbyar 'di/ /srin mo 'khor bcas thams cad la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /ma mo srin mo'i gdon tshogs dang / /mi nad phyugs nad bzlog tu gsol/ /klu'i tshogs

'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ gang+gA'i lha dang sin+d+ra'i lha/ /byams ldan lha dang dbyangs can lha/ /zla ba can dang ya mu ta/ /kun gyi lha dang mgyogs chen lha/ /mtsho steng lha la sogs pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma

mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su gtor khung 'bab 'thung la/ /chu sna brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni/ /bcud dang rtsi ldan sbyar ba 'di/ /chu rlung sna tshogs 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams

cad kyi/ /chu rlung gnas pa'i bgegs gdon dang / /tshe srog bar chod bzlog tu gsol/ /phyogs bzhi'i bgegs chen 'khor dang bcas pa la bsngo ba ni/ shar phyogs khams kyi bdag po dang / /lho phyogs sprin gyi sgron ma dang / /nub phyogs bgegs rgyal rdo rje dang / /byang

phyogs pi nA ya ka la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /tshad ma mchis pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /zas su mi gtsang za ba la/ /khrag dang sha sna sbyar ba 'di/ /bgegs chen bzhi po 'khor bcas la/ /bsngos pas tshim zhing dgyes gyur cig /khyed la phrin las zhu ba

ni/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kyi/ /phyogs bzhi'i bgegs tshogs zhi ba dang / /bsam spyor ngan pa bzlog tu gsal/ /'byung po ma lus khyed rnams kun/ /so sor gtor ma phul ba 'di/ /rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas su/ /rang rang phyogs su legs par

bzhugs nas kyang / /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / /nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas lhan cig tu/ /gtor ma me tog dri dang bdug par bcas/ /'di dag gsol zhing legs par bsnams nas kyang / /bdag gi las 'di'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /ces

brjod par bya'o/ /de nas b+h+yo 'bag bzhi byas pa'i mdun du bskor bzhi drangs la/ de b+h+yo sngags kyis bsngags te phyogs bzhir bskyal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor bcas la mchod pa dang / rgyud kyi bstod pa la sogs pas bstod nas bdag dang yon bdag 'khor bcas

kyis me tog thogs la/ rgyal mtshan nam/ sku dang dkyil 'khor bcas pa la yang stod pa byed cing bskor ba bya/ nad gdon zhi ba'i gsol ba gdab/ bzod par gsol/ ye shes pa gshegs/ dam tshig pa bsdu/ gtor ma gnod byed kyi phyogs su btang la/ bkra

shis brjod par bya'o/ /de ni mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / byad ka dang / phur ka dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /char chu yang dus su 'bab pa dang / rtsi bcud dang / lo tog la sogs

pa'i 'bru thams cad rgyas pa dang / mi phyugs thams cad 'phel ba dang / mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan+d+ra go mis 'phags pa yi/ /rjes gnang dngos su thob gyur nas/ /gtor chog bshad rgyud la brten brtsams/ /dge des 'gro kun bde thob shog /'phags

ma gdugs dkar mo can gyi gtor ma'i cho ga /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toT+wA Sha si tA ta pa tre nA ma a pa

rA dzi ta d+hA ra Ni sA d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma rdo phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ mthong dang ma mthong la sgrol

ba'i/ /gdugs dkar yum la phyag 'tshal te/ /bdag gzhan don de thob bya'i phyir/ /lo 'dab tsam cig gsal bar bya/ /de la 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ gnas dben zhing yid dang mthun par dang ngo maN+Dal dang mchod

pa bshams la shA khrus bya ste/ lus la dris byugs nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ stan bde ba la gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i steng du oM dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang

'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can dmigs te/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms te stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar stong pa nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i oM dkar po bsams te/

de nyid las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don byas te/ tshur 'dus pa las gdugs dkar po oM gyis mtshan par gyur te/ de las 'od zer lha mo'i sku dang bcas pa 'phros pas 'jig rten thams cad du nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las dgrol te tshur 'dus pas

'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can sku mdog dkar mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa/ sprul pa'i dbu stong phyag stong mnga' ba/ spyan bye ba phrag brgya stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu la mi phyed rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ sa

gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa/ bdag dang gzhan 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis kun nas yongs su bskor te gnas par bsams te/ mchod pa'i tshogs rnams byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas mdun gyi nam mkhar b+hUM

las ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang sems kyi 'byor pa'i rgyan dang ldan par bsgoms pa'i nang du seng ge la sogs pa'i gdan rnams bskyed pa la/ spyan drang ba ni snying ga'i oM gyi 'od kyis bskul te dmigs pa rnams mchod yon gyis bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de yang sangs rgyas

dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang / sprul pa'i tshogs rnams gsal bar dmigs te/ gzhung las byung ba'i phyag rgya dang bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod do/ /de nas gsol ba btab

ste bzlas pa ni bdag dang ye shes kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzlas pa'i yi ge mu tig gi rdog po lta bur bsams te/ spro ba dang bsdu ba'i spyor bas bzlas pa'i skyon spangs te bzlas pa bya'o/ /de yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar

dmigs shing sems can gyi don dran pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas ngal lam gtong bar 'dod na bzlas pa yid kyis 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la phul te/ bdag las kyi lha mos 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste/ bzod par gsol zhing dge ba'i rtsa

ba bsngos nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas lus bsrung bar bya ste ldang bar bya'o/ /langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /rtag tu 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo dran par bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal bar dmigs shing 'byung po'i kha zas spangs te bsgrub

par bya'o/ /srung ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / bzlog pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba dang / dmag dpung gzhom pa dang / dngos grub bsgrub pa dang / ser ba srung ba dang / sri'u gso ba dang / gtor ma btang ba dang / mdze nad gso ba dang / 'jigs

pa skyob pa kun dang po'i phan yon las 'byung ba ltar thams cad bya'o/ /bdag 'dra blo dman so so'i skye bo yis/ /'phags ma mchog la chu yi thigs tsam bstod/ /'di las skyes pa'i bsod nams gang byung bas/ /bdag dang sems can kun gyis mchog thob shog /'phags

pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /de la rang ngam gzhan la srung bar 'dod pas/ dang por gro ga'am

ras sam shing shun la/ gur kum gyis rim pa bzhir gnas par bskor te dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bkod pa'i lte ba la bsrung bar bya ba'i ming srung tshig dang bcas pa bris te/ rtsibs brgyad po dag la ni/ oM r-i Shi ga na nas aSh+Ta na ma'i bar du so sor bris te/ de yang srung

ba'i tshig dang bcas par ro/ /gnyis pa la ni/ tar+ya thA/ oM nas hUM drUM ban+d+ha'i bar du sde tshan brgyad du dgod par bya'o/ /rim pa gsum bar ni zhi bar byed ba'i rig sngags/ tar+ya thA/ hUM nas ma ma'i bar du dgod par bya'o/ /rim pa bzhi par ni thams cad 'joms pa'i rig sngags/

oM a si tA na lArka nas bi sa na ya'i bar du srung ba'i tshig dang bcas pa dgod par bya'o/ /de ltar bris pa de bum pa'am maN+Dal steng du bzhag nas/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bya ste/ 'khor lo'i dbus kyi yi ge las 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo

can 'khor bcas bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas mdun du gzhal yas khang bsams te/ ye shes kyi lha tshogs spyan drangs mchod pa bya ste/ gzungs nas 'byung bas gsol ba btab la/ bzlas pa brgya'am stong ngam ci tsam 'tsham par bya'o/ /de nas 'khor lo yang mchod cing tshangs

pa dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang / legs ldan la sogs pa la gtor ma phul te/ gsol ba btab nas rang ngam gzhan skyes pa'am bud med de phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas/ yungs kar dang bcas pas lus sam mgul du btags na mes mi tshugs

pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan no/ /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /bdag nyid bsnyen pa thob pas 'khrul 'khor 'ching bar 'dod na/ dur khrod kyi ras la khrag dang dug dang lan tshwa dang ske tshe la sogs pa'i khu

bas 'khor lo mu khyud gnyis la bskor ba bris te/ nang ma'i lta ba la bsgrub bya'i ming sa bon gyi yi ge bris pa'i phyi rol du/ tar+ya thA/ oM nas hUM druM ban+d+ha'i bar du bris pa'am mthar che ge mo mA ra ya phaT ces bri'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa la thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags mA ra ya dang

bcas par dgod do/ /de nas grog mkhar gyi sa dang / ba lang gi gci ba dang / dgra'i rkang rjes kyis/ bgegs kyi chu phar 'gram gyis las gzugs brnyan byas te/ de'i snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug ste dong gru gsum du gzhug go/ /de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal

'byor rdzogs par bya/ 'khor lo bsgrub byar bsams pa'i rten la phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa kun bkug cing bcug par byas la/ tshangs pa dang dbang po dang legs ldan drag po la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma byin te/ gsol ba btab nas bzlas pa ni phyag rgya'i tshogs la

sogs pas bsgrub bya bkug cing / bcug nas bcings par bsams te/ de nas ling+ga 'gul ba dang ldeg pa dang g.yo ba la sogs pa byung nas thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags kyis rig sngags bcad phur bas gdab par bya'o/ /tha mar sman ma rlung la 'phyar ba'am/ gan na

bar bya'o/ /yang na ling+ga la bzlas pa bya ste/ chu mig gam/ sbyin sreg gam/ sa gter ram/ ri rtser gtad bya'o/ /'khrul 'khor rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang pha rol gyi dmag bzlog pa ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/

phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas par bsgoms nas/ mdun du 'chi bdag gnas par bsgoms te/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de la bsnun pa'i sbyor ba bya ste/ tshur 'dus pas bdag ye shes kyi bdud rtsis lus la phan gdags par bsams te/ thams cad 'joms pa bzlas par bya'o/ /

ngag bzlog pa ni grog mkhar gyi sa dang / ba lang gi gci ba la bsgrub bya'i ming gzugs byas la/ de'i snying gar sngar gyi 'khrul 'khor bris pa'i mthar/ che ge mo mA ra ya ban+d+ha ya nan bya ba bcug ste bkod nas bcug nas/ gzugs kyi khar thams cad 'joms pa'i

sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar dang phur bus btab ste/ de nas mchod rten rnying pa'am/ lha khang gi them pa'am/ lam rgya gram mam sgrub bya'i yul gyi phyogs su tsha tsha'i 'og tu'am/ yang na rang gi mal 'og tu dong gru gsum pa byas pa'am/ 'og tu bzhag nas bye

mas bkang ste/ g.yam pa la rdo rje rgya gram bris la mnan pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang legs ldan drag po la gtor ma byin la/ 'chi bdag gzhom pa'am/ che ge mo'i ngag bcings shing che ge mo'i srung ma bdag gi dbang du gyis shig ces bsgo bar

bya'o/ /rang srung ba yang thun mong du lha'i nga rgyal gyis bzlas sgom rtag tu bya ba dang / lus la sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gdags so/ /bzlog pa'i thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba ni bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/

grog mkhar gyi sa dang / dur khrod kyi thal ba dang / chu phar 'gram tshur 'gram gyi sa las bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar bris pa'i mthar che ge mo'i 'byung po mA ra ya nan bya ba bkod de/ de'i snying gar bcug nas de la

bdag gi thugs las phyag rgya'i tshogs spros pas bsgrub par bya ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rnga mo la bskyon te/ bkug ste gzugs brnyan la bcug ste/ bcings nas la chas dril te gres mas dkris la/ thod pa'am kham phor kha sbyar sar pa ru bcug ste/

tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / legs ldan drag po la sogs pa la gtor ma byin nas 'byung po 'di dag gi dbang du gyis shig ces bsgo la/ lha khang gi thim pa'am/ lam rgya gram mam/ mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og dong gru gsum du bcug la/ bye ma'am tsher mas bkad nas

rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan te/ bskal par mi thar bar bsam mo/ /bgegs gzir ba ni gzugs brnyan snga ma ltar ram/ 'jag ma la byas te/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar byas te/ de'i mtha' mar che ge mo mA ra ya btags te bris nas/ gtor ma snga ma ltar byin te/ tshangs

pa dang / dbang po legs ldan la sogs pas gnod par byed pa'i 'byung po 'di choms shig ces bskul nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rang dbang med par snga ma ltar bkug bcings nas/ thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags dang yungs kar/ phur bu dang ral gri dang bcas pas

gzir cing tha mar mnan pa'am bsreg par bya'o/ /yang na tha mar mna' chu blud la gtang bar bya'o/ /bgegs bzlog cing gzir ba'i thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /pha rol gyi dmag dpung gzhom par 'dod na/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas 'khrul

'khor mu khyud gnyis pa snga ma ltar ram/ ras dmar po lta bu la bris pa'i mthar che ge mo'i tshogs dang / de dag gi srung ma'i ming gi mthar ban+da ya nan bya ba bris nas phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis de'i srung ma dang / dmag dpung rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bkug nas bstims te/

bcings nas 'thab mtshams su snga ma ltar gnan par bya'o/ /yang na pha rol gyi dmag 'ong ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro dang mchod pa bya ste/ grong

khyer thams cad kyi sgo'am/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /yang na rin po che'i byang bu'am/ gro ga'am/ shog bu la gzungs 'di bris te/ lhar bskyed cing spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa chen po byas nas bskor bar byas/

tshangs pa dang dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa la gtang ngo / /che ge mo'i dmag dpung choms shig pa zhes pas kyang bskul te/ de ltar gzungs du mar bris te/ spyi gtsug tu gdags pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ dmag dpung gi mdun du

bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du bya ste/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa phyag rgya'i tshogs dang / tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pas bskor te/ gnas par bsams shing phyar te 'gro bar bya'o/ /rtag tu mchod cing gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /des ni pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams

zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dmag dpung gzhom pa'i thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na/ gnas yid dang mthun zhing bkra shis par gro ga'am ras la gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa'am/ yang

na rin po che'i sgrom du bcug ste/ maN+Dal gyi dbus su bzhag nas sam dngos grub kyi rten pa dmar ser gyi zho'am/ mar khu'am yang na chang ngam/ zan la sogs pa bzhag nas lha'i rnal 'byor byas te gsol ba btab la/ tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma

sbyin te/ yang gsol ba btab nas dngos grub gsol bar dmigs te bsgom zhing bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam zhig na du ba dang / dro ba dang / 'bar ba kun byung nas 'thungs sam/ zos na tshe ring ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs rgyas pa dang / nam mkhar 'gro ba la

sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na bu 'dod pa gang la las gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs sa ma rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ bskor ba dang mchod pa byed cing tshangs pa la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor

ma sbyin te/ gsol ba btab na bu 'dod pa nges bu rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams kyi stobs kyang dpag tu med pa yang rnyed do/ /dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /yang 'jigs pa las sgrol bar 'dod pas/ gzungs 'di bris te gdugs sam

rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags la grong ngam grong khyer ram skyes pa'am/ bud med kyis mchod pa dang / bskor ba bya ste/ gsol ba btab nas tshangs pa la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma byin te/ gzungs 'di brgya'am stong du bzlas brjod bya ba dang / bris te lus

sam mgul du btags nas rtag tu 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can yid la byed pa dang gsol ba 'debs shing bzlas brjod byas na rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa la sogs ba dang / lha'i gdon la sogs pa dang / mdangs za ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs ba dang / gdon

thams cad kyis byas pa la sogs pa dang / nad dang rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa dang / gcan gzan sbrang bu tre ma la sogs pa las grol ba dang / rims nad thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa las skyob pa'i thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /ser ba

srung bar 'dod pas/ 'khrul 'khor snga ma ltar brgyad byas te/ tha mar ser ba'i 'byung po mA ra ya ban+d+ha ya nan/ bya ba bkod nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bkug bcings nas/ kham phor ram thod par bcug nas/ bsrung bar bya ba'i

yul gyi phyogs mtshams bzhir dong gru gsum du snga ma ltar mnan te/ tsha tsha btabs nas mchod rten brgyad byas te/ de gzungs 'di bris te mchod cing bskor ba byas nas gzhag pa dang / yungs kar la sngags 'bum la sogs pa bzlas te gzhag pa dang / gzhan du yang

bskor ba dang tshangs pa la sogs pa la gtor ma byin te/ gsol ba gdab pa dang / snang srid kyi lha 'dre dang / bar snang gi lha dang / gnod sbyin kun dang / yul de'i lha dang klu la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor mas tshim par byas nas gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas

gzungs la rtag tu mchod cing bzlas pa dang / skabs su mchod pa dang gtor ma gtang zhing sprin la sogs pa byung ba'i tshe bdag nyid lha'i nga rgyal byas te thams cad 'joms pa bzlas shing yungs kar dang bcas pa nam mkha' thams cad phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis gang bas 'joms

par bsam mo/ /ser ba srung ba'i thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /mdze la sogs pa sa bdag gi nad gso ba ni/ dang po lha'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par byas la/ bsgrub bya 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo'i spyan sngar sems bskyed pa dang / skyabs su 'gro ba

bya ste/ gzungs bris nas gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ mchod bstod bya zhing mdun du gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bsams te/ rtag tu khrus bya zhing bzlas brjod bya ba dang / thun mtshams su tshangs pa la sogs pa la

gtor ma byin la gsol ba gdab pa dang / gnod par byed pa la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab par bya ba dang / gdugs dkar mo'i srung ba gdags shing tha mar thams cad 'joms pas bskrad cing gzir ba dang / kun sngar bshad pa bzhin bya'o/ /de lta bu'i gang

zag la ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa gzhung gi phan yon de yang sngon gyi las kyi

rnam par smin pa ma gtogs so/ /rkyen las gyur pa thams cad la/ phan yon ji ltar bshad pa bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nad gdug pa can gso ba'i thabs rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /gtor ma gtang bar 'dod pas/ snod gtsang zhing mdzes pa yid du 'ong

ba'i nang du zan dang / khur ba dang / chan dang / 'bru'i tshogs dang / shing thog dang / rin po che'i tshogs dang / sman dang ldan par bya ste/ de nas bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor pas a kA ros sbyangs te/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis spel la/ bdud rtsi'i

rgya mtshor bsams te/ de'i phyogs rnams su hrIHlas pad+ma'i tshogs bskyed pa la phyogs skyong ba bcu la sogs pa chos kyi srung ma dang / khyad par du tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang legs ldan la sogs 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang bar bya'o/ /yang 'byung po'i gtor ma gnyis pa

la lha'i gdon la sogs pa dang / zas su mdangs za ba kun la sbyin par bya'o/ /de yang lce rdo rjer bsam zhing / sbu gus bdud rtsi thams cad ngoms shing tshim par bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga char bzhin du 'byung bar bsam mo/ /de nas tha mar bzod par gsol te/ gsol

ba btab nas yi ge brgya pa brjod do/ /thams cad gshegs so/ /de yang 'byung po'i gtor ma ni mngal dang / khrag dang / zhag dang / sha dang / tshil dang / rkang dang / btsas pa za ba la sogs pa la sbyin no/ /de yang / 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / gzungs kyi
