lha'i gdon dang / bya ba nas zas su mngal za ba kun gyis sbyin no/ /gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ma hA dza na nyid kyi rang 'gyur yin gsung / /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre nA ma d+hA ra ni bid+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags

pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor nus pa chung gyur zhing / /bsdus pa la mos sems can la/ /tsaN+Da bdag gis legs

bsdus te/ /gzungs kyi cho ga dgod par bya/ /dang por sngags pa dam tshig ldan/ /byang chub sems ldan rab sbyangs te/ /cho ga bsdus rgyas mkhas pa yis/ /maN+Dal chag chag btab steng du/ /dri yi byug pa legs bsgos te/ /dang por dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab brgyad ge sar

bcas pa bri/ /de yi phyir ni bcu drug pa/ /bris te sgo ni gcig pa bya/ /de dbus rin chen khri steng du/ /bum pa mtshan nyid ldan pa gzhag /rgyan dang dri yi sa chus gang bya'o/ /de nas mchod dang gtor ma bsham/ /dang po byang chub sems bskyed la/ /bdun po rnam par dag

pa yi/ /sngon 'gros lha mo bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas dang gtor ma dang / /mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya/ /bum pa mi dmigs b+h+rUM las ni/ /rin chen las grub gzhal yas khang / /dkyil 'khor cho ga nas gsungs pa/ /rim pas bskyed pa rdzogs par bya/ /byin

brlabs ye shes spyan drang dang / /de rjes mchod pas mchod par bya/ /bstod dang gsol gdab bzlas pa bya/ /phar 'phros 'od kyis lha mchod la/ /tshur 'dus bdag gi sdig pa dag /ngo bo chu la rnam pa lnga/ /yang na bzlog pa'i rnam par bya/ /de nas legs ldan chen po la/ /

gtor ma rgyas par byin nas ni/ /slob ma khrus byas stan la 'dug /thun mong khyad par sdom pa kun/ /phog la lha la mchod bstod bya/ /de nas thams cad 'joms pa yi/ /sngags kyis slob ma bsrung bskrad la/ /de nas bum pa'i chu yis ni/ /slob ma'i mgo nas blugs

pa dang / /bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod par bya/ /sdig sgrib dag ste rang gi ni/ /rigs kyis dbu la brgyan par bya/ /de nas me tog mchod pa dang / /dbu rgyan la sogs byas de nas/ /rang gi 'dod don gsol ba gdab/ /bla ma la ni yon phul la/ /rang gi dam tshig brjod

par bya/ /bla mas dkyil 'khor la srung ba'i/ /dam tshig rgyas par bsgrags nas ni/ /byur bsal la sogs rdzogs par bya/ /de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo yang / /cho ga ltar bris bsngags par bya/ /mdor bsdus maN+Dal 'dab brgyad pa/ /byas te gong ltar cho ga bya/ /shin tu bsdus

la bum par ni/ /lha mo nyid sku rdzogs par ni/ /byas te smon lam la sogs bya/ /de nas khrus sogs rgyas par bya/ /des ni phyi nang gnod pa dang / /sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gzhan yang las tshogs ma lus pa/ /kun kyang de

las 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga'i man ngag /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma zangs dkar lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o/ /

@##/ /lha mo gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pas rims bsrung bar 'dod na/ dang po mchod pa dang gtor mas rims kyi 'byung po tshim par byas te/ bden pa'i stobs kyis brjod pa dang gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs

bris te/ bsgrub par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su de gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags te/ mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te/ rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ thun bzhir bsgom bzlas bya'o/ /de yang nyin mtshan dus drug tu gdugs dkar mo 'khor

dang bcas pa la gsol ba gdab pa dang / mchod bstod dang bskor ba byas te/ bum pa'i chus bkru zhing / bsrung ba yang gdags par bya'o/ /dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / mgon po la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas bsgrub

bya gdugs dkar mo'i spyan sngar phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bskor ba thun bzhir bya zhing gdon gyi tshogs rnams la gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab bo/ /khyad par du rims kyi 'byung po la yang gtor ma byin te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /cho ga de lta bu

dang ldan pas thun bzhir gzungs 'don par bya'o/ /tha mar yang 'phags pa la mchod pa dang / srung ma'i tshogs la gtor ma rgya chen po sbyin no/ /rims bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /lha mo gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyugs nad

srung bar 'dod pas/ dang por gor gyi 'byung po la mchod pa dang gtor mas tshim par byas te/ de nas bsgrub bya rnams la thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad cing gzir ba dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo btags te khrus bya ba dang / 'phags pa gdugs

dkar mo can sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ mthar mchod bstod byas te/ gor zhi ba'i gsol ba gdab pa dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa mchod pa dang gtor mas tshim par byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de yang bar skabs su gdugs dkar mo dang srung ma'i tshogs la

gsol ba gdab cing / snyim pa sbyar te bsrung bar bya'o/ /khyad par du gor gyi 'byung po la 'byung gtor gyis mnyes par ba'o/ /de ltar thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rtag tu bsgoms pas mthar phyin pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la mchod bstod byas te/ phyugs

de rnams gnas dben par gnas par bya'o/ /de lta bus ni gor thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gor srung ba'i cho ga slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rnal 'byor pa zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byed par 'dod pas/ dang por sa gzhi shin tu kha dog

dkar bdag ba la thab khung zlum po rgyar khru gang zabs su khru phyed pa/ kha khyer sor bzhi pa dang ldan par bya ste/ de la dri dkar pos byug pa dang / me tog dkar po gtor bar bya'o/ /de yang dbus su pad+ma'i steng du rdo rjes mtshan pa bris te/ kha khyer yang rdo rjes bskor bar bya'o/ /

de nas thab khung du bud shing brtsig pa dang / mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te/ zhi ba'i rdzas til dang / mar dang / ku sha dang / dUr ba dang / nas dang / gro dang / dkar gsum mngar gsum la sogs pa bsags te/ rang nyid khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/

stan bde ba la pad+ma'i 'dug stangs sam/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis kha shar du bltas te gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rang nyid sgrub thabs las 'byung ba ltar lha'i rnal 'byor byas te/ de nas ma hA shU n+ya dza tA dz+nyA nas/ thab dang rdzas rnams stong par byas te/ raM las thab khung

'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang du bsams te/ de'i dbus su seng ge nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du/ sngar bzhin du cho ga'i yan lag gsum gyis gdugs dkar mo can 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa bsang zhing byin gyis brlabs nas mdun du ye shes kyi 'khor

lo spyan drangs te/ mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la/ sreg rdzas rnams gdugs dkar mo'i snying pos bsreg par bya'o/ /rdzas de rnams re re yang bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig tu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la 'bul lo/ /mthar yang mchod pas mnyes shing

tshim par byas nas bzod par gsol te dge rtsar bsngos nas ye shes kyi lha gshegs su gsol la/ dam tshig pa rang la bsdu'o/ /de lta bu'i zhi ba'i cho ga yang nad dang gdon la sogs pa zhi bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o/ /zhi ba'i sbyin

sreg slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi'i gling pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /lha mo gdugs dkar mo'i mngon spyod kyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ nad dang gdon la sogs pa dang por sa gzhi yang gdub cing gas pa dang / rtsub pa la thab khung zur gsum ngos re la khru

re yod pa la zabs su khru phyed pa bya ste/ dbus su 'khor lo la rdo rjes mtshan pa/ kha yang rdo rjes bskor ba/ sa gzhi yang dug dang khrag la sogs pa nag por byugs te/ me tog nag po dang 'bru nag pos gtor ro/ /de nas drag po'i mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams la/ drag po'i

rdzas khrag dang dug dang ling+ga dang / ske tshe dang / rdo phye lcags phye/ zi ra bra'o nag po/ sran ma nag po/ de ltar rdzas bshams nas/ bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor byas la thab dang rdzas rnams stong par bsams te/ dzaM las thab khung gru gsum pa bskyed pa'i nang du/ cho ga gsum

gyis gdugs dkar mo 'khor dang bcas pa drag po'i lhar bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ sreg rdzas rnams yum gyi sngags kyi tha mar mA ra ya

btags te/ khrag dang dug la sogs pas lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la bzod par gsol ba la sogs pa rnams bya'o/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang / dam tshig sems dpa' bsdus nas

rang nyid la bsrung bar bya'o/ /de lta bu de yang gang zhig tshar mchod kyi bar du lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o/ /mngon spyod kyi las slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /de bzhin du sa gzhi ser po la rdzas rnams yang las dang mthun pa

bsags la/ thab khung gru bzhi par rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de bzhin du sa gzhi dmar po la sogs par las dang mthun par rdzas bsags te/ thab khung zla gam byas te/ dbang gi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi'i man ngag go/ /sbyin sreg rdzogs so/ /

@##/ /dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas sri'u gso ba ni/ bud med bu 'dod pa gang dag la la gzungs 'di bris te/ gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas de la mchod pa dang bskor ba bya zhing / tshangs pa dang dbang po la

sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs la sogs pa yang rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas sri'u gso ba slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /

@##/ /rnal 'byor pas bzlog pa'i zor bya bar 'dod na/ dang por rdzas bsags pa ni/ kham sa'i mi mo'i gzugs bzhi'am brgyad dam bcu bya'o/ /de nas sgo nga dang / mda' 'ug pa ma skyer pa ma mde'u can bzhi dang / khrag phor bzhir dug dang zor gyi sna du ma

blugs pa'i snod bzhi dang / dmar gtor cha bzhi dang / mchod pa rnam pa lnga bsham mo/ /de rnams kyang grangs 'byor na bcu bcu/ ma 'byor na brgyad dam bzhi bsag pa ni/ de nas sngags mkhan bcu'am brgyad dam bzhi'am mtha' mar rang gcig pus lus la khrag dang sol

bas byugs te/ gos nag po bgos nas khros pa'i yid kyis gnas te/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor du byas te/ thun drug gam thun bzhir thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i sngags ring dang / 'byung po tshar gcod pa'i yungs kar dang / 'tshe la sngags te/ de rnams la gzer nas bar

bar du nad gdon thams cad la byo zhes bya bas gdab bo/ /de yang gdugs dkar mo can la thun bzhi'am/ drug tu mchod bstod byas te byo ba dang / bzlog par gsol ba gdab ba dang lham srin sde brgyad dang yul lhas gsol ba gdab par bsam mo/ /

de ltar thun bzhi'am drug tu sngags pa de tshes grangs dang gza' skar brtsis te/ dus la bab pa na skyes bu sngags dang ldan pa'am/ cho ga dang ldan pas zor lam phye bar zor bskyal te/ de lta bu yang rang dam gzhan shin tu nyan che na/ nar mar byas pas dus ma yin par 'chi ba

brgyad/ dgra dang bgegs bzlog par des te/ byol sngags bzlas kyang 'gal ba med do/ /bzlog pa'i zor bya ba'i cho ga slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsai t+ya sA d+ha na pi d+hi kra mnA ma/ bod skad du/ mchod rten

sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thun mtshams las dang dang po yi/ /gang zag dag ni sgrub pa yi/ /mchod rten cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams pas dgod/ /dang po gnas khang byi dor

byas/ /mchod pa la sogs bshams de nas/ /rang gi lha yi bskyed rim sgom/ /de nas bden pa'i tshig 'di yis/ /sa yi bdag pos sa blang bya/ /bdag ni gzhan don bsgrub pa la/ /lha mos mchod rten nas slang gis/ /dgyes pas bdag la stsal du gsol/ /zhes byas

brkos te 'dag pa la/ /'od kyis sbyangs te rin chen bsam/ /de nas 'bi 'bi legs byas te/ /mar gyis bskus la skol phor stsal/ /legs bton lha mo rang du bsam/ de la mchod dang gsol ba gdab/ /de rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i sngags/ /rtsa ba'i sngags

nyid kho nas bya/ /de nas na bza' legs gsol la/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor la sogs kun/ /bstims te mchod bstod legs bya ste/ /rten 'brel sngags kyis brtan par bya/ /de nas mchod la gsol ba gdab/ /yon bdag la sogs smon lam gdab/ /de nas

dge 'dun mchod ston bya/ /'byung ba chu rlung nam mkha' dang / /yid kyi bsgrub pa la sogs kun/ /bla ma'i gdams pa ldan pas gdab/ /de ltar mchod rten cho ga ni/ /mdor bsdus pa yi cho ga las/ /grub pas sems can ma lus ba/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal thob nas

ni/ /rim gyis gtsug tor lha mo yi/ zhal rdzogs par ni mthong bar shog /mchod rten bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //zangs dkar lo tsA ba'i 'gyur ro/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/

u Sh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre ho ma bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ /gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ /gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan don mthar phyin lha mo ni/ /gdugs dkar can la phyag 'tshal te/ /lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i

phyir/ /sbyin sreg gis ni tshim par bya/ /dri zhim po'i chus legs par khrus byas nas gos gsar pa bgos te/ rgyan khyad par can btags la bgegs srung ba dang / srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rgyud dag par bya ste/ phyag dang mchod pa la sogs

rgyud dag par bya'o/ /brtsam du rung ba'i sa phyogs su phrin las dang sbyar te/ thab dang rdzas la sogs pa rdzogs par byas la/ /shing gang yin pa btser te/ mchod pa dang sreg rdzas tshogs pa dang / oM badzra dz+wa la raM zhes pas me sbar la de nas stong pa tshad med par bsgoms

te/ oM badzra dz+wa la sarba d+ha rma badzra sarba d+ha rma si te hUM zhes pa'i sgras stong par bsgom mo/ /de'i ngang las 'byung ba ri rab dang bcas pa'i steng du b+h+rUM las me thab gzhal yas khang lta bu'o/ /der a dang zla ba la sa bon gyi yi ge las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa ldan pa 'phros shing

'dus ba las me lha dkar po rgyan kun rdzogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa ag tshom ser la 'khyil ba/ gsus pa che la 'od 'bar ba gzi brjid can/ g.yas rdo rje dang bgrang phreng bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis skyabs sbyin dang / gun+d+he bsnams pa'o/ /thugs ka na raM dmar

po gru gsum gyis mtshan pa'o/ /de nas de nyid dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ tshur byon tshur gshegs 'byung ba che/ /lha yi rgyal po drang srong mchog /sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du/ /'bar ba'i nang du gshegs su gsol/ /

e h+ye ag+na ye ma hA rA dza ga dzaH/ hUM 'byung ba chen po me yi lha/ /lha rgyal drang srong bde ba'i mchog /sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang / /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas yon chab kyis spyan drangs la/ bsang gtor byin te dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de

nas mchod pa dang phyag gis mchod de/ mar gyi dgang blugs phul te/ tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyur pa'i/ /gzi brjid chen po me yi lha/ /sku bcas sku ni dpal dang ldan/ /rngam brjid rgyan ldan las la dbang / /sreg blugs phul bas las rnams sgrub/ /zhi la

sogs pa'i lha dpal te/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las sgrub pa/ /gzi brjid rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bsang gtor phul la/ ag+na ye ha bya ka bya ba ha na ya/ a ti pya ti pya/ sarba pA paM shAn+tiM ku ru zhes pa'am/ oM badzra ag+na ye swA hA/ yam shing 'od la'o/ /oM ag+na

ya swA hA/ mar zhal du'o/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ til dang yungs kar phyag tu'o/ /sarba saM pa de zho dang 'bras chan phyag tu'o/ /a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya/ ku sha gtsug tu'o/ /badzra A yu She/ dUr pa gtsug tor du'o/ /ma hA be+e gA ya/ nas zhal du'o/ /ma

hA g+hasma re/ gro zhal du'o/ /ma hA ba la/ sran ma zhal du'o/ /ma hA puSh+Ta ya/ 'bras so ba zhal du'o/ /ma hA shra ya a ma po ti/ zhes bya bas/ dzA ti pa la dang / tarka dang / bil ba rnams zhal du/ rdzas thams cad me lha'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o/ /u du m+WA ra

la sogs ming dang thog ma tha mar brgyan te bsreg par bya'o/ /dri dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang mchod yon rnams ni so sor dbul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya sarba b+hasmiM ku ru sarba duSh+TAM ma ma hUM phaT shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ me lha gzi brjid skyed pa'i

dgang blugs phul ba/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas me lha'i thugs kar dkyil 'khor pa'am lha rnams dkar po la sogs par bskyed pa las 'od zer 'phros pa las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung dang / rdo rje'i gdung dang /

pad+ma'i gdung dang / glang po'i gdung dang / gzhon nu'i gdung dang / klu'i gdung dang / 'dus pa'i gdung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa dang / rgyal ba'i rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /gtum chen stobs chen 'bar ba mo/ /bgegs tshogs 'joms ma gshegs su

gsol/ /bsang gtor phul te mchod yon gyis spyan drangs la sngags dang phyag rgyas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa 'byung ba'i rim pa brjod par bya'o/ /de nas gong ma bzhin du dgang blugs dang sreg blugs dbul lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM/

a mu kaM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ oM hUM ma ma hUM ni swA hA/ zhes snying po'am nye ba'i snying po'am/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te uSh+NI ShA ya shud+d+he bi ra tsi bi ma ye swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags sam/ rdzas so so'i sngags rnams kyi khyad par gyis dkyil 'khor pa'am/ lha rnams tshim par bya ste/ sdig

pa sreg pa'i sngags kyis bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la smon lam gdab bo/ /bdag gis bcom ldan 'das gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa ji ltar tshogs pa'i mchod pa dang / sbyin sreg rnams kyis mchod pas/ bdag ming 'di

zhes bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad sgrib pa gnyis byang nas/ tshogs gnyis rdzogs te/ tshe 'di nyid du bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par gyur cig ces gsol ba btab la/ gdugs dkar mo can phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la/ phrin las su gsol ba ni/ bdag

dang yon gyi bdag po rnams la nad kyi rigs su gyur pa rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa las gyur pa thams cad zhi bar mdzod cig /gdon gyi rigs su gyur pa gdon stong phrag brgyad cu las thar bar mdzod cig /'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar mdzad

du gsol/ bzod par gsol ba ni/ bdag snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi sems can du gyur pas yo byad ma tshogs pa dang / bdag las dang po par gyur pas sems la dbang ma thob ste/ bying ba dang rgod pa'i dbang gis mi gsal ba dang / cho ga nyams te

lhag chad du gyur pa thams cad bzod pa chen po mdzad du gsol lo/ /de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs te/ rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /gtan du gshegs pa ma lags pas/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du

gsol/ /muHgats+tsha zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /mjug tu me lha mchod pa dang / las bsgrub pa'i sbyin sreg bya ste/ bstod pa ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs dbang mchog gi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal bo drang srong mchog gyur pa/ /ye shes mchog gis nyon mongs

thams cad sreg /'dzin byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzi brjid ldan pa me yi lha/ /'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad pa/ /bdag gzhan don sgrub sa la bzhugs/ /tshangs pa'i sras la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /de nas ye shes kyi me lha gshegs te/

bskyed pa me 'bar ba la bltas te/ oM ma ma hUM ni sarba da ha na badzrA ya che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bya bas brgya'am stong ngam khri'am 'bum mam/ ji srid nus pas bsreg par bya'o/ /bdag gi cho ga'i rim pa 'dis/ /lhag pa'i lha rnams mnyes bya ste/ /srid pa'i brtson

rar nyam thag pa'i/ /'gro kun srid mtsho brgal bar shog /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ /slob dpon rdo rje rnon pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/

Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre nA ma a pa rA dzi ta maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa brgyad la sogs pa las thar zhing / /rang gi don las gzhan 'dod gtsor mdzad pa'i/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga phyi yi don ltar brtsam/ /de la dang por bla ma ni/ /chos bcu la sogs ldan pa la/ /

slob ma dad ldan lha la gus/ /rigs ldan de yis gsol gsum gdab/ /de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rdzas dang yo byad tshogs pa bri/ /tshogs nas bsnyen pa la 'jug bya/ /gnas khang dben zhing nyams dga' ba/ /maN+Dal chag chag mchod sogs dgram/ /

byang chub sems bskyed ldan pa yis/ /bdun po rnam dag sngon 'gro bas/ /rang nyid lha mo'i 'khor lor bsam/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor cho ga las/ /ji ltar 'byung bo bskyed par bya/ /de nas gsang sngags bzlas pa ni/ /rang gi snying gar rab bkod la/ /snying po 'bum

du phrin las bzhi/ /ji ltar rigs pas bzlas par bya/ /yang na dus dang mtshan ma dang / /nus ldan rigs pas sbyar bar bya/ /'khor gyi sngags kyang 'dus par bzhed/ /de ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /de ni sa cho ga bya ba la/ /dang por phyi dang nang dang ni/ /phyogs dang

dbyibs dang kha dog dang / /'byung khungs la sogs rigs kyis brtag /de nas 'jig rten rgyal po'am/ /blon po bdag po ci rigs par/ /mngon pa bdag po tshig gis blang / /mi mngon par gyur sa gzhi ni/ /lha dang sa yi lha mo la/ /blangs te rmi lam la sogs

pas/ /brtag pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o/ /sa bdag la ni mi gnod par/ /rim pas brkos la nyes pa bsal/ /rnam lnga dang bsres 'thas par bcag /yang na 'jig rten gsum 'dul gyi/ /sngags sam las kyi bum pa'i chus/ /nyes pa ma lus dag par bya/ /yang na

lha mo'i rang sngags kyis/ /dag par byas pas gdon dang ni/ /zug rngu'i nyes pa dag par bya/ /yang na 'byung ba rim brtsegs dang / /rang gi sngags kyis gzung bar bya/ /rak+Sha'i sngags sam rang nyid ni/ /'phags mar byas te gsol ba gdab/ /de nas cho ga rim pa yis/ /

bskyed la phyogs bzhir slob ma yang / /lha mo bzhi yi bskyed rim gyis/ /tshig ni 'di skad gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun mchog la yang dag byung / /'phags ma'i

dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs/ /zhes pa brjod par bya'o/ /yang na tshigs bcad brjod par bya/ /de nas bla mas 'khor lo nam mkha' la bteg la rang nyid khros pa'i gzugs/ maM TaM las ni mig nyi zla/ /hUM las rkang pa rdo rjer bya/ /'gying bcas rdo rje gsor ba ni/ /gar

gyi tshul gyis 'di skad brjod/ /lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun nyon cig /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /gal te gang zhig 'da' 'dod na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus kyis ni/ /lus gsum las

gsum dag byas te/ /'di ni de gzhom gzhan du min/ /oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha rod Adz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya wAk+tsi t+ta hUM phaT/ ces brjod la/ bgegs med bya phyir bgegs dgra ni/ /phur bu'i

gzugs kyis gdab par bya/ /de nas lha yi tshogs dang ni/ /gtor ma mchod pas tshim bya ste/ /rab bsrung gnas su bsrung bar bya/ /de nas sa la lag pa ni/ /lan gsum brdabs pas lha mo ni/ /lang tsho ldan pas bsams te ni/ /byin brlabs ye shes gzhug pa

dang / /mchod bstod byas la 'di skad brjod/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang / /sa dang phar phyin lam la ni/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang gyur te/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud sde bcom pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud

kyi stobs/ /pham par bya ste dkyil 'khor bri/ /lha mos gsol te thim par bsam/ /de nas dri yi thig le dang / /mchod pa la sogs rgyas par bya/ /de rjes bum pa rnam pa drug /gser dngul rin chen las byas pa'am/ /sa las byas pa mgrin phra ba'o/ /lto ba che la

nag po yi/ /ra ri med pa'i ras kyis ni/ /kha brgyan mtshan ma legs bris te/ /'bru dang rin chen sman lnga dang / /ldan par byas te me 'od dam/ /dri yi thig le'i steng du gzhag/ /de nas slob ma rgyan dang ni/ /kha dog ldan pa'i rigs bzang dang / /bde gshegs gsang

sngags bsgrub brtson pa/ /don ston de la sdom pa dbog /dge bsnyen dge tshul la sogs pa/ /rim pas byang chub sems bskyed bya/ /de nas sngags kyi sdom pa yang / /sbyin pas dang por 'di skad brjod/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga'i 'khor lo ni/ /'khor ni bzhi char la yang

gnang / /rang rang slob dang ldan pa la/ /theg pa chen por sgrub byed pa/ /kha cig gsang sngags grub don gnyer/ /'di na dkyil 'khor 'jug par byed/ /de las gzhan yang bsod nams 'dod/ /gzhan dag pha rol don du gnyer/ /'jig rten phyi ma mchod bya ste/ /

dad pa mang du byas nas ni/ /blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi/ /tshe 'di'i 'bras tsam 'dod mi bya/ /tshe 'di tsam ni don gnyer ba/ /'jig rten pha rol pa de min/ /skyes bu 'jig rten pha rol gnyer/ /tshe 'di'i 'bras kyang rgyas par 'byung / /zhes pas bla mas spro ba bskyed/ /

rang gi lus la legs bcug ste/ /rang gi snang ba las byung ba/ /ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar gzhug /lan gsum bar du sbyang bar bya/ /de nas slob mas bla ma la/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /dga' chen khyod ni ston pa po/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul

bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum po yang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i tshul mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni gzhug par

mdzod/ /ces pa lan gsum gsol ba gdab/ /de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga ni/ /khyod ni bstan pa'i snod yin no/ /khyod ni yang dag bstan par bya/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /rdo rje gsang sngags mthu yis ni/ /ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /shAkya seng sogs cho ga yis/ /bdud kyi sde ni drag po yang / /dpung chen ma lus bcom pa ste/ /'jig rten rjes su

'jug shes nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /ces pa lan gsum yang na gcig /brjod la yan lag bdun pa rdzogs/ /byas te byang chub sems bskyed bya/ /de yi cho ga las byung ba/ /

shes par bya ste sbyin par bya/ /de nas hUM AHoM gyis ni/ /rdo rje dang ldan thig les mchod/ /de nas rigs kyi sdom pa dang / /bla ma sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /'phags pa'i dge 'dun bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di

zhes bya ba ni/ /dus 'di nas nyid bzung nas su/ /byang chub snying po la gnas par/ /sems can ma lus pa yi don/ /rdzogs par bya phyir sems bskyed bya/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges gnas pa/ /tshul khrims rnam gsum sdom pa dang / /

dge ba'i chos ni sbud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims dang / /so sor bdag gis gzung bar bya/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /de ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam

tshig yin par rgyal bas gsungs/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon bdag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu/ /sbyin

pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus bzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /

mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims bslab pa la sogs dang / /gnyis su med pa'i tshangs spyod dang / /rang gi dam tshig bsrung par bgyi/ /bdag gi bya ba'i las rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni bsgrub bya ste/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /ma bsgral

ba rnams bsgral bar bya/ /ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya/ /dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbyung bgyi/ /thams cad bla med byang chub kyi/ /lam la myur du gnas par bya'o/ /lan gsum du ni zlos su gzhug /de nas byung bsal sdig pa dbyung / /me tog phul te sngags kyis ni/ /

brtan par byas te las kyi sngags/ /rgyal la sogs pas brjod par bya'o/ /so shing a shwad+tha dang ni/ /u dum+WA ra sogs mi 'khyog cing / /srin dang gas chag mi sdug med/ /sor bcu gnyis pa mthe'u chung tshad/ /me tog ldan pa 'char bcug ste/ /byang shar bltas te mi smra

bar/ /ba ko tsam byugs maN+Dal steng / /ltos med rang gi mdun drang bor/ /de yi rtse mo bdag dang nye/ /bltas na mchog gi dngos grub yin/ /phyogs dang mtshams su kha bltas na/ /'bring dang zhi sogs las brgyad 'grub/ /thur bltas sa 'og 'grub pa ste/ /dkyil

'khor phyir ni dngos grub med/ /de nas dri yi chu ni bzang / /blugs te skyor chu blud par bya/ /oM hr-iHbi shud+d+haHsarba pA paM ni tsa saM sho d+ha ya bi kalpa a pa na ya hUM zhes lan gsum brjod la 'thung du gzhug /ngag gi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang / /skud pa dmar po sum bsgril ba/ /mdud

pa gsum ldan rang lhar byas/ /sngags kyis btab la lag par bcing / /hUM las byung ba'i ku sha yang / /sngas dang stan du sbyin par bya/ /de nas mchod pa spro bas chos/ /legs par bshad par bya ba ste/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen pa/ /u dum+WA ra'i me tog ltar/ /brgya

lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo / /sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni rnyed par dka'/ /gang gis mnyam med sems can don/ /bla na med par byed nus pa/ /gnyis med zab mo'i spyod yul ni/ /sems can sangs rgyas thob

byed pa'o/ /dang po bskal pa grangs med nas/ /bsags pa'i sdig pa gang dang gang / /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di mthong bas/ /de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /zhes pas kun la spro ba bskyed/ /slob ma de rnams kun gyis kyang / /seng ge'i nyal

thabs ldan pas su/ /ku sha'i stan la nyal bar bya/ /nang par langs la skal ldan rnams/ /thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /grong khyer dam pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /nang par dus su langs nas ni/ /rmi lam mtshan ma dri bar bya/ /des kyang bzang ngan mthong ba rnams/ /bla ma'i

mdun du brjod par bya/ /mtshan ma bzang bas dngos grub 'grub/ /ngan pa bsrung ba me yi ni/ /las kyis sdig pa gzhom par bya/ /de yi cho ga sbyin sreg bzhin/ /de nas nam mkhar bzhugs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod bstims la/ /mchod dang bstod pa la

sogs bya/ /pus mo g.yas pa sar btsugs te/ /lag tu bdug pa'i spos thogs te/ /'phags ma gdugs dkar lha mo mchog /rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor ni/ /mgon po bri bar 'tshal lags na/ /slob ma rnams

la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das mar bdag ni gus/ /de ni bka' drin mdzad par rigs/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo bya don stsol/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang / /gang yang gsang

sngags lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba ma lus dang / /'byung po byang chub nyer gnas pa/ /gang dag rdo rje spyan mnga' ba'i/ /bstan la mngon par dga' ba kun/ /bdag ni rdo rje che ge ste/ /'phags ma gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji ltar nus pa'i yo byad kyis/ /

'gro ba'i don phyir 'dri lags na/ /thugs brtse bar ni dgongs nas su/ /deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la/ /dkyil 'khor lhan cig gyur pa kun/ /nye ba ru ni mdzad par rigs/ /lan gsum la sogs brjod par bya/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang ldan pas/ /rnal 'byor

rdzogs pas sngar langs te/ /sdig 'joms dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor bteg la thig las bya/ /ras bal la sogs nyes med la/ /tshon lngas legs bsgyur rin chen snod/ /rigs lnga'i sa bon las bskyed de/ /byin rlabs dbang rnams rdzogs par

bya'o/ /a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmAHpar spa ra a nu ga te sarba d+harmAHa t+ya na ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmAHzhes brjod lnga po gcig tu bsgril/ /tshad ni nyis 'gyur la sogs bya/ /de nas dri bzangs kyis sbags te/ /ye shes thig ni mkhas pas gdab/ /bla mas slob ma dza yis

sbyin/ /de nyid sum 'gyur gyis blangs te/ /thig sgras sems can don du ni/ /sangs rgyas mang po bskul bsam bya/ /bla ma nub ste shar bltas nas/ /slob ma nub bltas tshangs thig gdab/ /de ltar g.yas skor gnyis btab la/ /zur dang logs sogs thig gi

cha/ /bla ma'i man ngag ltar bya'o/ /phur bu btsugs la bskor bar bya/ /mtshan min pas ni dngos min 'gyur/ /thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi/ /lhag dang chad las nad du 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul bas ni slob ma'o/ /zur bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi/ /do shal sogs

kyis spras pa ste/ /sgo khyud rin chen rdo rje dang / /rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bur bcas/ /mchod cing bkra shis rdzas kyis brgyan/ /de ltar mdzes pas lhag chad spang / /de nas tshon gyi las bya ba/ /rin chen lnga'am 'byung khungs sam/ /yang na legs par byas pa yi/ /

kha dog lnga ni rin chen snod/ /bzhag la rigs lnga'i sa bon snod/ /bskyed cing bstims la ye shes dgug /gnas gsum brlab cing mchod bstod la/ /oM badzra tsitra sa ma ya hUM/ zhes sogs brgya la sogs pa bzlas/ /de nas bla mas dbang ldan la/ /sogs pa'i

mtshams nas g.yas skor du/ /mdzub re snyoms par drang bar bya/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar dang ljang / /dkar po nang du rim pas so/ /mnyam zhing mi yo ma chad pa/ /bris te rin chen snod kyis dgab/ /me tog dor la slob mas kyang / /ci rigs par ni skyon spangs bri/ /

sbom phras nad dang nor zad byed/ /chad na slob dpon slob ma 'chi/ /yon pos thams cad kyis sdang 'gyur/ /shar dkar lho ser nub byang ni/ /ljang gu'i rnam pa shas che'o/ /dbus kyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /gdugs dang rdo rje bri bar bya/ /de yi phyi rim

'khor lo'i cha/ /dkar por gnas la shar rtsibs la/ /pad sdong phreng ba'i rnam pa dgod/ /lhor ni rin chen dbyug pa la/ /spos snod rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /nub tu rdo rje'i rnam pa la/ /byang du rgya gram dgod par bya/ /shar dang nub tu skyabs sbyin no/ /gru chad dmar po la sogs

te/ /sgo la lcags kyu la sogs dgod/ /lha yi snam bu dag la yang / /phyogs skyong mtshan ma rim pas so/ /tshon gyi rim pa rgyas par bya/ /de nas lha ni mnyes bya dang / /slob ma'i sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /mgon po'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya/ /gzar bu'i tshad dang thab

dang rdzas/ /de rnams gzhan las 'byung bzhin bya'o/ /de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /lus bkrus dri zhim chus byugs te/ /rgyan ldan pas ni mchod rdzas thogs/ /bskor ba byas la slob dpon ni/ /lha mor byas te hUM sgra yis/ /rdor dril ldan pas nang zhugs la/ /

dbus nas sgo yi rim pas su/ /dbye ba byas te bum pa sogs/ /rang rang gnas su dgod par bya'o/ /mchod pa'i tshogs kyang ma lus pas/ /mdzes byas bla ma dam pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed/ /gzhug dang byin rlabs dbang bskur gsol/ /byas

la mchod bstod ston mo bya/ /de nas rtsa ba'i lha dang ni/ /legs ldan la sogs lha rnams la/ /mthun pa'i gtor ma chen po rnams/ /cho ga man ngag ldan pas sbyin/ /de nas slob ma dbang 'dod na/ /lha las tha dad dbye byas te/ /slob ma 'jug tshul dbang bskur rim/ /

dang po dpa' bos blang bar bya/ /de nas slob ma rgyan ldan zhing / /mdzes pa'i gdong yang dar gyis ni/ /bkab ste lag par me tog ldan/ /mkhas pas khrid nas yol ba'i bar/ /bzhag ste bla mas ku sha yis/ /bu khyod su yin ci la dga'/ /dris te bdag ni skal

pa bzang / /gdugs dkar lha la bdag dga'o/ /de nas slob mas bla ma la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon mgon la skyabs su mchi/ /gtso bor lha mor bcas pa yi/ /lha rnams kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon

pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /de nas bla mas 'di skad brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /lha mo gdugs dkar can gyi gnas/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ /de nas dkyil 'khor lha rnams la/ /dad pas

phyag ni bya ba ste/ /oM na ma ste hUM/ na mA mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ de nas slob ma khrus byas te/ shar gyi sgo ru gnas pa la/ /de nas me tog bcas pa yis/ /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la stsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /zhes bya

bla mas de la ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun sogs/ /gong du bshad pa'i sdom pa sbyin/ /oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ /sems bskyed me tog dang bcas pa/ /snying gar bzhag ste sngags 'di brjod/ /oM su ra ste sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM/ /oM a khaM

bI ra hUM zhes pas slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug ste/ slob dpon tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /deng khyod lha mo dang ri khrod pa rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur gyis/ ngas gdugs dkar mo'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gdugs

dkar can dang ri khrod ma rnams kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur la/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos kyi/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ /de la 'khor lo gzhug bya ste/ /lag gis rdo rje spyir bzhag nas/ /

'di ni su yang rung ba la/ /gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na/ /khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje yis/ /rang gi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur/ /de nas bdud rtsi chu blugs te/ /'thung du bcug ste 'di skad brjod/ /lha mo chen po deng khyod kyi/ /snying la yang dag di ring zhugs/ /gal te

tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /zhes bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /oM badzra ud ka Tha oM AHhUM/

deng nas khyod kyi gdugs dkar can nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de khyod kyis bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /khyod ya nga ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do/ /de nas

slob ma'i gtso bo des/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzod la/ /rdo rje ye shes dbab tu gsol/ /de nas bla mas slob ma la/ /lus ngag yid gsum 'byung ba yi/ /'khor lor mdoms su yi ge dz+he/ /dmar ba bsams te 'od zer

gyis/ /lus kyi rdul dang mnyam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bkug la bstim de ni/ /oM badzra A be+e sha ya a a a zhes bya'o/ /yang na A be+e sha ya to Sha ya ra ra ra ra tsa la ya tsa la ya hUM ha a dz+he/ zhes brjod 'gying ba dang bcas pas/ rdzas kyi bdug pas legs bdugs te/ /dril

bu'i sgra dang a na le'i/ /sngags kyang ci mang dag tu bzlas/ /babs gyur lce la yi ge a/ /dmar po bsams te dge mi dge /smros shig bu kun nyams myong zhing / /dris la babs pa brtan bya'i phyir/ /tiSh+Tha badzra hUM zhes brtan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rjes khrid nas su/ /shar

sgo nas ni 'di skad brjod/ /'dir ni bsod nams ji lta bar/ /rigs kyi rim bzhin 'di yi lha/ /'dis ni dngos grub gang yin pa/ /rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur/ /de yi bsod nams gang yin las/ /dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /slob ma'i me tog phreng ba

de/ /pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ /zhes bas me tog lha la dor/ /lha ni gang la phog pa dang / /'grub 'gyur sngags 'dis mgo la bcing / /pra ti gr-ih+na swa mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ /de nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ /mig gnyis su ni oM bsams la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng

khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra Ni tra a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrIHzhes pas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni

gdugs dkar rigs su gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /'gro ba'i phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /dngos grub kun khyod dngos su 'gyur/ /dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang / /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /de nas me tog lhung ba'i lha/ /bstan dang

lha gzhan thams cad dang / /dkyil 'khor de nyid rdzogs par bstan/ /de nas slob ma dang ldan pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te/ /yon dbul dbang bskur gsol ba gdab/ /gdugs dkar can gyi dbang bskur ba/ /'gro ba skyob phyir rdo rje can/ /de ltar yon tan

kun 'byung ba/ /de bzhin bdag la deng stsol cig /ces pa byas te dbang sbyin phyir/ /yungs kar sngags kyis bgegs bzlog la/ /khrus byas rgyan ldan shar sgo yi/ /khri la 'dug la me tog ni/ /sngags kyis lha la dbul bar bya/ /oM pra tIts+tsha ho/ blangs te mgor

bcings sngags 'di brjod/ /oM d+harma kun+da a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM zhes brjod do/ /me tog phreng ba'i dbang 'di yis/ /'dod lha'i dngos grub myur rdzogs te/ /pad+ma can gyi zhing sogs su/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang mnyam par shog /rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas/ /las kyi bum par

chu bsdus te/ /slob ma mi bskyod par byas la/ /glu dang rol mo'i sgra dang ni/ /mchod pa'i tshogs kyis chu blugs shing / /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ lha mo rnams kyi bdud rtsi'i chu/ /bag chags thams cad dag byed pa/ /chu yi dbang bskur dam pa 'dis/ /nyon mongs thams cad dag gyur

cig /lugs 'byung bris pa'i dbu rgyan la/ /rin chen 'byung ldan bcug nas ni/ /bskon la dar dpyangs kyis bcings la/ oM paT+Ta badzra a ral+li ho/ thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /bde gshegs kun gyis bsngags pa dang / /rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang / /dar

dpyangs dbu rgyan dbang bskur ro/ /gser sogs tshad ldan rdo rje la/ /snang ba mtha' yas bkug bstims te/ /slob ma'i lag gtad sngags 'di brjod/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas/ /de ring khyod la dbang

bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis lang / /dril bu ldog pa'i tshad ldan la/ /don yod grub par byas nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon sbyin sngags 'di brjod/ /oM a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tha bI ra sa ma ya/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhed/ /de tshe dril bu sgra sgrogs te/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /mchog gi srid pa

byed par 'gyur/ /kha cig ming dang phyir mi ldog /dbang yang sbyin par byed pa yod/ /de ni thun mong dbang yin no/ /khyad par dbang bskur bstan pa ni/ /gzungs dang 'khor lo phyag mtshan dang / /legs ldan dbang dang bkra shis kyi/ /rdzas dang rin chen nya rin chen/ /seng

ge mda' gzhu ral gri dang / /mthun par sku yi dbang yang bskur/ /de nas bya ba bsrung bya ba dang / /mtshon gyis bra ba dang srung skud gdags/ /phur bus gdab dang bzlas pa yi/ /snang ba bzhin dang srung 'khor gyi/ /cho gas legs par gdags par bya/ /mchod byas lha

rnams gshegs bya ste/ brab pa'i lhag ma chu bor dor/ /rnam lngas thig dbyi la sogs bya/ /rang gis legs par rtogs pa yi/ /gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di/ /bla ma'i drin gyis byung ba ste/ /bsdus byas rgyas pa ma yin pas/ /mkhas rnams lha la bzod

par bya/ /de las byung ba'i dge tshogs zla ba'i 'od ltar bsil ba des/ /myos byed skye bo'i tshogs rnams gdung ba bsil bar gyur nas kyang / /rang gi 'dod pa'i lha mo nyid dang mtshungs pa'i slob mnga' rtogs gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo can gyi

dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /slob dpon mkhas pa pad+ma'i lcags kyus mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ At+yA dzi ta d+hA ra sA ts+tsha bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma

gdugs dkar mo can gyi sA ts+tsha'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pas/ /lus ngag sgrib pa sbyang ba dang / /khyad par bsgrub pa'i las brtson pas/ /tsha tsha bya ba'i rim pa bstan/ /dang po yid dang mthun

pa'i sa phyogs su thang bu bstar bar bya ste/ de ru spos dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags sam/ thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags zlos shing / gtor bas mi gtsang ba'i tshogs thams cad byang ste rin po che'i sa gzhir gyur par bsam/ bgegs yod pa kun rang rang gi gnas su

dengs par bya ste bka' bsgo ba yang bya'o/ /de nas dri bzang po la sogs pa'i chus skyang nu la byas/ me tog sil ma dpag tu med pa bkram la/ mchod pa la sogs pa'i yo byad kun tshogs par bya ste/ gnas khang dang mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba'o/ /de nas bla mas khrus

dang gtsang sbra bya ste/ sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs pas 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du bsam ste/ tsha tsha'i sa brko ba der brtag pa dang / oM AHhUM zhes pa'am/ bkra shis pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mos gang bar byin gyis brlab/ thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags kyis bgegs

bskrad pa dang / lha mo legs ldan la gtor ma byin la gsol ba gdab pa dang / sa bdag la gtor ma byin la bka' bsgo ba bya ste/ de nas ji tsam brko ba'i sa de la seng ldeng la sogs pa'i phur bus phyogs bzhir btab ste/ de yang stod legs ldan nam/ lha mo bdud rtsi

'khyil pa la smad phur par 'dug par bskyed la/ byin gyis brlabs la oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT ces lan gsum bzlas la gdab bo/ /de nas bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i tshon skud rnam pa lnga rigs lnga'i rnam pa'am/ rin chen lnga'i rang bzhin du bsams

la/ oM badzra sU tra sa ma ya hUM phaT ces bya ste/ phur pa'i mtha' ma tshon skud kyis bskor la rang gi rkang pa gar gzhag par rdo rjer lam lam song bar bsam mo/ /yang na sngags de thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bya'o/ /de nas thams cad 'joms pa'i sngags

zlos shing yungs kar gyis gtor ro/ /de nas sa gzhi de rin po cher gyur bar bsams la rang ji tsam 'dod pa brkos te/ de'i sngags kyang oM badzra kha na kha na ya hUM phaT ces bya'o/ /de nas phur bu dang tshon skud bsdus 'o mas bskus te gzhag go/ /sa blang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas

blangs pa rnams stegs bu la sogs par bzhag las brdung ba'i las bya ste/ sngags kyang oM badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT ces brjod cing rdo rje'i tho bas brdung ngo / /de nas spos chu la sogs pa'i chu la oM a mr-i te hUM phaT ces bzlas la/ spos chu dmigs pa las

a dkar por bsam/ de las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i 'od kyis spos chu thams cad khyab ste/ bdud rtsir gyur par bsams te sbru'o/ /de'i sngags oM badzra pra ma rda ya pra marda ya hUM phaT ces byas la sbru'o/ /de nas 'jim pa de bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'di brjod

de/ oM suk+Sh+me suk+Sh+me mu ga te/ shAn+te dAn+te/ nir ku li/ ni ra ba ra Ni/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha yA nu ga te/ ya ba de ya sho dzi ni/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he/ d+harma rA dza ya ba shi he/ sarba bud+d+hA ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA nA ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA te swA hA/ zhes brjod pas rang gi thugs las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phros pas

khams gsum sems can 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can du byas/ tshur la rig sngags la sogs sangs rgyas mchod pas 'jim pa la thim/ zhu nas khyab pas rin po che rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur par bsam ste stegs bu la gzhag go/ /de ni 'jim pa'i bya ba'o/ /

de nas 'bi 'bi bya ste/ de yang oM badzra badzrod b+ha ba ya swA hA/ zhes zlos shing bya'o/ /de nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros sems can gyi sgrib pa gsum sbyangs/ 'phags ma gdugs dkar can du byas/ 'phags pa mchod/ 'dus pas 'bi 'bi la thim pas ye shes lnga'i

rang bzhin gyi shel sgong dag pa'i rnam pa'i gzhal yas khang du bsams te/ de'i nang du yang gdan pad+ma dang seng ge las 'phags ma gdugs dkar can dang phyag rgya'i lha mo la sogs pa bskyed de/ 'di cho ga gsum gyis bskyed do/ /de nas oM las ye shes kyi 'od phyung la gzhal

yas khang du byas te/ gdan nas lha rdzogs pa'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed/ ye shes pa gzhug /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pas so/ /de nas rang gis kyang sbyang ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas 'bi 'bi rnams su oM a na le dang phyag rgya'i sngags sam sa bon rnams kyang gzhug/

gzhan srog shing brtan pa'i gzungs la sogs pa ci rigs par gzhug /rten 'brel dang dri ma med pa la sogs pa yang gzhug go/ /de la mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par bya'o/ /de nas oM d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he dz+wa la swA hA zhes brjod la/ de las lha mo rnams

bskul nas slar yang gzhug ste sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa rdul dang mnyam pas bdag dang sems can sbyangs te gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas mar byug pa ni oM a ra dze pi ra dze swA hA/ zhes brjod la/ byang chub kyi sems kyis bsgom par bsam mo/ /de ni 'bi 'bi bya ba'o/ /thabs

dang shes rab 'brel pa las chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par bzhugs par bsams te skol phor du bcug la/ oM badzra d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA zhes bya'o/ /de nas skol phor shes rab lag pa thabs su bsams te/ brdung ba ni de ni gnyis su med par bsrub par bsams te/

oM badzra mung+ga ra A ko Ta ya hUM zhes pa'am/ rten 'brel lam/ snying po'am/ nye snying la sogs zlos shing gdab bo/ /de nas chos kyi sku las sprul sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi don byed par chos kyi dbyings las 'byung bar bsam ste/ oM badzra d+harmA d+ha re swA hA/ zhes brjod

la 'byung ngo / /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya ma hA su kha badzra su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de las gzugs sku gnyis byung bas 'gro ba thams cad kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par bsam mo/ /de nas gzugs skus ji ltar rigs pa ste/ longs skus dag pa'i sems can gyi

don byed par bsam ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ho ka sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya'o/ /sbrul skus ma dag pa dang po'i las can la sogs pa'i don byed par bsams la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni rma Na kA ya sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya'o/ /de ni tsha tsha gdab pa'o/ /de nas sku

gsum gyi ngo bo dang rang don ni gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so/ /de la ye shes pa bstim pa dang mchod pa la sogs pa yang bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra phru shi swA hA/ zhes pas srog shing gzugs par bya'o/ /de nas sems can shes bcu ldan gyur cig /bstan pa yun

rings gnas par shog /sems can lhag bsam dag pa yis/ /kun bzang smon lam 'jug par shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM pra marda na ye swA hA/ zhes bya ste/ 'khor lo gsum bskon la/ khams gsum sems can ma lus pa/ /stobs dang ma 'dres chos dang ni/

dran pa nyer gzhag rnam thar brgyad/ /ye shes bzhi sogs ldan gyur shog /ces bya'o/ /oM pa da ka laM pa swA hA/ zhes brjod la dar gyi cod pan phul la/ sems can rnams ni ma lus pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la/ /dar dang lhab lhub la sogs pa/

byang chub bar du mchod par shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM pa da ka swA hA/ zhes bya ste/ ba dan phul la/ sems can rnams ni ma lus las/ /phyogs bcur bstan pa'i ba dan gyis/ /'tshe ba med cing chos ldan pas/ /grags pas rgyas par 'gengs par shog /ces bya'o

de nas oM kum+b+hi ra d+h+wa dza swA hA zhes bya ste/ chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan phul la/ 'khor ba ma stong bar du ni/ /bdud bzhi dag las legs rgyal nas/ /ston pa'i bstan pa zab mo dag /mi nub rgyal mtshan thob par shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM pra ma na ye swA hA/ zhes pas gdugs

phul la/ khams gsum sems can ma lus pa/ /nyon mongs tshad pas gdung ba la/ /thugs rje byang chub sems kyi gdugs/ /phub pas bde bas tshim gyur shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM rat+na mA le traM zhes pas me tog phul la/ yang na na maHshrI ya d+ha nu ga ta pra tiSh+Tha ta puSh+pa

ko ta no ta thA ga tA ar+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tar+ya thA/ oM puSh+pe swA hA zhes bya ba ste/ 'khor ba'i sems can ma lus kun/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs thob nas/ /blta bas mi ngoms gzugs kyis ni/ /sems can don rnams rdzogs byed shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas

oM su na d+ha re dza ye swA hA/ zhes byas te gdan phul la/ sems can ma lus sangs rgyas te/ /stobs bcu ldan pa glang po'i gdan/ /mi 'jigs seng ge'i gdan dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rta yi gdan/ /dbang bcu thob pa rma bya'i gdan/ /thogs med shugs ldan mkha' lding

gdan/ /'dod dgu 'byung ba rin chen gdan/ /skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i gdan/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal nyi zla'i gdan/ /gdan rnams myur du thob par shog /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM d+ha ra d+ha ra mi li dza le swA hA/ zhes gzhal yas khang du gshegs su gsol lo/ /ji ltar

chos dbyings dag pa yi/ /gnas su bsam shes bzhud pa ltar/ /bdag sogs sems can thams cad kyang / /dag pa'i gnas su gshegs gyur cig /de nas oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swA hA/ zhes bzhugs su gsol te/ rin chen gzhal yas chos dbyings su/ /sems

can don du brtser dgongs la/ /ji srid sems can byang chub bar/ /de srid du ni bzhugs par mdzod/ /ces bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra d+hA tu sha ri ma tiSh+Thi hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM zhes brjod la/ dbang bskur te rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par bya'o/ /de ni brtan par bya ba'i cho ga

yin no/ /des ni phun sum tshogs pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas slob dpon byang chub sems/ /ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod bya ste/ /bla med sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs/ /sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung zhing / /bdud dang phyir rgol log 'dren tshogs/ /thams cad pham

byas bde la dgod/ /sems can nying mtshams sbyor ba yi/ /nyon mongs ma lus sbyang bar bya/ /nga rgyal ri ni gzhom bya zhing / /skye ba'i ljon shing gcad par bya/ /'chi bdag srin po brlag bya ste/ /ma rig pa yi mun pa bsal/ /lta log yang dag lta la dgod/ /las kyi chu

klung bskam par bya/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho yang bskam ste/ /chos sgron spar zhing byang chub lam/ /bstan par byas te bzod des byos/ /'dod chags me dang zhe sdang mtshon/ /phrag dog 'tshub ma ser sna bdud/ /'jig tshogs bdag gis gzhom par bgyi/ /

sems can bde ba bla med kyis/ /byang chub lam la rab dgod phyir/ /bdag gi sdig bral mthun pa yi/ /dngos grub sna tshogs bdag la stsol/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du byas pa'am/ yang na mchod rten bum par gdugs dkar can dmigs pa de las 'od zer 'phros pas

phyag la sogs pa'i lha mos 'jig rten gyi khams khengs par bya ste/ de dag gi sgrib pa gsum ma lus par dag par bya ste thams cad lha mo'i rang bzhin du byas la/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor dag par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wa k+tsit+ta ma hA sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bstan par bya'o/ /

dung phor du dri chab la sogs pa blugs te/ lag pas bzung la a las zla ba'i rnam pa las 'od zer gyis yon chab bdud rtsir bsams la/ gtso mo nas 'khor la sogs pa'i snying po bzlas te dbul lo/ /de'i sngags/ oM a mr-i ta ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ zhes lan gsum du spyi

bor bzhag la dgang / der ye shes sems dpa' spyan dras te dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /de nas mchod pa lnga yang rang rang gi sngags kyis dbul/ sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad kyis kyang mchod de/ 'dir gzhung mangs kyis dogs pas ma bris so/ /mchod pa bsang ba dang

sbyang ba ni/ oM sarba pU dza pu Sh+pe swA hA/ zhes pas sbyang ngo / /de nas rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pas bstod pa bya ste/ de yang dang po spyir yang bstod pa ni/ 'gro ba rgyud lnga'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gzir ba'i 'gro gzigs nas/ /thugs

rjes sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'joms mdzad pa/ /thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ /sems can khams na bzhugs shing spyod gyur kyang / /chags pas mi gos pad+ma ltar dag pa/ /'dod chags

dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa la/ /thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab grur zhugs nas/ /zhi ba rin chen mchog gling skyel mdzad pa/ /kun gyi ded dpon lha mo khyod la 'dud/ /sems can bkren pa chos kyis phongs gyur pas/ /

ma rig thibs po'i nang du song ba rnams/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshim mdzad pa/ /ye shes sgron ma'i lha mo khyod la bstod/ /sems can las kyi chu bos 'bad pa rnams/ /dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad pa/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad la

'god mdzad pa/ /gsung gi mnga' bdag lha mo khyod la bstod/ /ces pa dang / yang slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis bstod pa'i srid gsum ston pa lha dang mi yis mchod 'os la sogs pas kyang bstod pa bya ste/ de nas yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la bsams pas smon

lam rgya chen po btab ste/ bdag sogs sems can skal ldan 'di rnams kyis/ /chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan bzhengs pas ni/ /dge tshogs ma lus ci yod mdun byas te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha mo thob par shog /'khor los sgyur rgyal mchog gi lus thob

shog /phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du skye bar shog /tshe 'di nad dang gnod pa dang / /'byung po 'khrugs dang gdon kun zhi gyur shog /ces bya'o/ /shar phyogs su gzungs tshar gcig gam/ gnyis sam gsum la sogs pa nye bar bshad pa ltar bklag /rgyas par byed

na/ dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i byang du slob ma 'dug la/ bkra shis kyi dbang la sogs pa bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas bsdu gshegs gtor ma btang ba kun bya/ khyad par du legs ldan gyi mchod pa bya'o/ /de nas dge 'dun gyi mchod ston la sogs pa kun bya'o/ /tsha tsha'i cho ga

'di byas pas/ /khams gsum ma lus sems can kun/ /lha mo nyid dang skal mnyam nas/ /gdul bya'i don la myur brtson shog /tsha tsha'i bya ba slob dpon pad+ma'i lcags kyus mdzad pa rdzogs so// //zangs dkar lo tsA bas tho ling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ uSh+NI Sha b+ha ba si tA ta pa tre bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ rje btsun phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam snang mdzad rigs gtsug tor grags/ /phyag stong spyan stong zhabs

btud nas/ /gzungs kyi rim pa las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /chu klung ngam/ nags tshal lam/ chu bo'i 'gram mam/ ri'i sul lam/ phug gam/ yid dang mthun pa'i yul dben pa bas mtha'i dgon par/ slob dpon gtsug lag mkhas pa chos la

dga' ba bslab pa bsrung ba 'grogs na bde ba/ snying rje can gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las la mkhas pa rmi lam du rtags dang mtshan ma thob pa/ sgrub pa'i grogs po rigs btsun pa chos spyod pa dad pa can snying stobs che zhing brtson 'grus

can/ bsam pa bzang zhing mi skyo ba gzhan gyis brid kyang 'phags pa'i tshul mi gtong ba'i grogs dang lhan cig tu stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sgrub pa'i yan lag ni rdzas me tog dkar po dri zhim pa dang / rtsa ba dang sdong bu la sogs pa sbyar ba'i spos dkar po dang / tsan+dan dkar po'i dri dang /

'bras dkar gyi bshos dang / lug la sogs pa dkar ba las byung ba mar gyi mar me dang / 'bras yos dang / tsan+dan dkar po dang / me tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i ar+g+haM dang / gtsug tor dkar mo'i nye ba'i snying po bzlas pa'i khrus byas la/ snying po'i sngags bzlas te/ stod g.yogs

dang smad g.yogs dkar po bgos nas/ gtsug tor nas byung ba bzhin tshogs gsog pa'i lha mdun du spyan drangs la/ bdun rnam dag byas te/ gtsug tor nas byung ba bzhin du khro mo bcu bdun bsgoms la sngags bcu gsum brjod nas thugs ka'i 'od zer las ra ba dang dra ba dang / bla re

dang me 'od rnams byung ste bsrung bar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge hUM bkod nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas dbyangs yig bcu drug las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM bsam mo/ /de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dkar po

rtse dgu ba bsam mo/ /de nas 'od zer s+pha ra Na hUM zhes pas spro ba dang / saM ha ra na hUM zhes pas bsdus nas/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje dang zhags pa bsnams pa/ bgegs kyi rgyal po bi nA ya ka gdan du bting ba/ sku mdog sngon po sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ rdo rje'i

rgyan gyis brgyan pa me'i phung po'i dbus na bzhugs par bsams la/ de'i snying ga nas nye ba'i snying po'i sngags brjod pas shar la sogs pa me 'bar ma la sogs pa'i khro mo brgyad sprul pa hUM druM hrIHSh+ToM gyis bdag dang khro mo brgyad byin gyis brlabs la snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bzlas nas/

de'i mdun du gdug pa can thams cad tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'khor dbu stong mnga' ba/ phyag stong mnga' ba/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi byed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can 'grel pa nas 'byung ba bzhin bsgoms la/ mchod pas mchod pa dang / gtsug tor dkar mo'i gzungs kyis

bstod pa dang / bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad srung du gsol zhes phrin las bcol la/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs skyong ba bcus bskor bar bsams la/ gtor ma bcu dbul ba dang / gdon thams cad la gtor ma gsum mkha' spyod dang / sa spyod dang

sa 'og na spyod pa'i dbye bas phye ba la mchod pa phul nas gzungs nas 'byung ba bzhin du phrin las bcol la gshegs su gsol bar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas nye ba'i snying po'i 'khrul 'khor bris la rgyal rigs la sogs pa la gdags so/ /yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas grong

dam grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gyi sgor btsugs te/ klog pa bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag la mchod pa chen po byas la/ bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya ba'am/ yang na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal la/ bskor ba bya'o/ /las 'di thams cad la snying

bo dang nye ba'i snying po 'bum sngon du bzlas te/ gzungs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la tshon dkar pos dkyil 'khor bris te/ mchod nas las thams cad shes par bya'o/ /gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can gyi gzungs 'don pa'i cho ga /slob dpon shU raM ga barma badzras mdzad pa

rdzogs so// //zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo la bstod pa/ /srid gsum ston pa lha yi lha/ /mtshungs med bde gshegs shAkya seng ge yi/ /mthon mthing g.yas su 'khyil

ba'i spyi gtsug nas/ /ya mtshan rmad byung lha mo khro rgyal gtso/ /khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra'i mgon med de/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug bkra shis mchog gi lha/ /sku mdog gangs ri'i rtse la nyi shar 'dra/ /zhal mang stong la spyan mang bye ba brgya/ /srid pa'i btson rar sems can nyam

thag pa/ /dus gsum gzigs nas sems can grol mdzad de/ /zhal stong phyag stong spyan stong rnams kyis ni/ /kun la khyab mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud dang bgegs rigs phas kyi rgol ba rnams/ /spyan mang gzigs pas khro gnyar 'ga' ston pas/ /gnod pa'i

rgyun rnams gtan nas 'joms mdzad pa/ /rgol ba tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma rig nor bas bslus pa'i sems can rnams/ /rang gi las nyid rnam par smin pa yi/ /'du ba rnam bzhi'i ri mas nad mi bzad pa/ /zhi mdzad thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ji

ltar khyod kyis sems can mang po la/ /thugs rje mchog gis 'gro don nyer bzung nas/ /srid gsum 'jigs pa che las bsgral gyur cing / /sdug bsngal mang po'i nad las thar mdzad ltar/ /bdag kyang khyod bzhin 'gro ba'i mgon gyur te/ /sems can klu yi zhags pas zin pa dang / /

nad kyi bskal pas nyen pa'i sems can la/ /sdug bsngal sel ba'i skyabs su da gyur cig /'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can la bstod pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre nA ma a ba rA dzi ta u pa de sha /bod skad du/ 'phags pa

de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i nye bar bshad pa/ bcom ldan 'das gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje chen pos sems bskyed de/ maN+Dal legs par byugs te thig le dang me tog gi tshom bu bkram

nas spyan drangs pa dang / mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas legs pa dang ldan pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas maN+Dal la a las zla ba la oM bsams la/ 'od kyis spro ba dang / bsdu ba byas pa las bcom ldan 'das ma gdugs dkar mo zhal gsum ma/ zhal gsum la

spyan gsum gsum yod pa'o/ /sngo ba dang dmar ba ni g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal la'o/ /rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas kyi dang po na gdugs dkar po/ gnyis pa na 'khor lo/ gsum pa na lcags kyu/ bzhi pa na gzhu'o/ /g.yon dang po na rgyal mtshan

'dzin pa'o/ /gnyis pan rdo rje dkar po'o/ /gsum pa mda'o/ /bzhi pa na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ni g.yon pa'o/ /khros pa'i stangs dang bcas pas ma rungs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /'od zer lcags kyu dang 'dra bas ye shes kyi lha dgug pa dang gzhug

pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya'o/ /dbang du bskur ba la bai ro tsa na'o/ /phyag dang mchod pa byas nas sngon du byas te dmigs pa bcu bzhis bklag par bya'o/ /legs pa dang ldan pa la gzungs kyis bstod pa bya'o/ /yang na mdun du dmigs te bstan pa ltar kun yid kyis bya ba yin no/ /

dmigs pa bcu bzhi ni phyag gi dmigs pa dang / thams cad zlog pa dang / ri khrod lo ma can nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ma'i che ba dang / 'jigs pa brgyad bzlog pa dang / gdon chen po nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzlog pa dang / rig sngags gcod pa dang / ma

mo brgyad dang / dam tshig can bcu bzhi'i sngags dang / thams cad bzlog pa dang / nad thams cad bsrung ba dang / thams cad bzlog pa dang / lus la gdags pa dang / 'di dang phyi mar phun sum tshogs pa dang / bu sri dang g.yul zhi ba dang / khyad par du bdag bsrung ba dang / char dbab

pa'o/ /gshegs pa dang bsdu ba byas te/ ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i nye bar bshad pa bla ma rdo rje gad na pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang /

lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ si tA ta pa tre a pa rA ji ta nA ma maN+Da la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa/ /rgyal ba'i gtsug tor las byung ba/ /sprul pa'i rang bzhin lha mo ni/ /sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra/ /phyag stong spyan stong brgya phrag stong / /lha rdzas gos kyis yang dag brgyan/ /bkra shis che ba'i lha mo la/ /de la bstod de

sgrub thabs bri/ /kun la phan gdags rim pa yis/ /gdugs dkar dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis las/ /yid kyi rnam pa bkod pa yis/ /bshad kyis nyon mongs ma dad min/ /yid dga' ba yi gnas dag tu/ /sgrub po dam tshig grogs bcas kyis/ /sa phyogs der ni bsham

pa dang / /bsag pa bum pa lnga sogs pa/ /nus dang sbyar yin de las gzhan/ /rigs dang mi rigs tshogs par bya/ /snying rje chen po rab dmigs pas/ /sems bskyed sngon du song ba yis/ /skad cig sku yis phyogs dang mtshams/ /bsrung dang sngags dang phyag rgyas so/ /snying

gar zla steng yi ge yi/ /'od kyis drang dang sprul nas ni/ /bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs pa dang / /snyan tshig ngag gis bstod pa dang / /phyag 'tshal sngon du song ba yis/ /sems bskyed sdom pa gzung dbang bskur/ /lha rnams bsdus pas lus bsregs te/ /rang bzhin lus su

blta bar bya/ /gnas sdu oM bsam 'gro ba sbyang / /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs pa dang / /'khor lo ma lus rdzogs par bya/ /dkar mo chen mo phyag stong ma/ /dbu stong spyan grangs brgya phrag stong / /lha yi rgyan dang chas rdzogs pa/ /bkra shis che ba'i lha mo'o/ /phyogs ni shar

lho nub byang du/ /drag shul chen mo rab gtum mo/ /'bar ba chen mo stobs chen mo/ /blta dkar sems dang dmar ljang ma/ /g.yas g.yon mthun par phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten dang / /bum pa bzung bas 'gying ba yi/ /nyi zla'i gdan bzhugs bsam par bya/ /

de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ /shar phyogs 'khor lo rnam bzhi la/ /gos dkar mo dang khro gnyer can/ /phreng ba'i pad+ma rdo rje ma/ /sor mo phreng ba ut+pa la'o/ /sngo bsangs ljang gu dmar mo'o/ /lho yi phyogs kyi 'khor lo rin/ /gzhan gyis mi thub sgrog can mo/ /mchod

mo gzi brjid chen mo ni/ /dkar dang ser nag ljang gu ma/ /rdo rje rin chen dbyug pa ste/ /spos dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /nub tu stobs chen lu gu rgyud/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin rigs gser phreng / /dmar dang ser dang dkar ljang ma/ /rdo rje dang ni bgrang phreng bsnams/ /byang du rdo rje rin

chen ma/ /gtsug tor bsgyings ma gser can ma/ /dmar po dkar dang ljang gu ser/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bgrang phreng can/ /sgrol ma dkar mo nam mkha' la/ /bsgyings pa skyabs sbyin bsam par bya/ /pad+ma'i spyan ni 'og tu bsam/ /dkar mo rdo rje skyil krung bcas/ /lha mo 'di dag

thams cad kyang / /yid tsam khros nas gco la gzigs/ /sgo ma mtshams kyi lha mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas rab tu gsal/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang / /me yi mtshams su gnas par bya/ /thams cad pa ni rdzogs pa ru/ /blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya/ /

gtso mo'i thugs kar sa bon las/ /de lta bu nyid bskyed pa yi/ /sa bon 'od kyis 'gro ba sbyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / /mdzad pa ma lus mthar phyin bya/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ /mnyes dang tha dad med par bya/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs te/ /

ma 'dres rab gsal bsgom par bya/ /gtso mo chang gis mchod pa dang / /phyag sogs rdzogs nas bya ba ni/ /'dod pa kun la sbyar bar bya/ /gal te slob mar dbang bskur na/ /sngon bzhin du ni bsgom par bya/ /bum pa sbyang byas zla la oM/ /spro bsdu lha mo bskyed pa dang / /dgug pa

byas nas mchod sogs bya/ /de nas legs ldan mchod pa dang / /bsgo dang las bcol de nas ni/ /sngon du lung de bklag par bya/ /bdun nam 'bum mam grangs med pa'o/ /legs ldan gzungs kyis bstod pa dang / /mchod pas bsgo ba thams cad byed/ /lha mo 'od zhu bdud

rtsi yis/ /khrus dang bkra shis brjod par bya'o/ /dbus bzhag phyogs rnams bcing ba dang / /skud pa lnga yi dra ba yis/ /tshon gyis bcad de dkri ba dang / /rus pa'am bong ba rdo ba la/ /dkris nas gtor te byur bsal bya/ /de nas gtor ma byas nas ni/ /bsrung

ba lus sam mgul du gdags/ /bcings pa lus la dkri ba dang / /phur bu bton nas gdab par bya/ /gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la/ /gur kum dri zhim 'um bu yis/ /skar ma rgyal la bab pa na/ /sngags pas bri ba rdzogs nas ni/ /btags pa tsam gyis bshad pa yi/ /

gnod pa ma lus pa las thar/ /dad ldan 'di ru dbang bskur ba/ /bu 'dod yi dam bcas tsam gyis/ /rnyed de tshe dang bsod nams 'phel/ /bde ba can du nye bar 'gro/ /rgyal la bri ba rdzogs nas ni/ /rgyal mtshan rtse la btags nas ni/ /rim gro chen po btsugs byas nas/ /

mi nad la sogs zlog par byed/ /de ni char 'bab nad med pa/ /klu rnams kyis ni byin gyis rlob/ /'di dag bya ba kun la ni/ /mchod dang gtor mas legs ldan mchod/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa dang / /dge bas sku gnyis rdzogs par shog /bcom ldan 'das gtsug

tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi cho ga'i rim pa/ slob dpon g+hi ri wa tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NISha se tA ta pa tre a pa rA dzi ta sA d+ha na d+hA ra nAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen dang / /rnal 'byor bde bzhi'i tshul ldan pas/ /sa gzhi bkra shis yid 'ong bar/ /maN+Dal ba yi rnam lngas byugs/ /sa yi

cho ga legs byas la/ /thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu ba/ rdo rje phreng ba gru chad dang / /snam bu dang ni gru bzhir bya/ /pad+ma sna tshogs phreng ba dang / /rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /tsan+dan shug pa la sogs pa/ /zhi dang rgyas pa'i shing rnams

la/ gtsug tor rgyal mtshan ldan pa bya/ /de la sngags rnams legs par bri/ /tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ oM Sh+ToM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bdag la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM hUM Sh+Ti ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bdag la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM badzra pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ oM rat+na ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na a ba lo ki te

mUrta ni te dzo ra Shi hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM pad+ma dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM karma sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM phaT swA hA/ rigs lnga'i gtsug tor ro/ /tat+yA thA/ a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai ra

bai ra sau me sau me/ sarba bud+d+hA/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a byeSh+T+r-i te sarba ta thA ga toTI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM phaT swA hA/ hUM ma ma hUM ni swA hA/ gtsug tor dkar mo'i 'o/ /oM ra shi ga Na pra shaste sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM dz+nyA /dzam+b+ha ni ka rI hUM dz+nyA/ ma hA bit+yA/ saM b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hUM dz+nyA/ pa ra bit+yA saM

b+hak+Sha Na ka rI t+t+waM dz+nyA/ sarba duT+wA nAn/ stam+b+ha ni ka rI hUM dz+nyA/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA nAn/ bi d+h+wan sa na ka rI hUM drAM/ tsa tur shI dI nAn/ gra ha sa ha sru Na ma bi d+h+wan sa na ka rI hUM hUM/ aSh+Ta biMsha tI nAn/ nak+Sha tA N+TaM/ pra sA d+ha na ka rI hUM bye/ aSh+NA nAM ma hA gra hA NAM/ bi d+h+wan sa na ka rI hUM drUM/ pad+ma

'dab brgyad gdan stengs su/ /rim bzhin gtsug tor bzhugs su gsol/ /gru chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /sgo bzhi sgo ba phur bu bzhi/ /rig sngags phreng bas bskor te gzugs/ /sgo bzhir ral gri me long dang / /bum pa mda' dang rim bzhin brgyan/ /kha dog lnga

yi rgyan rnams dang / /yungs kar la sogs 'bru lnga bkod/ /de nas/ rig sngags gcod cing mtshams bcad de/ /yan lag bdun pa'i smon lam gdab/ /phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad la/ /bdag la dbang bskur smon lam gdab/ /gnang ba thob nas sngags

'di brjod/ /oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de yis thams cad stong pa'i ngang / /a yi 'od zer 'phro du hUM/ /de las yi ge 'bru gsum 'phros/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun/ /raM gyis bsregs te yaM gis gtor/ /khaM gis bkrus la dag par byas/ /

de nas 'bru lnga 'di 'phros te/ /yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chags/ /khaM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dbus/ /laM las gser kyi sa gzhi chags/ /raM las me yi dkyil 'khor 'phros/ /'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'du las/ /rin chen sna tshogs ri rab ste/ /

rgyu las sna tshogs gzhal yas khang / /gru bzhi sgo bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje pad+mas bskor/ /dbus su rgyu las 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu nyi zla'i bar/ /paM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad de/ /ge sar dbus su bsam pa ni/ /rigs kyi gtsug tor lnga

rnams dang / phyogs bcu'i gtsug tor bcu rnams dang / /sgo bzhir gtsug tor chen po bzhi/ /thams cad yi ge rgyu las bskyed/ /sems can sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yid kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' ste/ /gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems/ /phyi nang snod bcud 'jig

rten khams/ /'byung lnga ye shes lnga rang bzhin/ /thams cad stong gsal rang bzhin med/ /de las 'od 'phros zla ba'i gdan/ /de yi dkyil du yi ge a/ /de dag 'phros shing 'dus pa las/ /thams cad par bu gseg shang gis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams

bkang ste/ /slar 'dus bcom ldan shAkya thub/ /sku mdog gser 'od 'bar ba la/ /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu ste/ /thugs ni ye shes lnga dang ldan/ /de 'dra bde bar gshegs pa'i skus/ /

nam mkha' bar snang sa gzhi rnams/ /til gang bzhin du gang bar bsgom/ /de dag dbu yi gtsug tor las/ /b+h+rUM las gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhi ba'i tshul/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dang po phreng ba rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /'og

ma skyabs sbyin mnyam gzhag can/ /thugs kar bde gshegs gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog ser po dbu rgyan 'khor lo bsnams/ /shar phyogs rdo rje gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dril bu bsnams/ /lho phyogs rin chen gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog sngo skya rin

chen nor bu bsnams/ /nub phyogs chos kyi gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog dmar skya pad+ma bum pa bsnams/ /byang phyogs las kyi gtsug tor ni/ /sku mdog ljang ser rgya gram lcags kyu bsnams/ /de lnga thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /b+h+rUM las gtsug tor chen po bcu/ /

dkar sngo dmar ljang mthing ga dang / /sngo skya dmar nag kha dog bcu/ /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas pa gtsug tor g.yon bum pa/ /re rer 'khor yang bcu bcus bskor/ /'khor lo pad+ma'i lte dbus nas/ /brjid

pa'i tshul du mnyam gnas te/ /phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur yi ge thig le bkod/ /oM AHhUM swA hA/ spyi bo lce dang snying ga dang / /lte ba gsang ba'i gnas rnams so/ /sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las lngas/ /byin gyis brlabs

pa'i cho 'phrul lo/ /oM hUM tAM hrIHha/ spyi bo rna ba g.yas g.yon dang / /ltag pa dpral ba dag tu dgod/ /'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang / /pad+ma rgya gram phyag mtshan sogs/ /rigs kyi bdag pos dbang bskur ba'i cho 'phrul lo/ /rdzogs pa'i sku mchog thugs ka nas/ /

gsang ba'i yi ge 'phru bzhi 'phros/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril/ /tshad med sgo ba chen mo bzhi/ /byams pa snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms so/ /d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke /gaN+d+te mchod pa'i lha mo bzhis/ /bde gshegs kun la mchod par

dmigs/ /byams pa'i lha mos bdug pa dbul/ /snying rje'i lha mos me tog dbul/ /dga' ba'i lha mos mar me dbul/ /btang snyoms lha mos byug pa dbul/ /so so'i sku mchog tshim nas kyang / /bskul don byas nas 'od zer 'dus/ /lha mo de dag thams

cad kyis/ /mig dang rna ba sna lce lus/ /'dod pa'i lha mo lnga 'phros te/ /gzugs sgra dri dang ro reg bya/ /gzugs kyi lha mos spyan la mchod/ /sgra yi lha mos snyan la mchod/ /dri yi lha mos shangs la mchod/ /ro yi lha mos ljags la mchod/ /reg bya'i

lha mos sku la mchod/ /thams cad 'phros te bdag la thim/ /gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du spyan drang ba ni/ phyogs bcu rab 'byams 'jig rten na/ /rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang

bcas/ /gtsug tor chen po 'khor bcas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/ /e bye hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA sarba ta thA ga toTI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM/ rgyal ba 'khor bcas tshur gshegs

gdan la bzhugs/ /rin chen stegs dang seng ge'i khri/ /nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs pa'i gdan/ /ma nyams tshul khrims brtan pa'i gnas 'dir bzhugs/ /pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ srid gsum ston pa mi dang lha yi lha/ /bcom ldan mgon po shAkya seng ge yi/ /mthon mthing

g.yas su 'khyil ba'i spyi gtsug na/ /ya mtshan rmad byung gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku/ /srid gsum 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rnam lnga rim bzhin dbul/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yi/ /dbu rgyan rin chen gtsug tor las/ /thugs rjes sprul

pa'i gtsug tor gdugs dkar sku/ /zhal gcig mche gtsigs ye shes gdong mig can/ /phyag bzhi rigs bzhi nyon mongs bdud bzhi 'joms/ /rang bzhin rgyas pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes dbu stong kha dog cir yang gsal/ /phyag ni 'bum phrag sprul

pa'i phyag mtshan rnams/ /thugs rje go cha cis kyang mi thub gsal/ /'bar ba'i mtshan rtags thugs rje nyi ma ltar/ /thugs rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun la khyab/ /rig sngags drag po phra men tshogs 'joms shing / /log 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams

'dul mdzad pa/ /log pa'i skyon rnams sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya thub pa lcags kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i lte dbus su/ /g+h+rUM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni legs par bskor/ /bsnyen pa 'bum phrag drug bya'o/ /

tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bI re dI re/ badzra d+ha ra di/ ban+d+ha bad+d+hA/ badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ hUM dz+nyA bad+d+hA hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod rnams/ /gsang sngags 'dis ni 'grub par gsungs/ /sngags re yungs kar re rer sprul/ /

bcad dam bskrad nas phur bus rdeg /rin chen lnga sogs bum pa la/ /khro bo'i lha rnams bsgom byas te/ /khrus kyi cho ga legs par bya/ /gtsang ba'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/ /shar phyogs sgo nas phyag 'tshal bshags/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis/ /sangs

rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag

'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i

rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+mo'i

gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir

'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par spong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang / /phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'dzin grub pa rnams

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

legs ldan nag po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bum pa rgyan ldan lnga rnams la/ /gtso bo'i sngags rnams legs brjod cing / /brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya/ /

dbang bskur bsrung ba'i tshig 'di brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir bzlog pa chen mos/ dus thams cad du bdag la dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ oM dus

gsum bde gshegs sprul pa'i sku/ /gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum pa chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i

rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad+mas mngon mtshon rdo rjes mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mkhar bsnams 'joms pa mo/ /drag po'i lha rnams thams cad kyis/ /bdag la srung bar mdzad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod ma/ /gzugs zhi

gzi brjed chen mo can/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje rigs gser phreng / /le brgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags/ /rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /

gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ma/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad+ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis/ bdag la srung bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas phyogs bcu'i gtsug tor rnams kyis dbang bskur/ gsang sngags

brjod/ oM r-i shi ga na pra shasta ya ta thA ga toTI Sha si tA ta pa tre hUM drUM/ a b+h+ri Shiny+tsa hUM/ phyi ma gong gis 'gre/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar mo can/ rdo rje gtsug tor phyir bzlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba

chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya stong mnga' ba/ mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mo sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad pa/ kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol/ /'jigs pa chen po nyi shu las bsrung du
