chos spyod pa rnams la bar chad dang bgegs su gyur pa bdud kyi phyogs thams cad dang / yul phyogs su mi nad dang phyugs nad gtong pa dang than pa dang sad ser la sogs pas ma rungs par bgyid pa dang / gnod pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa mang po ston cing / sems can

la sdang bar sems pa'i gdon bgegs rigs tha dad pa mang po khams dang yul phyogs 'dir rgyu ba mchis so 'tshal dang che ge mo la sngon gyi las kyis 'das pa'am/ 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa'am/ yul phyogs dang / pha tshan dang / rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i

lus dang srog dang / chab srid dang / dbang phyug 'khor dang / yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci mchis pa thams cad gang la gang 'tsham pa'i thabs kyis gdul zhing 'khon dang gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi ba dang

dge ba dang byams pa'i bsam pa can du bgyi zhing sngon chad bkra mi shis pa dang / gnod pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa ci bgyis pa rnams kyang 'jig cing mdor du stsal/ slan chad gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos dgag cing / gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig

chen po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol/ re re nas mchod pa 'bul zhing smon lam gdab pa rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir/ gzungs kyi snying po logs shig tu byung ba lan bdun yan chad bzhi bcu rtsa dgu man chad ci nus su bklag /ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa snga ma bzhin du byas te/ mdor bsdus pa'i gsol ba 'di skad gdab bo/ /ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa sems can las

kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa thams cad rjes su bzung zhing / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sngon

gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa byin gyis brlabs shing dpal gyi mgur nas yang dag par gsungs nas/ phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa rgyas par bka' stsal pa 'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar lhung yang gda'/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda'/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las

yol yang gda'/ nam mkha' ni dog sar 'gyur/ dog sa ni nam mkhar 'gyur/ chab ni zhugs su 'gyur/ zhugs ni chab tu 'gyur/ bser ma ni zhags pas gzung du rung yang gda'i/ lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen nyid thams cad

gzigs pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyis kun du spyod pa la yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur pa ma mchis pa lags na/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba

ba'i tshul bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams te/ mchod nas smon lam gsol ba rdo ci thogs pa'i nyams kyis dpag ste bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig /sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing

bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ da yang gdan 'dzom pa chen pos tshog yongs su rdzogs par bskangs te/ byin gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi don 'bral du mdzad cing stsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag

pa tshad mar gyur ba/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum du bstan du gsol/ 'phags pa rnams la so sor re re nas mchod pa phul zhing smon lam btab pa dang / gzungs kyi snying po bzlas pa rdzogs pa'i 'og tu/ spyir mchod pa dbul zhing bsod nams

dmigs kyis bsngo ba'i smon lam gdab pa/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyir mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs

dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol ba mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de phyag btsal ba dang / mchod cing 'phags pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang / bka' lung dang mthun par smon lam

gsol ba dang / gzhan yang 'phags pa de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba phul ba dang bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang / 'phags pa de dag gi mthu dpal dang byin gyi rlabs kyis/ lha sras kyi zhal snga

nas kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i dngos sdig dang / sgrib pa ci mnga' ba thams cad byang bar gyur cig /sku la bsnyun mi mnga' zhing sku tshe dpag tu med pa ring ba dang / dbu rmog btsan pa dang / chab srid 'byam par rgya che zhing / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das

pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig /mthar yang tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i g.yung drung gi sku chos kyi rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang brnyes par gyur cig /chab 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams cad kyang phyi nang gi

gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing bde zhing skyid pa dang / 'phral yun du legs pa'i chos bzang po la gnas par gyur cig /mnga' ris kyi yul khams thams cad du yang mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / lo nyas dang dgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i

bag ci yang mi 'byung ba dang / char chu dus su bab ste/ lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / bde skyid kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sgo thams cad nas dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig /sgo'i bsod nams bgyid pa la ni mjug

gi bsngo bas so so nas ji ltar dad pa bzhin du bris te 'debs su stsal lo/ /smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'og tu/ gyes khar bzod par gsol zhing slar gshegs par gnas par bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal

gyi rgyal bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla be+e DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom

pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag btsal zhing mchod pa dang / mdo dang mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang / che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang bo'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag par gyur pas ma 'tshal

ba dang / bag ma mchis pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang / mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan la gtsang sbras ma phyed pa dang / mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa la sogs

pa 'khrul zhing nongs par gyur pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na/ thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod par bzhes shing / 'phral yun gnyis su bdag cag la sgrib pa dang gnod par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'phags

pa rnams kyis kyang deng ngam dgung 'di'i bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba phongs shing nyam thag pa'i sems can thams cad kyis phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing bka' stsal pa yang / da dung yang bdag cag la thugs brtse bas yang dang yang du gdan 'dzem par mdzad par dgongs shing / so so'i

sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i don la gshegs su gsol/ mjug 'dir bsngo ba'i tshigs bcad kyang bklag go/ /rdzogs so// //dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po lha sras khri srong lde'u btsan gyi sku tshe bsring ba dang / dbu rmog btsan pa dang / chab srid

mtho ba dang / las sgrib sbyang ba dang / tshogs gnyis spel ba'i ched du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde'i man ngag /slob dpon bo d+hi satwas mdzad//[ ]@##/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi

khyad par rgyas pa'i gzungs bklag pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ lus legs par bkrus la gos bzang po dri ma med pa bgo zhing / kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya/ sems nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i dri

ma med par bya ste/ dkon mchog gi yon tan dang mdo sde'i phan yon la yid ches shing dad pa dang gus pa bskyed/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom/ khyim pa yin na bsnyen gnas kyi khrims gzung / dus bzang po tshes brgyad lta bu la brtsam/ gnas yid du 'ong ba gtsang mar byas la/ gdugs dang rgyal

mtshan mang pos legs par brgyan pa'i nang du spos kyi maN+Dal chen po byas la/ tshon phye'am me tog gis dgram par bya'o/ /lugs sku'am ras ris sam 'jim pa las byas pa yang rung ste/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa bya/ 'khor 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gdan yang bsham/ mchod

ba ci 'byor pa yang bsham ste/ sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar mar me bdun bdun dang / tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan bdun bdun gzhag /gzhan yang spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / lha bshos dang / rol mo'i bye brag dang / rin po che sna bdun dang / bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad dang / bum pa la sogs sta

gon bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba gzhan yang ci nus kyis bklag /gzungs kyi cho ga 'di zhag bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bzhi bcu rtsa dgu snyed du bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar mchod pa bshams pa dang / dge 'dun tshogs nas stan

bde ba la 'dug nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ci nus su bsgom/ de nas langs nas sems can thams cad kyi don du tshad med pa bzhi sgom zhing byang chub kyi sems yid la bya/ de ltar rang gi nus pa dang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pas de ltar byin gyis brlabs par yang bsam/

de nas gnas byin gyis brlab pa ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis/ de

gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa dang / 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams ji ltar sangs

rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam

pa tha gru che ba/ yangs pa reg na 'jam zhing bde ba dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba/ tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po'i dri bsung dang ldan pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du bkram pa/ mtha' rin po che'i pha gus brtsigs pa/ gser dang dngul dang mu tig gi phye ma gram bur bdal ba/

ut+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang pad+ma 'gying zhing ldem pas khebs par gyur cing / chu bya sna tshogs skad snyan pa sgrogs pa/ dga' zhing 'phyo ba lding bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i mtsho dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dag gis mdzes par byas pa rin po che'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa lha'i nor bu

dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang rin po che dbyangs pa/ me tog gi mgo lcogs dang 'bras bu mdzes par chags pas g.yur za zhing ldem pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha 'khrol ba las dam pa'i chos kyi sgra 'byung ba dang ldan pa tshar du sbrengs pas legs par brgyan pa'i sa gzhi la/ gzhal med khang

chen po rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer chen po rab tu 'byung ba/ gnas tha dad pa shin tu rnam par phye ba/ mtha' yas pa rnam par gnas pa/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ khams gsum las yang dag par 'das

pa'i spyod yul 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ shin tu rnam par dag cing dbang bsgyur ba'i rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin

dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa mtha' yas pa rnam par rgyu ba/ chos kyi ro'i dga' ba dang bde ba chen pos brten pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad yang dag par thob par byed pa nye bar gnas pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa'i dri

ma thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams cad yongs su spangs pa/ thams cad kyi bkod pa las lhag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa'i gnas/ dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi bzhon pa yin pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong

pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa nas 'jug pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rgyal po yon tan mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i bkod pa la brten pa'i gzhal med khang chen por gyur pa'i dbus su/ pad+ma'i gdan rin po che'i seng ge'i khri'i stan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs

bar yangs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med

mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla be+e DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sogs

phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad gdan 'dzom pa'i bzhug gnas/ 'phags pa so so'i smon lam khyad par can dang / mnga' thang dang 'tsham par grub pa/ mdzes pa sha stag 'byung bar gyur cig /phyi nang

kun du yang cha rigs dang 'tsham par yang lha dang mi'i yo byad dam pa zhal zas dang / na bza' dang rgyan dang / rol mo la sogs pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang / bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan

klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /'phags pa thams cad kyang 'dzom nas de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig /ces lan gsum bzlas/ yang dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi

rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /ces lan gsum bzlas/ mchod pa'i tshogs byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drangs te/

pus mo btsugs te me tog blangs/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid

sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam

par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad bdag cag la dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs

kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bzang

zhing rlabs che ba/ mthu dang byin gyi rlabs dpag tu ma mchis pa mnga' ba la brten te che ge la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing / gdan

'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / de ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gdul bya'i dbang du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam

par rol pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang / sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can las glengs te/ bdag cag rnams mnga' ris kyi gdul bya phyag mtshan du bzhes pa'i nang du gtogs te/ bka' drin thob pa'i 'phro

mchis pa tsam la brten te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyal ba'i sras po skyabs grol dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas

pa'i mdo bka' stsal pa'i tshe gdan 'dzom par 'dus te/ mdo'i don byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bsgrub par thugs bskyed pa de dag kyang / che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang bo bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na

yang / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa chen pos bkas gtad cing so so nas kyang lha'i tshig bden pas mdongs gsol du

zhal gyis bzhes te/ dam pa'i chos dang 'khor rnam bzhi skyong bar mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di yang lhag par phyag mtshan du bzhes pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor

srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi sras la sogs pa 'phags pa chos skyong ba thams cad kyang / che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs

sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde

'chang ba dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i sems can de dag phyag mtshan du bzhes shing bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon

chen po rgyan 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde

dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po thams cad la yang sngon gyi thugs dam bzang po las glengs te/ che ge mo la

sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / skabs 'dir spyan drang ba'i tshigs bcad bklag /

spyan drangs pa'i rjes la/ so so'i zhing khams nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs te/ gzhal med khang gi dbus su seng ge'i khri chen po brgyad la de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bzhugs/ chos po ti yang bzhugs/ bar gyi snam bu la byang chub sems dpa' gleng gzhi las

'byung ba'am/ yang na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa bzhugs pa'i gdan bsham/ de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / skyabs grol dang / phyag na rdo rje gsum gdan 'dzom pa la sngon gyi thugs dam bskul zhing phrin las mdzad cing bzhugs

par bsam/ gsum pa la g.yon gral du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen mo bcu gnyis kyi gdan bsham/ g.yas gral du tshangs pa dang / brgya byin gyi gdan bsham/ sgo bzhi la rgyal po chen po bzhi rang gis dam bcas pa bzhin sgrub cing bzhugs par bsam/ mchod pa dang dkyil

'khor sngar bden pa bdar ba'i tshul dang 'dra bar mos par bya'o/ /de ltar bsams pa'i rjes la spyir phyag 'tshal zhing mchod de/ mchod yon la sogs pa ci 'byor bas so/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod

do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zham 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs

su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs du mas kun nas bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs byang chub

sems dpa'i 'khor du mas kun nas bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas bskor ba dang bcas pa

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ltar snang byed dang / zla ba ltar snang byed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa

dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / skyabs grol dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la sogs te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /'phags pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad la mchod yon dang byug pa/ me tog dang bdug spos/ mar me dang zhal zas/ rol mo dang sil snyan/ gdugs dang

ba dan la sogs pa dngos su ci 'byor pa 'di dag dang / phyogs bcu na bdag pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i lha dang mi'i rdzas dam pa bde ba'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gzungs dang rig pa'i mthu dang mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las byung

ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste/ 'bul lo mchod do/ /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang / bdag cag gi thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mdor na mi bgyi bar rigs pa'i

las ni bgyis/ bgyi bar 'os pa'i las ni ma bgyis pa la sogs pa'i dngos sdig ci mchis pa thams cad yang dag par 'chags so/ /dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i dge ba mtha' dag gi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo / /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams

cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul lo/ /'jig rten gyi sgron ma gang dag mya ngan las bzla ba'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag thams cad la mya ngan las 'da' bar 'jig rten gyi don mdzad cing yun du bzhugs par gsol bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan

'dzom pa chen po dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs la/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/

phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par

rgyas pa rlabs po che ji ltar btab cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / don de nyid da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas ji ltar bka' stsal cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / skyabs grol dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs

pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bka' lung yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / so so'i dgongs spyod rgya chen po rdzogs par bskang ba'i slad du mdo sde'i don bsgrub pa'i phrin las mdzad par 'phags pa'i bka' btags pas zhal

gyis bzhes shing / ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la sogs te/ dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i dge bsnyen chen po thams cad gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mdo sde dang mdo sde

'dzin pa'i sems can bsrung ba dang bskyab par ji ltar zhal gyis bzhes pa la sogs pa/ sngon 'phags pa rnams kyis ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa/ de rnams gdan

'dzom pa mdzad pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor bshams/ 'byor pa'i stobs ci mchis pas mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar nas gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mtshan nas brjod de/ mchod pa 'bul/ bka' drin nod cing mchis na/ gdan 'dzom pas sngon ji ltar byin gyis

brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing phan yon ji skad 'byung ba'i bka' drin thams cad che ge mo la sogs pa bdag cag gis 'phral du thob par stsal bar ci gnang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa rnams la re re nas mchod pa dbul zhing smon lam

gdab par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i mtshan nas brjod de mchod nas smon lam du gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs

sgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas la/ skabs 'dir mchod pa 'bul/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal

po'i mtshan thos te/ yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod pa dang / phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems

can gang dag nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir te/ rims dang / gshed byed dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa de dag thams cad gnod pa dang / nad thams cad 'phral du zhi bar gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du

rims dang sdig pa can gyi gdon dang / nad thams cad med par gyur cig /rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag long ba dang / 'on pa dang / smyon pa dang / sha bkra dang / nad tshabs chen pos btab par gyur pa de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug

gi bar du dbang po thams cad yongs su tshang bar gyur cig /sdug bsngal dang nad thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ bya ba ma yin

pa spyod pa mang ba/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs byed pa/ ngan song gsum dang sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga la

sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing zad par gyur cig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du/ su yang sems can dmyal ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma gyur cig /lha yul ba'i lha'i bde ba dang /

mi'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag dbul por gyur te/ zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / yo byad mi bdog pa de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dbyig dang /

gos dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mal cha dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / yo byad 'phel bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / mtshon cha'i tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su

gzir ba de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcing ba dang / brdeg pa thams cad las thar bar gyur cig /lus kyi gdung ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag mgon med par gyur pa lus la gdung ba'i me 'bar ba dang / seng

ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug pa'i nang du chud de/ srog la bab cing nyam thag pa de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lus la gdung ba'i me thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug pa de

dag kyang byams pa la gnas par gyur cig /'jigs pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i gnas la gnas par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed par gyur te/ 'khrugs shing 'jigs skrag nas

sdangs pa de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /phan tshun byams pa la gnas par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag chu'i nang du son pa grur zhugs pa gling med par phyin nas srog 'dor ba chu

klung dang / rgya mtsho'i nang du son te/ smre sngags sna tshogs 'don pa de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du chu klung chen po de las dbugs 'byin pa phyin par gyur cig /'jigs pa med par rgal bar gyur cig /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye zhing / skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad mngon du gyur te/ ston pa bla na med pa

mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par nod/ thugs mnyes par byed cing skad cig skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'jug par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa 'bul/ deng rgyal ba

sras dang bcas pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+ma rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i mtshan yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod pa dang / phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ bcom

ldan 'das rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag zhing las kyi las kyi mtha' dang / tshong la dga' ste g.yeng ba sna tshogs mang bas dge ba'i chos

byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa las yongs su nyams te/ 'khor ba na 'khyams shing so sor 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /

yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa sna tshogs so sor myong ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas kyi bar du bza' ba dang / bgo ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang gser rnams 'byung zhing / 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /

dge ba'i chos rnams ni rnam par 'phel bar gyur cig /byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /ngan song dang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang

dag grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas lus yongs su gdung zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyam thag pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad yongs su byang bar gyur cig /skye ba de yang tham par gyur cig /bla na med pa'i byang chub tu

sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig /bud med gang dag nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir cing bud med kyi skye gnas la smod pa dang / sems can gang dag btsa' ba'i dus kyi sdug bsngal

gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /skye ba de yang tha mar gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa nyid thob par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag 'chi ba dang / dgra dang dgon pa'i gnod pas gtses pa

dang / phan tshun pha ma dang / sring mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du'i mya ngan myong zhing sdug bsngal ba dang / mya ngan gyi zug rngu lus la zug pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du 'chi ba dang / dgra dang dgon pa'i gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi

bar gyur cig /mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag mtshan mo mun nag na rnam par rgyu ba las kyi mtha' rnam pa sna tshogs la zhugs pa/ sdig pa can gyi gdon sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ 'jigs pa dang / smre sngags

'don pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du mun pa mun nag thams cad med par gyur cig /sdig pa can gyi gdon thams cad las thal bar gyur cig /mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba sna tshogs la mngon par brtson par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can

gang dag dman pa la mos shing / shes rab chung la dran pa rmongs te/ dge ba'i chos rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams pa de

dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du ting nge 'dzin dang / dran pa dang / stobs dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon du gyur cig /shes rab chen po rjes su rgyu bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag dman pa la mos shing

nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'dod pa bskyed de/ de la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog

par gyur cig /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig /byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po zad pa'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling kun du 'bar zhing rab tu

'bar bas 'khrugs par gyur te ngu zhing mya ngan byed la sngon mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal 'byung zhing skyabs med mgon med pa de dag thams cad sdug bsngal dang mya ngan las bral bar gyur cig /bsil ba'i dngos po thob par gyur cig /bsil ba'i dngos po thob par gyur cig /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang / zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye bar gyur cig /skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i yon tan sna

tshogs mngon du gyur te/ ston pa bla na med pa rin po che dang zla ba dang / pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par nod/ thugs mnyes par byed cing skad cig skad cig la

sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du kun du thogs pa med par 'jug par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o

zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i mtshan yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod pa dang / phyag

'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag srog gcod pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs

byed pa/ srog chags sna tshogs kyi srog gcod pa'i las byas pas tshe thung zhing nad mang ba dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / me dang / nad sna tshogs kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su byang ste/ tshe ring bar gyur cig /nad med par gyur cig /

dus ma yin par 'chi dus byed par ma gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs byas te/ gzhan gyi rdzas rkus phrogs pas dbul por skyes te/ sgren mo dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas lus yongs su gdungs

shing / sdug bsngal myong ba de dag thams cad 'phral du sdig pa thams cad byang ste/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dbang phyug phun sum tshogs shing ma tshang ba med pa thob par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag gcig la gcig gnod sems dang ldan zhing

phan tshun srog gcod par byed pa dang / 'thab pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas kyi bar du phan tshun pha ma ltar byams pa la gnas par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug gis bsgribs te/

tshul khrims 'chal bar gyur nas sdig pa kun du spyod cing bslab pa dral la dad pas byin pa longs spyod pas ngan song gsum du lhung zhing sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'phral du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar gyur cig /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa

thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin cing / lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom pa la gnas par gyur cig /byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /tar+ya thA/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ su sid+d+hi/

mo tsa ni mo k+Sha Ni/ muk+te/ bi muk+te /a ma le/ bi ma le/ maM ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ya/ gar+b+be/ rat+na gar+b+be/ sarbA r+tha/ sA d+ha ni/ pa ra mAr+tha/ sAd+ha ni/ mA na se/ ma hA ma na se/ ad b+hut+te/ a t+yad b+hut+te/ b+hI ta b+ha ye/ su bar+Ne/ brah+ma g+ho She/ brah+ma d+yA Shi te/ sarba tra ar+the Shu/ sarba A ba ra

a pa rA dzi te/ sarba tra a pra ti ha ta tsa tuH ShaSh+Ti b+hU ta ko Ti/ b+hA Shi te/ na maHta thA ga tA nAM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa des/ byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te/ sems can 'dod chags dang /

zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang dgon pas gnod par gyur pa/ tshe bskal par thub pa'i sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba'i sems can rnams la gzigs nas/ de dag gi dan du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa dang /

las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par bya ba'i phyir gzungs sngags kyi gzhi gsungs pa 'di bzlas pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad byang bar gyur cig /re ba thams cad yongs su

rdzogs par gyur cig /'chi ba'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pas dgongs par gyur cig /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du

pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye zhing / skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad mngon du gyur te/ ston pa bla na med pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad

las bka' lung yang dag par nod cing / thugs mnyes par byed cing / skad cig skad cig la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'jug par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med

mchog dpal la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal gyi

mtshan yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod pa dang / phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal ba

dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mang ba dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba de dag thams cad mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mang ba de dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /su yang sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal

myong bar ma gyur cig /tshe ring bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can gang dag sdig pa mi dge ba sna tshogs byas te/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po mun pa mun nag chen po can du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ skyes pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan

med mchog dpal gyi sku las 'od zer gyi snang ba byung bas reg cing mthong ba gyur te/ de ma thag tu sdig pa thams cad byang nas sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /

byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag sngon sdig pa mi dge ba bgyis te/ gzhan gyi rdzas phrogs nas dbul por dman pa'i khyim du skyes nas gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang /

rgyan mi bdog pa grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas lus gzir zhing mdog ngan par gyur pa de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bgo ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha thams cad la yang longs spyod par gyur cig /lus

la lha'i lus kyi kha dog gis brgyan par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za rnams kyis gtses shing mdangs phrogs te/ nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du

gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za rnams kyis mdangs phrogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing byams pa la gnas par gyur cig /nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal gyi

sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye zhing skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad mngon du gyur te/ ston pa bla na med pa mya ngan med mchog dpal la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par

nod/ thugs mnyes par byed cing skad cig skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su

mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa dbul/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi mtshan thos te/ yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod de phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i

mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag log par lta ba can gyi khyim du skyes pas/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la ma dad pa/ byang chub kyi sems yid la

byed pa las ring du gyur pa de dag las kyi sgrib pa de zad par gyur nas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du yang dag pa'i lta ba can du gyur cig /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan par gyur cig /byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa las phyir mi ldog

par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa/ yul mtha' 'khob tu skyes te/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rgyus sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag de nas shi 'phos

nas ngan song gsum du ltung zhing dge ba'i chos rnams la nyams par gyur pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi mtshan rna lam du grags par gyur cing chos sprin dang rgya mtsho'i sgra 'byung bar gyur cig /de dag gis chos kyi sgra de thos nas sngon gyi las zad par gyur te/

byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du byang chub kyi sems yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag gos dang / rgyan dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang bral zhing

mi ldan pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong zhing sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag gos dang / rgyan dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / longs spyod rnams bsams ma thag tu 'byung zhing mi ldan pa med par gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug

gi bar du su yang ci dang yang mi ldan pa med par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas phan tshun 'thab mo 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed par gyur cing gcig la gcig gnod par bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba'i phyir btung ba dang /

mtshon dang / mda' dang / dbyig pa dag gis bsnun te/ sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag la mda' dang / mtshon dang / dbyig pa la sogs pa las slar log par gyur cig /phyir phyogs par gyur cig /dgra thams cad kyang byams pa la gnas par gyur cig /su'i srog gi

dbang po yang 'gag par ma gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du rang rang gi rdzas dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dag gis chog shes par gyur cig /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po

seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye zhing skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad mngon du gyur te/ ston pa bla na med pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par nod/ thugs

mnyes par byed cing skad cig skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'jug par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho'i mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa dbul/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i tshogs gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho'i mchog gi blos rnam par

rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa'i mtshan thos te/ yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod de phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par

bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag zhing las dang / sa bon 'debs pa dang / tshong byed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag thams cad kyis bdag gi ming thos nas bdag gi mthus bsams ma thag tu 'tshog chas thams cad

'byor par gyur cig /gnod sems med par gyur cig /rtag tu dge ba'i chos spyod par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dge ba

bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur cig /sems can gang dag dmyal bar ma gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag gzhan gyi dbang du song ste/ chad pas bcad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / bsad pa'i 'os su gyur pa de dag thams

cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bcing ba dang brdeg pa la sogs pa las thar bar gyur cig /bla na med pa'i rang dbang phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba sna tshogs byas te/ 'chi bar

'gyur ba de dag thams cad sdig pa'i las thams cad yongs su byang ste/ tshe thung zhing dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur bas/ nam yang 'ga' yang 'chi bar mi gyur cig /'chi kar de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa'i

mtshan rna lam du grag cing rjes su dran nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du lha dang mi'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la rdzus te skye zhing / skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad mngon du gyur te/ ston pa

bla na med pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par nod/ thugs mnyes par byed cing skad cig skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'jug par gyur

cig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ deng rgyal ba

sras dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos te/ yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod de phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de'i sngon gyi smon lam

khyad par can dang mthun par bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus lus legs par brgyan par gyur te/ bdag ci 'dra ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig /lus kyi 'od zer gyis

'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dpag gis mi lang pa lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur cig /lus nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma med la 'od gsal ba dang / kho lag yangs shing gsal ba dang / dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang /

legs par gnas pa dang / nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs par brgyan par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur te/ sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar du skyes pa dag dang / gang dag yang mi'i 'jig

rten 'di na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na/ phyogs tha dad par 'gro ba de dag gi bdag gi 'od kyis phyogs dga' mgur 'gro zhing las rnams byed par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i shes rab dang thabs dpag tu med pas/ bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gyi

khams dpag gis mi lang ba dag /longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang ldan par gyur te/ su yang cis kyang brel ba med par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag lam ngan par zhugs pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de dag thams cad theg

pa chen po bla na med pa'i lam la zhugs par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du sdom pa gsum gyis bsdams pa dang / tshul khrims nyams pa med par gyur cig /su yang tshul khrims log par zhugs te ngan 'gror 'gro

bar ma gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag lus ngan pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / mdog mi sdug pa dang / bems po dang / yan lag skyon can dang / skur po dang / sha bkra can dang / zhar ba dang / long ba dang / 'on pa dang / smyon pa dang / lus la nad

kyis btab pa de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang nas/ thams cad dbang po tshang zhing yan lag yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /sems can gang dag nad sna tshogs kyis gzing ba/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med pa/ 'tshog chas dang / sman mi bdog pa/ dpung

gnyen med pa/ dbul ba sdug bsngal ba de dag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du nad med cing gnod pa med pa dang / yo byad phun sum tshogs par gnas par gyur cig /bud med gang dag bud med kyi skyon brgya dag gis kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa bud

med kyi dngos po la mi dga' ba bud med kyi skye gnas las thar bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad bud med kyi dngos po las log par gyur cig /byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams

cad bdud kyi zhags pa las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /lta ba tha dad pa mi mthun pa zang zing pas mi mthun pa dag spangs te yang dag pa'i lta ba la gnas par gyur cig /byang chub kyi spyod pa rlabs po che rdzogs par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can su dag rgyal po'i

'jigs pas skrag pa dang / gang dag bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / bsad par 'os pa rgyu du mas kun du gtses pa/ nga rgyal dang bral ba/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthus/ gnod pa thams

cad las yongs su thar bar gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag bkres pa dang / skom pa'i me rab tu 'bar ba/ kha zas tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa/ sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag gi kha dog dang / dri dang / ror ldan pa'i bza' btung gis tshim par byas te/

phyis chos kyi ros shin tu bde ba la 'god par gyur cig /bdag cag la sogs pa sems can gang dag sgren mo bgo ba med pa dbul ba sdug bsngal ba grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag gis nyin mtshan du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag gis gos yongs su

spyad par 'os pa tshon sna tshogs su kha bsgyur ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / spud pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /'phags pa dgyes pa'i

tshul khrims kyi dga' ba dang ldan par gyur cig /nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas mi brdzi bar rnam par grol ba'i bde ba la gnas par gyur cig /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la rdzus te

skye zhing skyes ma thag tu gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad mngon du gyur te/ ston pa bla na med pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad las bka' lung yang dag par nod/ thugs mnyes par byed cing skad cig

skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du thogs pa med par 'jug par gyur cig /ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun

bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa dbul/ deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan yid la dran zhing lan bdun brjod de/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa la sogs pa'i mthus/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can gang dag las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa thams cad rjes su gzung zhing / lha dang mi'i don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i

slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa byin gyis brlabs shing / dpal gyi mgur nas 'di skad du 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ yon tan thams cad don du gnyer ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres par de bzhin gshegs

pa bdun gyi mtshan gzung bar bya/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du yid la bya/ gus pas dad par bya/ sku gzugs kyang bya/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / zhal zas dang / rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas mchod par bya/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i

bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bya/ nyin bdun gtsang mar byas te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam gdab par bya/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems su bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang / tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me/

i mi ne/ mi hi/ ma ti ma ti/ sap+ta ta thA ga ta/ sa mA d+h+ya d+hiSh+Thi te/ a te ma te/ pA le pA paM sho d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba pA paM nA sha ya/ ma ma bud+d+he bud+d+hot+ta me/ u me ku me/ bud+d+ha k+She tra pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+ha me ni d+ha me/ me ru me ru/ me ru shi kha re/ sar+b+ba a kA la mr-i t+d+yu/ nI bA ra Ni/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha

a d+hiSh+Thi te na/ rak+Shan+tu me/ sarba de bAH/ sa me a sa me/ sa ma n+wA ha ran+tu me/ sarba bud+d+ha/ bo d+hi sa twA/ sha me sha me/ pra sha man+tu me/ sarba I t+yu da pa dra ba byA d+hA yaH pU ra Ni pU ra Ni pU ra ya me/ sar+b+ba A sha yA bai DUr+ya pra ti b+hA se/ sar+b+ba pA paM k+Sha yaM kA ri swA hA/ bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i gzungs 'di

rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod dam/ lan stong rtsa brgyad du bton na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sems par 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyis yang dag

par bsrung bar 'gyur/ lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis yongs su skyong bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyis mi btab par 'gyur/ ring du 'tsho

bar 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyi dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ ci bsams pa'i

bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes ji skad bka' stsal pa de dag thams cad che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du mdo las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod cing smon lam gsol ba

dang / gzungs sngags bzlas pas ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du byin gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis 'phral du thob par mdzad cing stsal bar ci gnang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'

yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pa/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ba de bdag cag la bden pa mngon sum du bstan par ci gnang / ma rig mun sel sgron ma mchog /sdug bsngal nad sel sman gyi phul/ /dam chos dkon mchog thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan bdun

bzlas/ bar 'dir chos la bstod pa dang / mchod pa bya/ dam pa'i chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ bdag cag tshe rabs nas tshe rabs thams cad du dam pa'i chos 'dzin par gyur cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa/ thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/ sku yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ ngan song gi

'gro ba sna tshogs 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal dus ngan pa'i sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs

kyis gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ lam dang sa dman par 'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ gang thos pa tsam gyis ci nas kyang bla na med pa'i byang

chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang zhing dag par 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa dang mi bde ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dod dgu'i re ba thams cad dang bsam

pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la dmigs kyis zhu ba mdzad cing / gdan 'dzom pa'i dbus su 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe

slad ma'i dus na/ gang dag mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'drir stsol ba dang / glegs bam la bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrags par bya'o/ /tha na rmi lam du yang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /tshon

sna lnga pa'i ras kyis dkris te/ phyogs gtsang mar bzhag na gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sus kyang

mdangs 'phrog par mi nus te phrogs na yang slar 'phrog par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa gsungs shing / 'phags pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te/

mchod pa bzhes shing de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa la thugs dam las glengs te bskul ba dang / mdo sde'i cho ga rdzogs par bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ mdo sde'i phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis 'phral du thob par byin

gyis brlab cing stsal bar ci gnang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa skyabs grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa skyabs grol/ dus ngan pa'i

sems can phongs shing sdug bsngal ba rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar/ 'di skad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can bro nas nad tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir te/ yun ring por bro nad kyis lus

kyi sha bas shing bkres pa dang skom pas gre ba dang mchu ni bskams/ 'gum pa la ni mngon du phyogs/ mdza' bshes dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams ngu ba rnams kyis ni bskor/ phyogs rnams ni mun par mthong / gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis ni drangs te/ de'i lus 'di na nyal yang rnam par

shes pa chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i mdun du 'khrid cing / mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gang lags pa des dge ba'am mi dge ba bgyis pa de dag thams cad legs par yi ger bris nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la phul ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes de la

dris shing brtags nas dge ba'am mi dge ba ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba la/ gang dag nad pa de'i don du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de la skyabs su mchi zhing 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor bas mchod pa bgyis na de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing /

rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyang 'tshal ba'i gnas ma mchis te/ yang na ni gdugs bdun/ yang na ni gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig /yang na ni gdugs sum cu rtsa lnga/ yang na ni gdugs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing / dran pa rnyed la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i

las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gi mngon sum du gyur te/ srog gi lan du yang sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do/ /mchod pa'i sbyor ba ni btsun pa kun dga' bo gang dag nad las yongs su thar bar 'dod pa de dag gis nad pa de'i don du nyin bdun mtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong

gi sdom pa blang bar bya/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la zas dang skom rnams dang yo byad thams cad kyis ci nus su mchod pa dang rim gro bya/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla be+e DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan yid la bya/ mdo sde 'di yang lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgur

gdon par bya'o/ /zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me bud par bya'o/ /sku gzugs bdun bya'o/ /sku gzugs re re'i spyan sngar mar me bdun bdun gzhag /mar me re re'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du byas te/ ci nas kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgur mar me mi zad par bya'o/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan

bzhi bcu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o/ /btsun pa kun dga' bo rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la nad kyi gnod pa dang / rang ngam pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa'am/ rgyu skar ram/ gza' zla ba'am/ gza' nyi ma'i gnod pa'am/ dus ma yin pa'i

rlung ngam/ char ram than pa'i gnod pa'ang rung / gnod pa dang 'og ba'am 'khrug pa zhig nye bar gnas par gyur na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya/ btson du bzung ba rnams gtang bar bya zhing gong du smos pa bzhin du/

bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla be+e DUr+ya'i 'od de la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas na/ rgyal po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par gyis yul bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / char chu dus su ldang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / nad

med pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /yul de na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang yul der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pas sems can rnams la gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ltas ngan pa thams cad mthong bar mi

'gyur ro/ /rgyal po de'i tshe dang mdog dang stobs dang / dbang phyug rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa bka' stsal pa gsungs shing 'phags pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes bzhin du deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho

brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te/ mchod pa bzhes shing de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa la thugs dam las glengs te/ bskul ba dang / mdo sde'i cho ga rdzogs par bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ mdo sde 'di las phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag

cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab cing stsal bar ci gnang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung

dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ku bai ra la sogs pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i lha'i dge bsnyen thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do/ /skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

phyag na rdo rje dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ku bai ra la sogs pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba'i lha'i dge bsnyen chen po rnams kyis ji ltar sngon gdan 'dzom pa chen po'i spyan sngar/

lha'i tshig bden par mdongs gsol du gsung gcig kho nar 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa yang thos/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mngon sum du bgyis te mchod pa bgyis so/ /yang

bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag spyod pa der bdag cag g.yog dang bcas te mchi bar bgyi'o/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / yi ger

'drir stsal ba der bdag cag mthun par lhan cig mchis te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/ rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa dang / 'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyi rlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang /

phyogs kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /'chi ba dang / dgra dang / dgon pa dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sems can thams cad la byas pa gzo ba lags te/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/ /

'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar bsams pa yid bzhin du 'grub pa dang / sems dang lus bde zhing longs spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /thams cad du bsrung bar

bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rang gi bro bor ba dang / dam bcas pa 'di dag rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des rjes su dran par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a g+hu ma g+hu/ ta ra g+hu/ ma ma g+hu g+hu re/ hA hU te/ mra mra mra mra/ dzu dzu dzu re swA hA/ gang la la zhig de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams dang / gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / rab tu gus par mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ngan song gsum du mchi bar rig par bgyi'o/ /de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las

slar mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar 'tshal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs shing zhal gyis bzhes pa dang / de nas byang chub sems

dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gis gzungs kyi gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi/ dgongs su gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

tad+ya thA/ oM badzre badzre ma hA badzre badzra pA sha d+ha ra Ni/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man+ta a pra ti ha te/ ha ha badzre/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha man+tu me sar+b+ba byA d+hA yaHku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba ka Ni sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ga wAn/ badzra pA Ni/ sar+b+ba A shAM me pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig de

bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskang bar bgyi'o/ /don thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /gal te des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na/

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'drir stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun yang bgyi/ rdo rje 'dzin yang sku gdung dang bcas pa bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yang ji skad gong du smos pa bzhin du/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / phreng ba dang /

rgyan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnams kyis mchod de bskor bar bgyi/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang gdon par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la yang phan pa'i sems su bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen gnas

la gnas te/ lan gsum khrus bgyi zhing / tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ zla ba phyi ma'i bco lnga'i nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ de la bdag gis rmi lam mthong ba stsal bar bgyi/ 'bel ba'i bka' mchid kyang bgyi/ re ba thams cad

kyang yongs su bskang bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phags pa'i bka' mi 'gyur ba tshad mar gyur pas zhal gyis bzhes pa bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs te/ mchod pa bzhes te gdan 'dzom pas mdo sde'i cho ga yongs

su rdzogs par bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad de/ phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo la sogs pa'i

gsung rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang / sgo thams cad nas chos spyod pa rnams la bar chad dang bgegs su gyur pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs su gyur pa thams cad dang / yul phyogs su mi nad dang / phyugs nad gtong ba dang / than pa dang / sad dang ser ba la

sogs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid pa dang / gnod pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa mang po ston cing sems can la sdang bar sems pa'i gdon bgegs rigs tha dad pa yul phyogs 'di na rgyu zhing gnas pa ci mchis pa thams cad dang / che ge mo la sngon gyi las

kyis 'das pa dang / 'phral gyi rkyen las byung ba'am/ yul phyogs dang / pha tshan dang / rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang / srog dang / chus srid dang / dbang phyug dang / 'khor dang / yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la ci yang rung ba'i sgo

nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs ci mchis pa thams cad gang la gang 'tsham pa'i thabs kyis 'dul zhing kho na dang / gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi ba dang / dge ba dang / byams pa'i bsam pa can du 'gyur zhing / sngon chad bkra mi shis pa dang /

gnod pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa bgyis pa rnams 'jig cing 'dor du stsal/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyis bro dam pos bsgag cing / gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig chen po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad par ci gnang / mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge

bsnyen bcu gnyis la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do

skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod

do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs

byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /skabs 'dir mchod pa dbul/ mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po re re la g.yog gnod sbyin bdun 'bum dang bcas pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ ji ltar sngon gdan 'dzom

pa'i spyan sngar/ lha'i ngag bden pas gsung gcig tu/ 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cag la yang ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /des na bdag cag

lhan cig tu mthun par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o/ /bye brag tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/

grong rdal lam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na mdo sde 'di spyod pa dang / gang na de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan 'chang ba dang / mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa'i sems can de dag la/ bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gdon thams

cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes zhal gyis bzhes te thugs dam du bzhes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang gi phyir/ khyed de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhing rjes su dran la

sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so zhes rjes su gnang ba ston pa de bzhin du/ deng 'dir yang mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir dul zhing zhi ba'i 'khor dang ldan par byams pa dang thugs brtse bas mchod pa bzhes shing mdo sde'i

cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/ phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa thams cad bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis thob par byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo la sogs pa

gsung rab dam pa'i chos yun ring du rgyas par bgyi ba dang / sgo thams cad nas chos spyod pa rnams la bar chad dang bgegs su gyur pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs thams cad dang / yul phyogs su mi nad dang / phyugs nad gtong ba dang / than pa dang / sad dang ser ba la sogs pas lo thog ma

rungs par bgyid pa dang / gnod pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa mang po ston cing / sems can la sdang bar sems pa'i gdon bgegs rigs tha dad pa mang po khams dang yul phyogs 'dir rgyu ba mchis so 'tshal dang / che ge mo la sngon gyi las kyis 'das

pa'am/ 'phral gyi rkyen las gyur pa'am/ yul phyogs dang pha tshan dang / rigs rgyud kyi sri can du gyur pa yang rung ste/ che ge mo'i lus dang srog dang / chus srid dang / dbang phyug dang / 'khor dang yo byad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i sgo nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i gdon bgegs

ci mchis pa thams cad gang la yang gdul ba'i thabs kyis 'dul zhing / khon dang gnod pa'i bsam pa 'dor du stsal te/ zhi ba dang dge ba dang / byams pa'i bsam pa can du bgyi zhing / sngon chad bkra mi shis pa dang / gnod pa'i sbyor ba ngan pa bgyis pa rnams kyang 'jig cing 'dor

du stsal/ slan chad kyang gnod pa'i bag ci yang mi bgyid par so so'i rigs kyi bro dam pos bsgag cing gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig chen po stsal ba'i phrin las mdzad par ci gnang / re re nas mchod pa dbul zhing smon lam gdab pa rdzogs pa'i skabs 'dir/ gzungs sngags

bzlas la khrus bya/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa 'bul/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod de/ phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can dang mthun par smon lam btab pa dang / de dag gi spyan

sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang dge ba la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang / de dag gi mthu dpal dang byin rlabs kyi stobs kyis che ge mo la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas

bsags pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa mnga' ba thams cad byang bar gyur cig /sku la bsnyun mi mnga' zhing sku tshe ring ba dang / dbu rmog btsan pa dang / chab srid 'byam dar che ba dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig /mthar

yang tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs nas g.yung drung gi sku chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang brnyes par gyur cig /chabs 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams cad kyang phyi nang gi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang / bla na med pa'i

byang chub chen po thob par gyur cig /yul khams thams cad du yang mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / lo nyes pa dang / dgra'i gnod pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i bag ci yang mi 'byung ba dang / char chu dus su bab ste/ lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / bde skyid kyi dpal phun

sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu skyes nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi zhal mthong ste gdams ngag thob nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sangs rgyas par gyur cig /khyad

par du yang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sgo thams cad nas dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig /de nas bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
