ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag pas ma 'tshal ba dang / bag ma mchis pa'i

dbang gis lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa dang / mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan pa dang / gtsang sbras ma phyed pa dang / mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams la

bzod par gsol zhing mchis na thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod pa bzhes shing 'phral dang yun du bdag cag gi sgrib par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / de nas gshegs su gsol ba ni/ khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su

mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang thugs rjes 'byon par mdzod/ /mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ bdag cag dang sems can gyi don mdzad pa lags kyis/ so so'i zhing khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'khor

dang bcas pa gshegs su gsol/ rdzogs so// //sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'di ltar brjod de/ thams cad du ni sa gzhi dag /gseg ma la sogs med pa dang / /lag mthil ltar mnyam bai DUr+ya'i/ /rang bzhin bzang por gnas gyur cig /bde ldan 'jig

rten bkod pa ltar/ /rin chen sa gzhi me tog bcas/ /ljon shing chu mtsho ma tshad med/ /chos sgrogs rgya chen ldan par shog /'jig rten 'das pa'i dge las byung / /rin chen bdun las grub pa yi/ /tshad mar 'od zer 'gyed pa'i gnas/ /rgyal ba sras bcas bzhugs

gyur cig /gshegs byon skye 'bri med pa'i sku/ /ji ltar smon bzhin yod pa dag /dkar po 'char ba'i tshul bzhin du/ /'jig rten skyabs su gshegs su gsol/ /bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag bsod nams skal bar ldan/ /bdag gis phul ba'i

mchod yon 'di/ /bzhes nas bdag la mnyes par mdzod/ /khyed ni rang bzhin yongs dag par/ /srid sogs nyes pa mi mnga' yang / /yon bdag sgrib pa sbyang slad du/ /gtsang ma'i chu yis sku khrus gsol/ /chos don dag pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /dpal ldan dag pa'i

gnas bshams par/ /ting 'dzin mi g.yo mnyam gzhag pas/ /dge bar dgongs pas gdan la bzhugs/ /gtsang dang sa gdan khri yangs pa la/ /thogs dang dog pa med pa'i sku/ /mnyam nyid tshul gyis 'dir bzhugs shing / /bde bar sbyar ba bzhes su gsol/ /zhes de ltar

yon chab dang sku khrus gsol/ gdan dbul/ de'i 'og tu ston pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas pa la spyi'i phyag byas te/ 'di ltar/ 'gro ba nyon mongs dug gis gzir ba la/ /thugs rje dug sel sman mchog bdud rtsi ni/ /smon lam chen pos grub par gyur pa yi/ /bde gshegs

'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las dang nyon mongs dbang gis sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis/ /gzir ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas spyod tshe thugs rje yis/ /sdug bsngal zhi byed smon lam sna tshogs sgrub mdzad pa'i/ /bde gshegs bdun po 'khor dang bcas la phyag

'tshal lo/ /de nas spyir mchod pa rnam pa lnga 'bul/ smon lam gdab/ rgyun bshags bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu re re nas mchod pa ni/ /mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pas dag pa la/ /dpe byad bzang po'i 'bru chags mdzes pa'i sku/ /gang gis mthong thos dran pa'i dpal gyur pa'i/ /

ston pa mtshan legs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen zla dang pad+mas rab brgyan zhing / /shes bya kun la chags pa'i thugs mnga' la/ /rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /sgra dbyangs rgyal po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar lhang nge ba/ /nyi

ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid 'bar/ /dri med gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu'i sku/ /gser bzangs dri med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mya ngan 'das shing bde ba'i mchog brnyes pa/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gdung ba sel mdzad pa/ /'gro drug mgon dang dpal du gyur pa po/ /mya

ngan med mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sgra chen pos pha rol rgol ba 'joms/ /rgya mtsho lta bur dngas pa'i sku mnga' zhing / /'gro ba'i dug gsum ma lus sel mdzad pa/ /chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi blo gros gting dpag dka'

ba'i tshul/ /rnam dag chos kyi dbyings la rol mdzad de/ /shes bya ma lus mngon sum gzigs pa po/ /mngon mkhyen rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nad gso mdzad pa sman pa'i mchog /bai DUr+ya ltar dngas pa'i sku mngal zhing / /sku yi 'od kyis 'gro ba sgrol mdzad

pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sman gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni/ /nad rnams ma lus bsal bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs sman gyi bla ma 'bul/ /yon bdag don du bzhes su gsol/ /thabs mkhas thugs rje shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs shing / /gzhan gyis mi

thub bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa/ /gser gyi lhun po lta bur mdzes pa'i sku/ /shAkya'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma rig mun sel sgron ma'i mchog /sdug bsngal nad sel sman gyi phul/ /dam chos sgron ma thams cad la/ /phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /

dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi/ /ye shes sku yi ngo bo nyid/ /ngag gi dbang phyug gzugs mdzes ldan/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro drug 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob mdzad cing / /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che las sgrol ba'i gru/ /mya ngan 'das par

phyin pa'i ded dpon mchog /sems dpa' skyabs grol mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang 'dzin pa/ /ma rungs 'dul zhing rig sngags 'chang / /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems dpa' nyi ma snang byed

ni/ /sku mdog dkar ser gangs ri'i gdan/ /phyag gnyis bdud rtsi'i sa gnon tshul/ /de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul/ /sems dpa' zla ltar snang byed ni/ /sku mdog dkar po pad+ma'i gdan/ /phyag gnyis chos 'chad bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa dam

pa 'bul/ /'dod khams 'dam las rab tu tshangs/ /gzugs khams tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /tshangs chen rgyal po mi mjed gtso/ /tshangs chen 'khor dang bcas la 'bul/ /dbu gsum phyag drug lha min 'dul/ /kun la khyab cing snyoms par 'jug /lha yi

gnas gsal stobs po che/ /lha chen khyab 'jug mchod pa 'bul/ /mtho ris lha yi gnas mchog na/ /mi pham mgon gyi zhal mthong ba/ /dga' ldan lha yi sras rnams la/ /yon bdag gus pas mchod pa 'bul/ /lha mi gnyen po lha yi rje/ /spyan gsum mnga' bas

dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i 'khor gzigs pa/ /lha dbang brgya byin mchod pa 'bul/ /lhun po'i rtser gnas lha dbang dang / /thabs dang tshul bzhin spyod mdzad pa/ /lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yang / /mchod bzhes yon bdag re skong mdzod/ /shes pa'i dad pa

tshan po che/ /nga rgyal bsnyems pa'i brag bsnyil te/ /ston pa'i zhabs 'bring bka' sdod pa/ /sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas la mchod/ /shar phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen yul 'khor srung / /sku mdog dkar po phyag na pi wang 'dzin/ /dri za'i 'khor tshogs smin pa'i thugs dam can/ /

de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /lho phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen 'phags skyes po/ /sku mdog sngon po phyag na ral gri bsnams/ /grul bum gdon tshogs smin phyir thugs dam can/ /de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /nub phyogs dpal

ldan rgyal po mig mi bzang / /sku mdog dmar po phyag na zhags pa bsnams/ /klu yi gdon tshogs smin phyir thugs dam can/ /de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /byang phyogs dpal ldan rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /sku mdog ljang gu phyag na ne'u le

bsnams/ /gnod sbyin gdon tshogs smin phyir thugs dam can/ /de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul/ /bde gshegs bstan pa bsrung ba'i dge bsnyen mchog /'jigs pa'i gzugs can rngom pa'i cha lugs can/ /gnod sbyin sde dpon ji 'jigs la sogs pa/ /

gnod sbyin sde dpon rnams la mchod pa 'bul/ /de nas gtor ma gtang / gzungs rnams mang du bzla/ spyir mchod pa lnga 'bul/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol bar bya zhing khrus bya'o/ /bzod pa gsol/ gshegs su gsol/ rdzogs so// //

/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde bklag cing de bzhin gshegs pa bdun mchod de/ smon lam gdab pa'i cho ga mdo sde las btus te rim par bklag pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs dang / bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla be+e DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang /

ston pa bde bar gshegs pa dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor dang / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ mchod pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs dang phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang / bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las 'byung brgya

mtsho thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan klubs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /'phags pa gdan 'dzom pas kyang / de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes te longs spyod par gyur cig /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ yang de'i rjes la dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces lan gsum bzlas/ mchod pa'i tshogs bden pas byin gyis

brlabs pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drang ba/ pus mo btsugs te me tog blangs thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par

yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zham 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig dang bcas pa la sogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po rnams kyis slad ma'i dus lnga brgya ba tham la

dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams

kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bzang zhing rlabs che ba dang / mthu dang byin gyi rlabs dpag tu ma mchis pa mnga' ba la brten te/ che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po

bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

dpal shAkya thub pa gdul bya'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bstan kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang / sngon gyi

smon lam khyad par can las glengs te/ bdag cag rnams mnga' ris kyi gdul bya phyag mtshan du bzhes pa'i nang du gtogs te bka' drin thob pa'i 'phro mchis pa tsam la brten te che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren cing

mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rje dang /

rgyal ba'i sras po skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde bka' stsal ba'i tshe/ gdan 'dzom par 'dus te/ mdo sde byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i

bka' sgrub par thugs bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po

mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa chen pos bkas btad cing so so nas kyang lha'i tshig bden pas mdongs gsol du zhal gyis bzhes te/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor rnam bzhi skyong bar mdzad cing zhal gyis bzhes pa'i lha'i dbang po

brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi sras la sogs pa phyogs skyong ba thams cad kyis kyang che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/

mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de/ byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'chang ba dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i sems can

de dag phyag mtshan du bzhes shing bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung

dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon

chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po thams cad la yang sngon gyi thugs dam bzang po las glengs te/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du/ mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen

du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de byin gyis brlab par ci gnang / skabs 'dir lha klu spyan drang ste/ phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba dbang dang ldan/ /thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam

dkyil po che/ /lha dang drang srong gshin rje srin po klu/ /rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs gza' rgyu skar bcas/ /de dag so so dbang po'i skur ston pa/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs so 'tshal/ /bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na/ /'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis

gshegs su gsol/ sa man dzaHde ltar spyan drangs pas thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la byon par bsam mo/ /de nas phyag 'tshal ba 'greng phyag bdun gyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs

bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zhabs 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi

brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog dpal byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag

'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed dang / zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal

lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs

grol la sogs pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa dam pa'i chos skyong ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la sogs te/ gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o/ /'phags pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad la mchod yon dang byug pa/ me tog dang bdug spos/ mar me dang zhal zas/ rol mo dang sil snyan/ gdugs dang ba dan la sogs pa dngos su ci

'byor pa 'di dag dang / phyogs bcu na bdag pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i lha dang mi'i rdzas dam pa/ bde ba'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gzungs dang rig pa'i mthu dang / mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las

'byung ba/ rgya mtsho thams cad kyis nam mkha'i mthas klas pa/ chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste 'bul lo/ /mchod do/ /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dang / bdag cag gis thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du sdig

pa mi dge ba'i las mdor na mi bgyi bar rigs pa'i las ni bgyis/ bgyi bar 'os pa'i las ni ma bgyis pa la sogs pa'i dngos sdig ci mchis pa thams cad yang dag par 'chags so/ /dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo'i dge ba mtha' dag gi bsod nams thams cad

la rjes su yi rang ngo / /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul lo/ /'jig rten gyi sgron ma gang dag mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag thams cad mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten gyi don mdzad cing yun ring du bzhugs

par gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dzom pa chen po dgongs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na/ sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis

bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / smon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa rlabs po che ji ltar btab cing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / don de nyid da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas ji ltar bka' stsal zhing

byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bka' lung yang dag par sgrub pa dang / so so'i dgongs spyod rgya chen po rdzogs par bskang ba'i

slad du/ mdo sde'i don sgrub pa'i phrin las mdzad par 'phags pa'i bka' btags pas zhal gyis bzhes shing ji ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis la sogs te/ lha'i dge bsnyen chen

po thams cad kyis/ gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mdo sde dang / mdo sde 'dzin pa'i sems can bsrung ba dang / bskyab par zhal gyis bzhes pa la sogs pa sngon 'phags pa rnams kyis ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal ba'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du de

bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa de rnams gdan 'dzom par mdzad pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar nas gdan [(]'jom [,]'dzom [)]pa'i spyan sngar mtshan nas brjod de mchod pa 'bul/ bskul zhing smon lam gsol te/ bka' drin nod cing mchis na gdan 'dzom pas sngon

ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing phan yon ji skad 'byung ba'i bka' drin thams cad che ge mo la sogs pa bdag cag gis 'phral du thob par stsal bar ci gnang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa rnams la re re nas mchod pa

'bul zhing smon lam gdab par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po'i mtshan nas brjod de mchod nas smon lam du gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal

po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan

bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags

rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /

de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/

skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod

pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /

'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ku be ra la sogs pa'i chos skyong ba lha'i dge bsnyen thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen dam pa/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu

gnyis la 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do

skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gza' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po btung 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon

chen po smra 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde

dpon chen po rdzogs byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su mchi'o/ /skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod do skyabs su

mchi'o/ /de skad lan bdun bzlas/ skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/ ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pas bdag cag la sogs pa sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna

tshogs kyis gtses pa/ phongs par gyur pa thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas par byin gyis brlabs shing / dpal gyi mgur nas

yang dag par gsungs nas/ phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar lhung yang gda'/ ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas 'pho yang gda'/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las yol yang gda'/ dogs ni nam mkhar 'gyur/ chab ni zhugs su

'gyur/ zhugs ni chab tu 'gyur/ bser ma ni zhags bas gzung du rung bar yang gda'i/ lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun du spyod pa la yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba de bzhin

gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzom

pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams te/ mchod nas smon lam du gsol pa/ dngos ci thog pa'i nyams kyis dpags te bgyis pa 'di tsam zhig sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ da yang gdan 'dzom pa chen pos cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskang ste/

byin gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal pa bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyis 'phral du thob par mdzad cing stsal bar ci gnang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur ba/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum du bstan pa ci gnang /

spyir mchod pa dbul zhing bsod nams dmigs kyis/ bsngo ba'i smon lam gdab/ 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho

brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang / zla ba dang / pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po

dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon

par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla be+e DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas/ mtshan nas brjod de phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod cing 'phags pa de dag gi smon lam khyad par can dang /

bka' lung mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang / gzhan yang 'phags pa de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang phul ba dang / bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang / 'phags pa de dag gi mthu dpal dang / byin gyi

rlabs kyis lha'i sras kyi zhal snga nas kyi thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags pa'i dngos sdig dang / sgrib pa ci mnga' ba thams cad byang bar gyur cig /sku la bsnyun mi mnga' zhing / sku tshe dpag tu med par ring ba dang / dbu rmog btsan pa dang / chab srid 'byam par rgya che zhing 'jig

rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig /mthar yang tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i g.yung drung gi sku chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go 'phang brnyes par gyur cig /chabs 'og tu gtogs pa'i 'bangs thams

cad kyang phyi nang gi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi zhing / bde zhing skyid pa dang / 'phral yun du legs pa'i chos bzang po la gnas par gyur cig /mnga' ris kyi yul khams thams cad du yang mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / lo nyes dang / dgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang / bkra

mi shis pa'i bag ci yang mi 'byung ba dang / char chu dus su bab ste/ lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / bde skyid kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /dam pa'i chos ring du gnas shing sgo thams cad nas dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig /sgo'i bsod nams bgyid pa la mjug

gi bsngo ba so so nas ji ltar dad pa bzhin du bris te 'debs su stsal lo/ /smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'og tu gyes kar bzod pa gsol zhing slar gshegs par gnang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal

po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang / zla ba dang pad+mas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan

'dzom pa spyan drangs nas mtshan nas brjod pa dang / phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa dang / mdo dang mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang / che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir/ bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman zhing ma dag par

gyur pas ma 'tshal ba dang / bag ma mchis pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang / mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan la gtsang sbras ma phye ba dang / mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs pa la

sogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs par gyur pa thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na/ thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod par bzhes shing 'phral yun gnyis su bdag cag la sgrib pa dang gnod par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par

ci gnang / 'phags pa rnams kyis deng ngam dgung 'di'i bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba phongs shing nyam thag pa'i sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing / bka' stsal pa yang da dung yang bdag cag la thugs brtse bas yang dang yang du gdan 'dzom par

mdzad par dgongs shing / so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnams su 'gro ba'i don la gshegs par ci gnang / mjug 'dir bsngo ba'i tshigs bcad kyang bklag go/ /rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ d+hA ra NI sarba sA d+ha na kra ma dwa ya nA ma/ bod

skad du/ gzungs thams cad kyi sgrub thabs rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba/ sgo drug zhi khro'i lha tshogs la/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te/ /sany+tsa la sogs don du ni/ /du ma gzungs kyi sgrubs thabs ni/ /spyi dang bye brag ldan tshul gyis/ /de ni nga yis bstan

te bri/ /nyams dga' bde ba'i gnas su ni/ /spyod gnyis ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsham par bya/ /ras ris mchod pa bsham par bya/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te/ /snying gar zla dkyil hUM bsams te/ /de yi 'od kyis phyogs bcu yi/ /sangs rgyas 'khor bcas

mdun du dgug /bdun po rnam dag rdzogs par bya/ /de rjes stong pa'i ngang la gnas/ /yaM dang baM dang laM las ni/ /rlung mtsho rin chen sa gzhi bsam/ /de steng b+h+rUM zhu gzhal yas khang / /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam mdzes pa/ /'khor lo pad+ma 'dab

brgyad bsam/ /pho brang dbus kyi lte ba la/ /rang gi yi dam oM du bsam/ /de las 'od 'phros las gnyis byas/ /slar 'dus gser gyi pu stir bsam/ /yang 'phros slar 'dus thim gyur pas/ /gtso chen pha rol phyin ma de/ /gser 'od skyil krung 'khor lo dang / /me tog

pusti mnyam gzhag go/ /de nas zhi ba'i lha gnas su/ /paM las pad+ma'i gdan du bsam/ /khro bo yi ni gnas rnams su/ /ma dang a dang paM las ni/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan du bsam/ /gtso bo'i thugs las 'od zer 'phros/ /las gnyis byas te lha gnas su/ /AHdang

oM dang hrIHdang a/ /dkar ser dmar ljang zhi gnas su/ /hUM ni mthing nag 'phros nas su/ /de dag la yang 'od 'phros pas/ /las gnyis byas te slar 'dus pas/ /so so'i mtshan mar bsgom par bya/ /de las kyang ni 'od 'phros pas/ /slar 'dus de nyid la thim pas/ /

so so'i sku ru bsgom bya ste/ /dbus kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni/ /ye shes dbang bskur ldan ma dang / /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje mi pham so sor 'brang / /sdig pa spong ba gdugs dkar mo/ /bdud 'joms sgo mtha' sgrub pa ste/ /kun kyang sku mdog gser 'od la/ /

zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag nyid can/ /g.yas na ral gri g.yon me tog /kun kyang de thogs zhi 'dzum can/ /rin chen rgyan klubs bsam par bya/ /shar gyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /gser mdog shAkya seng ge ste/ /skyil krung 'khor lo bsnams par bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma

la/ /spyan ras gzigs dang byams pa dang / /nam mkha'i snying po kun tu bzang / /lag na rdo rje 'jam pa'i dpal/ /sgrib pa sel dang sa yi snying / /dkar ser mthing ser yang mthing ser/ /ljang gu sngon po mdog yin no/ /kun kyang rgyan klubs me tog bsnams/ /'dzum bag

bzhin rgyas bsam par bya/ /lho yi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya can/ /mthing gzhal gsum phyag drug ma/ /rma bya'i mjug sgo mda' dang ni/ /mchog sbyin rnams ni go rims g.yas/ /rin chen gzhu dang rnga yab bsnams/ /go rims bzhin du g.yon na'o/ /

sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba'o/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /dang po'i 'dab ma stong chen mo/ /zhal gcig phyag drug dkar mo ste/ /ral gri mda' dang mchog sbyin rnams/ /go rims bzhin du g.yas na'o/ /zhags pa gzhu dang dgra sta bsnams/ /go rims

bzhin du g.yon na'o/ /gnyis pa so sor 'brang ma ste/ /zhal bzhi ma la phyag brgyad ma/ /pad+ma dang rgyan rtse gsum dang / /'dab brgyad dgra sta bcas pa la/ /ral gri pad+mar bcas pa dang / /pad+ma dung dang bcas pa'o/ /dang po gnyis g.yas tha ma g.yon/ /gsum pa bsil

tshal mdog dmar po/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi'i bdag nyid can/ /phreng ba mchog sbyin g.yas na'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu g.yon na'o/ /bzhi pa gsang sngags rjes 'dzin ma/ /ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /rdo rje mchog sbyin g.yas na'o/ /dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na'o/ /

kun kyang sna tshogs rgyan brgyan bsam/ /de dag bar gyi 'dab ma la/ /yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po/ /mig mi bzang dang rnam thos sras/ /dpa' bo yi ni cha lugs la/ /pi wang ral gri sbrul zhags dang / /mchod rten phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /nub kyi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /

mgon po bde gshegs tshe dpag med/ /sku mdog dmar po ting 'dzin rgya/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal bzang po mchog /gzi brjid can dang zla ba dang / /snyan pa dri med bzang po tog /bkod pa chen po spyan ras gzigs/ /mthu chen

thob ste de dag kyang / /kun kyang dkar ser me tog bsnams/ /zhi ba 'dzum bag bsam par bya/ /byang gi pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /chos yum dmar ser pu sti gsum/ /me tog stong thogs 'dzum bag can/ /rgyan ldan pa ni bsam par bya/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /gdugs

dkar rnam rgyal gtsug gi nor/ /dri ma med pa'i gtsug tor te/ /dkar dang sngo bsangs dmar ser mdog /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ral gri dang / /rin chen bsnams te 'dzum bag can/ /de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la/ /'od zer can dang par+Na dang / /ri khrod lo gyon dpal lung

bstan/ /mthing ga gcig dang gzhan rnams ser/ /phyag bzhi dUR+Wa ltar sngo gcig /de yi phyag mtshan gyur pa ni/ /mchog sbyin 'bras bu dgra sta bsnams/ /zhags pa dbyug to g.yon na'o/ /ri khrod lo gyon dgra sta'o/ /'od zer mya ngan med shing bsnams/ /me tog

bsnams pa khro 'dzum bsam/ /byang shar pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /bde gshegs tsan+dan yan lag ser/ /zhi des tsan+dan bsnams par bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /blo yangs 'brug sgrogs sgrib pa sel/ /yon tan 'byung gnas 'od dpag med/ /kun nas spos

mchog rgyal mtshan rtsal/ /nga rgyal gnon dang rgya mtsho dbyangs/ /kun kyang dmar ser zhi tshul la/ /sa gnon pa yi phyag rgya'o/ /shar lho pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /bde bar gshegs pa sgron ma mchog /ljang gu 'dzum bag sa gnon bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi pad+ma la/ /sems

dpa' 'od chen 'od dpag med/ /mi pham pa dang 'jam dpal dang / /dri ma med dang rdo rje snying / /rgyal ba can dang mtshan mo bzang / /kun kyang dmar ser me tog 'dzum/ /lho nub pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /mkha' lding gser gyi 'dab ma can/ /rdo rje'i mchu la lus 'bar ba/ /khro bo 'jigs

rung rtsal can la/ /rgyan brgyan klu la stan byas bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /sbas pa rdo rje kun 'bar glog /'bar ba'i gzi brjid gnam lcags mchu/ /dkar dmar ser dang sngon po ste/ /sbrul zan bzhi ni bsam par bya/ /de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la/ /khyab 'jug tshangs pa

dbang phyug dang / /drang srong ri byi bsam par bya/ /nub byang pad+ma'i lte ba la/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs yum ni/ /dkar 'dzum me tog bsnams pa bsam/ /de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig zhal/ /phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa

bsam/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rin chen phreng / /stobs chen dang ni mdangs phyir 'phrog /kun kyang mdog dkar rin chen phreng / /'khor lo lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la/ /gser can dang ni rnam rgyal can/ /'gro lding ba dang dbyig dang ldan/ /ser dang

dkar dang mthing ljang ngo / /kun kyang khro 'dzum 'khor lo bsnams/ /bcu drug pa yi 'dab ma la/ /rnam par gzigs dang thams cad skyob/ /log par dad sel gser thub dang / /'od srungs dang ni mar me mdzad/ /kun kyang zhi tshul sa gnon rgya/ /yongs grags dpal

dang rin chen zla/ /gser bzangs dri med mya ngan med/ /chos bsgrags rgya mtsho chos rgya mtsho/ /bai DUr 'od kyi rgyal po ste/ /kun kyang nam mkha'i mdog lta la/ /sman mchog a ru bsnams pa'o/ /mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od stong 'bar/ /snang ba mtha' yas de bsam bya/ /ser

sngo dmar ba'i mdog yin no/ /kun kyang ting 'dzin phyag rgya'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsibs la ni/ /lag na rdo rje rnam 'joms dang / /me ltar rmongs byed be con dang / /kun kyang mthing ga khro bo'i cha/ /rdo rje be con bsnams pa'o/ /gzhon nu bsod nams rgyal mtshan ni/ /

e na'i lpags gyon sbrul gyis brgyan/ /dug gi me tog thogs pa'o/ /khro bo me yi kha la ni/ /mthing ga me dpung lag na thogs/ /tshogs bdag dkar po lcags kyu bsnams/ /rnam rgyal dbyug pa sngon po dang / /gshin rje gshed dang mi g.yo mgon/ /rta mgrin gzhan

gyis mi thub dang / /bdud rtsi 'khyil dang khams gsum rgyal/ /kun kyang khro bo'i tshul can la/ /mthing ga rdo rje bsnams pa bsam/ /phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs la'o/ /hUM kA ra dang stobs po che/ /cha lugs gong dang mthun tshul la/ /'khor lo

gnyis kyi rtsibs la bsam/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog 'brog gnas dang / /gangs gnas lnga rtsen nor bzangs dang / /gang bzangs dang ni grags bzangs dang / /sa mdzes dang ni phreng mdzes dang / /kun kyang khro tshul gnas ser la/ /thams cad dbyug to bsnams pa'o/ /nag

po che dang lha mo nag /dbyug to zhags pa thogs pa la/ /khro bo'i gzugs can bsam par bya/ /rdo rje 'chang ni gtum mo dang / /rdo rje khro mo pho nya mo/ /khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /rig sngags khro bo rgyal ba can/ /kun kyang mthing ga khro tshul can/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud/ /de

dag phyag na bsnams par bsam/ /khro bo bar du gcod sbyong dang / /khro bo mi 'jigs sbyin pa ste/ /dkar ser khro tshul rdo rje bsnams/ /de yi phyi yi khyams la ni/ /gzungs rnams kun ni thams cad nas/ /mtshan brjod bde gshegs mtha' dag dmigs/ /lha mo sgo ba rang bzhin

dmigs/ /de nas phyi yi rim pa ni/ /'khor ba'i le tse khra bo la/ /gza' dgu dang ni rgyu skar ni/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsam par bya/ /de yi phyi yi khyams la ni/ /du ma gzungs nas brjod pa yi/ /gnod sbyin klu la sogs pa yi/ /mthu chen thams cad dmigs par bya/ /sgo de rgal ba'i

phyi rnams su/ /sna tshogs gzungs nas brjod pa yi/ /snying rje'i tshogs rnams thams cad dmigs/ /gal te bye brag sgrub byed na/ /tshogs gnyis gdan dang sa bon dang / /gang bskyed pa yi sku de rnams/ /gong du mthun pa'i sku ru bskyed/ /de ltar bsdus te bye brag lha/ /gang

'dod pa ni bskyed par bya/ /de nas ye shes lha tshogs ni/ /nam mkhar bkug ste mchod nas ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de nas phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /bum pa'i dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /de lta bur ni bsgom par bya/ /de

bskyed bzlas pa bya ba yin/ /thun mtshams gtor btang ye shes gshegs/ /sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pa ste dang po'o// //de nas snying po bsdus pa'i rim pa ni/ de ni rgyas pa btu bar bya/ /so so'i gzugs kyi nang nas te/ /shAka thub yum gyi snying bo ni/ /yi ge nyung na mu ne yin/ /lha

mo brgyad kyi snying po ni/ /lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs nang nas/ /ye shes dbang bskur rdo rje dbyings/ /so sor 'brang gsum snying po ni/ /so so'i gzugs kyi nang nas ni/ /tha ma'i sarba man chad yin/ /gzhan rnams mi btu gzungs na bzhin/ /sems dpa' 'khor brgyad snying po ni/ /dkyil

'khor brgyad pa'i nang bzhin no/ /yang na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi/ /nang gi gzungs rnams bzhin du'o/ /rma bya yi ni snying po ni/ /rma bya'i snying po'i nang nas kyang / /na ra ya yi sngags yin no/ /stong chen gyi ni snying po ni/ /gzungs na sngags kyi tha ma'o/ /so sor 'brang ma'i snying po ni/ /

snying po gsum gyi sngags nang nas/ /rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags gnyis pa yin par 'dod/ /gsang sngags gsum pa yin par 'dod/ /tshe dpag med kyi snying po ni/ /de mdo'i sarba saM skA ri/ /de yi 'khor gyi snying po ni/ /

'chi med rnga sgra'i sngags gzhug gi /a mr-i ta yi sngags yin no/ /chos yum gzungs kyi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /gdugs dkar snying po a na le/ /tha ma'i sngags gzhug nang bzhin no/ /rnam par rgyal ma'i snying po ni/ /gsang sngags de yi tha ma yi/

sarba ta thA mar bcad do/ /gtsug gi nor bu'i snying po ni/ /sngags de yi ni tha ma yi/ /sarba rnams gnyis mar bcad do/ /gtsug tor dri med snying po ni/ sngags de yi ni tha ma yi/ /sarba rnam gnyis mar bcad do/ /'od zer can gyi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /par+Na'i

snying po de nang bzhin/ /ri khrod lo gyon snying po ni/ /tad+ya thA nas bzung nas ni/ /swA hA dang po yan chad do/ /dpal lha lung bstan snying po ni/ /sngags de yi ni gzhung gi ni/ /tha ma'i sarba mar bcad do/ /tsan+dan yan lag snying po ni/ /de yi sngags kyi nang nas ni/ /sarba b+hU ta a ti ta/ /de ni

mar bcad yin par 'dod/ /bde gshegs bdun gyi snying po ni/ /khyad par can gyi mdo ji bzhin/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi snying po ni/ /sngags de yi ni tha ma yi/ /oM bzhi po ni yin par 'dod/ /sgrol ma mchog gi snying po ni/ /de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /mi pham

'jam dpal snying po yang / /sgrol ma mchog gi gzungs nang bzhin/ /dri ma med pa'i snying po ni/ /dri med gzungs sngags tha ma'o/ /rdo rje snying po de nang bzhin/ /rgyal ba can gyi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /mtshan mo bzang po'i snying bo ni/ /gzungs nas

sngags kyi tha ma'o/ /mkha' lding gtso bo'i snying po ni/ /tshangs pa khang par gzungs mthu yis/ /sngags rings de yi mjug gi ni/ /ta thA ga ta mar bcad do/ /sbas pa rdo rje kun 'bar glog /mchu yi nang nas 'byung bzhin no/ /'bar ba gzi brjid snying po ni/ /mchu yi

gzungs sngags tha ma yi/ /oM di ri di ri mar bcad yin par 'dod/ /gnam lcags mchu yi snying po ni/ /gnam lcags sngags kyi tha ma yin/ /oM di ri di ri de ni mar bcad yin par 'dod/ /ri byi'i sngags ni de nang bzhin/ /spyan ras gzigs yum snying po ni/ /sarba gnyis

po mar bcad yin/ /bcu gcig zhal gyi snying po ni/ /de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /rin chen phreng ba'i snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags gnyis pa yin par 'dod/ /stobs can gyi ni snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /mdangs phyir 'phrog gi snying po ni/ /de yi

gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /gser can gyi ni snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /rnam rgyal can gyi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /'gro lding pa yi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /dbyig dang ldan pa'i snying po yang / /

de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /bde gshegs rabs bdun snying po ni/ /sangs rgyas bdun pa'i gzungs nang bzhin/ /sman bla mched bdun snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags bar ma yin par 'dod/ /mi 'khrugs pa yi snying po ni/ /las sgrib sbyong ba'i gzungs nang gi /kaM ka ni ni yin

par 'dod/ /'od stong 'bar gyi snying po ni/ /rgya chen thogs med gzungs nang gi /mjug gi sngags thung yin par 'dod/ /snang mtha' yas kyi snying po ni/ /de yi gzungs sngags tha ma'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i snying po ni/ /tad+ya thA nas tha ma'o/ /rnam par 'joms pa'i snying po ni/ /de

yi sngags kyi gzhug gi ni/ /na mash+tsaN+Da man chad do/ /me ltar rmongs byed snying po ni/ /sngags de yi ni nang nas ni/ /sarba de ba nA ga man chad do/ /be con chen po'i snying bo ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po'i nang nas kyang / /sarba a ta sa ta na/ /de ni mar bcad yin par 'dod/ /

dug sel gyi ni snying po ni/ /de dag gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /me kha la yi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po'i nang nas kyang / /sa man na sa re/ /de ni mar chad yin par 'dod/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po ni/ /de yi gzungs kyi sngags gzhug gi /

tad+ya thA nas tha ma'i bar/ /khro bo bcu yi snying po yang / /rang rang gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /yang na bskor ba'i gzungs bzhin no/ /rnam par 'joms pa'i badzra bcu/ /khro bcu'i sngags su 'dod pa yin/ /lag na rdo rje bcu yi ni/ /snying po gzungs sngags tha mar 'dod/ /

nag po chen po'i snying po ni/ /de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /lha mo nag mo'i snying po yang / /de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /rig sngags rgyal ba can nang nas/ /khro bzhi'i sngags ni btu bar bya/ /gtum po yi ni sngags gnyis las/ /sngags tshan 'og ma yin par

'dod/ /rdo rje khro bo'i sngags de nyid/ /rdo rje pho nya mo yi sngags/ /mdung rtse gsum pa'i sngags yin no/ /khro bo lu gu rgyud sngags ni/ /gzungs kyi nang bzhin kho na'o/ /rig sngags rgyal ba can sngags ni/ /dza ya dza ye'i sngags yin no/ /khro bo bar du gcod sbyong sngags/ /

gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /khro bo mi 'jigs sbyin sngags ni/ /sngags de nyid kyi nang nas kyang / /sarba dur shar mar bcad do/ /de dag lha mngon nang nas btu/ /gzungs chen po yi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas snying po'i snying po

ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /dbang phyug chen po dka' thub bzang / /de la bcom ldan bka' stsal pa'i/ /sangs rgyas snying po'i gzungs sngags gzhug /sarba a ka rnam gsum yin/ /dbang bskur gzungs kyi snying po ni/ /de yi gzungs kyi nang

bzhin no/ /kun bzang gzungs kyi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /rten 'brel gzungs sngags ye d+harmA/ /me tog brtsegs gzungs snying po ni/ /sngags de nyid kyi nang nas kyang / /a mr-i ta ni mar bcad do/ /sa dbang gzungs kyi snying po ni/ /sngags de yi

ni gzhug gi ni/ /sa mya ka saM bud mar bcad do/ /yi ge drug pa'i snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /shes rab nyi shu rtsa lnga'i sgo/ /snying po oM du 'dod pa yin/ /mig sbyong gzungs kyi snying po ni/ /de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /gzi can zhus pa de nang bzhin/ /

sangs rgyas yan lag snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /gzhang 'brum sel ba'i snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /sgo drug snying po de nang bzhin/ /bu mang bton pa'i snying po ni/ /de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no/ /rims nad zhi gzungs de nang

bzhin/ /chos kyi rgya mtsho'i snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /sgo mtha' yas kyi snying po ni/ /sngags de yi ni mjug gi ni/ /sarba man chad yin par 'dod/ /lus dbyibs mdzes gzungs snying po ni/ /sngags de rang gi mjug gi ni/ /ma hA bo d+hi sa twa dang / /de

ni mar bcad yin par 'dod/ /dbugs chen gzungs kyi snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod/ /gza' rnams yum gyi snying po ni/ /gza' yum sngags kyi gzhug gi ni/ /sarba rnam gnyis yin par 'dod/ /ri rab khang brtsegs snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags tha ma

yin par 'dod/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad snying po ni/ /de rang mtshan gyi nang bzhin no/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer 'jug gzungs kyi/ /gsang sngags dang po bi sa ra/ /de yi snying po yin par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas bcu gnyis snying po ni/ /mi btu de yi rang bzhin no/ /sgo bzangs gzungs kyi

snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /nad rnams zhi gzungs snying po ni/ /mi btu de yi rang bzhin no/ /byang chub rgyan 'bum snying po ni/ /sngags gzhug sarba man chad yin/ /nI la kaN+Tha'i snying po ni/ /sngags de yi ni mjug gi ni/ /At+yA ba lo ki te/ /de ni man chad

yin par 'dod/ /lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag /ming brgyad gsang sngags bskor ba yis/ /de yi snying po de nang bzhin/ /mdo sdong brgyan pa'i snying po ni/ /gzungs sngags gsum po yin par 'dod/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyi snying po ni/ /mi btu de yi rang bzhin no/ /za ma tog gi

phyag rgya yi/ /de yi gzungs kyi sngags gzhug gi /sarba man chad yin par 'dod/ /dra byi rig pa'i rgyal mo'i sngags/ /gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod/ /sprin gyi gzungs kyi snying po ni/ /bde sbyin sngags ni yin par 'dod/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor snying po ni/ /gzungs

sngags tha ma'i nang nas kyang / /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /de ni mar bcad yin par 'dod/ /uTI Sha la sogs pa'i gzungs/ /snying po rang gzhung gsal ba yang / /de yi gzungs kyang 'ga' zhig mchis/ /de dag ma btus de nang bzhin/ /de ltar sna tshogs gzungs nang

nas/ /mkhas pas de ltar btu bar bya/ /snying po btu ba'i rim pa ste gnyis pa'o// //da ni rim gnyis mjug bsdus te/ /gong bzhin sgrub pa'i thabs bsgoms nas/ /snying po btu rim bzhin du ni/ /gtso bo nas ni 'khor gyi bar/ /rgyas dang 'bring dang bsdus pa yis/ /

bsnyen pa tshad du bskyal bar bya/ /de nas las la sbyor ba ni/ /dbang bskur dus su rig sngags bzhin/ /khrus kyi cho ga'i dus su ni/ /kun khyab gzungs kyi cho ga bzhin/ /gzungs brjod mjug gi cho ga'i dus/ /rang gi cho ga'i gzhung bzhin no/ /de bzhin las la sbyar bar bya/ /

bye brag tu ni sgrub byed na/ /bye brag sgrub pa'i thabs bsgoms nas/ /bye brag snying po bzlas par bya/ /de nas las la sbyar ba ni/ /zhi ba rim drug gdon dgrol sogs/ /zhi ba'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /drag po'i rim drug gdon dgrol sogs/ /drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /kun

khyab las sbyor thams cad kyis/ /las rnams thams cad mthar 'byung ba'o/ /gzhan las sogs pa'i gzungs rnams la/ /rten gyi gang zag mos byung na/ /de yi gzhung na lha gsal na/ /de gzhung bzhin du lhar bskyed de/ /de gzhung gsal bar ma gyur na/ /zhi la

bstan bdag drag po la/ /khro bo phyag na rdo rje la/ /bskyed tshul sgrub pa'i thabs bzhin no/ /las sbyor snying po gong bzhin no/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i thabs sbyangs nas/ /klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i/ /gdon rnams thams cad sel bar nges/ /mdze dang phol mig rims la sogs/ /

nad rnams thams cad sel bar nges/ /tshe 'di'i 'dod dgu thams cad 'grub/ /sdig pa thams cad zad par byed/ /dri ma thams cad 'khrud par byed/ /sdig pa sbyong ba'i mchog yin no/ /phyi mar mtho ris thar pa'i rgyu/ /sgrub pa yi ni mchog yin no/ /de yi phan yon mang po ni/ /

so so'i sna tshogs gzungs nang nas/ /rgyas shing gsal bar bstan pa ste/ /de dag de ru bltas te sgrub/ /phan yon de dag bden pa ste/ /sangs rgyas bka' ni mi slu ste/ /phan yon de dag thams cad ni/ /don tshig ldan la gzhung bzhin 'byung / /tshig ldan pa la de yi cha/ /mkhas pas

de ltar shes par gyis/ /rmongs pas de ltar ma shes pas/ /log pa'i the tshom za ba yin/ /de bas sgrub pa'i thabs 'di la/ /sgrub thabs grangs ni dpag med ldan/ /sna tshogs rgyud la brten byas nas/ /nor bu sgrub thabs rim gnyis 'di/ /rin chen grags pas bstan pa yin/ /

de las dge ba ci thob pa/ /kun gyis gzungs kyi don rtogs shog /bdag gi bstan bcos rgyas gyur cig /slob dpon mkhas pa rin chen grags pas mdzad pa gzungs 'dus spyi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //bal po ma hA pA nas bsgyur ba'o// //

@[ ]##/ /rgya gar skad du/ d+hA ra NI sarba maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ gzungs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ sgo drug zhi khro'i lha tshogs la/ /sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po tsany+tsa 'khor bcas kyis/ /gzungs rnams du mar brjod byas kyang / /

nus pa rdzogs par ma thon te/ /de nus rdzogs par gdon pa'i phyir/ /rang lha yi ni bsten bzhin du/ /de cho ga nga yis bstan te bri/ /rgyal po la sogs pho brang du/ /sna tshogs gzungs brjod mjug thogs sam/ /yang na gzungs mchog sgrub dus sam/ /dbang bskur ba yi dus dag tu/ /dkyil

'khor chen po bsham par bya/ /gzungs sgrub cho ga byed 'gyur na/ /cho ga byed pa'i dus dang ni/ /rang nyid stan la 'dug sogs par/ /kun khyab gzungs chog nang na gsal/ /dbang bskur dus su rim lnga bzhin/ /du ma gzungs kyi mjug tu ni/ /de yi bya ba'i cho ga spyad/ /dkyil

'khor bri ba'i snga gong du/ /gzungs rnams ma lus thams cad kyi/ /sngags btus yungs kar la btab nas/ /bum pa rnams su blugs par bya/ /bsnyen pa skyel ba'i slob dpon gyis/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /thig dang rdul tshon rigs lnga bzhin/ /de nas rdul

tshon dgye bar bya/ /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri/ /'khor lo'i lte ba mthing ga'o/ /rtsibs rnams ser zhing mu khyud dkar/ /yang na 'dab brgyad ci mdzes so/ /'dab rtsibs lte ba rnams la ni/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad ci mdzes bris/ /de steng gtso bo'i mdog dang bstun/ /

'khor lo pad+ma'i phyi nyid du/ /bcu drug 'dab ldan pad+ma ni/ /ci mdzes ba ru bri bar bya/ /pad+ma de yi phyi nyid du/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsibs ldan pa/ /mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /lte ba mthing ga'i rtsibs rnams ni/ /ci mdzes par ni bri bar bya/ /rtsibs mchan rin chen 'bar ba bri/ /

mu khyud dkar po de phyi khyams/ /sgo sogs rim pa lnga pa bzhin/ /de yi phyi yi rim pa ni/ /'khor ba'i mu khyud dgra bo bri/ /de yi phyi ni khyams su gnas/ /sgo ni gong dang mthun pa ste/ /sgo de yi ni phyi rol du/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi 'dab ldan ni/ /tshon sna lnga yis sdu gur bri/ /rdo rje me ri de

bzhin bri/ /de nas lha ni dgod bya ba/ /sgrub pa'i thabs bzhin dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni khyams rnams su/ /lha ming gsal ba'i gzungs rnams bri/ /snying po bris te khyams su gzug/ /dkyil 'khor rgyan bkod mchod rten ni/ /bshams te rang nyid stan la 'dug /rnal

'byor yan lag bskyed ldan pas/ /ye shes lha tshogs spyan drangs te/ /rang bzhin chos sku dbyer med kyang / /'gro ba'i don phyir yum gyi sku/ /yum chen pha rol phyin ma dang / /ye shes dbang bskur ldan pa dang / /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje mi pham so sor

'brang / /sdig pa spong ba gdugs dkar mo/ /bdud 'joms sgo mtha' sgrub pa ste/ /de ltar 'gro mgon khyed rnams kyang / /rgyal po'i 'khor 'bangs bcas pa yi/ /lus srog bar chad bsal ba ltar/ /dpal dang bsod nams spel ba dang / /las ngan sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /sprul

pa'i pho brang dam pa 'dir/ /mchod cing spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol/ /de bzhin sbrel bar bya ba ni/ /gser 'od shAkya seng ge dang / /spyan ras gzigs dang byams pa dang / /nam mkha'i snying dang kun du bzang / /lag na rdo rje 'jam pa'i

dpal/ /sgrib pa sel dang sa'i snying po/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya che/ /stong chen so sor 'brang ma dang / /bsil ba'i tshal dang gsang sngags 'dzin/ /yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po/ /mig mi bzang dang rnam thos sras/ /mgon po bde gshegs tshe dpag med/ /bzang

po mchog dang gzi brjid dpal/ /zla ba snyan pa dri med dang / /bzang po'i tog dang bkod pa che/ /spyan ras gzigs dang mthu chen thob/ /chos rnams thams cad yum dang ni/ /gdugs dkar rnam rgyal gtsug gi nor/ /'od zer can dang par+Na dang / /ri khrod lo gyon dpal lung

bstan/ /bde gshegs tsan+dan yal ga dang / /blo yangs 'brug sgra sgrib pa sel/ /yon tan 'byung gnas 'od dpag med/ /kun nas spos mchog rgyal mtshan rtsal/ /nga rgyal gnon dang rgya mtsho dbyangs/ /bde bar gshegs pa sgron ma mchog /sems dpa' 'od chen 'od dpag

med/ /mi pham pa dang 'jam dpal dang / /dri ma med dang rdo rje snying / /rgyal ba can dang mtshan mo bzang / /mkha' lding gser 'dab rdo rje mchu/ /sbas pa rdo rje kun 'bar glog /'bar ba gzi brjid gnam lcags mchu/ /khyab 'jug tshangs pa dbang phyug dang / /drang srong ri byi chen po ste/ /

mgon po spyan ras gzigs yum dang / /spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig zhal/ /rin chen phreng dang stobs chen dang / /mdangs phyir 'phrog dang gser can dang / /rnam rgyal can dang 'gro lding dang / /stobs can dbyig dang ldan pa ste/ /rnam par gzigs dang thams cad skyob/ /log dad

sel dang gser thub dang / /'od srungs dang ni mar me mdzad/ /yongs grags dpal dang rin chen zla/ /gser bzangs dri med mya ngan med/ /chos bsgrags rgya mtsho chos rgya mtsho/ /bai DUr 'od kyi rgyal po ste/ /mi 'khrugs pa dang 'od stong 'bar/ /bde bar gshegs pa snang mtha' yas/ /

lag na rdo rje rnam 'joms dang / /me ltar rmongs byed be con dang / /bsod nams rgyal mtshan me kha la/ /dpal ldan tshogs kyi bdag po ste/ /rnam rgyal dbyug pa sngon po dang / /gshin rje gshed dang mi g.yo mgon/ /rta mgrin gzhan gyis mi thub dang / /bdud rtsi 'khyil dang khams

gsum rgyal/ /hUM ka ra dang stobs po che/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog 'brog gnas dang / /gangs gnas lngas rtsen nor bzangs dang / /gang ba bzang dang grags bzangs dang / /sa mdzes dang ni phreng mdzes dang / /nag po che dang lha mo nag /rdo rje gtum po rdo rje khro/ /rdo rje pho nya lu gu rgyud/ /rig sngags khro bo

rgyal ba can/ /khro bo bar du gcod sbyong dang / /khro chen 'bar ba mi 'jigs sbyin/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHkun la sbyar/ /sna tshogs gzungs ni brjod pa yis/ /bde bar gshegs pa mtha' dag kyang / /bdag gis mtshan nas ma brjod kyang / /sngon gyi smon lam dbang gis ni/ /rang bzhin gnas pa mi

mnga' yang / /kun rdzob tsam du gnas pa ston/ /zhing khams pho brang la sogs nas/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs sbyang ba dang / /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ /sprul pa'i pho brang dam pa 'dir/ /mchod sbyin spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol/ /lha rnams khyams la bzhugs su gsol/ /

bde gshegs mchod dang sgo skyong ba'i/ /sgo bzhi'i lha mo khyed rnams kyang / /spyan 'dren mchod phyir gshegs su gsol/ /pho brang gru bzhir gshegs su gsol/ /sgo bzhi'i nang du gshegs su gsol/ /sna tshogs gzungs nas brjod pa yi/ /gza' dang rgyu skar gnod sbyin dang / /klu la

sogs pa'i mthu chen sogs/ /spyan 'dren mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /khor yug le tshe gshegs su gsol/ /'jig rten khams su gshegs su gsol/ /sna tshogs gzungs nas brjod pa yi/ /kha 'bar la sogs snying rje'i tshogs/ /mchod gtor sbyin gyis

'dir shog cig /de nas phyag rgya 'di skad do/ /yum chen pha rol phyin ma dang / /ye shes dbang bskur dpal ldan ma/ /rdo rje dbyings [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje mi pham so sor 'brang / /sdig pa spong ba gdugs dkar mo/ /bdud 'joms sgo mtha' yas pa ste/ /de lta'i 'gro mgon khyed rnams la/ /

rig pa'i slob dpon nga dang ni/ /gzungs 'dzin slob ma rnams kyi ni/ /bar chod bgegs rnams bzlog pa dang / /rnam smin sdig pa sbyong ba'i phyir/ /sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan 'dren skabs su smos bzhin du/ /de bzhin kun la bsgre bar bya/ /de nas mchod pa 'di skad do/ /dag pa

yi ni yon chab 'di/ /sna tshogs gzungs kyi lha la 'bul/ /sna tshogs gzungs kyi glegs bam la/ /bklags dang khab tu bzhugs pa dang / /rig pa'i slob dpon nga yis ni/ /sna tshogs gzungs chog byas pa yis/ /mi mthun par chod bzlog pa dang / /rnam smin sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /

thugs rje'i dbang gis bzhes su gsol/ /mchod rdzas gzhan yang de bzhin sbrel/ /de nas bstod pa 'di skad do/ /yum chen pha rol phyin ma dang / /ye shes dbang bskur ldan ma dang / /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje mi pham so sor 'brang / /sdig pa spong ba gdugs dkar mo/ /bdud

'joms sgo mtha' sgrub pa ste/ /gzungs 'chang gzungs sngags bdag nyid can/ /so so rang gi gzungs sngags kyis/ /nus pa so sor 'don mdzad tshe/ /khyod kyi yon tan bskal par ni/ /brjod kyis lang bar mi 'gyur te/ /yon tan cha tsam zur gyis bstod/ /sku mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

de ltar sbrel bar bya ba ni/ /spyan 'dren skabs kyi mtshan smos bzhin/ /bde gshegs bya rgod ri bo yi/ /lho phyogs dge slong stong nyis brgya/ /lnga bcus yongs bskor ma ga d+hA'i/ /ma skyes dgra yis bsnyen bkur tshe/ /sa g.yos sprin 'dus glog byung ste/ /yangs pa'i mi bred sngangs thon skrag /de

slad kun tshogs stong chen gsungs/ /stong chen glegs bam phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bde gshegs mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal/ /bzhugs tshe sa ri klus zin nas/ /sdug bsngal nyen pa kun dgas zhus/ /sangs rgyas gzungs gsung rma bya che/ /rma bya'i glegs bam phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bde

gshegs lhun zom rdo khri na/ /sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhi dang / /nyan thos lta bu dbang phyug bskor/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /ston pas gsungs pa'i so sor 'brang / /glegs bam so sor 'brang la bstod/ /bde gshegs dur khrod bsil

tshal dang / /'jigs rung skye bar dge slong ni/ /stong dang nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / /rgyal chen bzhi yi 'khor bzhi po/ /bsrung ba'i slad du yongs zhus pa/ /ston pas gsungs pa bsil ba'i tshal/ /glegs bam bsil ba'i tshal la bstod/ /bde gshegs mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal/ /

bzhugs tshe tshangs pa sogs rnams kyis/ /stong gsum srung slad yongs zhus pa/ /cang mi gsung gi tshul gnang ba/ /gsang sngags rjes 'dzin ston pas gsungs/ /de yi glegs bam phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lha mo brgyad gzungs phyag rdor gyis/ /'jam dpal la ni gsungs pa

yi/ /lha mo brgyad gzungs phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan rgyal khab bya rgod kyi/ /phung rir dge slong stong bzhugs tshe/ /lag na rdo rjes zhus pa yi/ /kun tshogs rgyal ba can gyi gzungs/ /rgyal ba can gyi glegs bam bstod/ /bcom ldan rin chen khang brtsegs na/ /sems

dpa' sum khri lnga stong dang / /dge slong lnga brgya nyi khri stong / /bzhugs pa'i tshe na bcom ldan gyis/ /'byung po bskyab phyir gnang ba'i gzungs/ /rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa yi/ /me ltar rmongs byed gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan rgyal khab 'od ma'i tshal/ /bya ka lan+da ka

gnas na/ /lha bu tsan+dan skyes nas ni/ /dge slong bcom ldan la zhus pa/ /de phyir bcom ldan gsungs pa yi/ /mtshan mo bzang mo'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab na ni/ /dge slong lnga brgya nyi khri dang / /sems dpa'i lha dang thabs cig ste/ /spyan ras gzigs

dang zla 'od dang / /tsan+dan gyis ni yan lag gsungs/ /tsan+dan yan lag phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal/ /mgon med zas sbyin kun ra na/ /dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu stong / /bcom ldan kun dga' bo la gsungs/ /gzungs chen mo

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan lhas ma lta bu dang / /lag na rdo rje thabs cig tshe/ /brgya byin zhus te bcom ldan 'das/ /gser can gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan bya rgod spungs ri la/ /dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu stong / /sgra gcan zin stong gsungs pa yi/ /be+e

con gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan grong khyer yangs pa can/ /dge slong lnga brgya sems dpas bskor/ /bcom ldan gnang zhing sems dpa' ni/ /kun du bzang pos gsungs pa yi/ /spyan ras gzigs yum gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan rdo rje la zhugs te/ /

lag na rdo rjes byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni/ /rnam 'joms gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan yul 'phags brag phug bzhugs/ /lha dbang tshe yi 'du byed 'jigs/ /bcom ldan de yi don gsungs pa/ /bar du gcod sbyong gzungs la bstod/ /bcom

ldan chos dbye dgon pa na/ /sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig dang / /'bum phrag du ma thabs cig tshe/ /bcom ldan sems dpa'i 'khor chen la/ /skye bo mang la phan phyir gsungs/ /sangs rgyas snying po'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan ma ga d+hA yul nas/ /lus 'phags

brag phug gshegs bzhugs tshe/ /lha dbang der phyin lha min dang / /g.yul 'gyed phyir zhus bcom ldan gsungs/ /mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan skyed tshal rgya mtsho'i 'gram/ /lha yi 'khor bskor chos ston tshe/ /gnas gtsang lha la bka' stsal pa'i/ /

sangs rgyas snying po'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal/ /dge slong brgya stong sems dpa'i tshogs/ /bskor tshe shA ri'i bu la gsungs/ /dbang bskur gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan rgyal khab bya rgod kyi/ /phung ri'i dge slong brgya stong dang / /

sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum/ /dgu bcu rtsa dgus gnas gtsang lhas/ /bskor tshe spyan ras gzigs gsungs pa'i/ /kun du bzang po'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan sum cu rtsa gsum gyi/ /lwa ba dkar po'i rdo leb bzhugs/ /lha dbang lha min las pham nas/ /bcom

ldan 'das la zhus gsungs pa'i/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gzungs/ /gzungs de la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan tsam pa bskos rdzing 'gram/ /dge slong lnga brgya thabs cig tshe/ /bcom ldan dge slong rnams la bstod/ /'chi med rnga sgra phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom

ldan nyid kyis bka' stsal pa'i/ /rten 'brel gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis bka' stsal pa'i/ /rims zhi gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan rgya mtsho ma dros na/ /dge slong lnga brgya thabs cig ste/ /sems dpa' stong dang de nang nas/ /seng ge

rnam rtses rgyan nas gsungs/ /me tog brtsegs gzungs phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan bram ze yangs dbang gnas/ /bzhugs tshe bram zes sa dbang zhus/ /sa dbang gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan mnyan yod mig mangs khyams/ /bzhugs tshe ston pas

'khor la gsungs/ /kun tshogs 'gro lding rig sngags bstod/ /bcom ldan rgyal khab bya rgod kyi/ /phung rir dge slong nyi khri stong / /lnga brgya sems dpa' khrag khrig 'bum/ /du ma brgya byin lha tshogs bskor/ /de tshe ston pas bcom ldan la/ /spyan ras gzigs zhus gsungs pa yi/ /

yi ge nyung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan dge slong rnams la gsungs/ /lha mo 'od zer can gzungs bstod/ /bcom ldan kun dga' bo la gsungs/ /nyid rgyud tshogs bdag gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan legs par gnas la gsungs/ /dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs

la bstod/ /bcom ldan kun dga' bo la gsungs/ /yi ge drug pa'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid gsungs pha rol sgo/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan shAkya bde ldan don/ /gsungs pa rnam sbyor gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan kun dga' bo la gsungs/ /lag

na rdo rje bcu gzungs bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags bstod/ /bcom ldan gzi can la gsungs pa'i/ /gzi can zhus pa'i gzungs la bstod/ /kun nas de ni tshogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas yan lag gzungs la bstod/ /

kun dgas bcom ldan la zhus pa'i/ /gzhang 'brum sel ba'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan khyim bdag la gsungs pa'i/ /bu mang rton pa'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan dge slong rnams la gsungs/ /nad rnams zhi ba'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /

dug sel rig sngags phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan kun dga' bo la gsungs/ /mi rgod 'jigs pa'i gzungs la bstod/ /de dag kun nas tshogs pa yi/ /rgyal ba can gyi rig sngags bstod/ /lha bu rab brtan don gsungs pa'i/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal gzungs la bstod/ /spyan ras

gzigs kyis gsungs pa yi/ /bcu gcig zhal gyi gzungs la bstod/ /spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa yi/ /snying rje mi shol gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /phyir log rnam par rgyal gzungs bstod/ /bcom ldan dbang la gsungs pa yi/ /gtsug

gi nor bu'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /rin chen phreng ba'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan 'jam dpal la gsungs pa'i/ /tshe dpag med pa'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan kun dga' la gsungs pa'i/ /me kha la yi gzungs la bstod/ /bcom

ldan sems dpa' rnams la gsungs/ /sgo drug pa yi gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan dge slong rnams la gsungs/ /chos rgya mtsho yi gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan me mig bu la gsungs/ /sgo mtha' yas kyi gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan 'das gsungs pha rol phyin/ /tshul

brgya lnga bcu'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan sum brtsegs bsrung slad du/ /gdugs dkar gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /lus dbyibs mdzes gzungs phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzhan gzungs bcom ldan byin rlabs pa'i/ /dbugs chen

gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ /nag po chen po'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /gos sngon gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ /mi 'jigs gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

bcom ldan phyag rdor la gsungs pa'i/ /gza' yum gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzhan gsungs bcom ldan byin rlabs pa/ /gnam lcags gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /kun tshogs rdo rje mchu yi gzungs/ /rdo rje mchu yi gzungs la bstod/ /kun tshogs ri rab khang pa

brtsegs/ /rdo rje khang brtsegs gzungs la bstod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni 'khor brgyad po/ /sde tshan brgya ni rtsa brgyad dang / /gzungs sngags bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /kun nas tshogs pa stobs po che/ /stobs po che yi gzungs la bstod/ /nor bu dri med don gsungs pa'i/ /

gtsug tor dri med gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nam mkha'i snying la gsungs/ /sangs rgyas bdun pa'i gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /sgrol mchog gi ni gzungs la bstod/ /ston pas kun dga' la gsungs pa/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer gzungs la

bstod/ /khyim bdag zla ba la gsungs pa'i/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan byams pa la gsungs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bcu gnyis gzungs la bstod/ /lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa'i/ /sgo bzangs gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /blo gros rnam dag la gsungs

pa'i/ /dri ma med pa'i gzungs la bstod/ /'jam dbyangs gzhon nus gsungs pa yi/ /khyad par can gyi gzungs la bstod/ /phyag stong spyan stong gsungs pa yi/ /rgyal chen thogs med gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /sman bla mched bdun gzungs

la bstod/ /ston pa nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /lha mo par+Na'i gzungs la bstod/ /ston pa nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /ri khrod lo gyon gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /dpal lha lung bstan gzungs la bstod/ /bde gshegs sku bsdu bsod nams ldan/ /

uSh+NI Sha yi gzungs la bstod/ /kun tshogs dkon mchog ta la ste/ /dkon mchog ta la'i gzungs la bstod/ /'jigs byed rang gis gsungs pa yi/ /'jigs byed kyi ni gzungs la bstod/ /spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa yi/ /don yod zhags pa

phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /stobs chen gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /sprin chen nyid kyi gzungs la bstod/ /ston pa

nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /sprin chen rlung 'khor gzungs la bstod/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /snang mtha' gzungs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gzhan yang bde gshegs gsungs pa yi/ /bde gshegs byin rlabs gzhan gsungs dang / /gzhan gsungs bde

gshegs byin rlabs dang / /sa thob sems dpas gsungs pa dang / /de dag kun dang tshogs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad nas/ /gzungs kyi glegs bam ji snyed bzhugs/ /de dag mtshan nas ma smos kyang / /sgo gsum dang ba yis ni bstod/ /sgo drug zhi khro'i lha

tshogs dang / /de yi gsung gi rgyud drug dang / /de 'dzin sgrub pa phyir mi ldog /yul gsum gyi ni spyan sngar ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon nga dang ni/ /gzungs 'dzin slob ma rnams kyi ni/ /mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu/ /sdig pa'i las ni ci spyad pa/ /mthol lo bshags so yul

gsum la/ /de nas glegs bam zhal phye ste/ /rim pa bzhin du 'di skad do/ /stong chen mo yi glegs bam la/ /gzungs ni 'dzin slob rnams kyis ni/ /bklags dang bklag tu gsol ba dang / /rim pa'i cho ga spyad pa yis/ /stong chen mo yi glegs bam 'di/ /lus la 'chang ngo sems

la gnas/ /ngag gis brjod dang phud du khur/ /spyi bor len no gzungs 'di'o/ /de bsgres rim pas spyi bor blangs/ /rig pa gtad pa'i cho ga ni/ /rdzas lngar lhar bskyed mchod bstod bya/ /de nas 'dod pa'i lha gcig ni/ /slob ma'i mig la phab nas ni/ /'di skad du ni brjod par bya/ /gzungs 'dzin

pa yi bu khyod ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon nga la nyon/ /rang 'dod lha la lta bar gyis/ /lha 'di yid la bsgom par gyis/ /dang po mos yul byed pa yin/ /gnyis pa gsal bar byed pa yin/ /gsum pa sku rdzogs dngos su mthong / /bzhi pa lung bstan thob gyur nas/ /rgyud rnams kun la longs spyod de/ /rgyud

don thams cad khyod kyis khrol/ /'dod lha 'di la mos sems 'byung / /khyod kyi skye ba snga rol gyi/ /las 'phro 'dir ni sad pa yin/ /sgrubs shig sgrubs shig rim gyis 'byung / /sku yi rig pa de gtad do/ /de ba ka sa oM/ /de nas brjod pa'i tshig de ni/ /slob ma'i lce thog bzhag nas ni/ /

'di skad du ni brjod par bya/ /gzungs 'dzin pa yi bu khyod ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon nga la nyon/ /brjod pa gsung gi sngags 'di ni/ /sngags ma yin pa'i tshig dang ni/ /nam yang bsre bar ma byed cig /bla ma yis ni ma gsungs pa/ /de la bdag par ma byed cig /gsung gi rig pa da gtad de/ /phreng

ba snying ga la gtad nas/ /'di skad du ni brjod par bya/ /gzungs 'dzin pa yi bu khyod ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon nga la nyon/ /rig pa grangs su 'dzin byed cing / /sbyin dang ldan pa'i bgrang 'phreng 'di/ /brgyan phyir 'chang bar ma byed cig /'gom zhing smad par ma byed cig /sdig can lag tu ma gtad cig /

thugs kyi rig pa da gtad do/ /de ba tsin+ta hUM/ /glegs bam spyi bo'i steng bzhag ste/ /'di skad du ni brjod par bya/ /gzungs 'dzin pa yi bu khyod ni/ /rig pa'i slob dpon nga la nyon/ /gsang sngags chos 'di rtogs dka' ste/ /mi shes rmongs pa ma byed cig /yid gnyis the tshom ma 'cha' cig /log pa

yi ni shes rab kyis/ /mkhyen chos rig pa ma gzung cig /bla ma bsten cing spros pa chod/ /gsang sngags chos la thogs med spyod/ /rgyud nyan pa yi snod du rung / /rgyud don slob ma gsal bar gyis/ /yon tan ji snyed gdeng du ldan/ /yon tan rig pa da gtad do/ /rat+na sarba ma hA oM AHhUM/ /rdo rje

dril bu lag gtad do/ /'di skad du ni bya ba yin/ /rdo rje dril bu rang bzhin gyis/ /thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel la/ /phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas/ /'gro ba'i don la deng du bskul/ /phrin las rig pa da gtad do/ /de ba karma oM AHhUM/ /de nas phrin las 'di skad bcol/ /yum chen pha rol phyin

ma dang / /ye shes dbang bskur dpal ldan ma/ /rdo rje mi pham so sor 'brang / /sdig pa spong ba gdugs dkar mo/ /bdud 'joms sgo mtha' sgrub pa ste/ /de ltar 'gro mgon de rnams kyi/ /klu dang gnod sbyin mi min sogs/ /'byung po gdon tshogs bzlog pa dang / /'dod

chags zhe sdang gti mug las/ /gyur na sdig pa sbyong du gsol/ /yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po/ /rnam thos sras dang mig mi bzang / /phyogs skyong rgyal po khyed kyis kyang / /gzung 'dzin phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang / /bsrung ba dus su mdzad du gsol/ /tshangs pa dang ni dbang

phyug dang / /khyab 'jug dang ni drang srong dang / /gzung 'dzin phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang / /bsrung ba dus su mdzad du gsol/ /lha mo nag dang mgon pos kyang / /gzung 'dzin phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang / /bsrung ba dus su mdzad du gsol/ /de dag sems dpa' bde gshegs rnams/ /

spyan 'dren skabs 'dres phrin las bcol/ /rma bya che dang bsil ba'i tshal/ /gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma ste/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /glegs bam de la bklag pa dang / /klog tu stsal dang cho ga brgyad/ /de lta bu yi mthu yis ni/ /gzungs dang mthun pa'i

phan yon stsol/ /rdo rje mchu dang gnam lcags mchu/ /sprin chen rlung dkyil sprin chen mo/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /rgyal ba can dang be con che/ /bar du gcod sbyong 'gro lding ste/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /'od zer can dang yi ge drug /gzi can

zhus dang mig rnams sbyong / /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /lag na rdo rje bcu gzungs dang / /mdangs phyir 'phrog dang gzhang 'brum sel/ /bu ni mang po rton pa'i gzungs/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /stobs chen dang ni me kha la/ /dbugs chen

gzugs dang gza' kun yum/ /bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /rgyal mtshan dpung rgyan gzungs dang ni/ /gser can dang ni nor gyi gtsug /dgra 'joms pa yi gzungs yin te/ /tshe 'di la ni sman pa yi/ /ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma smos kyang / /

bgegs 'joms 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /spyan ras gzigs yum me tog brtsegs/ /tsan+dan yan lag dbang bskur gzungs/ /tshogs spel 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /yi ge nyung du sgo drug gzungs/ /las kyi sgrib pa sbyong gzungs dang / /snying rje mi bshol ba yi gzungs/ /phyi ma la ni sman pa

yi/ /ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma smos kyang / /tshogs spel 'ba' zhig gzungs yin te/ /gtsug tor gdugs dkar rin chen phreng / /rnam 'joms ri khrod lo ma gyon/ /bgegs 'joms gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /tshe 'di nyid la sman gtso ba/ /

ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma brjod kyang / /bgegs 'joms gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /sangs rgyas snying po sa dbang gzungs/ /sgo mtha' yas dang don yod zhags/ /tshogs spel gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal dri ma med/ /

sangs rgyas kyi ni 'khor brgyad kyi/ /mtshan ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad gzungs/ /tshogs spel gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /phyi ma'i tshogs su gtso bo yi/ /ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma smos kyang / /tshogs spel gtso bo'i gzungs yin te/ /'chi med

rnga sgra gzungs chen po/ /kun du bzang dang rten 'brel gzungs/ /cha snyoms pa yi gzungs yin te/ /sangs rgyas yan lag dbyig dang ldan/ /bcu gcig zhal gzungs lha mo lnga/ /cha snyoms pa yi gzungs yin te/ /lus kyi dbyibs mdzes chos rgya mtsho/ /tshe dpag med

gzungs khyad par can/ /stobs po che yi gzungs dang ni/ /rdo rje ri rab khang brtsegs gzungs/ /cha mnyam pa yi gzungs yin te/ /'di dang phyi mar sman pa'i gzungs/ /ji snyed pa yi gzungs bzhugs pa/ /de dag mtshan nas ma smos kyang / /ma mnyam pa yi gzungs

yin te/ /gong gi tshig gzhug kun la gdags/ /de nas rig pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /sgo yi them par rkang bzhag la/ /yangs pa'i grong khyer 'jug gzungs kyis/ /gsang sngags dang po bi sa nas/ /nyin mtshan chos kyang spyod par shog /dngos su gsungs pa'i bka' tsho yi/ /

gsang sngags tshigs bcad bcas pa yis/ /nang du kha bltas lan cig dang / /de bzhin phyi ru lan gnyis so/ /gdugs dkar rnam rgyal snying po yang / /gro gshog bu la bris la/ /gtor ma dang bcas sgo khar gzung / /de rtsar de ni tshar re gdon/ /de nas

bsrung pa'i 'khor lo bri/ /dkyil 'khor pho brang 'dra ba bri/ /'khor lo pad+ma 'dra ba bri/ /de dag dgod pa'i yi ge ni/ /so so'i lha yi mtshan dang ni/ /de de so so'i snying po dang / /yang na de yi sngags bzhugs dang / /ming rus srungs shig bcas pa yi/ /ze 'bru la ni A li dang / /

mu khyud la ni kA li'o/ /tha ma mi shigs me ri'o/ /de ni phyi yi srung 'khor ro/ /dgra 'joms pa yi srung 'khor ni/ /khor yug gsum pa bri bar bya/ /de ni mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi/ /kha phyir bstan pas mtha' skor bri/ /de la dgod pa'i sngags bri ba/ /dang po gser can snying po ni/ /gnyis

pa rgyal mtshan rgyan yin no/ /gsum pa gtsug tor nor bu'o/ /phyir zlog 'khor lo bri bya ba/ /'khor lo lte rim bzhi pa la/ /bcu drug rtsibs ldan 'khor lo bri/ /dang po'i lte rim gdugs dkar ro/ /gnyis pa phyir zlog stobs can no/ /gsum pa phyir zlog rin chen phreng / /bzhi pa

hUM gis bskor ba'o/ /rtsibs la yang ni hUM dgod do/ /de bzhin dpyad de mkhas pas kyang / /man ngag bzhin du dpyad de bri/ /bden tshig 'di dang bcas pa yis/ /de la bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gdags/ /na mo sangs rgyas kyi bka' bden pa dang / chos kyi bka' bden pa dang /

dge 'dun gyi bka' bden pa dang / sgo drug zhi khro'i tshogs kyi bka' bden pa dang / brgyud pa'i bla ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i thod pa can gyi bka' bden pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa bzhi yi bden pa yi/ /gzung 'dzin slob ma 'di la srungs shig /'byung po mi dang mi ma yin

pas 'di la tho 'tshams par ma byed cig /sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di 'brub kyang srid/ nam mkha' ni lag pas mnan du btub kyang srid/ sems can gcig tu gyur yang srid/ nyi zla ni sa la ltung yang srid/ rlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung yang srid/ me ni chu ru 'gyur yang

srid/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi gzhan du 'gyur yang srid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/ /de bas na khyed kyis 'di la gnod pa ma byed cig /de nas smon lam 'di skad do/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzungs 'di la/ /rdo rje slob dpon nga yis ni/ /bklags dang

bklag tu stsal ba dang / /mchod bstod bkur sti bcas pa dang / /rig pa'i cho ga spyad pa yis/ /dge ba 'di yi stobs kyis ni/ /sna tshogs gzungs nas brjod pa yi/ /zhing 'dir bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /zhing khams gzhan bzhugs sangs rgyas kyi/ /de dag spyan

sngar skyes nas ni/ /sna tshogs gzungs la spyod par shog /bskyed rdzogs rnam gnyis sgom par shog /de bsgoms mngon par sangs rgyas shog /sngon tshe dge slong sa ri la/ /gdug pa klu yis gzir ba'i tshe/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya ches/ /bsrung zhing sbas pa byas pa ltar/ /

gzung 'dzin slob ma 'di la yang / /sngon tshe dge slong sa ri bzhin/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya ches/ /bsrung zhing sba bar byed par shog /sngon tshe bram ze khyab 'jug ni/ /gdug pa klu yis gzir ba'i tshe/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya mchus/ /bsrung zhing sba bar byas pa ltar/ /

gzung 'dzin slob ma 'di la yang / /sngon tshe khyab 'jug ji bzhin du/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje mchus/ /bsrung zhing sba bar byed par shog /sngon tshe shAkya'i bu mo ni/ /sa 'tsho ma la sogs pa la/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang / /bsrung zhing sba bar byed pa ltar/ /gzung 'dzin

slob ma 'di la yang / /sa 'tsho ma la sogs bzhin du/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang / /bsrung zhing sba bar byed par shog /sngon tshe khyim bdag zla bzangs la/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs kyis ni/ /dbul po'i bro nad bsal ba ltar/ /gzung 'dzin slob ma 'di la yang / /

khyim bdag zla ba bzang po bzhin/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di ni/ /dbul dang bro nad sel bar shog /sngon tshe lha bu rab brtan la/ /rgyud bdun skye bo myong 'gyur ba/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal zhi byas bzhin/ /gzung 'dzin slob ma 'di la yang / /lha bu rab tu brtan pa

bzhin/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal gzungs kyis ni/ /bsrung zhing sba bar byed par shog /sngon tshe lha dbang brgya byin la/ /lha ma yin gyis pha ma byas te/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo gser can gyis/ /g.yul bzlog bsrung ba byas pa bzhin/ /gzung 'dzin slob ma

'di la yang / /lha dbang brgya byin bzhin du ni/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo gser can gyis/ /g.yul bzlog srung ba byed par shog /sna tshogs pa yi gzungs nang nas/ /gang zag gcig la phan btags dang / /sems can kun la phan btags gzungs/ /snying rje phan yon de dag kun/ /
