bdag dang khams gsum sems can la/ /'di dang phyi mar 'byung bar shog /sna tshogs pa yi gzungs la ni/ /phyin ci ma log spyod par shog /sna tshogs gzungs mchog spyad pa yi/ /nyon mongs dri ma dag par shog /ye shes gzungs don bsgoms pa yi/ /shes bya'i

sgrib pa dag par shog /smon lam rgya chen btab pa yis/ /snying rje byang chub sems ldan shog /ye shes tshogs kyi rgyu mthun gyis/ /thugs gsang chos sku thob par shog /bsod nams tshogs kyi rgyu mthun gyis/ /gsung gsang longs sku thob par shog /smon

lam snying rje'i rgyu mthun gyis/ /sku gsang sprul sku thob par shog /bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams/ /sems can don ni thogs med du/ /byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul ma thob par/ /zhing gzhan dam par skye bar shog /don byed rdzu 'phrul thob nas kyang / /

gdul dka'i sems can gang 'dul du/ /der skyes de rnams 'dul bar shog /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /ma lus kun gyi zhal mthong shog /sangs rgyas zhing khams bsam mi khyab/ /thams cad khyab par 'gro bar shog /sangs rgyas

chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la nyan par shog /gdul bya'i sems can bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la 'dul bar shog /rtag tu tshe rabs gar skyes kyang / /rigs bzang dag tu skye bar shog /gzhon la rab tu 'byung bar shog /bud

med tshogs ni thams cad la/ /mi gtsang phung por shes par shog /rtag tu tshangs par spyod par shog /snying rje tshul khrims rgyan ldan shog /bshes gnyen yon tan ldan pa la/ /rtag tu bsnyen bkur byed par shog /spyod pa yid 'ong grogs bzangs dang / /rtag

tu rab tu 'grogs par shog /rtag tu nyon mongs chung bar shog /kun la mi phongs spyod par shog /kun gyis bzang por mthong bar shog /bud med tshogs ni yong med cing / /gos zas sems bskyed 'byung ba bzhin/ /nub phyogs bde ba can zhing du/ /rin

chen pad+ma las skye shog /sna tshogs gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /gson la drug dang gshin la gnyis/ /rten la gcig dang gson gshin rten/ /gsum gyi las la 'bad par shog /dag cing gtsang la gzungs kyi chos/ /spyod lam mkhas pa slob dpon

dang / /rtag tu mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /dben pa'i nags khrod nyams dga' ru/ /gnyen 'dun 'byor pa kun bor te/ /'jig rten chos brgyad phyir spangs nas/ /thar pa'i yid ches ma gtogs pa/ /rnam rtog gzhan ni mi 'byung bar/ /ye shes gzungs

don bsgom par shog /sna tshogs gzugs mchog spyod par shog /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul mthu thob shog /'jug pa byang chub sems kyi ni/ /gzhan don thogs med byed par shog /bgegs 'joms sna tshogs gzungs thob shog /bgegs 'joms sna

tshogs gzungs thob nas/ /'jigs byed khro bo'i skur sprul te/ /'byung po thams cad 'dul bar shog /tshogs spel sna tshogs gzungs thob shog /tshogs spel sna tshogs gzungs thob nas/ /'phags pa'i sa la gnas nas ni/ /ye shes bsod nams tshogs

thob shog /de dag spyi yi cho ga'o/ /bye brag cho ga byed gyur na/ /rgyud ni rnam pa gnyis su gnas/ /cho ga mngon rtogs la rgyud dang / /zin pa tsam du ston rgyud do/ /mngon rtogs gsal ba 'ga' mi snang / /cho ga gsal ba'i gzungs bzhin du/ /de nang bzhin du

bsam par bya/ /sgrub pa'i thabs bzhin mngon rtogs bsgom/ /de yi snying po bzlas byas te/ /spyi yi cho ga 'di nang nas/ /dgos pa btus te 'di dang sbyar/ /bye brag cho ga ldan pa yin/ /zin pa tsam du ston rgyud kyi/ /rgyud kyi zin tshig la

brten nas/ /tshad ldan bstan bcos rgyas par dgrol/ /de bkrol bzhin du cho ga bshad/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzungs 'di la/ /shes rab blo yi me long gis/ /rin chen grags pas mthong nas ni/ /sany+tsa klus zin don du ni/ /rang lha yis ni snang bzhin du/ /

sna tshogs gzungs nas bsdus nas byas/ /'jig rten pa yi grags 'dod cing / /zang zing bsod nams phyir ma yin/ /snying rjes brlan sems bstan pa yin/ /de bstan dge ba ci thob cing / /kun gyi rnam smin dag pa dang / /'gro ba gnod las rgyal gyur

cig /bdag gi bstan bcos rgyas gyur cig /kun don 'di yis grub par shog /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rin chen grags pas mdzad pa/ gzungs spyi'i cho ga kun snang gsal ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //bal po ma hA pA na'i rang 'gyur ro/ /tsheg

bar bdun pa'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sA d+ha naM sarba karma nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrub thabs thams cad kyi las ka zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum mgon po 'gro don mdzad/ /ston pa de la gus btud

de/ /sgrub pos nang dang nub sogs su/ /tshogs chen dag ni bsags pa dang / /sgrub thabs kun na mi gsal ba'i/ /bdun po rnam dag gsal bar bstan/ /bde gshegs mtha' dag mkha' la dmigs/ /dus gsum gyi ni bla ma dang / /phyogs rnams kun gyi

bde gshegs dang / /phyag 'os kun la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mi mjed 'jig rten 'di 'am ni/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ /mchod pa bla na yod pa dang / /mchod pa bla na med pa yis/ /de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa nas/ /

nyon mongs srad bus bcings gyur pas/ /mi shes dbang gis bgyis pa yi/ /lci dang yang ba'i sdig bsags pa/ /mgon po'i tshogs la so sor bshags/ /'das dus sangs rgyas ji snyed dang / /da ltar phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs/ /de bzhin gang dag ma

byon dang / /dus gsum sangs rgyas de dag gis/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos bstan gsol/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas de dag gis/ /'khor bar 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis gzigs mdzod la/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs

su gsol/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas dge ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba dang / /nyan thos rang rgyal dge ba dang / /'jig rten dge ba ci spyod pa/ /de dag la yang yi rang ngo / /zag bcas dge ba ci bsags pa/ /de bzhin zag med dge ba

gang / /dge ba'i tshogs ni ci bsags pa/ /byang chub sems dpar bsngo bar gyis/ /bdun po rnam dag re re la/ /se gol gyi ni sgra yang bsgrags/ /de ltar bsod nams tshogs bsags nas/ /ye shes tshogs ni 'di lta ste/ /mu stegs skye bo tha mal

bzhin/ /stong pa tsam gyis bsgyur nas ni/ /phyal bar bya ba'i ma yin te/ /dman pa yi ni byang chub bzhin/ /'ga' zhig stong pa'i tshul la ni/ /'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa bzhin/ /gzugs las stong pa gzhan mi btsal/ /

'khrul ngor bstan pa'i gzugs su snang / /gzugs dang stong pa dbyer med na/ /gzugs ni rnam par dag pa yin/ /gzugs nyid stong par shes par bya/ /dper na chu yi zla ba bzhin/ /de ltar ye shes tshogs bsags bya/ /tshogs gnyis bsags

pas sgrib gnyis byang / /bskyed rim 'byung ba'i dgos pa yin/ /de nas so so'i sgrub thabs bzhin/ /bskyed tshul lha de gsal bar bskyed/ /bskyed rim bsgom pa'i rnam gnyis te/ /rtogs pa can dang rtogs pa dman/ /rtogs pa can gyis 'di ltar bsgom/ /

gang bskyed pa yi lha de ni/ /nam mkha' yi ni 'ja' tshon bzhin/ /gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom/ /chu la zla ba shar ba bzhin/ /snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom/ /rtogs pa dman pas 'di ltar bsgom/ /yod par rag pa'i rnam pa

dang / /'bur btod ris su bris bzhin du/ /gong ltar gsal ba'i rnam par bsgom/ /de ltar bskyed rim bsgoms nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i tshul ni rnam pa gnyis/ /don dam dang ni kun rdzob dang / /don dam bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /rtogs pa can gyi bskyed rim bzhin/ /

yengs med gsal bar bsgoms nas ni/ /yul gzung 'dzin pa yongs spangs nas/ /rtogs pa thams cad bkag nas ni/ /nam mkha' stong las sgra 'byung zhing / /sgra de yang ni rang bzhin med/ /chos nyid kyi ni rang sgra'o/ /kun rdzob phrin las bzhi bzlas

pas/ /zhi ba'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /sngags brjod sngags kyi 'od zer ni/ /nyi zer lta bur phyogs bcur 'phro/ /ma lus kun la phog pas ni/ /kun gyi gnod sems zhi byas te/ /phan sems byams sems ldan gyur nas/ /sgrub po nyid la 'dug par bsam/ /

rgyas pa'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /sngags 'od nyi zer lta bu ni/ /'dom gang tshad nas khugs pa'i tshul/ /rang gi lus la phog pas ni/ /lus kyi tshe bsod rgyas par bsam/ /dbang gi bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /sngags 'od lcags kyu lta bus ni/ /phyogs

bcur 'phros te ma lus bkug /sgrub pa'i las ka ci bya zhes/ /phyag dang bcas pas 'dud par bsam/ /drag po'i bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ /sngags 'od me lce lta bus ni/ /phyogs bcu kun du 'phros pa ste/ /rang gnod bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg /

mi bzad skad ngan chen po yis/ /sgrub pa po la skyabs gsol bsam/ /de skye thun mtshams 'di lta ste/ /gtor dbul ye shes nam mkhar dbyung / /yid kyis phar mchod byin gyis tshur brlabs bsam/ /se gol sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /ye shes mchog

'byung mgon po khyod kyis ni/ /dngos grub chen po stsal du gsol/ /slar gshegs slar yang 'byon du gsol/ /bstan bcos brtsam pa rnam gnyis te/ /sgra tshad dag las phul byung bas/ /lung dang mi 'gal don de gtan la 'bebs/ /mdo rgyud lung dang bstan

bcos nas drangs te/ /de nas rten dang de dang mi 'gal ba/ /des kyang 'ga' zhig brtsam par rigs pa yin/ /sgo drug gis ni bstan bcos brtsam pa ni/ /yi dam lha yi zhal mthong dang / /de yis gnang ba byin pa dang / /dngos grub kun la dbang thob

pas/ /mdo rgyud lung dang bstan bcos las drangs nas/ /de la rten dang de dang mi 'gal bas/ /des ni brtsam par rigs pa yin/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi bka' las kyang / /bskyed rim gsal bar ma bstan te/ /bskyed rim gsal bar ma gyur

na/ /don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /de bskyed gsal bar bstan gyur nas/ /shes rab 'chal ba'i gang zag gis/ /slob dpon med par zhugs gyur nas/ /bdag nyid phung ba kho nar zad/ /yang na de dus 'khor rnams kyis/ /bde gshegs

kyi ni byin rlabs kyis/ /de ni gsol ba kho na yin/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /blo chung sems can mang gyur te/ /mdo sde rnams las lung bstan te/ /da ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /blo chung sems can mar gyur te/ /de la dgongs te bde

gshegs kyis/ /nga dang 'dra ba'i gang zag gis/ /nga yi lung rnams 'grol bar bya/ /de skad lung nas 'byung ba ste/ /mtshan nyid ldan gyis bstan bcos brtsam/ /mtshan nyid mi ldan brtsams gyur nas/ /kun kyang dgongs par ma gyur pas/ /

de don gzhan du bstan byas nas/ /sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po rat+na kIrtis mdzad pa sgrub thabs thams cad kyi las ka gsal byed ces bya ba rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA da hr-i da ya

ka lpaM/ bod skad du/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi /rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka'

stsal te/ /de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong che/ /tshigs bcad 'di yi cho ga ni/ /sems can rnams la phan byed pa/ /las kun 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /cho ga bzhin du bshad par bya/ /de la re zhig sgrub pa po'i skyes bus dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu

dang ba chen pos bskyed par bya'o/ /'di snyam du yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sems can rnams kyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang / ldog pa gsungs te 'di

ltar las dang nyon mongs pa yod na ni sems can rnams 'khor bar 'jug par 'gyur la/ las dang nyon mongs pa med na ni sems can rnams 'khor ba las ldog go zhes bya ba'i bden pa'i tshig 'dis bdag gi cho ga zhib mo zhig grub par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i

'og tu 'di skad ces tshig brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs

rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rim pa 'dis de dag gi las thams

cad tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni cho ga zhib mo dang po yin no/ /de nas rang gi lag mthil lam lus la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa

me'i khams la snyoms par bzhugs par bsam par bya ste/ de lta bu ni lha rjes su dran pa'i cho ga yin no/ /da ni sbyor ba bri bar bya ste/ rims kyis btab pa dang / klad pa na ba dang mig na ba la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa tshigs su bcad pa 'dis lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis dbyung

ba'i tshul du byab par bya'o/ /rims nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rtag pa dang / rims mi bzad pas thebs pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba'i skud pa la bzlas brjod brgya byas pa gdags par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rims sel ba'i bdug pa'i ri lu dag ji

ltar 'dod par bzlas brjod byas nas bdug par bya'o/ /snying nad dang rtsib logs na bas thebs pa rnams la chu la bzlas brjod bcu'am bcu gnyis bzlas nas blud par bya'o/ /yang na nad de la phan pa'i sman dang bcas la bzlas brjod byas la blud do/ /g.yen pa dang /

rdo dang / 'brum bu dang / phol mig la sogs pa dang / rma red pa la grog tshang gi sa la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod byas nas bsku bar bya'o/ /gzhang 'brum mam pho mtshan 'brum bus thebs pa rnams la skyer khaN+Da'i ri lu'am byang chub sems dpa'i ri lu la bzlas brjod

byas nas bsku bar bya'o/ /mdor na nad kyi rnam pa gang gis thebs pa de la bdag nyid kyis tshab che chung shes par byas la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bzlas brjod mang ba'am nyung du nyi shu sum cu bzlas pas byug pa'am bsku bar bya'o/ /'khru bas thabs pa rnams la sman khu'am

ri lu'i rdzas kyi rigs gzhan la bzlas brjod lnga'am drug bzlas nas zar gzhug ste/ de lta bu'i nad gso ba'i cho ga yin no/ /de nas lo tog nas dang / gro dang / 'bras dang / sran mung+ga dang / mon sran dre'u dang / ras bal gyi shing dang / rgun 'brum dang / a ru ra la

sogs pa la za pa'i srin bu dang sbyar ba dang / phye ma leb dang / byi ba dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs la sogs pa kha bcing ba'i phyir zhing gi khyon shes par byas nas bye ma'am thal ba bye gang ngam/ de las lhag tsam la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas zhing la gtong bar

bya'o/ /de lta bu ni lo thog la phan pa'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du ha cang char ches na bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i me tog dman ma re re la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas/ bla gab med pa'i phyogs su ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa zhig

byas la/ dbus su bum pa bzhag nas steng du kham phor gzhag par bya'o/ /kham phor gyi nang du me tog dman pa bzlas brjod byas pa bsregs pas 'chad par 'gyur te/ 'di ni char bcad pa'i cho ga'o/ /de bzhin du ser ba bzlog pa la se'u'i lcug ma'am nya phyis lcug ma la

bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas sprin bzlog par bya'o/ /yang na yungs kar la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas thum por byas te/ se'u'i lcug ma'i thor tho la bcings nas bla gab med par gzugs te/ de lta bu ni sprin bzlog pa'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du 'byung

po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed kyi gdon gyis zin pa rnams bum pa'am zangs kyi ril bar yungs kar yang blugs/ dri'i rdzas ga pur dang / tsan+dan dang / gla rtsi la sogs pa yang bcu gnas bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod

rten nam/ dri gtsang khang ngam/ sa phyogs bde ba zhig tu bzhag la/ phyis sa phyogs gzhan par ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ me tog gis gtor la phyogs bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag ste/ gu gul gyi bdugs pas bdug par bya'o/ /de nas

bkru bar bya ba de gos dkar po bskon nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag la/ bum par sa bon thams cad dang rin po che thams cad bcug la/ rje btsun sangs rgyas la reg par byas pa'i chu'i rgyun gyis bkrus na/ nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /nad 'go ba

thams cad dang 'tshe ba thams cad thag ring por 'gyur ro/ /rim pa de ltar byas na 'byung po'i gdon dang / brjed byed dang / sha za la sogs pas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni bum pa'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyor ba gzhan yang byis pas

'jigs pa rnams la gi wang la bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas pas/ 'phags pa stobs po che bris la gtsang sbra byas la mgul bar gdags so/ /de bzhin du yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mgul du gdags so/ /gu gul gyi bdug pa la yang

dag par bzlas brjod gnyis sam gsum byas nas bdug go/ /mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la yungs kar dang gu gul gyi bdug pa la de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas pas bdug par bya'o/ /yang na skud pa la snga ma de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas nas mgul du gdags

te/ de lta bu ni byis pa gso ba'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du bud med bu thogs pa la chu la bzlas brjod lnga'am drug byas nas blud na legs par btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bud med mo gsham la rje btsun sangs rgyas kyi sku bsil ba'i chu la bzlas brjod

nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ khrus byas pas lus gtsang mar gyur pa la blud na bu tsha byung zhing phan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni rigs rgyud spel ba'i cho ga yin no/ /lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis skud pa la bzlas brjod lan bdun byas nas re re bzhin mdud pa dor bar bya'o/ /

yang na gos kyi mtha' la lan gnyis sam gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa bor na bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni lam du nyes pa mi 'byung ba'i cho ga yin no/ /shu dag tshon gang tsam lo gcig gi nyi ma'i grangs dang mnyam pa blangs nas grangs de tsam du

bzlas brjod byas la/ mar yang srang de tsam zhig la bzlas brjod byas nas bum pa gcig tu blugs te/ bkrus nas nyi ma re re zhing shu dag gi dum bu dang / mar srang gcig la bzlas brjod byas nas zos na yid gzhungs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ba

ser skya'i 'o ma dang mar dang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas pa'i 'o thug sna ma'i mgo lcogs kyis dkrugs te zos na yid gzhungs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur te/ de lta bu ni yid gzhungs pa'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du me tog dang / 'bras bu'am/ rtswa'am/ shing ngam

'jim pa lag pa g.yas pa'i chang par bcug la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig chang par bcug pa byin pa de dang mdza' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni mdza' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga yin no/ /de bzhin du ba lang dang rta la sogs pa phyugs 'chi bar nye bar gnas pa'i tshe chu yungs kar

dang bcas pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i thum po gdags so/ /de bzhin du mi rnams 'chi ba'i gnod pa 'byung ba la/ yungs kar la de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas pa'i thum po mgo skyob kyi thog tu gdags par bya ste/ 'di lta bu ni re zhig mi ngas dang

phyugs ngas gso ba'i cho ga yin no/ /re zhig ne rban rak+Shi ta/ bdag gis rang gi bla ma las tshigs su bcad pa mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyor ba brgya thos so/ /de yang yun rings pas kha cig ni brjod de/ che long kun bsdus pa yin no/ /'di thams cad

'grub pa la the tshom mi bya'o/ /nangs na yang gang la yid ches pas dad pa yod pa de la lhag par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar nges so/ /bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas dgos pa ci yang mi 'grub pa med do/ /tho gar yul nas skyes gyur pa/ /dge slong ne rban rak+Shi

tas/ /cho ga bzang po tshul bzhin du/ /rab tu 'bad nas bshad pa yin/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo/ /mkhan po ne+erban rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ pra tiSh+Tha bi byeH/ bod skad du/

rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la re zhig pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sgor byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed thob pa'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge tshul lam/ dge slong gi dge 'dun nam/ gang zag gi mchod rten nam/ bris

sku la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa byed pas gang rab tu gnas par bya ba mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de'i nye 'khor skyang nul byas te/ mthar tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po'i chus byugs nas/ mdun du maN+Dal gru bzhi pa khru gang yan chod nas ji tsam nus par byugs nas/

der pad+ma bdab ma brgyad pa tshon gyis bri bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa gser la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa kha rgyan dang / mgul dkris dang bcas par rin po che dang / sman dang / 'bru rnams gzhug cing tsan+dan dang / ga bur la sogs pa

dri zhim po dang sbyor ba'i chu klung gi chu gtsang mas dgang zhing / grangs kyang gcig nas brtsams te ji snyed 'byor pa gzhag par bya'o/ /me tog la sogs pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pa rnams kyang mdun du sta gon du byas la/ nang par snga dro'i dus su yid du 'ong ba'i bla re bres

pas mdzes pa'i gnas su sgrub pa pos stan bde ba la skyil mo krung la sogs pa mnyam par gzhag pa'i spyod lam gyis gnas te/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma byin la/ gser ram dngul gyi gzhi'am gro ga la'ang rung / tsan+dan dkar pos/ ye d+harmA he tu

pra b+ha bA tud+he ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ de ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH zhes pa tshar bdun du bris la/ tshar re re zhing lan bdun bdun bklags te/ bum pa'i chus bkrus la bum pa de nyid du bzhugs par bya'o/ /de nas bum pa'i steng du zla ba la sngags

kyi phreng ba dkar po 'od dang bcas pa skad cig gis bsams te/ de'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas lha'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams bkug la bum pa'i chu de sngags kyi phreng ba zhu ba dang lhan cig ro gcig tu gyur pas bum pa gang bar dmigs nas/ de lag pas

reg nas brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la mchod rten la sogs pa'i nang ngam snying gar zla ba la snga ma ltar sngags kyi phreng ba dmigs la/ de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khyab par bltas te/ des sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul nas/ gang zhig

rab tu gnas par bya ba mchod rten la sogs pa de'i gzugs kyis byon nas de dang de la thim pa dang / sngags la sogs pa thams cad ro gcig tu gyur par bsams nas/ lugs su blugs pa rnams la ni dngos su khrus bya'o/ /glegs bam la sogs pa rnams la ni me

long la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / glu dang / sgra dang bcas pas sngags bzlas bzhin du sngar gyi bum pa'i chus khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas dri zhim pos bsgos pa'i gos kyis sku phyi ba byas pa'i rjes la ci 'byor pa'i na bza' dang

rgyan rnams dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa ci 'byor pa rnams dbul lo/ /de'i rjes la lag pas reg nas snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mchod rten nam lugs sku'i nang du gro ga la snying po bris te gzhug go/ /glegs

bam bris sku'i ni mtha' mar bri'o/ /de ltar byas nas slar yang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod cing rol mo'i sgra yang bsgrags te/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skye dgu kun la rtag tu

byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden pa'i byin gang gis/ /bden 'di gsungs pa 'di la sdig med cing / /lhar bcas lha min gyis rtag mchod 'os pa'i/ /bden pa des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /dam chos bdud rtsi

thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /zhal nas gsungs pa bsil ba'i ro 'di yi/ /nyon mongs 'bar ba'i me yis gdungs pa yi/ /'gro kun sdug bsngal rtag tu zhi byed shog /ces brjod cing sngar gyi bum pa'i chu'i lhag mas rab tu gnas pa'i sa gzhi dang / gnas khang dag tu nyung

zad gtor bar bya'o/ /bya ba rnams rdzogs pa na rdul tshon la sogs pa rnams chu bo chen po'am/ khron pa rnying par dor nas sa gzhi lci ba sar pas byugs te/ rab gnas byed pa'i slob dpon dang / dge slong la mchod ston dang / yon dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas rten de la mchod

pa phul te/ yon bdag 'di'i ched du bzhugs la sems can gyi don mdzad par gsol ba gdab po/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga thun mong pa paN+Di ta dpal su ma ti kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mkhas pa de nyid dang lo tsA ba pradz+nyA kIrtis bsgyur ba'o//
